line.right: -im // 94 // </s><s> ADHY - @ OṢIT -ā ĀMIṢ -a PĀTR -a @ CĪVAR -e KUL -a @ SAṂSTAV -e c <g/> ^ <g/> aiva SAD ĀBHIYUKT -āḥ / KURV -īta SĀRDH -aṃ na hi teṣu SAṂSTAV -aṃ tān VARJAY -ed AGNIKHAD -hāṃ KHAD -āṃ yath <g/> ^ <g/> aiva // 95 // </s><s> yasy EPSIT -aṃ DHARṢAY -ituṃ hi MĀR -aṃ PRAVARTIT -uṃ CAKR -a @ VAR -aṃ hy ANUTTAR -am / SATTV - @ ĀRTH -am evaṃ VIPUL -aṃ ca KART -uṃ VARJY -āś ca ten <g/> ^ <g/> āpi ca PĀP -a @ MITR -āḥ // 96

line.left: SAṂSTAV -aṃ tān VARJAY -ed AGNIKHAD -hāṃ KHAD -āṃ yath <g/> ^ <g/> aiva // 95 // </s><s> yasy EPSIT -aṃ DHARṢAY -ituṃ hi MĀR -aṃ PRAVARTIT -uṃ CAKR -a @ VAR -aṃ hy ANUTTAR -am / SATTV - @ ĀRTH -am evaṃ VIPUL -aṃ ca KART -uṃ VARJY -āś ca ten <g/> ^ <g/> āpi ca PĀP -a @ MITR -āḥ // 96 // </s><s> VIVARJAY -itvā ca PRIY -ā @ PRIY -āṇi LĀBH -aṃ YAŚO BHAṆḌAN -a @ MĀN -am ĪRṢY -ām / eṣeta NITY -aṃ sada BUDDH -a @ JÑĀN -aṃ ya ICCHAT -e BUDHY -itum AGR -a @
line.right: -im // 97 // </s><s> CATVĀR -a ime RĀṢṬRAPĀL -a BODHISATTV -ānāṃ DUḤKH -a @ VIPĀK -ā DHARM -āḥ / </s><s> KATAM -e CATVĀR -aḥ ? </s><s> JÑĀN -en ĀBHIMANYANAT -ā RĀṢṬRAPĀL -a BODHISATTV -ānāṃ DUḤKH -a @ VIPĀK -o DHARM -aḥ / </s><s> ĪRṢY -ā @ MĀTSARY -a @ CITT -aṃ RĀṢṬRAPĀL -a BODHISATTV -ānāṃ DUḤKH -a @ VIPĀK -o DHARM -āḥ / </s><s> an @ ADHIMUKT -ī RĀṢṬRAPĀL -a BODHISATTV -ānāṃ DUḤKH -a @ VIPĀK -o DHARM -aḥ / </s><s> a @ PARIŚUDDH -a @ JÑĀN -a @ KṢĀNT -i @ SAṂBHOG -a @ PARYEṢṬ -ī RĀṢṬRAPĀL -a BODHISATTV -ānāṃ DUḤKH -a @ VIPĀK

line.left: @ GAṆ -e ca na tasy ADHIMUKT -iḥ / ŚIKṢ -a DHUT -eṣu na tasy ADHIMUKT -iḥ PĀP -am at ESTR -ir APĀY -a @ MUKH -asya // 100 // </s><s> sa itaś CYUT -o hi MAN -u JEṢ -u KARM -a @ VAŚ -ād a @ BUDH -o hi VIMŪḌH -aḥ / NARAK -eṣv atha TIRYA -g GAT -iṣu PRET -a GAT -iṣu ca VAND -ati DUḤKH -am / </s><s> 101 // </s><s> yasya MAT -ir BHUV -i LOKAPRADĪP -o DUḤKH - @ AKṢ -a @ YĀNTAK -aro NARAVĪR -aḥ / tena APĀY -a @ PATH -aṃ PRAV -i @ HĀY -a

line.left: -am / BADH -yati tebhi sa DṚṢṬ -i @ ŚAT -ebhiḥ PAṄK -i GAJ -o yatha DURBALAK -āyaḥ // 103 // </s><s> KUL -a @ SAṂSTAV -a @ BANDHAN -a @ YUKT -oyas tu PRAMATT -a sadā GRAH -a @ CITT -aḥ / JÑĀN -a @ VIVARJIT -a MŪḌH -a @ MAT -iś ca BADH -yati ebhi a @ YUKT -a @ CAR -ībhiḥ // 104 // </s><s> yo hy ata ICCHAT -i DUḤKH -a @ BHAY -ebhyo JĀT -i @ JAR -ā @ MARAṆ - @ ĀD -i @ VIMOKṢ -am / so AVAMANYAN -a MANYAN -a TYAKTV -ā YUJ -yati

line.left: -su PRAYUJYAT -a BHŪM -i @ GUṆ -eṣu BAL - @ ENDRIY -a @ JÑĀN -e / SARV -a @ GUṆ -aiś ca sadā SAMUPET -ā BUDDH -a BHAV -ej JAR -a @ PAÑJAR -a @ MUKT -aḥ // 107 // </s><s> KALP -a ACINTIY -a PŪRV -a CAR -antaḥ SATTV -a @ HITĀY -a CARAN VAR -a @ BODH -au / DĀN -a @ DAM -e NIYAM -e api ca NITY -aṃ su @ STHIT -a āsi TYAJ -itva ca JÑĀT -īn // 108 // </s><s> PRĀNT -a @ VAN -e sada NITY -a RAT -o AHAṂ ŚOṢIT -a ĀŚRAY -u
line.right: -i @ NIDĀN -am / na ca SAṂSṚT -u VĪRY -aṃ KADĀCID eṣata JÑĀN -a MAHĀPURUṢ -āṇām // 109 // </s><s> BHAV -a @ CĀRAK -e JAGAT i DṚṢṬ -vā PAÑC -a GAT -i @ BHRAM -a @ BHRĀM -ita SATTV -ān / KṚTV -a KṚP -āṃ VIPUL -ām iha PŪRV -e ĀRJIT -a BODH -i BAL -āj JAG -ad ARTH -e // 110 // </s><s> DUHIT -ṛ SVAS -utāḥ PRIY -a @ BHĀRY -āḥ TYAKT -a PUR -ā DHAN -a @ DHĀNY -a PRABHŪT -āḥ / JĪVIT -a IṢṬ -a MAH -ī su @ SAMṚDDH -ā eṣata BODH -i @ VAR

line.left: CARAN VAR -a @ BODH -au / DĀN -a @ DAM -e NIYAM -e api ca NITY -aṃ su @ STHIT -a āsi TYAJ -itva ca JÑĀT -īn // 108 // </s><s> PRĀNT -a @ VAN -e sada NITY -a RAT -o AHAṂ ŚOṢIT -a ĀŚRAY -u BODH -i @ NIDĀN -am / na ca SAṂSṚT -u VĪRY -aṃ KADĀCID eṣata JÑĀN -a MAHĀPURUṢ -āṇām // 109 // </s><s> BHAV -a @ CĀRAK -e JAGAT i DṚṢṬ -vā PAÑC -a GAT -i @ BHRAM -a @ BHRĀM -ita SATTV -ān / KṚTV -a KṚP -āṃ VIPUL -ām iha PŪRV -e ĀRJIT -a
line.right: -i BAL -āj JAG -ad ARTH -e // 110 // </s><s> DUHIT -ṛ SVAS -utāḥ PRIY -a @ BHĀRY -āḥ TYAKT -a PUR -ā DHAN -a @ DHĀNY -a PRABHŪT -āḥ / JĪVIT -a IṢṬ -a MAH -ī su @ SAMṚDDH -ā eṣata BODH -i @ VAR -āṃ BAH -u KALP -ān // 111 // </s><s> PHAL -a @ PUṢP -a @ JAL - @ ĀḌHY -a su @ RAMY -a āsi VAN -e MUN -i KṢĀNT -i @ RAT -o AHAM / CHINN -a KAR -au CARAṆ -au KAL -i @ RĀJÑ -ā n <g/> ^ <g/> aiva MAN -o api

line.left: -a ĀŚRAY -u BODH -i @ NIDĀN -am / na ca SAṂSṚT -u VĪRY -aṃ KADĀCID eṣata JÑĀN -a MAHĀPURUṢ -āṇām // 109 // </s><s> BHAV -a @ CĀRAK -e JAGAT i DṚṢṬ -vā PAÑC -a GAT -i @ BHRAM -a @ BHRĀM -ita SATTV -ān / KṚTV -a KṚP -āṃ VIPUL -ām iha PŪRV -e ĀRJIT -a BODH -i BAL -āj JAG -ad ARTH -e // 110 // </s><s> DUHIT -ṛ SVAS -utāḥ PRIY -a @ BHĀRY -āḥ TYAKT -a PUR -ā DHAN -a @ DHĀNY -a PRABHŪT -āḥ / JĪVIT -a IṢṬ -a MAH -ī su @ SAMṚDDH -ā eṣata
line.right: -i @ VAR -āṃ BAH -u KALP -ān // 111 // </s><s> PHAL -a @ PUṢP -a @ JAL - @ ĀḌHY -a su @ RAMY -a āsi VAN -e MUN -i KṢĀNT -i @ RAT -o AHAM / CHINN -a KAR -au CARAṆ -au KAL -i @ RĀJÑ -ā n <g/> ^ <g/> aiva MAN -o api tadā MAM -a DUṢṬ -am // 112 // </s><s> VAN -a @ KANDAR -i ŚYĀM -aku NĀM -a āsi MUN -ir BHARAT -o GUR -u JĪRṆ -o / DṚḌH -a @ BĀṆ -a @ HAT -ena NṚP -eṇa n <g/> ^ <g/> aiva MAN

line.left: / CHINN -a KAR -au CARAṆ -au KAL -i @ RĀJÑ -ā n <g/> ^ <g/> aiva MAN -o api tadā MAM -a DUṢṬ -am // 112 // </s><s> VAN -a @ KANDAR -i ŚYĀM -aku NĀM -a āsi MUN -ir BHARAT -o GUR -u JĪRṆ -o / DṚḌH -a @ BĀṆ -a @ HAT -ena NṚP -eṇa n <g/> ^ <g/> aiva MAN -aṃ PARID -ūṣ ITAM ĀSĪT // 113 // </s><s> ŚAIL -a @ TAṬ -ād ANAPEKṢ -ya ŚARĪR -aṃ PROTSṚJAT -aś ca su @ BHĀṢIT -a @ HET -oḥ / KĀY -e na ca me na ca JĪV -e
line.right: -i @ NIMITT -am a @ VEKṢY -a babhūva // 114 // </s><s> VYĀGHR -i @ SUT -ān api JĪVIT -a @ HET -os TYAJ -ya TAN uṃ PARITARPIT -a VYĀGHR -ī / GAGAN -e ABHY -a @ NADAN sur ASAṂG -hāḥ SĀDH -u MAHĀPURUṢ -a STHIR -a @ VĪRY -a // 115 // </s><s> ATIDĀN -a @ RAT -aś ca yad ĀSĪT MĀṆAV -a PŪRV -a @ BHAV -eṣu CAR -aṃś ca / ŚOṢIT -u RATN -a @ NIDĀN -a SAMUDR -aḥ PRĀPY -a MAṆ -iṃ SUKHIT -āḥ KṚT -a SATTV -āḥ // 116 // </s><s> SUTASOM -a MAH -ī @ PAT

line.left: @ KṚŚ -asya MAJJ -a MAY -ā DATT -am / na ca SATTV -a TYAKT -a MAY -a JĀT -u āsi NṚP -o yadā KUSUM -a NĀM -a // 136 // </s><s> SARV -a @ SVAK -o @ ŚAM api TYAKTV -a JĪVIT -a TYAKT -a me PRIY -a MANĀP -am / NAR -u MOKṢIT -o VYASAN -a @ PRĀPT -a āsi NṚP -o ARTHASIDDH -i yada PŪRV -am // 137 // </s><s> CAKR - @ ĀṄKIT -aṃ KAMAL -a @ TULY -aṃ PAṆ -i @ YUG -aṃ PRAD -a @ MATT -am ANAPEKṢ -am / NṚP -a ĀŚUKET -u yada ĀSĪD
line.right: -im ABHĪPS -a @ MĀN -a JAG -ad ARTH -e // 138 // </s><s> NṚP -a SARVADARŚ -i yada ĀSĪT KĀRUṆIK -o JAN - @ ĀRTH -a @ HITAK -āmaḥ / TYAKT -ā MAY -ā CATU -ro api ca DVĪP -āḥ SPHĪT -a @ NAR -air VRAN -arī ŚAT -aiś ca // 139 // </s><s> MṚD -u KOMAL -aṃ VIKAL -a @ GAUR -aṃ ūru ta CCHITTV -a hṝṣṭa MUDIT -āyā / DATT -aṃ SV -a @ MĀṂS -a RUDHIR -aṃ me JÑĀNAVAT -ī ya DĀS -i NṚP -a @ PUTR -ī // 140 // </s><s> KANAK -ābha PĪNAS -u KUMĀR -aṃ TYAKT

line.left: // </s><s> GAJ -a @ VAŚ -a @ GAT -ena ŚOṢIT -o me TAN ur api VṚDDH -a @ GUR -uṃ JAGAT SMAR -itvā / SURUCIR -am a @ ŚANA -ṃ MAY -ā na BHUKT -aṃ MOKṢIT -a ĀTM -a GAJ -ā yadā TAD ā SĪT // 147 // </s><s> ṚKṢ -a @ PAT -ir abhūva ŚAIL -a @ DURG -e hi MAHAT a SAPT -a DIN -āni RAKṢIT -o me / PURUṢ -a va DHAK -u tena me PRAYUKT -o na ca PRATIGHĀT -a KṚTAŚ -ca me TAD āsmin // 148 // </s><s> āsi GAJ -o hi MAKUND -a @ NIKĀŚ -o
line.right: -i @ VAR - @ ĀŚRIT -a BUDDH -a @ GUṆ - @ ĀRTH -ī / sa VIṢ -eṇa ŚAR -eṇa ca VIDDH -o DAṂṢṬR -a @ VAR -āṃs TYAJ -amāna na DVIṢṬ -aḥ // 149 // </s><s> VAN -a @ GOCAR -i KHAṆḌ -aka @ DVĪP -e TITTIR -i @ POTAK -a MAITR -a @ VIHĀR -ī / </s><s> SAH -a @ DARŚAN -ena ŚAMIT -o AGN -iṃ DEV -a @ GAṆ -ā KUSUM -āni KṢIP -anti // 150 // GAṄG -a @ TARAṄG -a @ JAL -air hiyamāṇaḥ TĀRIT -a me yada āsi MṚG -atve / </s><s> VADH -akā MAM -a

line.left: -iṃ DEV -a @ GAṆ -ā KUSUM -āni KṢIP -anti // 150 // GAṄG -a @ TARAṄG -a @ JAL -air hiyamāṇaḥ TĀRIT -a me yada āsi MṚG -atve / </s><s> VADH -akā MAM -a ten APANĪT -ā n <g/> ^ <g/> aiva MAN -o MAM -a TATR -a PRADUṢṬ -am // 151 // </s><s> TĀRIT -a PAÑC -a @ ŚAT -aṃ VAṆIJ -ānāṃ SĀGAR -a @ MADHY -a @ GAT -āś ca a @ NĀTH -āḥ / taiś ca HAT -aḥ KṢUDHIT -aiś ca TADĀH -aṃ KACCHAP -a @ YON -i @ GAT -o api ca MAITR -aḥ // 152 // </s><s>
line.right: -i @ CAR -iṃ CARAM -āṇahu PŪRV -aṃ MATSY -a babhūva yadā JAL -a @ CAR -ī / TYAKT -a MAY - @ ĀŚRAY -a SATTV -a @ HITĀY -a BHAKṢIT -a PRĀṆ -i @ SAHASR -a @ ŚAT -ebhiḥ // 153 // </s><s> VYĀDH -i @ ŚAT - @ ĀBHIHAT -aṃ JAGAD - @ ĪKṢ -ya SAMUCCHRAY -a KṚTV -ā / SATTV -a KṚT -āḥ SUKHIT -ā NIRUJ -āś ca PRĀṆAK -u SAUMY -a tadā ca yad ĀSĪT // 154 // </s><s> SIṂH -a babhūva yadā MṚG -a @ RĀJ -ā STHĀM -a @ BAL - @ ĀNVIT -a KĀRUṆIK -aś

line.left: ca PRĀṆAK -u SAUMY -a tadā ca yad ĀSĪT // 154 // </s><s> SIṂH -a babhūva yadā MṚG -a @ RĀJ -ā STHĀM -a @ BAL - @ ĀNVIT -a KĀRUṆIK -aś ca / VIDDH -a ŚAR -eṇa na DŪṢIT -a CITT -aṃ MAITR -i tadā VADH -ake api tadā me // 155 // </s><s> ŚAṄKH -a @ TUṢĀR -a @ NIBH -o HAY -a @ RĀJ -ā āsi PUR -ā ca SAMUDR -a @ TAṬ -e AHAM / RĀKṢAS -i @ MADHY -a @ GAT -ā VAṆIJ -o me TĀRIT -a KṚTV -a KṚP -āṃ KARUṆ -āṃ ca // 156 // </s><s>
line.right: -i @ CAR -iṃ CARAM -āṇa JAN - @ ĀRTH -e āsi KUṆĀL -a AHAṂ yada PAKṢ -ī / VARJIT -a KĀMAGUṆ -ā BAH -u DOṢ -ā no ca VAŚ -aṃ PRAMAD -āna GAT -o AHAM // 157 // </s><s> āsi ŚAŚ -o VAN -a @ GULM -a @ NIVĀS -ī ŚĀS -atī taṃ su @ KṚT -e ŚAŚ -a @ VARG -am / MUN -ir ĀŚR -am a @ VĀS -i KṢUDH - @ ĀRT -as tasya KṚT -ena MAY - @ ĀŚRAY -u TYAKT -aḥ // 158 // </s><s> āsi ŚUK -o DRUM -a @ PUṢP -a @ PHAL -

line.left: -a @ JAN -asya / tac ca GIR -aṃ VAD -ato MAM -a ŚRUTV -ā ten <g/> ^ <g/> āpi CAURY -a BHAV -enna KADĀCIT // 163 // </s><s> SĀDH -u ŚUK -ā HAR -a ŚĀL -i yat HEṢṬ -aṃ DURLABH -a MĀNUṢ -a yasyimu BHAKT -iḥ / MĀNUṢ -a tvaṃ MAY -a TĪRY -a @ GAT -ehā SĀDH -u DAM -aḥ ŚAM -a SAṂYAM -a TUBH -yam // 164 // </s><s> ity evam āni CARIT -āni PŪRV -a CAR -anta DUṢKAR -a KṚT -āni / na ca me MANAS -i TATR -a BHAV -i KHED -a eṣata UTTAM -āṃ VIRAJ -a
line.right: -im // 165 // </s><s> ĀDHYĀTMIK -aṃ hy atha ca BĀHY -aṃ n <g/> ^ <g/> āsti hi VAST -u YANMAY -ā na DATT -am / ŚĪL -e ca KṢĀNT -i TATH -a VĪRY -a DHYĀN -a UPĀY -a PRAJÑ -a CARIT -o AHAM // 166 // </s><s> MĀṂS -aṃ TVAC -aṃ TATH api ca MAJJ -a ŚOṆIT -am eva DATT -a SV -a @ ŚARĪR -āt / PRĀNT -e GUH -āsu ca yadā me ŚOṢIT -a ĀŚRAY -o api CAR -atā me // 167 // </s><s> DHUT -a @ YĀN -a DEŚIT -a JIN -ebhiḥ YATR -a PRAYUJYAT -o JIN -a BHAV

line.left: PRIY -o BHAV -ati BUDDH -o ĀRY -a @ GAṆ -aś ca ŚIKṢ -a DHUTADHARM -āḥ / ABHIYUJYAT -hā SATAT -am evaṃ TYAKTV -a ca JÑĀTR -a @ LĀBH -aya ŚAK -īrti // 214 // </s><s> MĀYOPAM -aṃ hi bhi ? </s><s> DUR -am ETAT SVAPN -a @ SAM -aṃ ca SAṂSKṚT -am a @ VĪKṢY -am / NACIR -ād BHAV -iṣyati VIYOG -aḥ SARVAPRIY -air na NITY -am iha KAŚCIT // 215 // </s><s> UDYUJY -atāṃ GHAṬ -ata NITY -aṃ PĀRAMIT -āsu BHŪM -iṣu BAL -eṣu / mā JĀT -u SAṂŚAY -ata VĪRY -aṃ YĀV -an na BUDH yathā PRAVAR -a @
line.right: -im // 216 // </s><s> NIDĀN -a @ PARIVART -aḥ PRATHAM -aḥ // </s><s> DVITĪY -aḥ PARIVART -aḥ / </s><s> YADBHŪYAS -ā RĀṢṬRAPĀL -a BODHISATTVAYĀN -ī @ YĀN -āṃ PUDGAL -ānām ime DOṢ -ā BHAV -iṣyanti — </s><s> an @ ABHIYUKT -ā an @ ABHIYUKT -ān PŪJAY -iṣyanti <g/> ; ŚAṬH -āḥ ŚAṬH -ān PŪJAY -iṣyanti <g/> ; a @ JÑĀ AJÑ -ān SAT KARTAVY -ān MANYANT -e <g/> ; ĀMIṢ -a @ PRIY -āś ca BHAV -iṣyanti / </s><s> ADHYAVASĀN -e BAHUL -āḥ KUL -a @ MATSAR -āḥ ŚAṬH -ā DHVĀṄKṢ -ā MUKHAR -āḥ KUHAK -āḥ KṢĀTR -a @ GURUK -āḥ / </s><s> ANYONY -a

line.left: DARIDR -a @ KUL -e PRAVRAJIT -āḥ SAMĀN -ā LĀBH -a @ MĀTR -akeneha ŚĀSAN -e TUṢṬ -im UTPĀDAY -iṣyanti / </s><s> teṣām ATYAYADEŚAN ^ <g/> āpi na BHAV -iṣyati kiṃ punar JÑĀN - @ ĀBHISAMAY -aḥ / </s><s> te BUDDH -a @ GUṆ -ān ri CIT -vā JÑĀTR -a @ LĀBH -a @ MĀTR -akena ŚRAV -a @ MAṆ -āḥ sma ity ĀTM -ānaṃ PRATIJÑ -āsyanti / </s><s> n ĀHAṂ RĀṢṬRAPĀL -a teṣāṃ tathā RŪP -āṇāṃ PUDGAL -ānām ĀNULOMIK -ām api KṢĀNT -iṃ VAD -ami KUT -aḥ punar BUDDH -a @ JÑĀN -am / </s><s> SUGAT -isteṣāṃ DŪR -e <g/> ; kiṃ punar
line.right: -iḥ / </s><s> teṣāṃ PUN -ā RĀṢṬRAPĀL -a tathā RŪP -āṇāṃ PUDGAL -ānām AṢṬ -au BODH -eḥ PARIPANTH -a @ KAR -ān DHARM -ān VAD -ami / </s><s> KATAM -ā @ NAṢṬ -au ? </s><s> APĀY - @ OPAPATT -iḥ DARIDR -a @ KUL - @ OPAPATT -iḥ PRATYANT -a @ JANAPAD -o @ PATT -iḥ NĪCA -luk OPAPATT -ir DUR - @ VARṆ -atānd HATV -a @ GATIK -āḥ PĀP -a @ MITR -a @ SAMAVADHĀN -aṃ BAH -um ĀNYAT -ā VIṢAM -ā @ PARIHĀR -eṇa KĀLAKRIY -āḥ / </s><s> imān RĀṢṬRAPĀL -a AṢṬ -au DHARM -ān BODH -eḥ PARIPANTH -a @ KAR

line.left: -e TUṢṬ -im UTPĀDAY -iṣyanti / </s><s> teṣām ATYAYADEŚAN ^ <g/> āpi na BHAV -iṣyati kiṃ punar JÑĀN - @ ĀBHISAMAY -aḥ / </s><s> te BUDDH -a @ GUṆ -ān ri CIT -vā JÑĀTR -a @ LĀBH -a @ MĀTR -akena ŚRAV -a @ MAṆ -āḥ sma ity ĀTM -ānaṃ PRATIJÑ -āsyanti / </s><s> n ĀHAṂ RĀṢṬRAPĀL -a teṣāṃ tathā RŪP -āṇāṃ PUDGAL -ānām ĀNULOMIK -ām api KṢĀNT -iṃ VAD -ami KUT -aḥ punar BUDDH -a @ JÑĀN -am / </s><s> SUGAT -isteṣāṃ DŪR -e <g/> ; kiṃ punar BODH -iḥ / </s><s> teṣāṃ PUN -ā RĀṢṬRAPĀL -a tathā RŪP -āṇāṃ PUDGAL -ānām AṢṬ -au
line.right: -eḥ PARIPANTH -a @ KAR -ān DHARM -ān VAD -ami / </s><s> KATAM -ā @ NAṢṬ -au ? </s><s> APĀY - @ OPAPATT -iḥ DARIDR -a @ KUL - @ OPAPATT -iḥ PRATYANT -a @ JANAPAD -o @ PATT -iḥ NĪCA -luk OPAPATT -ir DUR - @ VARṆ -atānd HATV -a @ GATIK -āḥ PĀP -a @ MITR -a @ SAMAVADHĀN -aṃ BAH -um ĀNYAT -ā VIṢAM -ā @ PARIHĀR -eṇa KĀLAKRIY -āḥ / </s><s> imān RĀṢṬRAPĀL -a AṢṬ -au DHARM -ān BODH -eḥ PARIPANTH -a @ KAR -ān VAD -ami / </s><s> TAT kasya HET -oḥ ? </s><s> n ĀHAṂ RĀṢṬRAPĀL -a VACAN -a

line.left: -e <g/> ; kiṃ punar BODH -iḥ / </s><s> teṣāṃ PUN -ā RĀṢṬRAPĀL -a tathā RŪP -āṇāṃ PUDGAL -ānām AṢṬ -au BODH -eḥ PARIPANTH -a @ KAR -ān DHARM -ān VAD -ami / </s><s> KATAM -ā @ NAṢṬ -au ? </s><s> APĀY - @ OPAPATT -iḥ DARIDR -a @ KUL - @ OPAPATT -iḥ PRATYANT -a @ JANAPAD -o @ PATT -iḥ NĪCA -luk OPAPATT -ir DUR - @ VARṆ -atānd HATV -a @ GATIK -āḥ PĀP -a @ MITR -a @ SAMAVADHĀN -aṃ BAH -um ĀNYAT -ā VIṢAM -ā @ PARIHĀR -eṇa KĀLAKRIY -āḥ / </s><s> imān RĀṢṬRAPĀL -a AṢṬ -au DHARM -ān
line.right: -eḥ PARIPANTH -a @ KAR -ān VAD -ami / </s><s> TAT kasya HET -oḥ ? </s><s> n ĀHAṂ RĀṢṬRAPĀL -a VACAN -a @ PRATIJÑ -asya BODH -im iti VAD -ami / </s><s> na KUHAK -asya CARY -ā @ PARIŚUDDH -iṃ VAD -ami / </s><s> na ŚAṬH -asya BODH -i @ CARY -āṃ VAD -ami / </s><s> n ĀMIṢ -a @ GURUK -asya BUDDH -a @ PŪJ -āṃ VAD -ami / </s><s> NĀBHIMĀN -inaḥ PRAJÑ -ā @ PARIŚUDDH -iṃ VAD -ami / </s><s> n ĀHAṂ duṣ @ PRAJÑ -a @ SAMANVĀGAT -asya SAṂŚAY -a @ CCHEDAN -aṃ VAD -ami / </s><s> n ĀHAṂ MATSAR -iṇa ĀŚAY -a @ PARIŚUDDH

line.left: @ KAR -ān DHARM -ān VAD -ami / </s><s> KATAM -ā @ NAṢṬ -au ? </s><s> APĀY - @ OPAPATT -iḥ DARIDR -a @ KUL - @ OPAPATT -iḥ PRATYANT -a @ JANAPAD -o @ PATT -iḥ NĪCA -luk OPAPATT -ir DUR - @ VARṆ -atānd HATV -a @ GATIK -āḥ PĀP -a @ MITR -a @ SAMAVADHĀN -aṃ BAH -um ĀNYAT -ā VIṢAM -ā @ PARIHĀR -eṇa KĀLAKRIY -āḥ / </s><s> imān RĀṢṬRAPĀL -a AṢṬ -au DHARM -ān BODH -eḥ PARIPANTH -a @ KAR -ān VAD -ami / </s><s> TAT kasya HET -oḥ ? </s><s> n ĀHAṂ RĀṢṬRAPĀL -a VACAN -a @ PRATIJÑ -asya

line.left: // 223 // </s><s> PUṆY -air VIHĪN -āḥ PARADĀR -a @ GṚDDH -ā a @ ŚUDDH -a @ ŚĪL -āḥ KUŚAL -eṣu bod DAR -aḥ / te ŚĀSAN -e an @ ARTH -a @ ŚMAŚĀN -a @ DĀR -uvat ye BODHICITT -ena a @ LABDH -a @ JÑĀN -āḥ // 224 // </s><s> BODH -y @ ARTH -iko ANVEṢAT -i BUDDH -a @ DHARM -ān na TIṢṬHAT -e c <g/> ^ <g/> āpi yathā sa MOKṢ -aḥ / DṚḌH -āḥ sa LEP -ena KṚT -aḥ KAP -ir vā MĀN - @ ĀBHIBHŪT -asya TATH ^ <g/> aiva BODH -iḥ // 225 // </s><s>

line.left: -oḥ / TYAKTV -ā ca DHARM -āṃs ta AYUKTAYOG -āḥ nir ARTH -a @ BHŪT ā NIPAT -anti ŚĀSAN -am // 226 // </s><s> MAH -ā @ PRAPĀT -aṃ JVALIT -aṃ HUT -ā @ ŚANA -ṃ su @ BHĀṢIT - @ ĀRTH -e PATIT -o asmi PŪRV -e / ŚRUTV -ā ca TASMIN PRATIPATT -iye STHIT -o VIHĀY -a SARVĀṆ -i PRIY -ā @ PRIY -āṇi // 227 // </s><s> ŚRUTV -ā GUṆ - @ ĀḌHY -aṃ ca VICITR -a @ ŚĀSAN -aṃ teṣāṃ SPṚH -ā NAIK -a @ PAD -e api JĀ -yate / a @ DHARMAKĀM -asya KUT -o asti
line.right: -iḥ yath <g/> ^ <g/> aiva c ĀNDHAS -ya PATH -i PRAKĀŚAN -am // 228 // </s><s> iti // </s><s> BHŪT a @ PŪRV -aṃ RĀṢṬRAPĀL -a ATĪT -e a @ DHVANY -a @ SAṂKHY -aeyaiḥ KALP -air ASAṂKHYEY -ataraira CINTY -air a @ TULY -air a @ PRAMĀṆ -air VIPUL -air a @ PRAMEY -air yad ĀSĪT / </s><s> tena KĀL -ena tena SAMAY -ena SIDDHĀRTHABUDDH -ir NĀM -a TATHĀGAT -o ARH -an SAMYAKSAṂBUDDH -o LOK -a UDAPĀD -i VIDYĀCARAṆASAṂPANN -aḥ SUGAT -o LOKAV -id ANUTTAR -aḥ PURUṢADAMYASĀRATH -iḥ ŚĀST -ā DEV -a @ MANUṢY -āṇāṃ ca BUDDH -o BHAGAV -ān / </s>

line.left: -a @ SATTV -a @ KṚP -a @ MAITR -a @ MĀNAS -ā te BHAV -anti NACIR -ān NAROTTAM -āḥ // 230 // </s><s> ye a @ PRAMEY -a SUGAT -ā ATĪT -āḥ SĀṂPRAT -aṃ ca hi ye apy ANĀGAT -āḥ / SARV -a eva KUŚAL -ais ta UDGAT -ā a @ PRAMĀD -a @ PATH -a eva su @ STHIT -āḥ // 231 // </s><s> ANNAPĀN -a @ MAT -ha VASTR -a @ BHOJAN -aṃ HEM -a @ RŪPY -a @ MAṆ -i @ BHŪṢAṆ -am / DATT -aṃ tair api ca KALP -a @ KOṬ -iyaḥ PRĀRTHAY -adbhi RIH -a
line.right: -im UTTAM -ām // 232 // </s><s> HAST -a @ PĀD -a @ MAT -ha KARṆ -a @ NĀSIK -ā YĀCIT -ā DAD -ati SAṂPR -a @ HARṢIT -āḥ / SARV -a @ BODH -i @ GUṆ -a @ PŪRIT - @ ĀŚAY -āḥ te BHAV -anti NACIR -ān NAROTTAM -āḥ // 233 // </s><s> RAJ -ya @ SAUKHY -a @ VIBHAV -āṃś ca SARV -aśo VIPRAHĀY -a DAYIT -āḥ sriyo api ca / RAṄG -a @ MĀY -a @ SADṚŚ -aṃ hi SAṂSKṚT -aṃ SAṂŚRAY -asva VAN -am eva niḥ SPṚH -aḥ // 234 // </s><s> JĪVIT -aṃ CAPAL -am a @

line.left: -aṃ ca hi ye apy ANĀGAT -āḥ / SARV -a eva KUŚAL -ais ta UDGAT -ā a @ PRAMĀD -a @ PATH -a eva su @ STHIT -āḥ // 231 // </s><s> ANNAPĀN -a @ MAT -ha VASTR -a @ BHOJAN -aṃ HEM -a @ RŪPY -a @ MAṆ -i @ BHŪṢAṆ -am / DATT -aṃ tair api ca KALP -a @ KOṬ -iyaḥ PRĀRTHAY -adbhi RIH -a BODH -im UTTAM -ām // 232 // </s><s> HAST -a @ PĀD -a @ MAT -ha KARṆ -a @ NĀSIK -ā YĀCIT -ā DAD -ati SAṂPR -a @ HARṢIT -āḥ / SARV -a @
line.right: -i @ GUṆ -a @ PŪRIT - @ ĀŚAY -āḥ te BHAV -anti NACIR -ān NAROTTAM -āḥ // 233 // </s><s> RAJ -ya @ SAUKHY -a @ VIBHAV -āṃś ca SARV -aśo VIPRAHĀY -a DAYIT -āḥ sriyo api ca / RAṄG -a @ MĀY -a @ SADṚŚ -aṃ hi SAṂSKṚT -aṃ SAṂŚRAY -asva VAN -am eva niḥ SPṚH -aḥ // 234 // </s><s> JĪVIT -aṃ CAPAL -am a @ DHRUV -aṃ sadā MṚTTIK -ā @ GHAṬ -aka eva BHED -i ca / YĀCIT - @ OPAM -am AŚĀŚVAT -aṃ sadā NĀTR -a NITY -am a @ ŚUBH -aṃ KUMĀR -aka // 235

line.left: @ OPAM -am AŚĀŚVAT -aṃ sadā NĀTR -a NITY -am a @ ŚUBH -aṃ KUMĀR -aka // 235 // </s><s> neha MĀTR -a na PIT -ā na BĀNDHAV -ā DHĀR -ayanti YATAMĀN -a DURGAT -im / yat KṚT -aṃ hi ŚUBH -ā @ ŚUBH -aṃ TAT pr-āyantam ANUYĀT -i PṚṢṬHAT -aḥ // 236 // </s><s> KĀM -a @ HET -u BAH -u KALP -a @ SĀGAR -ā ANYAMANY -a @ VADH -itā NIRARTH -akāḥ / KASYACIN na ca KṚT -aṃ tvayā HIT -aṃ VYARTH -a eva ca NIVEŚIT -aḥ ŚRAM -aḥ // 237 // </s><s> ADY -a te JAGAT a eṣato HIT -aṃ
line.right: -i @ ŚĀNTAMAT -ulaṃ PAD - @ OTTAM -am / MAJJ -a @ MĀṂS -am api CARM -a ŚUṢ -yate YADYAP -i tvam api mā KṚT -hā ŚRAM -am // 238 // </s><s> DURLABH -o hi SUGAT -asya SAṂBHAV -aḥ ŚĀNT -a @ DHARMAŚRAVAṆ -aṃ su @ DURLABH -am / MĀR -apa KṢAM - @ AVADHŪY -a YATN -ato BUDDH -a @ JÑĀN -a na CIREṆ -a LAPS -yase // 239 // </s><s> BHADR -a @ MITR -a @ PAR -i @ SEVAK -aḥ sadā PĀP -a @ MITR -a @ PARIVARJAK -o BHAV -a / SAT PATH -e UPAN -ayanti te

line.left: // </s><s> DHIG YAUVAN -ena manuj EŚVAR -a yanna NITY -aṃ DHIG JĪVIT -asya GAMAN -aṃ GIR -i @ TOY -a @ ŚĪGHR -am / DHIK SAṂSKṚT -aṃ KṢAY -am IDAṂ TAḌ -i @ DABHR -a @ LOL -aṃ DHIK KAṆḌIT -asya TRIBHAV -e NṚP -a KĀM -a @ RĀG -aḥ // 262 // </s><s> SAṂCODIT -o asmi VIBUDH -air BHAV -a a @ PRAMATT -o no BODHISATTV -a BHAV -ate VIṢAY - @ ĀBHILAGN -aḥ / BUDDH -o BHAV -eyam iha LOK -a @ HIT - @ ĀNUKAMP -ī n <g/> ^ <g/> āsti PRAMĀD -a @ CARIT -asya NARENDR -a
line.right: -iḥ // 263 // </s><s> KĀM - @ ĀTUR -o BHAV -ati yo NṚP -a CITT -a @ DĀS -aḥ sa hi PUṆY -a @ NĀŚ -a @ NIRAT -o VINIVṚTT -a @ SVARG -aḥ / HIṂS -ā @ SAMIDDH -am api n ĀBHICAR -eta JĀT -u PAKṢ -īva PAÑJAR -a @ GAT -aḥ KATHAM ĀŚVAS -eta // 264 // </s><s> DHĀT -ūś ca SARP -a @ SADṚŚ -ā VADH -a @ KĀŚ ca SKANDH -āḥ CITT -aṃ ca s ĀSRAV -am ANARTHAK -a ŚŪNY -a GRĀM -aḥ / viṣa STAMB -a @ PUṢPIT -a i VEH -a NARENDR -a KĀY -aḥ

line.left: -aṃ NAṬARAṄG -a @ KALP -am // 268 // </s><s> MEGH -aṃ KṚP -ā @ KARUṆ -a @ PĀRAMIT -ā @ BHRAK -ūṭaṃ SATTV - @ ĀRTH -a @ GARJIT -a VIPAŚYAN -a @ VIDY -u MĀL -ī / BODHYAṄG -a @ DHĀR -a @ SUKH -a @ ŚĪTAL -a @ VṚṢṬ -i @ JĀL -aiḥ ŚĪT -ī @ KAROM -i ca JAG -ac CIR -a @ KĀL -a @ TAPT -am // 269 // </s><s> ETAT SMAR -ann AHAM iha KṢITIŚ - @ OPAVIṢṬ -o NĀST ^ <g/> īha me PRAṆIDH -i SAṂSKṚT -a @ SARV -a @ KĀM -aiḥ /
line.right: -y @ ARTH -iko hi VICAR -ām iha SATTV -a @ HET -oḥ EKĀṂŚIK -o na hi BHAV - @ ĀBHIRAT -au MAM - @ ECCH -ā // 270 // </s><s> JĀNAN va SET -ka iha PĀRTHIV -a ŚATR -u MADHY -e ko BUDDH -imān SABHAY -a @ MĀRG -a @ PATH -aṃ VRAJ -eta / ko vā SACAKṢ -u RIH -a TĀT -a PAT -et PRAPĀT -e ko BODH -i @ MĀRG -am ADHIGAM -ya BHAV -et PRAMATT -aḥ // 271 // </s><s> ANUSROT -a SARV -a @ JAGAT ī PRATISROT -ā so AHAṂ VĀC -ā na ŚAKY -am iha PĀRTHIV

line.left: TAPT -am // 269 // </s><s> ETAT SMAR -ann AHAM iha KṢITIŚ - @ OPAVIṢṬ -o NĀST ^ <g/> īha me PRAṆIDH -i SAṂSKṚT -a @ SARV -a @ KĀM -aiḥ / BODH -y @ ARTH -iko hi VICAR -ām iha SATTV -a @ HET -oḥ EKĀṂŚIK -o na hi BHAV - @ ĀBHIRAT -au MAM - @ ECCH -ā // 270 // </s><s> JĀNAN va SET -ka iha PĀRTHIV -a ŚATR -u MADHY -e ko BUDDH -imān SABHAY -a @ MĀRG -a @ PATH -aṃ VRAJ -eta / ko vā SACAKṢ -u RIH -a TĀT -a PAT -et PRAPĀT -e ko
line.right: -i @ MĀRG -am ADHIGAM -ya BHAV -et PRAMATT -aḥ // 271 // </s><s> ANUSROT -a SARV -a @ JAGAT ī PRATISROT -ā so AHAṂ VĀC -ā na ŚAKY -am iha PĀRTHIV -a BODH -i PRĀPT -um / MER -u PRAYĀT -am api SĀGAR -am UTSAH -eyaṃ na tv eva me MAN -a ih ĀBHIRAM -eta KĀM -aiḥ // 272 // </s><s> GACCH -āśu PĀRTHIV -a va RAS -va JAN -ena SĀRDH -aṃ SARV -āṃ hi RĀṢṬR -ar ATIM - @ UTSṚJ -a SARVALOK -e / ĀDĀY -a GACCH -atu yath ĀBHIMAT -aṃ hi yasya GṚH -yā PRAMĀD -a MAM -a TĀT

line.left: @ ARTH -iko hi VICAR -ām iha SATTV -a @ HET -oḥ EKĀṂŚIK -o na hi BHAV - @ ĀBHIRAT -au MAM - @ ECCH -ā // 270 // </s><s> JĀNAN va SET -ka iha PĀRTHIV -a ŚATR -u MADHY -e ko BUDDH -imān SABHAY -a @ MĀRG -a @ PATH -aṃ VRAJ -eta / ko vā SACAKṢ -u RIH -a TĀT -a PAT -et PRAPĀT -e ko BODH -i @ MĀRG -am ADHIGAM -ya BHAV -et PRAMATT -aḥ // 271 // </s><s> ANUSROT -a SARV -a @ JAGAT ī PRATISROT -ā so AHAṂ VĀC -ā na ŚAKY -am iha PĀRTHIV -a
line.right: -i PRĀPT -um / MER -u PRAYĀT -am api SĀGAR -am UTSAH -eyaṃ na tv eva me MAN -a ih ĀBHIRAM -eta KĀM -aiḥ // 272 // </s><s> GACCH -āśu PĀRTHIV -a va RAS -va JAN -ena SĀRDH -aṃ SARV -āṃ hi RĀṢṬR -ar ATIM - @ UTSṚJ -a SARVALOK -e / ĀDĀY -a GACCH -atu yath ĀBHIMAT -aṃ hi yasya GṚH -yā PRAMĀD -a MAM -a TĀT -a na RĀJY -a @ KOṬ -yā // 273 // </s><s> ŚAKY -ā na NĀR -i @ GAṆ -a @ MADHY -a @ GAT -ena BODH -iḥ PRĀPT -uṃ ŚIV -aṃ PAD -am ANUTTAR

line.left: -hy a @ BHĀṢ -anta — </s><s> ŚRAVAṆ -am UPAGAT -as te kiṃ na BUDDH -aḥ KUMĀR -a ŚARAṆ -am a @ ŚARAṆ -ānāṃ NĀM -a SIDDHĀRTHABUDDH -iḥ / PARACAR -i @ KUŚAL -o asau PUṆY -a @ PRAJÑ -ā @ GUṆ -aḍhyo DAŚ -a @ NIYUT -a @ SAHASR - @ ĀDHYĀY -ināṃ tasya SAṂGH -aḥ // 276 // </s><s> PUṆY -a @ RAS - @ MIR - @ ĀH -a — </s><s> AHAM api JIN -a DṚKṢ -ye KĪDṚŚ -aṃ tasya RŪP -aṃ VAD -ata api ca SARV -e KĪDṚŚ -o cāsya VARṆ -aḥ / AHAM api PARIPṚCCH -e KĪDṚŚ -ī

line.left: hi ĀGAT -o AHAṂ KATHAṂ na RĀṆ -āṃ BHAV -ate PRAMĀD -aḥ // 290 // </s><s> PRANAṢṬ -a @ MĀRG -asya BHAV - @ ĀDY -a DEŚIK -o JĀTY - @ ANDH - @ ABHŪT -asya BHAV - @ ĀDY -a CAKṢ -uḥ / MAH -ā @ PRAPĀT - @ ĀD iha māṃ SAMUDDHAR -a ŚRADDH - @ ĀKAR -ā KĀRUṆIK -ā CIKITS -akā // 291 // </s><s> DARIDR - @ ABHŪT -asya KUR -uṣva SAṂGRAH -aṃ BADDH -asya MOKṢ -aṃ KUR -u me ADY -a NĀTH -a / SASAṂŚAY -ebhyo VIMAT -iṃ ca CHIN -da CARY -āṃ ca me VYĀK -uru
line.right: -i @ MĀRG -e // 292 // </s><s> TĪRTH -aṃ ca SAṂDARŚAY -a uhyato me DĪP -aṃ KUR -uṣv <g/> ^ <g/> āpi MAM - @ ĀNDHAKĀR -e / VRAṆ -ī @ KṚT -aṃ māṃ hi KUR -uṣva NIRVRAṆ -aṃ ŚALY -aṃ ca me UDDHAR -a VAIDYARĀJ -a // 293 // </s><s> VIMOCY -a māṃ DURGAT -i @ SAṂKAṬ -āt tvaṃ BHAV - @ OPALAMBH -a @ GRAHAṆ -aṃ NIKṚNT -a / SAṂTĀR -a māṃ ŚOK -a @ MAH - @ AUGH -a @ PĀRAM AṢṬĀṄG -a @ MĀRG -eṇa MAH - @ ĀPATH -ena // 294 // </s><s> PARĪTT -a @ MĀY

line.left: -aṃ BAH -v ANTARĀY -aṃ KUŚAL -aṃ BHAV -aty api / PUṆY -asya SIDH -yaty a @ CIR -ād VIPĀK -aḥ LABDH -a @ KṢAṆ -o me ADY -a VAD - @ AIK -a @ NIŚCAY -am // 295 // </s><s> ETAD dhi me VYĀK -uru LOKANĀTH -a syād BODHISATTV -o hi yathā PRAMATT -aḥ / yathā CAR -ann UTTAM -a @ BODH -i @ CĀRIK -āṃ pra MOCAY -eyaṃ BHAV -a @ BANDHAN -āj JAGAT // 296 // </s><s> atha KHAL -u RĀṢṬRAPĀL -a SIDDHĀRTHABUDDH -is TATHĀGAT -aḥ PUṆYARAŚM -e RĀJ -a @ KUMĀR -asy ĀDHYĀŚAY -aṃ VID -itvā VISTAR -eṇa

line.left: hy aja RAM // 320 // </s><s> MĀRG - @ AJÑ -a MĀRG -a @ KUŚAL -ā BHAGAV -an KUPATH -ān NIVĀR -ayasi LOK -am IMAM / KṢEM -e ŚIV -e VIRAJ -a ĀRY -a @ PATH -e PRAT -i @ ṢṬH -ā @ PAP -yasy API JAG -ad BHAG -a @ VAN // <g/> 3 <g/> 2 <g/> 1 // </s><s> PUṆY -ā @ DHIK asya tava PUṆY -a @ NIDH -eḥ SATAT -ā @ KṢAY -ā BHAV -ati PUṆY -a @ KRIY -ā / BAH -u KALP -a @ KOṬ -īṣu na yāti KṢAY -aṃ YĀV -an na SAṂSPṚŚAT -i

line.left: tvaṃ MUN -e BAH -u KṢETR -ān / BHĀṢ -ante tava VARṆ -a NĀYAK -ā DIŚAT -āsu VAND -e tvām a @ SAMANT -a @ GOCAR -aṃ MUN -i @ RĀJ -am // 340 // </s><s> VAND -āmo api ca DHARMAT -ām a @ KHIL -a @ PRĀPT -aṃ SARV -a @ SATTV -a @ KRIY -āsu DṚŚ -yase yatha MĀY -ā / na ca te ASTY - @ ĀGAMAN -aṃ KVACID GAMAN -aṃ vā MĀY -ā @ DHARM -a SAT i PRATIṢṬHIT -am ABHIVAND -e // 341 // </s><s> SĀDH -u tvaṃ NARAVĪR -a BHĀṢ -ase VAR -a @ MĀRG -aṃ

line.left: -a @ GOCAR -ād DŪR -ī @ BHŪT ā BUDDH -a @ JÑĀN -a @ VIRAHIT -āḥ MOKṢ -a @ CITT -a @ VIRAHIT -āḥ BODHICITT -a @ VIRAHIT -āḥ / </s><s> TASMĀT TARH -i RĀṢṬRAPĀL -a IMAM evaṃ RŪP -aṃ DHARM -aṃ ŚRUTV -ā BODDHAVY -am — </s><s> PĀP -a @ MITR -āny UDYUKT -āni na SEVITAVY -āni LĀBH - @ ĀRTHIK -ānām // </s><s> atha KHAL -u BHAGAV -āṃs tasyāṃ VELĀY -ām imā GĀTH -ā a @ BHĀṢ -ata — </s><s> a @ PRAMEY -e DAŚABAL -a @ CALIT -e LĀBH -e JÑĀT -au PARIGAT -a @ HṚDAY -ā / HIT -vā

line.right: -i ASAṄG -a RIDH -yate SUGAT -ānām // 349 // </s><s> ĀRY -aṃ VAṂŚ -aṃ NIṢEV -ate GUṆ -a @ PREKṢ -ī JÑĀN -aṃ TATR -a UTPĀDAY - @ ECCH -u ivā TRA / mā evaṃ PRAVIJAH -ya ŚĀSAN -aṃ GUṆ -a @ MAṆḌ -aṃ SARV -āsveta GAT -īṣu PAÑC -asū yatha BĀL -āḥ // 350 // </s><s> ŚAIL - @ ĀRAṆY -a @ GUH -ā @ NIJ - @ ĀSIN -o BHAV -ateha TATRA STH -āś ca ma ĀTM -a MANY -athā PAṬAPAṂS -ī / ĀTM -ānaṃ PARIBHĀṢAT -hā SATAT -a @ NITY -a — </s><s> MAN -u SMAR -anto BUDDH -a

line.left: KĀNICIT TAD ANY -āni LAUKIK -a @ LOKOTTAR -eṣv ARTH -eṣu KUŚAL -āni SAMYA -k @ PRAṆ -i @ DHĀN -āni teṣāṃ SARV -eṣām AGRY -a m ETAT SAMYA -k @ PRAṆ -i @ DHĀN -aṃ NIRUTTAR -aṃ YADUT -a BODHISATTV -asya PRATHAM -aś CITTOTPĀD -aḥ / </s><s> evam AYAṂ PRATHAM -aś CITTOTPĀD -aḥ SVABHĀV -ato api VEDITAVY -aḥ / </s><s> ĀKĀR -ato apy ĀLAMBAN -ato api GUṆ -ato APYUT KARṢ -ato ati PAÑC -a @ LAKṢAṆ -o VEDITAVY -aḥ / </s><s> tasya ca BODHICITT -asya SAH - @ OTPĀD -ā @ DEV - @ ĀVATĪRṆ -e BHAV -ati BODHISATTV -o ANUTTAR -e
line.right: -i @ MAHĀYĀN -e / </s><s> BODHISATTV -o BODHISATTV -a iti ca SAṂKHY -āṃ GACCH -ati YADUT -a SAṂKET -a @ VYAVAHĀR -a @ NAY -ena / </s><s> TASMĀT sa CITTOTPĀD -aḥ AVATĀR -a @ SAṂGṚHĪT -aḥ / </s><s> UTPĀDY -a ca BODHISATTV -as tac CITT -aṃ KRAM -eṇ ĀNUTTAR -āṃ SAMYAKSAṂBODH -im ADHIGACCH -ati n ĀNUTPĀDY -a / </s><s> TASMĀD ANUTTARĀY -āḥ SAMYAKSAṂBODH -eḥ sa CITTOTPĀD -o MŪL -am / </s><s> DUḤKHIT -eṣu ca SATTV -eṣu sa KĀRUṆIK -o BODHISATTV -aḥ PARITRĀṆ - @ ĀBHIPRĀY -as tac CITT -am UTPĀD -ayati / </s><s> TASMĀT sa CITTOTPĀD -aḥ KARUṆ -ā @ NIṢYAND -aḥ / </s><s> tañ ca

line.left: -ato api VEDITAVY -aḥ / </s><s> sa ca BODHISATTV -asya PRATHAM -a @ CITTOTPĀD -aḥ SAM -ā @ SEN -a DVIVIDH -aḥ / </s><s> NAIRYĀṆIK -aś cā NAIRYĀṆIK -aś ca / </s><s> TATR -a NAIRYĀṆIK -o ya UTPANN -o ATYANT -am ANUVART -ate na punar VYĀVART -ate / </s><s> a @ NAIRYĀṆIK -aḥ punar ya UTPANN -o n ĀTYANT -am ANUVART -ate punar eva VYĀVART -ate / </s><s> tasya ca CITTOTPĀD -asya VYĀVṚTT -ir api DVIVIDH -ā / </s><s> ĀTYANTIK -ī c <g/> ^ <g/> ān ĀTYANTIK -ī ca / </s><s> TATR - @ ĀTYANTIK -ī yat SAKṚ -d VYĀVṚTT -aṃ CITT -aṃ na punar UTPAD -yate
line.right: -āya / </s><s> an @ ĀTYANTIK -ī punaḥ yad VYĀVṚTT -aṃ CITT -aṃ punaḥ punar UTPAD -yate BODH -āya / </s><s> tasya KHAL -u CITT -asya <g/> ^ UTPĀD -aḥ CATU -rbhiḥ PRATYAY -aiś CATU -rbhir HETU -bhiś CATU -rbhir BAL -air VEDITAVY -aḥ / </s><s> CATVĀR -aḥ PRATYAY -āḥ KATAM -e / </s><s> iha KULAPUTR -o vā KUL - @ ADR -u HIT -ā vā TATHĀGAT -asya vā BODHISATTV -asya vā a @ CINTY -am ATYADBHUT -aṃ PRĀTIHĀRY -aṃ PRABHĀV -aṃ PAŚ -yati SAṂPRATYAYIT -asya vā ANTIK - @ ĀCCH -ṛṇoti / </s><s> tasya DṚṢṬ -vā vā ŚRUTV -ā vā evaṃ BHAV -ati / </s>

line.left: yad VYĀVṚTT -aṃ CITT -aṃ punaḥ punar UTPAD -yate BODH -āya / </s><s> tasya KHAL -u CITT -asya <g/> ^ UTPĀD -aḥ CATU -rbhiḥ PRATYAY -aiś CATU -rbhir HETU -bhiś CATU -rbhir BAL -air VEDITAVY -aḥ / </s><s> CATVĀR -aḥ PRATYAY -āḥ KATAM -e / </s><s> iha KULAPUTR -o vā KUL - @ ADR -u HIT -ā vā TATHĀGAT -asya vā BODHISATTV -asya vā a @ CINTY -am ATYADBHUT -aṃ PRĀTIHĀRY -aṃ PRABHĀV -aṃ PAŚ -yati SAṂPRATYAYIT -asya vā ANTIK - @ ĀCCH -ṛṇoti / </s><s> tasya DṚṢṬ -vā vā ŚRUTV -ā vā evaṃ BHAV -ati / </s><s> MAH - @ ĀNUBHĀV -ā BAT -eyaṃ
line.right: -ir yasyāṃ STHIT -asya vā PRATIPANN -asya vā AYAM eva RŪP -aḥ PRABHĀV -aḥ IDAM evaṃ RŪP -aṃ PRĀTIHĀRY -aṃ DṚŚ -yate ca ŚRŪ -yate ca sa TAD eva PRABHĀV -a @ DARŚAN -aṃ ŚRAVAṆ -aṃ v ĀDHIPAT -iṃ KṚTV -ā MAHĀBODH -y @ ADHIMUKT -o MAHĀBODH -au CITT -am UTPĀD -ayati / </s><s> AYAṂ PRATHAM -aḥ PRATYAY -aś CITT -asya <g/> ^ UTPATT -aye / </s><s> sa na h <g/> ^ <g/> aiva PRABHĀV -aṃ PAŚ -yati vā ŚṚṆ -oti vā APAR -itv ANUTTAR -āṃ BODH -im ĀRABHY -a SAD DHARM -aṃ ŚṚṆ -oti BODHISATTVAPIṬAK -aṃ DEŚY -amānaṃ ŚRUTV -ā ca

line.left: vā ŚRUTV -ā vā evaṃ BHAV -ati / </s><s> MAH - @ ĀNUBHĀV -ā BAT -eyaṃ BODH -ir yasyāṃ STHIT -asya vā PRATIPANN -asya vā AYAM eva RŪP -aḥ PRABHĀV -aḥ IDAM evaṃ RŪP -aṃ PRĀTIHĀRY -aṃ DṚŚ -yate ca ŚRŪ -yate ca sa TAD eva PRABHĀV -a @ DARŚAN -aṃ ŚRAVAṆ -aṃ v ĀDHIPAT -iṃ KṚTV -ā MAHĀBODH -y @ ADHIMUKT -o MAHĀBODH -au CITT -am UTPĀD -ayati / </s><s> AYAṂ PRATHAM -aḥ PRATYAY -aś CITT -asya <g/> ^ UTPATT -aye / </s><s> sa na h <g/> ^ <g/> aiva PRABHĀV -aṃ PAŚ -yati vā ŚṚṆ -oti vā APAR -itv ANUTTAR -āṃ
line.right: -im ĀRABHY -a SAD DHARM -aṃ ŚṚṆ -oti BODHISATTVAPIṬAK -aṃ DEŚY -amānaṃ ŚRUTV -ā ca punar ABHIPRASĪDAT -i / </s><s> ABHIPRASANN -aś ca SAD DHARMAŚRAVAṆ -am ADHIPAT -iṃ KṚTV -ā TATHĀGAT -a @ JÑĀN - @ ĀDHIMUKT -aḥ TATHĀGAT -a @ JÑĀN -a @ PRATILAMBH -āya CITT -am UTPĀD -ayati / </s><s> AYAṂ DVITĪY -aḥ PRATYAY -aś CITT -asya <g/> ^ UTPATT -aye / </s><s> sa na h <g/> ^ <g/> aiva DHARM -a ŚṚṆ -oty api tu BODHISATTV -aḥ SAD DHARM - @ ĀNTARDHĀN -i @ MĀMUKH -ām UPAGAT -āṃ PAŚ -yati / </s><s> DṚṢṬ -vā ca punar asy <g/> ^^ <g/> aivaṃ

line.left: @ PRAYOG -aḥ / </s><s> DV -e ime DṚḌH -a @ PRATHAMACITTOTPĀDIK -asya BODHISATTV -asya MAHAT ī KUŚAL -a @ DHARM - @ ĀYADVĀR -e / </s><s> SVĀRTH -a @ PRAYOG -aś c ĀNUTTARĀY -āḥ SAMYAKSAṂBODH -eḥ SAMUDĀGAM -āya / </s><s> PARĀRTH -a @ PRAYOG -aś ca SARV -a @ SATTV -ānāṃ SARV -a @ DUḤKHAN -ir MOKṢĀY -a / </s><s> yathā DV -e ĀYADVĀR -e evaṃ dvau MAH -āntau KUŚAL -a @ DHARM -a @ SANNICAY -au DV -āva PRAMEY -au KUŚAL -a @ DHARMASKANDH -au / </s><s> PEYĀL -am / </s><s> DV -e ime PRATHAMACITTOTPĀDIK -asya BODHISATTV -asya PRATHAM -aṃ CITTOTPĀD -am UPĀDĀY -a
line.right: -āya KUŚAL -a @ PARIGRAH -a @ VAIŚEṢY -e TAD ANY -aṃ KUŚAL -a @ PARIGRAH -am UPANIDH -āya / </s><s> HET -u VAIŚEṢY -aṃ PHAL -a @ VAIŚEṢY -añ ca / </s><s> sa KHAL -u BODHISATTV -asya KUŚAL -a @ PARIGRAH -o ANUTT - @ ANURĀY -āḥ SAMYAKSAṂBODH -er HET -uḥ sā ca tasya PHAL -am / </s><s> na TAD ANY -aḥ SARV -a @ ŚRĀVAK -a @ PRATYEKABUDDH -a @ KUŚAL -a @ PARIGRAH -aḥ PRĀGEV -a TAD ANY -eṣāṃ SATTV -ānām / </s><s> TASMĀD BODHISATTV -ānāṃ KUŚAL -a @ PARIGRAH -as TAD an @ YASMĀT SARV -a @ KUŚAL -a @

line.left: AIKADHY -am ABHISAṂKṢIP -ya BODHISATTV -a @ CARY -ety UC -yate / </s><s> KUTR -a punar BODHISATTV -āḥ ŚIKṢ -ante / </s><s> SAPT -asu STHĀN -eṣu ŚIKṢ -ante / </s><s> SAPT -a STHĀN -āni KATAM -āni / </s><s> SVĀRTH -aḥ PARĀRTH -aḥ TATTV - @ ĀRTH -aḥ PRABHĀV -aḥ SATTV -a @ PARIPĀK -aḥ ĀTM -ano BUDDH -a @ DHARM -a @ PARIPĀK -aḥ ANUTTAR -ā ca SAMYAKSAṂBODH -iḥ SAPTAM -aṃ STHĀN -am / </s><s> UDDĀN -am / </s><s> sva — PARĀRTH -aś ca TATTV - @ ĀRTH -aḥ PRABHĀV -aḥ PARIPĀCAN -e / SATTV -a SV -a @ BUDDH -a @ DHARM -āṇāṃ PAR -ā
line.right: -iś ca SAPTAM -ī // </s><s> SV -a @ PARĀRTH -aḥ KATAM -aḥ SAMĀSAT -o DAŚ -a @ VIDH -aḥ SV -a @ PARĀRTH -o VEDITAVY -aḥ / </s><s> KEVAL -aṃ PARASAMBADDH -aḥ HIT - @ ĀNVAY -aḥ SUKH - @ ĀNVAY -aḥ HET -u SAṂGṚHĪT -aḥ PHAL -a @ SAṂGṚHĪT -aḥ e HIK -aḥ ĀMUTRIK -aḥ ĀTYANTIK -aḥ an @ ĀTYANTIK -aś ca / </s><s> TATR -a KEVAL -aḥ SVĀRTH -aḥ PARĀRTH -aś ca BODHISATTV -ena PARIJÑĀY -a PRAHĀTAVY -aḥ BODHISATTV -a @ VIDH -eḥ SAMATIKRĀNT -at VĀDAN - @ ANURŪPAT - @ VĀC -ca / </s><s> PARIŚIṢṬ -e ca ŚIKṢITAVY -aḥ / </s>

line.left: ĀD -i @ BHAY -a @ BHĪT -āṃś ca SATTV -ān PARAT -o DAṆḌ - @ ĀD -i @ BHAY -ād VIPRAMOKṢ -ayati YĀVADEV -a SVAY -am eva BHAY -a @ GRAHAṆ - @ ĀRTH -am / </s><s> DṚṢṬADHARM -a @ SUKH -a @ VIHĀR -aś ca BODHISATTV -asya SATTV - @ ĀRTH -a @ NIDHYĀN -a @ VIRAHIT -aḥ KEVAL -aḥ SVĀRTH -o VEDITAVY -aḥ / </s><s> ity EVAṂBHĀGĪY -o BODHISATTV -asya KEVAL -aḥ SVĀRTH -o ve DIV -tayo yo BODHISATTV -ena PARIJÑĀY -a PRAHĀTAVY -aḥ / </s><s> DĀN -aṃ punaḥ BODHISATTV -asya KṢĀNT -iś ca KĀRUṆY -a @ PŪRVAK -aṃ vā
line.right: -i @ PARIṆAT -aṃ vā SVARG -a @ NIMITT -aṃ vā NITY -a @ KĀL -aṃ PARASAMBADDH -a eva SVĀRTH -o VEDITAVY -aḥ / </s><s> ity etān yathā NIRDIṢṬ -ān ĀKĀR -ān STHĀPAY -itvā TAD ANY -a ETAD VIPARYAY -āt SVĀRTH -o BODHISATTV -ānāṃ SARV -a eva PARĀRTH -a @ SAMBADDH -o VEDITAVY -aḥ / </s><s> TATR - @ ĀYAṂ BODHISATTV -asya KEVAL -aḥ PARĀRTH -o BODHISATTV -ena PARIJÑĀY -a PRAHĀTAVY -aḥ / </s><s> VIPANN -a DṚṢṬ -er DĀN -am an @ ĀGAM -a @ DṚṢṬ -er a @ PHAL -a @ DARŚ -inaḥ BHRAṢṬ -a @ ŚĪL -asya PRATIPATT -i @ VIRAHIT

line.left: -am ADHIGACCH -ati tathā tathā BHŪYASY -ā MĀTR -ayā PAROPĀRAMBH -a @ VIVĀD -a @ PRAKĪRṆALAPIT -ā @ KLEŚ - @ OPAKLEŚ -ebhyaś ca VṚTT -a @ SKH -a LIT -a @ SAMUDĀCĀR -ebhyaḥ PARIJÑĀY -a PARIJÑĀY -a CITT -am ADHYUPEKṢAT -e / </s><s> yathā yathā GUṆ -air VIVARDH -ate tathā tathā PRATICCHANN -a @ KALYĀṆ -o BHAV -ati / </s><s> na PARAT -o JÑĀT -uṃ SAMANVEṢAT -e na LĀBH -a SATKĀR -am / </s><s> imā EVAṂBHĀGĪY -ā BAH -avo ANUŚAṂS -ā BHAV -anti BODHISATTV -asya BODHIPAKṢY -ā BODHY - @ ANUKŪL -ās taj JÑĀN -a @ SANNIŚRIT -asya / </s><s> TASMĀD ye KECID
line.right: -im ANUPRĀPT -avanto ye ca KECIT PRĀP -syanti ye ca PRĀPN -uvanti SARV -e ta ETAD eva JÑĀN -aṃ NIŚRITY -a n ĀN -yan NYŪN -aṃ PRATIVIŚIṢṬ -aṃ vā / </s><s> evaṃ NIṢPRAPAÑC -a @ NAY - @ ĀRŪḌH -o BODHISATTV -a evaṃ caṃ BAH -v ANUŚAṂS -a ĀTM -anaś ca BUDDH -a @ DHARM -a @ PARIPĀK -āya PAR -eṣāñ ca YĀN -a @ TRAY -a @ DHARM -a @ PARIPĀK -āya SAMYA -k PRATIPANN -o BHAV -ati / </s><s> EVAÑ ca punaḥ SAMYA -k PRATIPANN -o BHAV -ati / </s><s> BHOG -eṣv ĀTMABHĀV -e ca nis TṚṢṆ -o BHAV -ati / </s>

line.left: <s> SARV -a @ VIDYĀSTHĀN -eṣu cāsy ĀVY -ā @ HAT -aṃ PARIŚUDDH -aṃ PARYAVADĀT -aṃ JÑĀNADARŚAN -aṃ PRAVART -ate / </s><s> a @ KHINN -aś ca BHAV -ati SATTV -ānām ARTH -e SAṂSĀR -a @ SAṂSṚTY -ā / </s><s> TATHĀGAT -ānāñ ca SARV -a @ SANDHĀY -a @ VACAN -āny ANUPRAVIŚAT -i / </s><s> na ca MAHĀYĀN - @ ĀDHIMUKT -eḥ SAṂHĀRY -o BHAV -aty a @ PARAPRATYAY -atayā / </s><s> asya KHAL -u PAÑC -a @ VIDH -asy ĀNUŚAṂS -asya PAÑC -a @ VIDH -am eva KARM -a VEDITAVY -am / </s><s> PARAM -o DṚṢṬADHARM -a @ SUKH -a @ VIHĀR -o BODHISATTV -asya
line.right: -āya PRAYOG -a @ NIRYĀT -asya KĀYIK -a @ CAITASIK -asya VYĀYĀM -a @ KLAM -asya NĀŚ -āya CITT -a @ ŚĀNT -er ANUŚAṂS -asy AITAT KARM -a VEDITAVY -am / </s><s> SARV -a @ BUDDH -a @ DHARM -āṇāṃ PARIPĀK -o BODHISATTV -asya SARV -a @ VIDYĀSTHĀN -eṣv a @ VYĀHAT -a @ JÑĀNAT -āyā ANUŚAṂS -asyai TAT KARM -a VEDITAVY -am / </s><s> SATTV -a @ PARIPĀK -o BODHISATTV -asya SAṂSĀR -ā @ KHEDIT -āyā ANUŚAṂS -asy AITAT KARM -a VEDITAVY -am / </s><s> VINEY -ān ĀMUT PANN - @ OTPANN -ānāṃ SAṂŚAYĀN -āṃ PRATIVINODAN -aṃ DHARM -a @ NETR -yāś

line.left: DUḤKH -a @ PRASAṂYUKT -am apya DUḤKH -ā @ SUKH -a @ VEDAN -ā @ SAṂPRAYUKT -am api CITT -aṃ JĀN -āti / </s><s> EK -ena PARACITT -a @ JÑĀN -e NAIK -asya SATTV -asya yasya yad yathā YĀDṚŚ -aṃ YĀV -ac CIT -aṃ PRATYUPASTHIT -aṃ BHAV -ati TAT SAKṚ -d YATHĀBHŪT -aṃ PRAJĀN -āti / </s><s> EK -en <g/> ^ <g/> aiva PARACITT -a @ JÑĀN -ena PRABHŪT -ānām api SATTV -ānāṃ yeṣāṃ yad yathā YĀDṚŚ -aṃ YĀV -ac CITT -aṃ PRATYUPASTHIT -aṃ BHAV -ati TAD api SAKṚ -d YATHĀBHŪT -aṃ PRAJĀN -āti / </s><s> sā punar iyam ABHIJÑ -ā BUDDH -asya
line.right: -i @ SAT tvānām IND -riya PAR -ā @ PAR -a @ JÑĀN -āya SATTV -ānāṃ NĀN - @ ĀDHIMUKT -i @ JÑĀN -āya NĀN -ā @ DHĀT -u CARIT -a @ JÑĀN -āya YATHĀYOG -añ ca PRAT -i @ PAT -su CITRĀS -u NIRVĀṆ -a @ PUR -aḥsarīṣu SAMYA -k @ SANNIY -o @ GĀY -a / </s><s> IDAM asyāḥ KARM -a VEDITAVY -am / </s><s> TATR - @ ĀSRAVAKṢAY -a @ JÑĀN -aṃ BUDDH -a @ BODHISATTV -ānāṃ KATAM -at / </s><s> iha TATHĀGAT -o vā BODHISATTV -o vā KLEŚ -ānāṃ KṢAY -a @ PRĀPT -iṃ YATHĀBHŪT -aṃ PRAJĀN -āti / </s>

line.left: KARM -a VEDITAVY -am / </s><s> TATR -a DHARM -a @ PRABHĀV -aḥ KATAM -aḥ / </s><s> DĀN -a @ PRABHĀV -aḥ ŚĪL -a @ KṢĀNT -i @ VĪRY -a @ DHYĀN -a @ PRAJÑ -ā @ PRABHĀV -aś ca / </s><s> sa punar eṣa DĀN - @ ĀD -īnāṃ DHARM -āṇāṃ PRABHĀV -aḥ SAMĀSAT -aś CATU -rbhir ĀKĀR -air VEDITAVY -aḥ / </s><s> VIPAKṢ -a @ PRAHĀṆ -ataḥ SAṂBHĀR -a @ PARIPĀK -ataḥ SVAPAR - @ ĀNUGRAH -ataḥ ĀYAT -yāṃ PHAL -ad ĀNAT -aś ca / </s><s> DĀN -aṃ DADAD BODHISATTV -o DĀN -a @ VIPAKṢ -aṃ MĀTSARY -aṃ PRAJAH -āti / </s><s> ĀTM -ano
line.right: -i @ SAṂBHĀR -a @ BHŪT añ ca BHAV -ati TAD asya DĀN -am / </s><s> DĀN -ena ca SAṂGRAHAVAST -unā SATTV -ān PARIPĀC -ayati / </s><s> PŪRV -aṃ DĀN -āt SUMAN -ā DAD -ac CITT -aṃ PRASĀD -ayati / </s><s> DATT -vā cā VIPRATISĀR -ī / </s><s> TR -iṣu KĀL -eṣu PRAMUDIT -a @ CITT -atayā ĀTM -ānam ANUGṚH -aṇāti / </s><s> PAR -eṣāṃ ca JIGHATS - @ ĀPIP -āsāśot OṢṆ -a @ VYĀDH - @ ĪCCH -ā @ VIGHĀT - @ ABHAY -a @ DUḤKH - @ ĀPANAYAN -āt PAR -a @ MAN -u GṚHṆ -āti / </s><s> PARATR -a ca YATR -a YATR

line.left: -eṣāṃ ca JIGHATS - @ ĀPIP -āsāśot OṢṆ -a @ VYĀDH - @ ĪCCH -ā @ VIGHĀT - @ ABHAY -a @ DUḤKH - @ ĀPANAYAN -āt PAR -a @ MAN -u GṚHṆ -āti / </s><s> PARATR -a ca YATR -a YATR -a PRATYĀJĀ -yate ĀḌHY -o BHAV -ati MAH - @ ĀBHOG -o MAH - @ ĀPAKṢ -o MAH -ā @ PARIVĀR -a ity eṣa CATU -r ĀKĀR -o DĀN -asya PRABHĀV -o nāta UTTAR -i nāto BHŪY -aḥ / </s><s> KĀYAVĀK SAṂVAR -a @ ŚĪL -aṃ SAMĀDADĀN -o BODHISATTV -aḥ ŚĪL -a @ VIPAKṢ -aṃ DAUḤŚĪLY -aṃ PRAJAH -āti / </s><s>
line.right: -eśca SAṂBHĀR -a @ BHŪT aṃ BHAV -ati TAD asya ŚĪL -a @ SAMĀDĀN -am / </s><s> SAMĀNĀRTHAT -ayā ca SAṂGRAHAVAST -unā SATTV -ān PARIPĀC -ayati / </s><s> DAUḤŚĪLY -a @ PRATYAY -aṃ BHAY -am AVADY -aṃ VAIR -aṃ PRAJAH -ad ĀTM -ānam ANUGṚH -aṇāti SUKH -aṃ SVAPAN SUKH -aṃ PRATIBUDHY -amānaḥ / </s><s> tathā ŚĪL -avato a @ VIPRATISĀR -aḥ PRĀMODY -aṃ YĀV -ac CITT -a @ SAMĀDH -iḥ / </s><s> ity evam ĀTM -ānam ANUGṚHṆ -āti / </s><s> SARV -a @ SATTV -ānāñ ca SARV -a @ PRAKĀR -air a @ VIHEṬHAN -atayā ABHAY -am ANUPRAYACCH -ati / </s><s> evaṃ PARAM -apy ANUGṚHṆ -āti

line.left: @ VIPRATISĀR -aḥ PRĀMODY -aṃ YĀV -ac CITT -a @ SAMĀDH -iḥ / </s><s> ity evam ĀTM -ānam ANUGṚHṆ -āti / </s><s> SARV -a @ SATTV -ānāñ ca SARV -a @ PRAKĀR -air a @ VIHEṬHAN -atayā ABHAY -am ANUPRAYACCH -ati / </s><s> evaṃ PARAM -apy ANUGṚHṆ -āti / </s><s> TAN NIDĀN -añ ca KĀY -asya BHED -āt SUGAT -au SVARG -a @ LOK -e DEV -eṣ ŪPAPAD -yate / </s><s> ity AYAṂ CATU -r ĀKĀR -aḥ PRABHĀV -aḥ ŚĪL -asya / </s><s> nāta UTTAR -i nāto BHŪY -aḥ / </s><s> KṢAM -o BODHISATTV -aḥ KṢĀNT -i @ VIPAKṢ -am a @ KṢĀNT -i PRAJAH -āti / </s><s>
line.right: -eśca SAṂBHĀR -a @ BHŪT ā SĀS -ya KṢĀNT -i r BHAV -ati / </s><s> SAM -ān ĀRTH -atay <g/> ^ <g/> aiva ca SATTV -ān PARIPĀC -ayati / </s><s> ĀTM -ānañ ca PAR -añ ca MAHAT o BHAY -āt PARITRĀY -amāṇas tayā kṣ yāntyā ĀTM -ānañ ca PAR -aṃś c ĀNUGṚHṆ -āti / </s><s> tato NIDĀN -añ ca BODHISATTV -a ĀYAT -yām a @ VAIR -a @ BAHUL -o BHAV -aty a @ BHED -a @ BAHUL -aś cā DUḤKH -a @ DAURMANASY -a @ BAHUL -aḥ / </s><s> DṚṢṬ -e ca DHARM -e a @ VIPRATISĀR -ī KĀL -aṃ KAR -oti / </s>

line.left: NIDĀN -añ ca BODHISATTV -a ĀYAT -yām a @ VAIR -a @ BAHUL -o BHAV -aty a @ BHED -a @ BAHUL -aś cā DUḤKH -a @ DAURMANASY -a @ BAHUL -aḥ / </s><s> DṚṢṬ -e ca DHARM -e a @ VIPRATISĀR -ī KĀL -aṃ KAR -oti / </s><s> KĀY -asya ca BHED -āt SUGAT -au SVARG -a @ LOK -e DEV -eṣ ŪPAPAD -yate / </s><s> it YAYAÑ CATU -r ĀKĀR -aḥ KṢĀNT -eḥ PRABHĀV -o nāta UTTAR -i nāto BHŪY -aḥ / </s><s> ĀRABDH -a @ VĪRY -o BODHISATTV -o VIHAR -an VĪRY -a @ VIPAKṢ -aṃ KAUSĪDY -aṃ PRAJAH -āti / </s><s>
line.right: -eśca SAṂBHĀR -a @ BHŪT aṃ BHAV -ati SANNIŚRAY -aś ca TAD VĪRY -am / </s><s> SAM -ān ĀRTH -atay <g/> ^ <g/> aiva ca SATTV -ān PARIPĀC -ayati / </s><s> ĀRABDH -a @ VĪRY -aś ca SUKH -aṃ SPARŚ -aṃ VIHAR -an na VYAVAKĪRṆ -aḥ PĀPAK -air a @ KUŚAL -air DHARM -aḥ PŪRV -eṇ ĀPAR -aṃ VIŚEṢĀDHIGAM -aṃ PAŚ -yan PRĪT -i @ PRĀMODY -en ĀTM -ānam ANUGṚHṆ -āti / </s><s> KUŚALAPAKṢ - @ ĀBHIYUKT -aś ca PAR -aṃ na KĀY -ena VĀC -ā vā VIHEṬH -ayati / </s><s> PAR -eṣāṃ c ĀRABDH -a @ VĪRY -atāyāṃ CHAND -aṃ JAN -ayati / </s>

line.left: -ā vā VIHEṬH -ayati / </s><s> PAR -eṣāṃ c ĀRABDH -a @ VĪRY -atāyāṃ CHAND -aṃ JAN -ayati / </s><s> evaṃ PARAM -apy ANUGṚHṆ -āti / </s><s> HET -u BALIK -aś ca BHAV -ati ĀYAT -yāṃ PURUṢ -a @ KĀR - @ ĀBHIRAT -aś ca / </s><s> ity AYAṂ CATU -r ĀKĀR -o VĪRY -a @ PRABHĀV -aḥ / </s><s> nāta UTTAR -i nāto BHŪY -aḥ / </s><s> DHYĀN -aṃ SAMĀPADY -am āno BODHISATTV -o DHYĀN -a @ VIPAKṢ -aṃ KLEŚ -aṃ KĀM -a VITARK -a @ PRĪT -i @ SUKH -a @ RŪP -a @ SAṂJÑ - @ ĀD -īṃśc OPAKLEŚ -ān PRAJAH -āti / </s><s>
line.right: -eśca SAṂBHĀR -a @ BHŪT aṃ SANN -iś RAY -a @ BHŪT aṃ BHAV -ati TAD asya DHYĀN -am / </s><s> SAM -ān ĀRTH -atay <g/> ^ <g/> aiva ca SATTV -ān PARIPĀC -ayati / </s><s> DṚṢṬADHARM -a @ SUKH -a @ VIHĀR -atay ĀTM -ānam ANUGṚHṆ -āti / </s><s> ŚĀNT -a @ PRAŚĀNT -a @ VĪT -a @ RĀG -a @ CITT -atayā SATTV -eṣv a @ VYĀBĀDHY -o BHAV -an NAV -i @ KOPY -aḥ PARAM -apy ANUGṚHṆ -āti / </s><s> JÑĀN -a @ VIŚUDDH -ir ABHIJÑĀN -irh ĀRAV -i @ ŚUDDH -ir DEV - @ OPAPATT -iś cā YATY -āṃ DHYĀN

line.left: @ VIHĀR -atay ĀTM -ānam ANUGṚHṆ -āti / </s><s> ŚĀNT -a @ PRAŚĀNT -a @ VĪT -a @ RĀG -a @ CITT -atayā SATTV -eṣv a @ VYĀBĀDHY -o BHAV -an NAV -i @ KOPY -aḥ PARAM -apy ANUGṚHṆ -āti / </s><s> JÑĀN -a @ VIŚUDDH -ir ABHIJÑĀN -irh ĀRAV -i @ ŚUDDH -ir DEV - @ OPAPATT -iś cā YATY -āṃ DHYĀN -a @ PHAL -am / </s><s> ity eṣa CATU -r ĀKĀR -o DHYĀN -a @ PRABHĀV -o nāta UTTAR -i nāto BHŪY -aḥ / </s><s> PRAJÑ -āvān BODHISATTV -aḥ PRAJÑ -ā @ VIPAKṢ -am a @ VIDY -āṃ PRAJAH -āti / </s><s>
line.right: -eśca SAṂBHĀR -a @ BHŪT ā BHAV - @ ATYASY -a sā PRAJÑ -ā / </s><s> DĀN -en <g/> ^ <g/> āpi PRIY -a @ VĀDIT -a @ YĀPY ARTHACARY -ay <g/> ^ <g/> āpi SAM -ān ĀRTH -atay <g/> ^ <g/> āpi ca SATTV -ān PARIPĀC -ayati / </s><s> JÑEY -a @ VAST -u — YATHĀRTH -a — PRATYAVAGAM - @ OPASAṂHIT -ena <g/> ^ UDĀR -eṇa PRĪT -i @ PRĀMODY -en ĀTM -ānam ANUGṚHṆ -āti / </s><s> SARVATR -a NYĀY - @ OPADEŚ -ena DṚṢṬ -e DHARM -e SAṂPARĀY -e ca HIT -a @ SUKH -ābhyāṃ SATTV -ānapy ANUGṚHṆ -āti / </s>

line.left: -an EḌAK -aṃ TATH -ā @ GAT -ā @ YĀN u PRADATT -avān / </s><s> PRATIGṚH -īte ca TASMIN BHAGAV -atā sa MARKAṬ -o HṚṢṬ -a @ MĀNAS -aḥ PRATYAV -a @ SṚṢṬ -aḥ sa NṚTY -amānaḥ / </s><s> BHAGAV -antam ev ODDIŚY -a TATHĀGAT -aḥ SNĀS -yati taṃ SNĀPAY -iṣyāmi iti MEGH -a @ PRATĪKṢAṆ -ā / </s><s> VṚKṢ -a @ MŪL -e ca BODHISATTV -asya TATHĀGAT -asya vā SANTIṢṬHAT -as tasya SARV -a @ VṚKṢ -āṇāṃ PRĀCĪN -a @ NIMN -āsu CHĀY -āsu tasya VṚKṢ -asya CHĀY -ayā KĀY -ā @ VIJAHANAT -ā / </s><s> ṢAḌ bhir VARṢ -air ABHISAṂBUDDH -a @
line.right: -es TATHĀGAT -asy ĀVATĀR -a @ GAVEṢ -iṇo api MAR -asy ĀLABDH - @ ĀVATĀR -atā / </s><s> SĀRŪPY -a SAHAGAT -āyāś ca SMṚT -eḥ SATATASAMIT -aṃ PRATYUPASTHĀN -atā / </s><s> SMṚT -asya ca PRATISAṂVIDIT -ānāṃ VEDAN -ānāṃ SAṂJÑ -ānāṃ VITARK -āṇām UTPĀD -aḥ STHĀN -aṃ NIRODH -aś ca / </s><s> tathā DARŚAN - @ ĀNUGRAH -a @ KAR -aḥ SAHAJ -aḥ PRABHĀV -o BUDDH -ānā MĀR -ya @ CĀR -a @ VIHĀR -a @ SAṂGṚHĪT -aś ca / </s><s> TATR -a DARŚAN - @ ĀNUGRAH -a @ KAR -aḥ / </s><s> TADYATH -ā UNMATT -āḥ KṢIPT -a @ CITT -āḥ TATHĀGAT -aṃ DṚṢṬ -vā

line.left: -aḥ PARIPĀK -a @ PRABHED -aḥ SATTV -ānāṃ BUDDH -a @ BODHISATTV -a @ KṚT -o VEDITAVY -aḥ / </s><s> TATR -a BODHISATTV -aḥ ebhiḥ PARIPĀK -a @ KĀRAṆ - @ AIRYAT -hā NIRDIṢṬ -air ĀTM -anaś ca BUDDH -a @ DHARM -a @ PARIPĀK -āy ENDRIY -a @ PARIPĀK -aṃ KUŚALAMŪL -a @ PARIPĀK -aṃ JÑĀN -a @ PARIPĀK -añ ca MṚD -u MADHY - @ ĀDHIMĀTR -añ ca SAMUDĀN -ayati PARASATTV -ānāñ ca PARAPUDGAL -ānāṃ YĀN -a @ TRAY -a @ NIRYĀṆ -āya / </s><s> iti BODHISATTVABHŪM -āv ĀDHĀR -e YOGASTHĀN -e ṢAṢṬH -aṃ PARIPĀK -a @ PAṬAL -am // </s><s>
line.right: -i @ PAṬAL -am TATR -a BODH -iḥ KATAM -ā / </s><s> SAMĀSAT -o DVIVIDH -añ ca PRAHĀṆ -aṃ DVIVIDH -añ ca JÑĀN -aṃ BODH -ir ity UC -yate / </s><s> TATR -a DVIVIDH -aṃ PRAHĀṆ -aṃ — KLEŚ - @ ĀVARAṆ -a @ PRAHĀṆ -aṃ JÑEY - @ ĀVARAṆ -a @ PRAHĀṆ -añ ca / </s><s> DVIVIDH -aṃ punar JÑĀN -aṃ yat KLEŚ - @ ĀVARAṆ -a @ PRAHĀṆ -āc ca NIRMAL -aṃ SARV -a @ KLEŚ -anir ANUBANDH -a @ JÑĀN -am / </s><s> JÑEY - @ ĀVARAṆ -a @ PRAHĀṆ -āc ca yat SARV -asmin JÑEY -e a @ PRATIHAT -aman

line.left: -ānāṃ BUDDH -a @ BODHISATTV -a @ KṚT -o VEDITAVY -aḥ / </s><s> TATR -a BODHISATTV -aḥ ebhiḥ PARIPĀK -a @ KĀRAṆ - @ AIRYAT -hā NIRDIṢṬ -air ĀTM -anaś ca BUDDH -a @ DHARM -a @ PARIPĀK -āy ENDRIY -a @ PARIPĀK -aṃ KUŚALAMŪL -a @ PARIPĀK -aṃ JÑĀN -a @ PARIPĀK -añ ca MṚD -u MADHY - @ ĀDHIMĀTR -añ ca SAMUDĀN -ayati PARASATTV -ānāñ ca PARAPUDGAL -ānāṃ YĀN -a @ TRAY -a @ NIRYĀṆ -āya / </s><s> iti BODHISATTVABHŪM -āv ĀDHĀR -e YOGASTHĀN -e ṢAṢṬH -aṃ PARIPĀK -a @ PAṬAL -am // </s><s> BODH -i @ PAṬAL -am TATR -a
line.right: -iḥ KATAM -ā / </s><s> SAMĀSAT -o DVIVIDH -añ ca PRAHĀṆ -aṃ DVIVIDH -añ ca JÑĀN -aṃ BODH -ir ity UC -yate / </s><s> TATR -a DVIVIDH -aṃ PRAHĀṆ -aṃ — KLEŚ - @ ĀVARAṆ -a @ PRAHĀṆ -aṃ JÑEY - @ ĀVARAṆ -a @ PRAHĀṆ -añ ca / </s><s> DVIVIDH -aṃ punar JÑĀN -aṃ yat KLEŚ - @ ĀVARAṆ -a @ PRAHĀṆ -āc ca NIRMAL -aṃ SARV -a @ KLEŚ -anir ANUBANDH -a @ JÑĀN -am / </s><s> JÑEY - @ ĀVARAṆ -a @ PRAHĀṆ -āc ca yat SARV -asmin JÑEY -e a @ PRATIHAT -aman ĀVARAṆ -aṃ JÑĀN -am / </s><s> APAR -aḥ

line.right: -ir ity UC -yate / </s><s> TATR -a DVIVIDH -aṃ PRAHĀṆ -aṃ — KLEŚ - @ ĀVARAṆ -a @ PRAHĀṆ -aṃ JÑEY - @ ĀVARAṆ -a @ PRAHĀṆ -añ ca / </s><s> DVIVIDH -aṃ punar JÑĀN -aṃ yat KLEŚ - @ ĀVARAṆ -a @ PRAHĀṆ -āc ca NIRMAL -aṃ SARV -a @ KLEŚ -anir ANUBANDH -a @ JÑĀN -am / </s><s> JÑEY - @ ĀVARAṆ -a @ PRAHĀṆ -āc ca yat SARV -asmin JÑEY -e a @ PRATIHAT -aman ĀVARAṆ -aṃ JÑĀN -am / </s><s> APAR -aḥ PARYĀY -aḥ / </s><s> ŚUDDH -a @ JÑĀN -aṃ SARVAJÑ -ānam ASAṄG -a @ JÑĀN -añ ca / </s>

line.left: <g/> edaṃ CATVĀRIṂŚ -ad UTTAR -am ĀVEṆIK -aṃ BUDDH -a @ DHARM -a @ ŚAT -am / </s><s> DVĀTRIṂŚ -an MAHĀPURUṢ -a @ LAKṢAṆ -āny a @ ŚĪTY -anu VYAÑJAN -āni CATASR -aḥ SARV - @ ĀKĀR -āḥ PARIŚUDDH -ayaḥ DAŚ -a BAL -āni CATVĀR -i VAIŚĀRADY -āni trīṃṇi SMṚTYUPASTHĀN -āni TRĪṆ -ya @ RAKṢY -āṇi MAHĀKARUṆ -ā a @ SAMMOṢADHARM -atā VĀSAN -ā @ SAMUDGHĀT -aḥ SARV - @ ĀKĀR -a @ VAR -a @ JÑĀ -nañ ca / </s><s> eṣāñ ca BUDDH -a @ DHARM -āṇāṃ VIBHĀG -aḥ PRATIṢṬHĀP -a @ ṬAL -e BHAV -iṣyati / </s><s> TATR -eyaṃ PARAM -ā
line.right: -iḥ SAPT -abhiḥ PARAM -atābhir YUKT -ā ye NEY -aṃ SARV -a @ BODH -īnāṃ PARAM -ety UC -yate / </s><s> SAPT -a PAR -a @ MAT -āḥ KATAM -āḥ ĀŚRAY -a @ PARAM -atā PRATIPATT -i @ PARAM -atā SAMPATT -i @ PARAM -atā JÑĀN -a @ PARAM -atā PRABHĀV -a @ PARAM -atā PRAHĀṆ -a @ PARAM -atā VIHĀR -a @ PARAM -atā ca / </s><s> yat TATHĀGAT -o DVĀTRIṂŚAT -ā MAHĀPURUṢ -a @ LAKṢAṆ -aiḥ su @ LAKṢIT -a @ GĀTR -aḥ / </s><s> iyamasy ĀŚRAY -a @ PARAM -at <g/> ^ <g/> ety UC -yate / </s><s> yat TATHĀGAT -a

line.left: ŚAT -am / </s><s> DVĀTRIṂŚ -an MAHĀPURUṢ -a @ LAKṢAṆ -āny a @ ŚĪTY -anu VYAÑJAN -āni CATASR -aḥ SARV - @ ĀKĀR -āḥ PARIŚUDDH -ayaḥ DAŚ -a BAL -āni CATVĀR -i VAIŚĀRADY -āni trīṃṇi SMṚTYUPASTHĀN -āni TRĪṆ -ya @ RAKṢY -āṇi MAHĀKARUṆ -ā a @ SAMMOṢADHARM -atā VĀSAN -ā @ SAMUDGHĀT -aḥ SARV - @ ĀKĀR -a @ VAR -a @ JÑĀ -nañ ca / </s><s> eṣāñ ca BUDDH -a @ DHARM -āṇāṃ VIBHĀG -aḥ PRATIṢṬHĀP -a @ ṬAL -e BHAV -iṣyati / </s><s> TATR -eyaṃ PARAM -ā BODH -iḥ SAPT -abhiḥ PARAM -atābhir YUKT -ā ye NEY -aṃ SARV -a @
line.right: -īnāṃ PARAM -ety UC -yate / </s><s> SAPT -a PAR -a @ MAT -āḥ KATAM -āḥ ĀŚRAY -a @ PARAM -atā PRATIPATT -i @ PARAM -atā SAMPATT -i @ PARAM -atā JÑĀN -a @ PARAM -atā PRABHĀV -a @ PARAM -atā PRAHĀṆ -a @ PARAM -atā VIHĀR -a @ PARAM -atā ca / </s><s> yat TATHĀGAT -o DVĀTRIṂŚAT -ā MAHĀPURUṢ -a @ LAKṢAṆ -aiḥ su @ LAKṢIT -a @ GĀTR -aḥ / </s><s> iyamasy ĀŚRAY -a @ PARAM -at <g/> ^ <g/> ety UC -yate / </s><s> yat TATHĀGAT -a ĀTM -a @ HITĀY -a PARAHIT -āya BAHUJAN -a @ HITĀY -a BAHUJAN -a

line.left: -ati / </s><s> EK ASMIN n eva ca KALP -e PRABHŪT -ānāṃ BUDDH -ānām UTPĀD -o BHAV -ati / </s><s> teṣu teṣu ca DAŚ -asu DIKṢ VAPR -a @ MEY - @ ĀSAṂKHYEY -eṣu LOKADHĀT -uṣv a @ PRAMEY -āṇām eva BUDDH -ānām UTPĀD -o VEDITAVY -aḥ / </s><s> TAT kasya HET -oḥ / </s><s> SANT -i DAŚ -asu DIKṢ VAPR -a @ MEY - @ ĀSAṂKHYEY -ā BODHISATTV -ā ye TULY -a @ KĀLA KṚT -a @ PRAṆIDHĀN -ās TULY -a @ SAṂBHĀR -a @ SAMUDĀGAT -āś ca / </s><s> YASMIN n eva DIVAS -e PAKṢ -e māse SAṂVATSAR -e EK -ena BODHISATTV -ena
line.right: -au CITT -aṃ PRAṆIHIT -aṃ TASMIN n eva DIVAS -e PAKṢ -e māse SAṂVATSAR -e SARV -aiḥ / </s><s> yathā c AIK -a UTSAH -ito GHAṬIT -o VYĀYACCH -itaś ca tathā SARV -e / </s><s> TAT HĀH -i DṚŚ -yante ASMIN n eva LOKADHĀT -āvan EK -āni BODHISATTV -a @ ŚAT -āni yāni TULY -a @ KĀL -a @ PRAṆIDHĀN -āni tul YATY -ā @ GĀN -i TULY -a @ KṢĀNTIK -āni TULY -a @ VĪRY -āṇi TULY -a @ DHYĀN -āni TULY -a @ PRAJÑĀN -āni / </s><s> PRĀGEV -a DAŚ -asu DIKṢ -v ANANT -ā @ PARYANT -eṣu LOKADHĀT -uṣu / </s>

line.left: ANUTTAR -ā SAMYAKSAṂBODH -iḥ SVABHĀV -ato api yathā NIRDIṢṬ -ā YATHĀBHŪT -aṃ VEDITAVY -ā / </s><s> PARAM -ato api GUṆ -a @ NIRDEŚ - @ ĀNUSMARAṆ -ato api SAṂBHAV -ato api VIŚEṢ -ato api yathā NIRDIṢṬ -ā YATHĀBHŪT -aṃ VEDITAVY -ā / </s><s> api tva CINTY ^ <g/> aiva SARV -a @ TARK -a @ MĀRG -a @ SAMATIKRĀNT -atvād a @ PRAMEY - @ ĀSAṂKHYEY -a @ GUṆ -a @ SAMUDIT -atvād ANUTTAR ^ <g/> aiva ca SAMYAKSAṂBODH -iḥ SARV -a @ ŚRĀVAK -a — PRATYEKABUDDH -a @ TATHĀGAT -ānābhi NIRVṚTT -aye BHAV -ati / </s><s> TASMĀD eṣ <g/> ^ <g/> aiva
line.right: -ir AGRY -ā ŚREṢṬH -ā VAR -ā PRAṆĪT -eti / </s><s> iti BODHISATTVABHŪM -āv ĀDHĀR -e YOGASTHĀN -e SAPTAM -aṃ BODH -i @ PAṬAL -am / </s><s> BAL -a @ GOTR -a @ PAṬAL -am NIRDIṢṬ -aṃ TĀVAD YATR -a BODHISATTV -ena ŚIKṢITAVY -am / </s><s> yathā punaḥ ŚIKṢITAVY -aṃ TAD VAKṢ -yāmi / </s><s> UDDĀN -am / </s><s> ADHIMUKT -er BAHUL -atā DHARM -a @ PARYEṢṬ -i @ DEŚAN -ā / </s><s> PRATIPATT -is tathā SAMYA -g @ AVAVĀD - @ ĀNUŚĀSAN -am / </s><s> UPĀY -a @ SAHIT -aṃ KĀYAVĀṄ MAN -aḥ KARM -a PAŚCIM -am / </s><s> ih ĀDIT -a eva BODHISATTV -ena BODHISATTV -a

line.left: @ NIRDEŚ - @ ĀNUSMARAṆ -ato api SAṂBHAV -ato api VIŚEṢ -ato api yathā NIRDIṢṬ -ā YATHĀBHŪT -aṃ VEDITAVY -ā / </s><s> api tva CINTY ^ <g/> aiva SARV -a @ TARK -a @ MĀRG -a @ SAMATIKRĀNT -atvād a @ PRAMEY - @ ĀSAṂKHYEY -a @ GUṆ -a @ SAMUDIT -atvād ANUTTAR ^ <g/> aiva ca SAMYAKSAṂBODH -iḥ SARV -a @ ŚRĀVAK -a — PRATYEKABUDDH -a @ TATHĀGAT -ānābhi NIRVṚTT -aye BHAV -ati / </s><s> TASMĀD eṣ <g/> ^ <g/> aiva BODH -ir AGRY -ā ŚREṢṬH -ā VAR -ā PRAṆĪT -eti / </s><s> iti BODHISATTVABHŪM -āv ĀDHĀR -e YOGASTHĀN -e SAPTAM -aṃ
line.right: -i @ PAṬAL -am / </s><s> BAL -a @ GOTR -a @ PAṬAL -am NIRDIṢṬ -aṃ TĀVAD YATR -a BODHISATTV -ena ŚIKṢITAVY -am / </s><s> yathā punaḥ ŚIKṢITAVY -aṃ TAD VAKṢ -yāmi / </s><s> UDDĀN -am / </s><s> ADHIMUKT -er BAHUL -atā DHARM -a @ PARYEṢṬ -i @ DEŚAN -ā / </s><s> PRATIPATT -is tathā SAMYA -g @ AVAVĀD - @ ĀNUŚĀSAN -am / </s><s> UPĀY -a @ SAHIT -aṃ KĀYAVĀṄ MAN -aḥ KARM -a PAŚCIM -am / </s><s> ih ĀDIT -a eva BODHISATTV -ena BODHISATTV -a @ ŚIKṢ -āsu ŚIKṢIT -u KĀM -en ĀDHIMUKT -i @ BAHUL -ena BHAVITAVY -aṃ DHARM -e PARYEṢ -akeṇa DHARMADEŚAK -ena

line.left: SAMANVĀGAT -o BHAV -ati / </s><s> TR -iṣu RATN -eṣu BUDDH -a @ DHARM -aṃ SAṂGH -a @ GUṆ -eṣu BUDDH -a @ BODHISATTV -a @ PRABHĀV -e ca yathā NIRDIṢṬ -e TATTV - @ ĀRTH -e ca yathā NIRDIṢṬ -e HET -au ca PHAL -e ca VICITR -e YATHĀYOG -a @ PATIT -e a @ VIPARĪT -e PRĀPTAVY -e c ĀRTH -e SAMARTH -o AHAṂ PRĀPT -um iti / </s><s> yathā PRĀPTAVY -e ARTH -e evaṃ PRĀPT -y @ UPĀY -e ASTY - @ AYAṂ PRĀPT -y @ UPĀY -aḥ PRĀPTAVY -asy ĀRTH -asya eti / </s><s> TATR -a PRĀPTAVY -oa yathā
line.right: -ir ANUTTAR -ā / </s><s> PRĀPT -y @ UPĀY -aḥ punaḥ SARV -e BODHISATTV -a @ ŚIKṢ -ā @ MĀRG -āḥ / </s><s> tathā su @ BHĀṢIT -e SULAPIT -e su @ PRAV -yā HṚT -e ADHIMUKT -is TADYATH -ā SŪTR -aṃ GEY -aṃ VYĀKARAṆ - @ ĀD -iṣu DHARM -eṣu / </s><s> TATR -āsminn AṢṬ -a @ VIDH -e ADHIMUKT -y @ ĀDHIṢṬHĀN -e BODHISATTV -asya dvābhyāṃ KĀRAṆ -ābhyām ADHIMUKT -i @ BAHUL -atā VEDITAVY -ā / </s><s> ADHIMUKT -y @ ABHYĀS -a @ BAHULĪKĀR -ataś ca TĪVR -a @ KṢĀNT -i @ SANNIVEŚ -ataś ca / </s><s> TATR -a DHARM -aṃ BODHISATTV -aḥ

line.left: @ CITT -o BODHISATTV -o DĀN -aṃ DAD -an na PARAT -aḥ PRATYUPAKĀR -aṃ PRATYĀŚ -aṃ SAT e / </s><s> SUKH -a @ KĀM -āṃ TṚṢṆ -ā @ DĀH -ena DAH -yamānāma PRATIBAL -āṃ PRAKṚT -i @ DUḤKHIT -āṃ janatāṃ SAṂPAŚYAN / </s><s> VIPĀK - @ ĀNAPEKṢ -aṃ DĀN -aṃ KATAM -at / </s><s> na BODHISATTV -o DĀN -aṃ DATT -vā DĀN -asya <g/> ^ a @ YATY -āṃ BHOG -a @ SAMPAD aṃ vā ĀTMABHĀV -a @ SAMPAD aṃ vā PHAL -a @ VIPĀK -aṃ PRATYĀŚ -aṃ SAT e / </s><s> SARV -a @ SAṂSKĀR -eṣu PHALG -u DARŚ -ī PARAM -a @
line.right: - @ ĀVAN -u ŚAṂS -a @ DARŚ -ī / </s><s> ebhir DAŚ -abhir ĀKĀR -air BODHISATTV -ānāṃ VIŚUDDH -aṃ SUVIŚUDDH -aṃ DĀN -aṃ BHAV -ati / </s><s> evaṃ hi BODHISATTV -a ETAN NAV - @ ĀKĀR -aṃ DĀN -aṃ NIŚRITY -a DĀN -a @ PĀRAMIT -āṃ PARIPŪRAY -itvā ANUTTAR -āṃ SAMYAKSAṂBODH -im ABHISAṂBUDH -yate / </s><s> iti BODHISATTVABHŪM -āv ĀDHĀR -e YOGASTHĀN -e NAVAM -aṃ DĀN -a @ PAṬAL -am / </s><s> ŚĪL -a @ PAṬAL -am UDDĀN -am / </s><s> SVABHĀV -aś c <g/> ^ <g/> aiva SARV -añ ca DUṢKAR -aṃ SARV -ato MUKH -am / syāt SĀTPAURUṢY -a @ YUKT -añ

line.left: -iñca yathā yaiḥ SATTV -aiḥ SĀRDH -aṃ SAṂVASTAVY -aṃ BHAV -ati tathā taiḥ SAṂVAS -ati / </s><s> yathā yeṣu SATTV -eṣu PRATIPATTAVY -aṃ BHAV -ati tathā teṣu PRAT -i @ PAD -yate / </s><s> yasya ca SATTV -asya BODHISATTV -aś CITT -am ANUVARTIT -u KĀM -o BHAV -ati tasya ca CET - @ PAŚ -yaty evaṃ RŪP -eṇāsya VAST -u SAMUDĀCĀR -eṇa KĀYIK -a @ VĀCIK -ena DUḤKH -a @ DAURMASY -am UTPAT -syete / </s><s> tac ca DUḤKH -a @ DAURMANASY -am asya nā KUŚAL -āt STHĀN -ād VYUTTHĀN -āya KUŚAL -e ca STHĀN -e PRATIṢṬHĀPAN -āya SAṂVART -iṣyate / </s><s> PRATISAṂKHYĀY -a
line.right: -i @ SATT - @ VAST -aṃ KĀYIK -a @ VĀCIK -aṃ VAST -a @ SAMUDĀCĀR -aṃ YATN -ataḥ PARIHAR -ati na SAMUDĀCAR -ati / </s><s> sa CET punas TAD DUḤKH -a @ DAURMANASY -am asyā KUŚAL -āt STHĀN -ād VYUTTHĀPY -a KUŚAL -e STHĀN -e PRATIṢṬHĀPAN -āya PAŚ -yati n ĀNUVART -ate / </s><s> PRATISAṂKHYĀY -a BODHISATTV -aḥ PARACITT -aṃ YADUT -a PARĀNUKAMP -ām ev OPĀDĀY -a yena ca PAR -eṣāṃ VAST -u SAMUDĀCĀR -eṇa KĀYIK -a @ VĀCIK -en ĀNY -eṣām UTPAD -yate DUḤKH -a @ DAURMANASY -am tac ca PAR -eṣāṃ TAD ANY -eṣā MAK -uśalāt STHĀN -ād VYUTTHĀN

line.left: -a yena ca PAR -eṣāṃ VAST -u SAMUDĀCĀR -eṇa KĀYIK -a @ VĀCIK -en ĀNY -eṣām UTPAD -yate DUḤKH -a @ DAURMANASY -am tac ca PAR -eṣāṃ TAD ANY -eṣā MAK -uśalāt STHĀN -ād VYUTTHĀN -āya KUŚAL -e STHĀN -e PRATIṢṬHĀPAN -āya na SAṂVART -ate PRATISAṂKHYĀY -a PRATISAṂHAR -ati BODHISATTV -as TAT KĀYAVĀK KARM -a @ SAMUDĀCĀR -aṃ TAD ANY -eṣāṃ CITT - @ ĀNURAKṢ -ayā / </s><s> sa CET punaḥ PAŚ -yati PAR -eṣāṃ TAD ANY -eṣāṃ vā TAD UBHAY -or vā a @ KUŚAL -āt STHĀN -ād VYUTTHĀPY -a KUŚAL -e STHĀN -e PRATIṢṬHĀPAN -āya PRATISAṂKHYĀY -a SAMUDĀCAR -ati
line.right: -i @ SATT - @ VAST -aṃ KĀYAVĀK SAMUDĀCĀR -am / </s><s> n ĀNUVART -ate teṣāṃ SATTV -ānāṃ CITT -am ANUKAMP -ā @ CITT -am ev OPASTHĀPY -a / </s><s> yena ca BODHISATTV -a ĀTM -ano VAST -u SAMUDĀCĀR -eṇa KĀYIK -a @ VĀCIK -ena PAR -eṣāṃ DUḤKH -a @ DAURMANASY -am UTPADY -amānaṃ SAMANUPAŚ -yati sa ca KĀYAVĀK SAMUDĀCĀR -o na ŚIKṢĀPAD -a @ PARIGṚHĪT -o BHAV -ati na PUṆY -a @ JÑĀN -a @ SAMBHĀR - @ ĀNUGAT -aḥ tac ca DUḤKH -a @ DAURMANASY -aṃ PAR -eṣāṃ nā KUŚAL -āt STHĀN - @ ĀDIT -i PŪRV -avad VEDITAVY -am

line.left: - @ VAST -aṃ KĀYAVĀK SAMUDĀCĀR -am / </s><s> n ĀNUVART -ate teṣāṃ SATTV -ānāṃ CITT -am ANUKAMP -ā @ CITT -am ev OPASTHĀPY -a / </s><s> yena ca BODHISATTV -a ĀTM -ano VAST -u SAMUDĀCĀR -eṇa KĀYIK -a @ VĀCIK -ena PAR -eṣāṃ DUḤKH -a @ DAURMANASY -am UTPADY -amānaṃ SAMANUPAŚ -yati sa ca KĀYAVĀK SAMUDĀCĀR -o na ŚIKṢĀPAD -a @ PARIGṚHĪT -o BHAV -ati na PUṆY -a @ JÑĀN -a @ SAMBHĀR - @ ĀNUGAT -aḥ tac ca DUḤKH -a @ DAURMANASY -aṃ PAR -eṣāṃ nā KUŚAL -āt STHĀN - @ ĀDIT -i PŪRV -avad VEDITAVY -am / </s><s> PRATISAṂHAR -ati
line.right: -i @ SATT - @ VAST -aṃ KĀYAVĀK SAMUDĀCĀR -aṃ PARACITT - @ ĀNURAKṢ -ayā / </s><s> TAD VIPARYAY -āt SAMUDĀCĀR -aḥ PŪRV -avad VEDITAVY -aḥ / </s><s> yathā DUḤKH -a @ DAURMANASY -am evaṃ SUKH -a @ SAUMANASY -aṃ YATHĀYOG -aṃ VISTAR -eṇa VEDITAVY -am / </s><s> na ca PARACITT - @ ĀNUVART -ī BODHISATTV -aḥ PAR -asya KRODH -a @ PARYAVASTHĀN -ena PARYAVASTHIT -asya SAMMUKH -am a @ VIGAT -e KRODH -a @ PARYAVASTHĀN -e VARṆ -am api BHĀṢ -ate PRĀGEV -ā @ VARṆ -am / </s><s> n <g/> ^ <g/> āpi SAṂJÑĀPT -im ANUPRAYACCH -ati / </s><s> punaḥ PARACITT - @ ĀNUVART

line.left: PRAŚ -ā @ DAM -evān UPABṚṂH -ayatā na CIR -asy EDĀN -īṃ me a @ KṢAY -asya <g/> ^ a @ PRAMEY -asya NIRUTTAR -asya MAH -ā @ PUṆY -a @ NIDHĀN -asya PRĀPT -ir BHAVIṢY -at <g/> ^ <g/> īti ETAM ev ĀRTH -am ANUCINTAY -atā TŪṢṆ -īṃ BHAVITAVY -am / </s><s> tena punar VIJÑ -ena BODHISATTV -ena sa tathā PRATIPANN -o BODHISATTV -aḥ a @ VIKṢIPT -ena CETAS -ā STHIT -ena vā NIṢAṆṆ -ena vā ĀSAN -e IDAṂ syād VACANĪY -aḥ / </s><s> ŚRUṆ -u evaṃ NĀM -an KULAPUTR -a DHARM -a @ BHRĀT -ar iti vā BODHISATTV -o asi
line.right: -au ca KṚT -a @ PRAṆIDHĀN -aḥ / </s><s> tenaom iti PRATIJÑĀTAVY -am / </s><s> sa punar UTTAR -i IDAṂ syād VACANĪY -aḥ / </s><s> PRATĪCCH -asi tvam evaṃ NĀM -an KULAPUTR -a MAM - @ ĀNTIK -āt SARVĀṆ -i BODHISATTV -a @ ŚIKṢĀPAD -āni SARV -añ ca BODHISATTV -a @ ŚĪL -aṃ SAṂVAR -a @ ŚĪL -aṃ KUŚAL -a @ DHARM -a @ SAṂGRĀH -aka @ ŚĪL -aṃ SATTV - @ ĀRTHAKRIY -ā @ ŚĪL -añ ca / </s><s> yāni ŚIKṢĀPAD -āni YACCH -īlam ATĪT -ānāṃ SARV -a @ BODHISATTV -ānām ABHŪT / </s><s> yāni ŚIKṢĀPAD -āni YACCH -īlam ANĀGAT -ānāṃ SARV -a @

line.left: @ ĀTM -anāṃ ŚRĀVAK -a @ PRATYEKABUDDH -a @ BODHISATTV -ānāṃ va DHĀY -od YATAM ĀMIṢ -a @ KIÑCIT ka HET -oḥ PRABHŪT ĀNANTARY -a @ KARM -a @ KRIY -ā @ PRAYUKT -aṃ PAŚ -yati / </s><s> DṚṢṬ -vā ca punar evaṃ CETAS -ā CITT -am ABHISAṂSKAR -oti / </s><s> YADYAP -y @ AHAM enaṃ PRĀṆ -inaṃ JĪVIT -ād VYAPAROPY -a NARAK -eṣ ŪPAPADY -eyaṃ KĀM -aṃ BHAV -atu me NARAK - @ OPAPATT -iḥ / </s><s> eṣa ca SATTV -a ĀNANTARY -a @ KARM -a KṚTV -ā mā BHŪN - @ NARAK -a @ PARĀYAṆ -a iti / </s><s> evam ĀŚAY -o
line.right: -i @ SATT - @ VAST -aṃ PRĀṆ -inaṃ KUŚAL -a @ CITT -o a @ VYĀKṚT -a @ CITT -o vā VID -itvā ṚTĪY -amānaḥ ANUKAMP -ā @ CITT -am evā YATY -ām UPĀDĀY -a JĪVIT -ād VYAPAR - @ OPA -yati / </s><s> an @ ĀPATTIK -o BHAV -ati BAH -u ca PUṆY -aṃ PRASŪ -yate / </s><s> YATHĀP -i TAD BODHISATTV -o ye SATTV -ā RĀJĀN -o vā BHAV -anti RĀJ -a @ MAH -ā @ MĀTR -ā vā ADHIMĀTR -a @ RAUDR -āḥ SATTV -eṣu NIRDAY -ā EKĀNT -a @ PAR -a @ PĪḌ -ā @ PRAVṚTT -āḥ

line.left: -e MANY -u SAMBHĀVAN -ā @ JĀT -ānām ĀGHĀT -a @ VAIMUKHY -a @ SAṂBHĀVAN -ā @ JĀT -ānāṃ sau MUKHY - @ ĀNTARBHĀV -a @ ŚUDDH -y @ UPADARŚAN - @ ĀRTH -am / </s><s> yaḥ punar BODHISATTV -a EVAṂDṚṢṬ -iḥ syād evaṃ VĀD -ī na BODHISATTV -ena NIRVĀṆ - @ ĀRĀM -eṇa VIHARTAVY -am / </s><s> api tu NIRVĀṆ -a @ VIMUKH -ena VIHARTAVY -am / </s><s> na ca KLEŚ - @ OPAKLEŚ -ebhyo BHETAVY -am na c AIK -āntena tebhyaś CITT -aṃ VIVECAY -itavyam / </s><s> tathā hi BODHISATTV -ena TRĪṆ -i KALP - @ ĀSAṂKHYEY -āni SAṂSĀR -e SAṂSAR -atā
line.right: -iḥ SAMUDĀNET -a @ VYET -i / </s><s> SĀPATTIK -o BHAV -ati SĀTISĀR -aḥ KLIṢṬ -ām ĀPATT -im ĀPAD -yate / </s><s> TAT kasya HET -oḥ / </s><s> yathā KHAL -u ŚRĀVAK -eṇa NIRVĀṆ - @ ĀBHIRAT -ir ā SEVITAVY -ā KLEŚ - @ OPAKLEŚ -ebhyaś ca CITT -a @ MUD -v EJAY -i @ TAVY -aṃ tataḥ ŚATASAHASR -a @ KOṬ -i @ GUṆ -ena BODHISATTV -ena NIRVĀṆ - @ ĀBHIRAT -ir ā SEVITAVY -ā KLEŚ - @ OPAKLEŚ -ebhyaś ca CETAS -a UDVEG -o BHĀVAYITAVY -aḥ / </s><s> tathā hi ŚRĀVAK -o asy ĀTM -ano ARTHĀY -a PRAYUKT -o BODHISATTV -aḥ SARV

line.left: KṚTV -ā yatkiñcic CEṢṬ -ate SARV -aṃ TAD BODHISATTV -a @ KṚTY -am / </s><s> nā KṚTY -aṃ na ca KṚTY -aṃ KURV -ataḥ ĀPATT -ir YUJ -yate / </s><s> SATTV -eṣu tu DVIṢṬ -o BODHISATTV -o n ĀTM -ano na PAR -eṣāṃ HIT -am ĀCAR -ati / </s><s> na c AITAD BODHISATTV -a @ KṚTY -am / </s><s> evam a @ KṚTY -aṃ KURV -ataḥ ĀPATT -ir YUJ -yate / </s><s> MṚD -u MADHY - @ ĀDHIMĀTR -atā ca BODHISATTV -asy ĀPATT -īnāṃ VEDITAVY -ā / </s><s> TADYATH -ā VASTUSAṂGRAHAṆ -yām / </s><s> EVAÑ ca punaḥ SV -a @ VINAY -e ŚIKṢ -ā @ PRAYUKT -o
line.right: -i @ SATT - @ VAST -is ṚBH -iḥ SAṂPATT -ibhiḥ SAMANVĀGAT -aḥ SUKH -aṃ SPARŚ -aṃ VIHAR -ati PRAYOG -a @ SAMPATT -yā ĀŚAY -a @ SAMPATT -yā PŪRV -a @ HET -u SAMPATT -yā ca / </s><s> TATR -a PRAYOG -a @ SAMPAT KATAM -ā / </s><s> YATHĀP -i TAD BODHISATTV -aḥ ŚĪL -eṣv AKHAṆḌACĀR -ī BHAV -ati PARIŚUDDH -a @ KĀYAVĀṄ MAN -aḥ SAMUDĀCĀR -o n ĀBHĪKṢṆĀPATTIK -o VIVṚT -apā PAŚC -a BHAV -ati / </s><s> iyam UC -yate PRAYOG -a @ SAMPAT / </s><s> ĀŚAY -a @ SAMPAT KATAM -ā / </s><s> DHARM - @ ĀBHIPRĀY -aḥ PRAVRAJIT -o BHAV -ati

line.left: SATTV -ānāṃ DUḤKH - @ ĀPAKARṢAṆ - @ ĀYĀS -mābhir VYĀYACCH -itavyaṃ na DUḤKH - @ OPASAṂHĀR -āya / </s><s> tasy <g/> ^^ <g/> aivaṃ YONIŚ -o MANAS -i KURV -ataḥ SUKH -a @ SAṂJÑ -ā PRAH -īyate DUḤKH -a @ SAṂJÑ -ā c OTPAD -yate / </s><s> sa tāṃ DUḤKH -a @ SAṂJÑ -āṃ NIŚRITY -a PAR -eṣāṃ SARV - @ ĀPAKĀR -ān MARṢ -ayati KṢAM -ate / </s><s> KATH -añ ca BODHISATTV -o APAKĀR -iṣu SATTV -eṣu PARIGRAH -a @ SAṂJÑ -āṃ BHĀV -ayati / </s><s> iha BODHISATTV -a IDAṂ PRATISAṂŚIKṢAT -e / </s><s> MAY -ā KHAL -u SARV -a @ SATTV -ā
line.right: -āya CITT -am UTPĀDAY -atā KAḌATR -a @ BHĀV -ena PARIGṚHĪT -āḥ / </s><s> SARV -a @ SATTV -ānāṃ MAY - @ ĀRTH -aḥ KARAṆĪY -a iti / </s><s> TAN na me PRAT -i @ RŪP -aṃ sy ĀDY -ad AHAM evaṃ SARV -a @ SATTV - @ ĀNUPĀDĀY - @ AIṢ -ām ARTH -aṃ KAR -iṣyāmi ity an @ ARTH -am eva KUR -yām APAKĀR -am a @ MARṢ -ayan / </s><s> tasy <g/> ^ <g/> aiva yāniśo MANAS -i KURV -ataḥ APAKĀR -iṣu SATTV -eṣu PARASAṂJÑ -ā PRAH -īyate / </s><s> PARIGRAH -a @ SAṂJÑ -ā ca SAṂTIṢṬHAT -e / </s><s> sa tāṃ

line.left: ABHYUPAGAT -āni ADHIVĀSIT -āny ANUBHŪT -āni KṚṢ -i @ VAṆIJY -ā RĀJ -a @ PAURUṢY -a @ PRAYUKT -ena / </s><s> evaṃ ta DVAY - @ ARTH -aṃ DUḤKH -asy AIVĀR -the MAY -ā MAH -ad DUḤKH -am ABHYUPAGAT -aṃ PRATISAṂKHYĀY - @ ĀJÑĀN -a @ DOṢ -eṇa / </s><s> SĀṂPRAT -aṃ tu MAM -a SUKH -ā @ HĀRAK -e KUŚAL -e PRAYUKT -asya PRATISAṂKHYĀY -a tataḥ KOṬ -ī @ ŚATASAHASR -a @ GUṆ -asya DUḤKH -asy ĀDHIVĀSAN - @ ĀBHYUPAGAM -aḥ PRAT -i @ RŪP -aḥ syāt / </s><s> PRĀGEV -a tato NYŪN -asya / </s><s> evaṃ YONIŚ -o MANAS -i KURV -an
line.right: -āya PRAYUKT -o BODHISATTV -aḥ SARV -a @ VASTUK -aṃ DUḤKH -am ADHIVĀS -ayati / </s><s> SARV -a @ VASTUK -aṃ DUḤKH -aṃ KATAM -at / </s><s> TAT SAMĀSAT -aḥ AṢṬ - @ ĀKĀR -aṃ VEDITAVY -am / </s><s> SANNIŚRAY - @ ĀDHIṢṬHĀN -aṃ LOKADHARM - @ ĀDHIṢṬHĀN -am ĪRYĀPATH - @ ĀDHIṢṬHĀN -aṃ DHARM -a @ PARIGRAH - @ ĀDHIṢṬHĀN -a BHIKṢĀKAVṚTT - @ ĀDHIṢṬHĀN -am ABHIYOG -a @ KLAM - @ ĀDHIṢṬHĀN -aṃ SATTV - @ ĀRTHAKRIY - @ ĀDHIṢṬHĀN -am iti KARAṆĪY - @ ĀDHIṢṬHĀN -añ @ CET -i / </s><s> CATVĀR -aḥ SANNIŚRAY -āḥ / </s><s> yān ĀŚRITY -a sv ĀKHYĀT

line.right: -i @ PARYANT -a @ GAMAN -ād a @ VIGAM -aś c ĀSAṂPRAMOṢ -aś cā VISAYOG -aś ca syād iti SAMYA -k CITT -aṃ PRAṆIDADH -āti / </s><s> PŪRVAK -aṃ PRAṆIDH -ā @ TAVY -e ARTH -e PRAṆIDHĀN -aṃ PAŚCIM -akaṃ PRAṆIDHĀN -aṃ VEDITAVY -am / </s><s> etāny eva ca MAH -ā @ PRAṆIDHĀN -āni PRAMUKH -āni KṚTV -ā tasya BODHISATTV -asya DAŚ -a @ PRAṆIDHĀN - @ ĀSAṂKHYEY -a @ ŚATASAHASR -āṇy UTPAD -yante SAMYA -k PRAṆIDHĀN -ānām / </s><s> tasy <g/> ^ <g/> aivamā YATY -āñ ca PRAṆIDHĀN -avataḥ DṚṢṬ -e ca DHARM -e ĀRABDH -a @ VĪRY -asya DAŚ -a

line.right: - @ AṄG -āni PARIPŪR -yante BODHISATTV -a @ PRĀYOGIK -a @ CARY -ā @ PARIPŪR -i @ SAṂGRAH -ā @ DAS -ya VIHĀR -asya JÑĀN - @ ĀBHIJÑ - @ ĀCARY -ā @ VIŚUDDH - @ ĀṢṬAM -a @ VIHĀR - @ ĀKRAMAṆ -āc ca / </s><s> tathā hi sa BODHISATTV -o asya VIHĀR -asy ĀNANT -a @ RAM - @ AṢṬAM -aṃ VIŚUDDH -aṃ VIHĀR -aṃ PRAVIŚ -ati / </s><s> sa ca VIHĀR -a EKĀNT -a @ VIŚUDDH -aḥ / </s><s> ime tu SAPT -a VIHĀR -ā VYĀMIŚR -āḥ / </s><s> VIŚUDDH -a @ VIHĀR -a @ PŪRVAṄGAM -atvād a @ SAṂKLIṢṬ

line.left: su @ NIŚCIT -a @ VIṢAY -a @ SAMĀDH -i @ PRAMUKH -āni DAŚ -a SAMĀDH -i @ ŚATASAHASR -āṇy ABHINIRHARAT -i BODHISATTVASAMĀDH -īnām / </s><s> teṣāñ ca LĀBH -āt SAMATIKRĀNT -o BHAV -ati ŚRĀVAK -a @ PRATYEKABUDDH -a @ SAMĀDH -i @ VIṢAY -am / </s><s> sa evaṃ SARV -a @ KLEŚ -a @ VIVIKT -ena DURVIJÑEY -ena SARV -a @ VIKALP -a @ PRACĀR - @ ĀPAGAT -ena KĀY -a @ VĀṄ MAN -as KARM -aṇā VIHAR -ati / </s><s> na c OTTAR -i @ VIŚEṢ -a @ PARIMĀRGAṆ - @ ĀBHIYOG -am UTSṚJ -ati SATTV - @ ĀPEKṢ -ayā / </s><s>
line.right: -i @ PARIPŪRṆ - @ ĀRTH -aṃ tasyā PRAMĀṆ -aṃ SARV -a @ NIMITT - @ ĀPAGAT -aṃ KĀY -a @ VĀṄ MAN -as KARM -a PRAVART -ate su @ PARIŚODH -itam ANUTPATTIK -a @ DHARM -a @ KṢĀNT -y @ ĀVABHĀSIT -am / </s><s> ASMIN VIHĀR -e SV -a @ BUDDH -i @ VIṢAY -atayā SARV -a @ ŚRĀVAK -a @ PRATYEKABUDDH -a @ VIṢAY -a @ SAMATIKRĀNT -ās TAD ANY -eṣu tu ṢAṬ -ṣu BUDDH -a @ DHARM - @ ĀDHYĀLAMBANAT -ayā ṢAṢṬH -e ca VIHĀR -e BODHISATTV -o NIRODH -aṃ SAMĀPAD -yate / </s><s> asmis tu PRATIKṢAṆ -aṃ SAMĀPAD

line.left: JÑĀNAT -aś ca a @ PRAMEY -a — VIMOKṢ -a — DHĀRAṆ -ī ABHIJÑ -ā PRATILAMBH -ataś ca TAD ĀDHIPATEY -a MAHĀSMṚT -i @ JÑĀ n ĀBHINIRHĀR -a @ NIRVACAN -a @ VYAVASTHĀN -ataś ca MAH - @ ĀBHIJÑ - @ ĀBHINIRHĀR -ataś ca KUŚALAMŪL -a @ VIŚUDDH -i — UPAPATT -i @ PRABHĀV -a @ VIŚEṢ -ataś ca SAM -āsa NIRDEŚ -ataḥ PARAM -o VIHĀR -o VEDITAVY -aḥ / </s><s> VISTAR -a @ NIRDEŚ -ataḥ punar yathā SŪTR -am eva TADYATH -ā DHARMAMEGH -āyāṃ BODHISATTVABHŪM -au / </s><s> PARIPŪRṆ -a @ BODHISATTV -a @ MĀRG -aḥ su @ PARIPŪRṆ -a —
line.right: -i @ SAMBHĀR -aś ca sa BODHISATTV -aḥ TATHĀGAT -ā NĀMANTIK -āt DHARM -a @ MEDH -a @ BHŪM -yām ATYUDĀR -āṃ duḥ @ SAH -āḥ TAD ANY -aiḥ SARV -a @ SATTV -aiḥ SAD DHARM -aṃ VṚṢṬ -i SAMPRATĪCCHAT -i / </s><s> MAH -ā @ MEDH -a @ BHŪT aś ca sv AYAM an @ ABHISAMBUDDH -a @ BODH -i — ABHISAMBUDDH -a @ BODH -iś cā PRAMEY -ānāṃ SATTV -ānāṃ SAD DHARM -a — VṚṢṬ -ayā NIRAP -a @ MAY -ā KLEŚ -a @ RAJ -āṃsi PRAŚAM -ayati / </s><s> VICITR -āṇi ca KUŚAL -am ula ŚASY -āni VIROH -ayati

line.left: SAM -āsa NIRDEŚ -ataḥ PARAM -o VIHĀR -o VEDITAVY -aḥ / </s><s> VISTAR -a @ NIRDEŚ -ataḥ punar yathā SŪTR -am eva TADYATH -ā DHARMAMEGH -āyāṃ BODHISATTVABHŪM -au / </s><s> PARIPŪRṆ -a @ BODHISATTV -a @ MĀRG -aḥ su @ PARIPŪRṆ -a — BODH -i @ SAMBHĀR -aś ca sa BODHISATTV -aḥ TATHĀGAT -ā NĀMANTIK -āt DHARM -a @ MEDH -a @ BHŪM -yām ATYUDĀR -āṃ duḥ @ SAH -āḥ TAD ANY -aiḥ SARV -a @ SATTV -aiḥ SAD DHARM -aṃ VṚṢṬ -i SAMPRATĪCCHAT -i / </s><s> MAH -ā @ MEDH -a @ BHŪT aś ca sv AYAM an @ ABHISAMBUDDH -a @
line.right: -i — ABHISAMBUDDH -a @ BODH -iś cā PRAMEY -ānāṃ SATTV -ānāṃ SAD DHARM -a — VṚṢṬ -ayā NIRAP -a @ MAY -ā KLEŚ -a @ RAJ -āṃsi PRAŚAM -ayati / </s><s> VICITR -āṇi ca KUŚAL -am ula ŚASY -āni VIROH -ayati VIVARDHAY -atī PĀC -ayatī tasyāṃ BHŪM -āv AVASTHIT -aḥ / </s><s> TASMĀT sā BHŪM -ir DHARMAMEGH -ety UC -yate / </s><s> ten <g/> ^ <g/> aiva c ĀRTH -ena PARAM -o VIHĀR -o DRAṢṬAVY -aḥ / </s><s> na ca yāny UTTAR - @ OTTAR -eṣu VIHĀR -eṣv AṄG -āni nir NIṢṬ -āni tāni PŪRVAK -eṣu VIHĀR -eṣu SARVEṆ -a SARV -aṃ na

line.left: VIHĀR -o VEDITAVY -aḥ / </s><s> VISTAR -a @ NIRDEŚ -ataḥ punar yathā SŪTR -am eva TADYATH -ā DHARMAMEGH -āyāṃ BODHISATTVABHŪM -au / </s><s> PARIPŪRṆ -a @ BODHISATTV -a @ MĀRG -aḥ su @ PARIPŪRṆ -a — BODH -i @ SAMBHĀR -aś ca sa BODHISATTV -aḥ TATHĀGAT -ā NĀMANTIK -āt DHARM -a @ MEDH -a @ BHŪM -yām ATYUDĀR -āṃ duḥ @ SAH -āḥ TAD ANY -aiḥ SARV -a @ SATTV -aiḥ SAD DHARM -aṃ VṚṢṬ -i SAMPRATĪCCHAT -i / </s><s> MAH -ā @ MEDH -a @ BHŪT aś ca sv AYAM an @ ABHISAMBUDDH -a @ BODH -i — ABHISAMBUDDH -a @
line.right: -iś cā PRAMEY -ānāṃ SATTV -ānāṃ SAD DHARM -a — VṚṢṬ -ayā NIRAP -a @ MAY -ā KLEŚ -a @ RAJ -āṃsi PRAŚAM -ayati / </s><s> VICITR -āṇi ca KUŚAL -am ula ŚASY -āni VIROH -ayati VIVARDHAY -atī PĀC -ayatī tasyāṃ BHŪM -āv AVASTHIT -aḥ / </s><s> TASMĀT sā BHŪM -ir DHARMAMEGH -ety UC -yate / </s><s> ten <g/> ^ <g/> aiva c ĀRTH -ena PARAM -o VIHĀR -o DRAṢṬAVY -aḥ / </s><s> na ca yāny UTTAR - @ OTTAR -eṣu VIHĀR -eṣv AṄG -āni nir NIṢṬ -āni tāni PŪRVAK -eṣu VIHĀR -eṣu SARVEṆ -a SARV -aṃ na SAṂVID -yante / </s><s> api tu MṚD

line.left: ca NIRNIMITT -aṃ PRAT -i @ SAṂVIDV -i @ HĀR -añ ca SAMATIKRAMY -a PARAM -aṃ BODHISATTV -a @ VIHĀR -aṃ PRATILABH -ate / </s><s> TATR -a dau KALP - @ ĀSAṂKHYEY -au VEDITAVY -au / </s><s> yo api MAHĀKALP -aḥ so api RĀTR -in DIVAS -am ā SĀRDH -am āsa GAṆAN -ā @ YOG -ena KĀL -ā @ PRAMEY -atvād ASAṂKHYEY -a ity UC -yate / </s><s> y <g/> ^ <g/> āpi teṣām eva MAHĀKALP -ānāṃ GAṆAN -ā @ YOG -ena SARV -a @ GAṆAN -ā SAMATIKRĀNT -ā SAṂKHY -ā so apy ASAṂKHYEY -aḥ / </s><s> PŪRVAK -eṇa KALP - @ ĀSAṂKHYEY -ena
line.right: -ir an @ ALP -aiḥ KALP - @ ĀSAṂKHYEY -air ADHIGAM -yate / </s><s> PAŚCIM -akena punaḥ KALP - @ ĀSAṂKHYEY -ena TRI -bhire VANAD - @ HIK -aiḥ / </s><s> yas tv ADHIMĀTR - @ ĀDHIMĀTR -eṇa VĪRYĀRAMBH -eṇa PRAYUJ -yate tataḥ KAŚCID ANTARAKALP -ān PRABHŪT -ān VYĀVART -ayati KAŚCIT YĀVAN MAHĀKALP -ān / </s><s> na tv ASAṂKHYEY -a @ VYĀVṚTT -iḥ KASYACID ast <g/> ^ <g/> īti VEDITAVY -am / </s><s> ebhiś ca DVĀDAŚ -abhir BODHISATTV -a @ VIHĀR - @ AISTR -ibhir ASAṂKHYEY -aiḥ KLEŚ - @ ĀVARAṆ -a @ PAKṢY -añ ca DAUṢṬHULY -aṃ PRAH -īyate JÑEY - @ ĀVARAṆ

line.left: -asya PRATHAM -aṃ PRAMUDIT -a @ VIHĀR -am UPĀDĀY -a YĀVAD DAŚAM -ād VIHĀR -ād UPAPATT -ir VARṆIT -ā sā asy ĀDHIPAT -ty OPAPATT -ir ity UC -yate / </s><s> JAMBŪDVĪP -e ŚVAR -atvam UPĀDĀY -a YĀVAN MAHEŚVAR -atvād a @ KANIṢṬH -ān ATIKRAMY -a SARV - @ OPAPATT -y @ ĀYATAN -a @ PRAVIṢṬ -aṃ YATR -a PARAM -a @ VIHĀR -a @ PRĀPT -ā eva BODHISATTV -ā UPAPAD -yante / </s><s> teṣāṃ hi TAT KARM - @ ĀDHIPATY -ena NIRVṚTT -am / </s><s> TATR -a CARAM -ā BODHISATTV - @ OPAPATT -iḥ KATAM -ā / </s><s> yasyām UPAPATT -au PARIPŪRṆ -a @
line.right: -i @ SAMBHĀR -ī BODHISATTV -aḥ PUROH -i @ TAK -ule vā RĀJ -a @ KUL -e vā UPAPADY - @ ĀNUTTAR -āñ ca SAMYAKSAṂBODH -im ABHISAṂBUDH -yate / </s><s> SARV -añ ca BUDDH -a @ KĀRY -a KAR -oti / </s><s> iyam UPAPATT -iś CARAM -ā PAŚCIM -amety UC -yate / </s><s> ye KECID BODHISATTV -ā ATĪT -ān ĀGAT -a @ PRATYUTPANN -eṣv U <g/> 1 <g/> DHV -asu ŚUBH -āsu BHADR -āsu KALYĀṆ -āsu UPAPATT -iṣ ŪPAPANN -ā @ UPAP -atsyante UPAPAD -yante ca SARV -e te āsv eva PAÑC -asu / </s><s> nāta UTTAR -i nāto BHŪY -aḥ STHĀPAY -itvā BĀL

line.left: @ PĀT -a @ PATIT -o BHAV -ati / </s><s> PRAT -i @ SAṂVIDV -i @ HĀR -o NIYAT -a @ CARY -ā @ BHŪM -iḥ / </s><s> PARAM -o VIHĀR -as TĀTHĀGAT -aś ca NIṢṬHĀGAMANABHŪM -iḥ / </s><s> TĀTHĀGAT -asya punar VIHĀR -asya BHŪM -eśca PAŚC -ān NIRDEŚ -o BHAV -iṣyati BUDDH -a @ DHARM -a @ PRATIṢṬH -ā PAṬAL -e / </s><s> TATR -a BODHISATTV -aḥ ADHIMUKTICARY -ā @ BHŪM -eḥ ŚUDDHĀDHYĀŚAYABHŪM -im ANUPRAVIŚ -an KATHAM ap-āyān SAMATIKRĀM -ati / </s><s> iha BODHISATTV -o LAUKIK -aṃ PARIŚUDDH -aṃ DHYĀN -aṃ NIŚRITY - @ ĀDHIMUKTICARY -ā @ BHŪM -au su @ SAMBHṚT -a @
line.right: -i SAMBHĀR -o DAŚ - @ OTTAREṆ -a PŪRV -a @ NIRDIṢṬ -en ĀKĀR -a @ ŚAT -ena SATTV -eṣv ANUKAMP -āṃ BHĀVAY -apy ANANY -a @ MANASIKĀR -aḥ / </s><s> sa BHĀVAN - @ ĀNVAY -āt TAD RŪP -aṃ SATTV -eṣv ANUKAMP - @ ĀŚAYAṂ KARUṆ - @ ĀŚAYAṂ PRATILABH -ate / </s><s> yen ĀPĀY -ān SATTV -ānām ARTH -e AGĀR - @ ĀVASĀY -ogen ĀDHITIṢṬHAT -i / </s><s> yadi me eṣv eva SANNIVAS -ato ANUTTAR -ā SAMYAKSAṂBODH -iḥ SAMUDĀGACCH -ati tathā py AHAM UTSAH -āmi iti SATTV -ānāṃ DUḤKH - @ ĀPANAYAN -a @ HET -oḥ / </s><s> SARV -āñ ca SATTV

line.left: BALĀDHĀN -atā / </s><s> ŚĀSTAR -i KĀṂKṢ -ā VIMAT -ir VICIKITS -ā TATHĀGAT -a @ PŪJ -opa STHĀN -atāyāḥ VIPAKṢ -aḥ / </s><s> yasya PRATIPAKṢ -eṇa TATHĀGAT -a @ PŪJ - @ OPASTHĀN -atā / </s><s> evaṃ TĀVAD eṣāṃ VIPAKṢ -a @ PRATIPAKṢ -ato VYAVASTHĀN -aṃ BHAV -ati / </s><s> kaḥ punar eṣāṃ SAMĀS - @ ĀRTH -aḥ / </s><s> SAM -ā @ SEN -a DAŚ -abhirebhir DHARM -air ĀŚAY -a @ ŚUDDH -iḥ PRAYOG -a @ ŚUDDH -iś ca PARIDĪPIT -ā / </s><s> TATR -a TRI -bhiḥ PŪRVAK -air ĀŚAY -a @ ŚUDDH -iḥ / </s><s> AVAŚIṢṬ -aiḥ PRAYOG -a @ ŚUDDH -ir VEDITAVY -ā / </s><s>
line.right: -im ABHIŚRADDH -ad BODHISATTV -aḥ SATTV -ān DUḤKHIT -ān KARUṆĀ -yate / </s><s> KARUṆĀY -am āno MAY -aite PARITRĀTAVY -ā iti MAITRĀ -yate / </s><s> tathā MAITR -a @ CITT -asya SARV -a @ PARITYĀG -ī BHAV -aty eṣu BHOG -a @ JĪVIT -a @ NIRAPEKṢ -aḥ / </s><s> NIRAPEKṢ -aś c AIṢ -ām ARTH -e PRAYUJYAMĀN -o na PARIKHID -yate / </s><s> a @ PARIKHINN -aś ca ŚĀSTR - @ AJÑ -o BHAV -ati / </s><s> ŚĀSTR - @ AJÑ -aś ca yathā LOK -e PRAVARTITAVY -a @ MAN -ena tathā JĀN -āti / </s><s> evaṃ LOKAJ -ño BHAV -ati / </s><s> SVAY -añ ca KLEŚ

line.left: <s> SAṂVṚT -i @ GRAHAṆ -a @ PRAVṚTT -ā punar JÑĀN -a @ PĀRAMIT -ā / </s><s> it YAY -a @ MANAY -or VIŚEṢ -aḥ / </s><s> APAR -aḥ PARYĀY -aḥ / </s><s> a @ PRAMĀṆ -a @ JÑĀNAT -ā UPĀYAKAUŚALY -a @ PĀRAMIT -ā / </s><s> UTTAR - @ OTTAR -a @ JÑĀN -a @ VAIŚEṢIK -atā — PRĀRTHAN -ā PRAṆIDHĀN -a @ PĀRAMIT -ā / </s><s> SARV -a @ MĀR -air MĀRG -ān ĀCCHEDY -atā BAL -ā @ PĀRAMIT -ā / </s><s> yat HĀV -aj jñaiy ĀVABODH -atā JÑĀN -a @ PĀRAMIT -ā / </s><s> SMṚTYUPASTHĀN -āny UPĀDĀY -a SARV -e SAPT -a @ TRIṂŚ -ad
line.right: -i @ PAKṢY -ā DHARM -āś CATASR -aś ca PARYEṢAṆ -āś CATVĀR -i ca YATHĀBHŪT -a @ PARIJÑĀN -āni yathā PŪRV -a @ NIRDIṢṬ -āny ABHISAMASY -a BODHISATTV -ānāṃ BODHIPAKṢY -a @ CARY -ety UC -yate / </s><s> yathā SAṂVAR -ṇitāś ca ṢAḌ bhi JÑĀ -ḥ PRABHĀV -a @ PAṬAL -e BODHISATTV -ānām ABHIJÑ - @ ĀCARY -ety UC -yate / </s><s> dvau ca PŪRV -a @ NIRDIṢṬ -ā @ VAPR -a @ MEY -au VINEY -ā @ PRAMEY -aś ca VINAY - @ OPĀY -ā @ PRAMEY -aś ca SARV -a @ SATTV -a @ PARIPĀK -o yathā NIRDIṢṬ -aḥ SATTV

line.left: SARV -a @ SATTV -a @ PARIPĀK -o yathā NIRDIṢṬ -aḥ SATTV -a @ PARIPĀK -a @ PAṬAL -e BODHISATTV -asy ĀBHISAMASY -a SATTV -a @ PARIPĀK -a @ CARY -ety UC -yate / </s><s> ābhiś CATASṚ -bhir BODHISATTV -a @ CARY -ābhiḥ SARV -a @ BODHISATTV -a @ CARY -āṃ SAṂGRAH -o VEDITAVY -aḥ / </s><s> TATR - @ ĀSAṂKHYEY -a @ TRAY -a — DĪRGH -a @ KĀL -a @ SAMUDĀGAM -āt SVABHĀV -a @ VIŚUDDH -i @ VIŚEṢ -āt TAD ANY -ebhyaḥ SARV -a @ LAUKIK -a @ ŚRĀVAK -a @ PRATYEKABUDDH -a @ KUŚALAMŪL -ebhyaḥ PARAM -a @
line.right: -i @ PHAL -a @ PARIGRAH -āc caite DAŚ -a DĀN - @ ĀDAY -o DHARM -āḥ PARAM -eṇa KĀL -ena SAMUDĀGAT -āḥ PARAM -ayā SVABHĀV -a @ VIŚUDDH -yā VIŚUDDH -āḥ PARAM -añ ca PHAL -am ANUPRAYACCH -anti / </s><s> iti TASMĀT PĀRAMIT -ā ity UCYANT -e / </s><s> TRI -bhiś ca KĀRAṆ -aiḥ PĀRAMIT -ānām ANUKRAM -a @ VYAVASTHĀN -aṃ VEDITAVY -am / </s><s> KATAM AISTR -ibhiḥ / </s><s> PRATIPAKṢ -ataḥ UPAPATT -ito VIPĀK -a @ PHAL -ataś ca / </s><s> TATR -a MĀTSARY -aṃ duś @ CARIT -aṃ SATTV -eṣu VAIR - @ OTPĪḌAN -atā KAUSĪDY -aṃ VIKṢEP -o MAND -a @

line.left: DAŚ -a DĀN - @ ĀDAY -o DHARM -āḥ PARAM -eṇa KĀL -ena SAMUDĀGAT -āḥ PARAM -ayā SVABHĀV -a @ VIŚUDDH -yā VIŚUDDH -āḥ PARAM -añ ca PHAL -am ANUPRAYACCH -anti / </s><s> iti TASMĀT PĀRAMIT -ā ity UCYANT -e / </s><s> TRI -bhiś ca KĀRAṆ -aiḥ PĀRAMIT -ānām ANUKRAM -a @ VYAVASTHĀN -aṃ VEDITAVY -am / </s><s> KATAM AISTR -ibhiḥ / </s><s> PRATIPAKṢ -ataḥ UPAPATT -ito VIPĀK -a @ PHAL -ataś ca / </s><s> TATR -a MĀTSARY -aṃ duś @ CARIT -aṃ SATTV -eṣu VAIR - @ OTPĪḌAN -atā KAUSĪDY -aṃ VIKṢEP -o MAND -a @ MOMUH -atā ca / </s><s> amī ṢAḌ DHARM -ā
line.right: -er ĀVARAṆ -a @ STHĀNĪY -āḥ / </s><s> eṣāṃ ṢAṆṆ -āṃ DHARM -āṇāṃ PRATIPAKṢ -eṇa ṢAṬ PĀRAMIT -ā YATHĀYOG -aṃ VEDITAVY -āḥ / </s><s> TAD ANY -āś ca PĀRAMIT -ā ābhir eva SAṂGṚHĪT -āḥ / </s><s> evaṃ PRATIPAKṢ -ato VYAVASTHĀN -aṃ BHAV -ati / </s><s> KATHAM UPAPATT -itaḥ / </s><s> ih ĀDIT -a eva BHOG -a @ NIRAPEKṢ -o BODHISATTV -aḥ TYAKTV -ā ĀGĀRIK -ān KĀM -ān ŚĪL -a @ SAMĀDĀN -aṃ KAR -oti / </s><s> ŚĪL -a @ GAURAV -āc ca PARAVIHEṬH -aṃ KṢAM -ate / </s><s> no tu PAR -aṃ VIHEṬH -ayati / </s><s> SAMĀDĀN -ataś ca KṢĀNT -itaś ca VIŚUDDH -i @ ŚĪL -o NIŚCAL

line.left: PARIPŪRṆ -ā BODHISATTV -ānām ADHIŚĪL -aṃ ŚIKṢ -ā VEDITAVY -ā / </s><s> DHYĀN -a @ PĀRAMIT -ayā ADHICITT -aṃ ŚIKṢ -ā / </s><s> PRAJÑĀPĀRAMIT -ayā ADHIPRAJÑ -aṃ ŚIKṢ -ā / </s><s> na ca BODHISATTV -asya <g/> ^ UTTAR -i ŚIKṢ -ā @ MĀRG -a UPALABH -yate / </s><s> TRI -bhiḥ ataḥ SARV -a @ BODHISATTV -a @ ŚIKṢ -ā @ MĀRG -aṃ SAṂGRAH -āt ṢAḌ eva PĀRAMIT -ā VYAVASTHĀPIT -ā / </s><s> nāta UTTAR -i nāto BHŪY -aḥ / </s><s> CATVĀR -i c <g/> ^ <g/> emāni BODHISATTV -ānāṃ SAMĀSAT -aḥ KṚTY -āni / </s><s> yaireṣāṃ SARV -a @ KṚTY -a @ SAṂGRAH -o BHAV -ati / </s><s>
line.right: -āya KUŚAL - @ ĀBHYĀS -aḥ / </s><s> TAT PŪRVAK -aś ca TATTV - @ ĀRTH -a @ PRATIVEDH -aḥ PRABHĀV -a @ SAMUDĀGAM -aḥ / </s><s> SATTV -a @ PARIPĀCAN -atā ca / </s><s> etāni ca CATVĀR -i KṚTY -āni BODHISATTV -āḥ ābhiś CATASṚ -bhiś CARY -ābhir YATHĀKRAM -aṃ KURV -anty ANUTIṢṬH -anti / </s><s> TASMĀD api TAD UTTAR -ā CARY -ā na VYAVASTHĀP -yate / </s><s> iti BODHISATTVABHŪM -āv ĀDHĀR -e NIṢṬH -e YOGASTHĀN -e CATURTH -aṃ CARY -ā @ PAṬAL -am / </s><s> LAKṢMAṆ - @ ĀNUVYAÑJAN -a @ PAṬAL -am TATR -a TATHĀGAT -a @ VIHĀR -am ĀRABHY -a TĀTHĀGAT -īñ ca
