line.left: @ ĀNVAY -a @ JÑĀN - @ AVAY -o @ ANURŪP -ā SNIGDH -ā yad evaṃ MAY -i te MAT -iḥ syāt // <g/> 1 — 55 <g/> // </s><s> ETAC ca TAD yena NṚP -arṣayas te DHARM -eṇa SŪKṢM -eṇa DHAN -āny a @ VĀPY -a // NITY -aṃ TYAJ -anto VIDH -ivad babhūvus TAP -obhir ĀḌHY -ā VIBHAV -air DARIDR -āḥ // <g/> 1 — 56 <g/> // </s><s> PRAYOJAN -aṃ yat tu MAM - @ OPAYĀN -e TAN me ŚṚṆ -u PRĪT -im upehi ca tvam DIV -yā MAY - @ ĀDITY -a @ PATH -e ŚRUT -ā VĀG
line.right: -āya JĀT -as TANAY -as tav <g/> ^ <g/> eti // <g/> 1 — 57 <g/> // </s><s> ŚRUTV -ā VACAS tac ca MAN -aś ca YUKTV -ā JÑĀTV -ā NIMITT -aiś ca tato asmy UPET -aḥ DIDṚKṢ -ayā ŚĀKY -a @ KUL -a @ DHVAJ -asya ŚAKR -a @ DHVAJ -asy eva SAMUCCHRIT -asya // <g/> 1 — 58 <g/> // </s><s> ity ETAD evaṃ VACAN -aṃ NIŚAMY -a PRAHARṢ -a @ SAṂBHRĀNT -a @ GAT -ir NARENDR -aḥ ĀDĀY -a DHĀTR -y — AṄK -a @ GAT -aṃ KUMĀR -aṃ SAṂDARŚAY -ām āsa TAP -o @ DHANĀY -a // <g/>

line.left: -aḥ // <g/> 2 — 54 <g/> // </s><s> RIRAKṢIṢ -antaḥ ŚRIY -am ĀTM -a @ SAṂSTH -āṃ RAKṢ -anti PUTR -ān BHUV -i BHŪM -i @ PĀL -āḥ PUTR -aṃ NARENDR -aḥ sa tu DHARMAKĀM -o ra RAKṢ -a DHARM -ād VIṢAY -eṣu MUÑC -an // <g/> 2 — 55 <g/> // </s><s> VAN -am ANUPAM -a @ SATTV -ā BODHISATTV -ās tu SARV -e VIṢAY -a @ SUKH -a @ RAS -a @ JÑĀ JAGM -ur UTPANN -a @ PUTR -āḥ ata UPACIT -a @ KARM -ā RŪḌH -a @ MŪL -e api HET -au sa RAT -im UPAS -iṣeve
line.right: -im ĀPAN na YĀVAT // <g/> 2 — 56 <g/> // </s><s> tataḥ KADĀCIN MṚD -u ŚĀDVAL -āni PUṂSK -o @ KIL - @ ONNĀD -ita @ PĀDAP -āni ŚUŚR -āva PADM - @ ĀKAR -a @ MAṆḌIT -āni GĪT -air NIBADDH -āni sa KĀNAN -āni // <g/> 3 — 1 <g/> // </s><s> ŚRUTV -ā tataḥ STR -ī @ JAN -a @ VALLABH -ānāṃ MANOJÑ -a @ BHĀV -aṃ PUR -a @ KĀNAN -ānām BAH -iḥ PRAYĀṆ -āya ca KĀR -a BUDDH -im ANTARGṚH -e NĀG -a iv ĀVARUDDH -aḥ // <g/> 3 — 2 <g/> // </s><s> tato NṚP -as tasya

line.left: MAM -a NIRYĀṆ -am ito JAG -ad DHIT -āya TURAG - @ OTTAM -a VEG -a @ VIKRAM -ābhyāṃ PRAYAT -a @ SVĀT - @ MAHIT -e JAG -ad DHIT -e ca // <g/> 5 — 78 <g/> // </s><s> iti SUHṚD -am iv ĀNUŚIṢY -a KṚTY -e TURAG -a @ VAR -aṃ nṛvaro VAN -aṃ YIYĀS -uḥ SIT -am a @ SIT -a GAT -i @ DYUT -ir VAPUṢ -mān RAV -ir iva ŚĀRAD -am a @ BHRAM ā RUR -oha // <g/> 5 — 79 <g/> // </s><s> atha sa PARIHAR -an NIŚĪTH -a @ CAṆḌ -aṃ PARIJAN -a @
line.right: -a @ KAR -aṃ dhvaniṃ SAD AŚV -aḥ VIGAT -a @ HAN -u RAV -aḥ PRAŚĀNT -a @ HEṢ -aś CAKIT -a @ VIMUKT -a @ PADAKRAM -o JAG -āma // <g/> 5 — 80 <g/> // </s><s> KAN -a @ KAVALAY -a @ BHŪṢIT -a @ PRAKOṢṬH -aiḥ KAMAL -a @ NIBH -aiḥ KAMAL -ān iva PRAVIDHY -a AVANAT -ata NAV -as tato asya YAKṢ -āś CAKIT -a @ GAT -air DADH -ir e KHUR -ān KAR - @ ĀGR -aiḥ // <g/> 5 — 81 <g/> // </s><s> GUR -u PARIGH -a @ KAPĀṬ -a @ SAṂVṚT -ā yā na

line.left: -aḥ KHAL -u SOḌH -um ĀGAT -ān iṣu PRAHĀR -ān api kiṃ punaḥ kaśāḥ GAT -aḥ kaś ĀPĀT -a @ BHAY -āt KATHAṂ nv AYAṂ ŚRIY -aṃ GṚHĪT -vā HṚDAY -aṃ ca me SAM -am // <g/> 8 — 39 <g/> // </s><s> a @ NĀRY -a @ KARM -ā BHṚŚ -am ADY -a HEṢ -ate NARENDR -a @ DHIṢṆY -aṃ PRAT -i @ PŪR -ayann iva yadā tu NIRVĀH -ayati sma me PRIY -aṃ tadā hi MŪK -as TURAG - @ ĀDHAM -o a @ BHAV -at // <g/> 8 — 40 <g/> // </s><s> yadi hy a @ HEṢ -iṣyata
line.right: -ayan JAN -aṃ KHUR -aiḥ KṢIT -au v <g/> ^ <g/> āpy a @ KARIṢY -ata DHV -a @ NIM HAN -u SVAN -aṃ vā JANIṢY -ad UTTAM -aṃ na cā BHAVIṢ -yan MAM -a DUḤKH -am ĪDṚŚ -am // <g/> 8 — 41 <g/> // </s><s> it <g/> ^ <g/> īha DEV -yāḥ PARIDEVIT - @ ĀŚRAY -aṃ NIŚAMY -a BĀṢP -a @ GRATHIT -ā @ KṢAR -aṃ VAC -aḥ adho MUKH -aḥ SĀŚR -u KAL -aḥ KṚT - @ ĀÑJAL -iḥ ŚANA -ir IDAṂ CHAND -aka UTTAR -aṃ JAG -au // <g/> 8 — 42 <g/> // </s><s> VIGARH -ituṃ

line.left: -i @ CANDRAM -āḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 2 — 98 <g/> // </s><s> tv AGAST -hi ŚEṢ -o NIḤŚEṢ -air MED -aḥ PIŚIT -a @ ŚOṆIT -aiḥ KṢĪṆ -o apy a @ KṢĪṆ -a @ GĀMBHĪRY -aḥ SAMUDR -a iva sa vya BHĀT // <g/> 1 <g/> 2 — 99 <g/> // </s><s> atha KAṢṬ -a @ TAP -aḥ SPAṢṬ -a VYARTH -a @ KLIṢṬ -a @ TAN ur MUN -iḥ BHAV -a @ BHĪR -ur imāṃ CAKR -e BUDDH -im BUDDH -atva KĀṄKṢ -ayā // <g/> 1 <g/> 2 — 100 <g/> // </s><s> n ĀYAṂ DHARM -o VIRĀG -āya na
line.right: -āya na MUKT -aye JAMB -u MŪL -e MAY -ā PRĀPT -o yas tadā sa VIDH -ir DHRUV -aḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 2 — 101 <g/> // </s><s> na cāsau DURBAL -en ĀPT -uṃ ŚAKY -am ity ĀGAT - @ ĀDAR -aḥ ŚARĪR -a @ BAL -a @ VṚDDH -y @ ARTH -am IDAṂ BHŪY -o ANV -a @ CINTAY -at // <g/> 1 <g/> 2 — 102 <g/> // </s><s> KṢUT - @ PIPĀS - @ ĀŚRAM -a @ KLĀNT -aḥ ŚRAM -ād ASVASTH -a @ MĀNAS -aḥ PRĀPN -uyān MANAS -āv ĀPY aṃ PHAL -aṃ KATHAM a @ NIRVṚT

line.left: <s> SIT -a @ ŚAṄKH - @ OJJVAL -a @ BHUJ -ā NĪL -a @ KAMBAL -a @ VĀSIN -ī sa PHEN -a @ MĀL -ā @ NĪL - @ ĀMB -ur YAMUN eva SAR -i @ DVAR -ā // <g/> 1 <g/> 2 — 110 <g/> // </s><s> sā ŚRĀDDH -ā @ VARDHIT -a @ PRĪT -ir VIKAS -allo CAN - @ OTPAL -ā ŚIRAS -ā PRAṆIPATY ^ <g/> ainaṃ GRĀH -ayām āsa PĀY -a @ SAM // <g/> 1 <g/> 2 — 111 <g/> // </s><s> KṚTV -ā TAD UPABHOG -ena PRĀPT -a @ JANM -a @ PHAL -āṃ sa tām
line.right: -i @ PRĀPT -au SAMARTH -o ABHŪT SAṂTARPIT -a @ ṢAḌ INDRIY -aḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 2 — 112 <g/> // </s><s> PARYĀPT - @ ĀPYĀN -a @ MŪRT -iś ca SĀRTH -aṃ SV -a @ YAŚAS -ā MUN -iḥ KĀNT -i @ DHAIRY -e bab HĀR - @ AIK -aḥ ŚAŚĀṄK - @ ĀRṆAV -ayor DV -ayoḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 2 — 113 <g/> // </s><s> ĀVṚTT -a iti VIJÑĀY -a taṃ JAH -uḥ PAÑC -a BHIKṢ -avaḥ // MANĪṢ -iṇam iv ĀTM -ānaṃ NIRMUKT -aṃ PAÑC -a DHĀT -avaḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 2 — 114 <g/> // </s>

line.left: // </s><s> PARYĀPT - @ ĀPYĀN -a @ MŪRT -iś ca SĀRTH -aṃ SV -a @ YAŚAS -ā MUN -iḥ KĀNT -i @ DHAIRY -e bab HĀR - @ AIK -aḥ ŚAŚĀṄK - @ ĀRṆAV -ayor DV -ayoḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 2 — 113 <g/> // </s><s> ĀVṚTT -a iti VIJÑĀY -a taṃ JAH -uḥ PAÑC -a BHIKṢ -avaḥ // MANĪṢ -iṇam iv ĀTM -ānaṃ NIRMUKT -aṃ PAÑC -a DHĀT -avaḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 2 — 114 <g/> // </s><s> VYAVASĀY -a @ DVITĪY -o atha ŚĀDVAL -ās TĪRṆ - @ ABHŪT -alam so AŚVATTH -a @ MŪL -aṃ PRAY -ayau
line.right: -āya KṚT -a @ NIŚCAY -aḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 2 — 115 <g/> // </s><s> tatas TADĀN -īṃ GAJ -a @ RĀJ -a @ VIKR -amaḥ PAD -a @ SVAN -en ĀNUPAM -ena BODHIT -aḥ MAHĀMUN -er ĀGAT -a @ BODH -i @ NIŚCAY -o JAG -āda KĀL -o BHUJAG - @ OTTAM -aḥ STUT -im // <g/> 1 <g/> 2 — 116 <g/> // </s><s> yathā MUN -e TVAC - @ CARAṆ - @ ĀVAPĪḌIT -ā MUH -ur MUH -ur NIṢṬ -an ATĪV -a MEDIN -ī yathā ca te RĀJAT -i SŪRY -avat PRABH -ā DHRUV -aṃ tvam IṢṬ -aṃ

line.left: 2 — 113 <g/> // </s><s> ĀVṚTT -a iti VIJÑĀY -a taṃ JAH -uḥ PAÑC -a BHIKṢ -avaḥ // MANĪṢ -iṇam iv ĀTM -ānaṃ NIRMUKT -aṃ PAÑC -a DHĀT -avaḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 2 — 114 <g/> // </s><s> VYAVASĀY -a @ DVITĪY -o atha ŚĀDVAL -ās TĪRṆ - @ ABHŪT -alam so AŚVATTH -a @ MŪL -aṃ PRAY -ayau BODH -āya KṚT -a @ NIŚCAY -aḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 2 — 115 <g/> // </s><s> tatas TADĀN -īṃ GAJ -a @ RĀJ -a @ VIKR -amaḥ PAD -a @ SVAN -en ĀNUPAM -ena BODHIT -aḥ MAHĀMUN -er ĀGAT -a @
line.right: -i @ NIŚCAY -o JAG -āda KĀL -o BHUJAG - @ OTTAM -aḥ STUT -im // <g/> 1 <g/> 2 — 116 <g/> // </s><s> yathā MUN -e TVAC - @ CARAṆ - @ ĀVAPĪḌIT -ā MUH -ur MUH -ur NIṢṬ -an ATĪV -a MEDIN -ī yathā ca te RĀJAT -i SŪRY -avat PRABH -ā DHRUV -aṃ tvam IṢṬ -aṃ PHAL -am ADY -a BHOKṢ -yase // <g/> 1 <g/> 2 — 117 <g/> // </s><s> yathā BHRAM -antyo DIV -i CĀṢ -a @ PAṄKT -ayaḥ PRADAKṢIṆ -aṃ tvāṃ KAMALĀKṢ -a KURV -ate yathā ca SAUMY -ā DIV -i VĀNT -i VĀYAV

line.left: // </s><s> KECID VRAJ -anto BHṚŚ -am āva VALG -ur ANY -o @ ANY -am āpuplu VIR -e TATH -ānye ci KRĪḌ -ur ĀKĀŚ -a @ GAT -āś ca KECIT KECIC ca CER -us TAR -um ASTAK -eṣu // <g/> 1 <g/> 3 — 25 <g/> // </s><s> na NART -a KAŚCID BHRAMAY -aṃs TRIŚŪL -aṃ KAŚCID VIP -u SPHŪRJ -a GAD -āṃ VIKARṢ -an HARṢ -eṇa KAŚCID VṚṢ -avan na NARD -a KAŚCIT PRAJ -a @ JVĀL -a TAN ū RUH -ebhyaḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 3 — 26 <g/> // </s><s> EVAṂVIDH -ā BHŪT a @ GAṆ -āḥ SAMANT -āt TAD
line.right: -i @ MŪL -aṃ PARIVĀRY -a TASTH -uḥ JIGHṚKṢ -a @ VAŚ c <g/> ^ <g/> aiva JIGHĀṂS -a @ VAŚ ca BHART -ur NIYOG -aṃ PAR -i @ PĀLAY -antaḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 3 — 27 <g/> // </s><s> taṃ PREKṢY -a @ MAR -asya ca PŪRV -a @ RĀTR -e ŚĀKY -a @ RṢABH -asy <g/> ^ <g/> aiva ca YUDDH -a @ KĀL -am na dyauś ca KĀŚ -e PṚTHIV -ī CAKAMP -e PRAJ -a @ JVAL -uś c <g/> ^ <g/> aiva DIŚ -aḥ SAŚABD -āḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 3 — 28 <g/> // </s><s> VIṢV

line.left: <g/> // </s><s> MAH -ī @ BHṚT -o DHARM -a @ PARĀŚ ca NĀG -ā MAHĀMUN -er VIGHN -am AMṚṢYAMĀṆ -āḥ MĀR -aṃ PRAT -i KRODH -a @ VIVṚTT -a @ NETR -ā NIḤŚ -a @ ŚVAS -uś c <g/> ^ <g/> aiva JAJ -ṛmbhire ca // <g/> 1 <g/> 3 — 30 <g/> // </s><s> ŚUDDHĀDHIVĀS -ā vibu DHARṢAY -as tu SAD DHARM -a @ SIDDH -y @ ARTH -am ABHIPRAVṚTT -āḥ // MĀR -e ANUKAMP -āṃ MANAS -ā PRACAKR -ur VIRĀG -a @ BHĀV -āt tu na ROṢ -am īyuḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 3 — 31 <g/> // </s><s> TAD
line.right: -i @ MŪL -aṃ SAMAVEKṢY -a KĪRṆ -aṃ HIṂS - @ ĀTM -anā MĀR -a @ BAL -ena tena DHARM - @ ĀTM -abhir LOK -a @ VIMOKṢ -a @ KĀM -air babhūva HĀH - @ ĀKṚT -am ANTARĪKṢ -e // <g/> 1 <g/> 3 — 32 <g/> // </s><s> UPAPLAV -aṃ DHARM -a @ VIDH -es tu tasya DṚṢṬ -vā STHIT -aṃ MĀR -a @ BAL -aṃ MAHARṢ -iḥ na cu KṢUBH -e n <g/> ^ <g/> āpi YAY -au VIKĀR -aṃ MADHY -e GAV -āṃ SIṂH -a iv OPAVIṢṬ -aḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 3 — 33 <g/> // </s>

line.left: KṢEP -a tasy OPAR -i DĪPT -am ANY -aḥ KAḌAṄGAR -aṃ PARVAT -a @ ŚṚṄG -a @ MĀTR -am yan MUKT -a @ MĀTR -aṃ GAGAN -a @ STH -am eva tasy ĀNUBHĀV -āc CHAT -adhā PAP - @ HĀL -a // <g/> 1 <g/> 3 — 40 <g/> // </s><s> KAŚCI -j JAL -ann ARK -a iv ODIT -aḥ KHĀD AṄGĀR -a @ VARṢ -aṃ MAH -ad UTS -a @ SARJ -a cūṛ NĀN -i CĀMĪKAR -a @ KANDAR -āṇāṃ KALP - @ ĀTYAY -e MER -ur iva PRADĪPT -aḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 3 — 41 <g/> // </s><s> TAD
line.right: -i @ MŪL -e PRAVIKĪRYAMĀṆ -am AṄGĀR -a @ VARṢ -aṃ tu sa VISPHULIṄG -am MAITR -ī @ VIHĀR -ād ṚṢ -i @ SAT TAMAS -ya babhūva RAKT - @ OTPAL -a @ PATTR -a @ VARṢ -aḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 3 — 42 <g/> // </s><s> ŚARĪR -a @ CITT -a @ VYASAN - @ ĀTAP -ais tair EVAṂVIDH -ais taiś ca NIPĀTYAMĀN -aiḥ n <g/> ^ <g/> aiv ĀSAN -āc CHA -āk YAMUN -iś ca CĀL -a SV -a @ NIŚCAY -aṃ BANDHUM iv OPAGUHY -a // <g/> 1 <g/> 3 — 43 <g/> // </s><s> ath ĀPAR -e

line.left: @ ŚIPH -o DHAIRY -a @ VIGĀḌH -a @ MŪL -aś CĀRITR -a @ PUṢP -aḥ SMṚT -i @ BUDDH -i @ ŚĀKH -aḥ JÑĀN -a @ DRUM -o DHARM -a @ PHAL -a @ PRADĀT -ā n OTPĀṬAN -aṃ hy ARHAT i VARDHAMĀN -aḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 3 — 65 <g/> // </s><s> BADDH -āṃ DṚḌH -aiś CETAS -i MOH -a @ PĀŚ -air yasya PRAJ -āṃ MOKṢAYIT -uṃ MANĪṢ -ā TASMIN JIGHĀṂS -ā tava n OPAPANN -ā ŚRĀNT -e JAG -ad BANDHAN -a @ MOKṢ -a @ HET -oḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 3 — 66 <g/> // </s><s>
line.right: -āya KARM -āṇi hi yāny anena KṚT -āni teṣāṃ NIYAT -o ADY -a KĀL -aḥ STHĀN -e TATH -āsminn UPAVIṢṬ -a eṣa yath <g/> ^ <g/> aiva PŪRV -e MUN -ayas TATH ^ <g/> aiva // <g/> 1 <g/> 3 — 67 <g/> // </s><s> eṣā hi nābhir vasu @ DHĀT -a @ LAS -ya KṚTSN -ena YUKT -ā PARAM -eṇa DHĀM -nā BHŪM -er ato ANY -o asti hi na PRADEŚ -o VEG -aṃ SAMĀDH -er VIṢAH -eta yo asya // <g/> 1 <g/> 3 — 68 <g/> // </s><s> TAN mā KṚT -hāḥ ŚOK -am upehi ŚĀNT -iṃ mā BHŪN

line.left: <g/> 3 <g/> // </s><s> a @ STHĀN -ād ĀNUKŪLY -āc ca DHARM -eṣv ADHIGAM -asya hi / KOL -asy EVA PARITYĀG -o DHARM -e SAṂDH -is tato MAT -aḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 4 <g/> // </s><s> NAIRMĀṆIK -ena no BUDDH -o DHARM -o n <g/> ^ <g/> āpi ca DEŚIT -aḥ / DEŚIT -as tu DVAY -ā @ GRĀH -yo a @ VĀCY -o a @ VĀK PATH -a @ LAKṢAṆ -āt // <g/> 1 <g/> 5 <g/> // </s><s> GRAHAṆ -a @ DEŚ -aṇā c <g/> ^ <g/> āsya n ĀPĀRTH -ā PUṆY -a @ SAṂGRAH -āt / PUṆY -aṃ
line.right: -yan UPASTAṂBH -ād UPASTAṂBH -ād DVAY -asya ca // <g/> 1 <g/> 6 <g/> // </s><s> SVĀBHĀVIK - @ ĀPT -i @ HET -utvāt TAD ANY -asya ca JANM -anaḥ / KAIVALY -ād BUDDH -a @ DHARM -āṇām AGRY -atvaṃ PUṆY -a @ SĀDHAN -am // <g/> 1 <g/> 7 <g/> // </s><s> a @ GRĀH yān ABHILAPY -atvaṃ SV -a @ PHAL -ānām an @ UDGRAH -āt / DVAY - @ ĀVARAṆ -a @ NIRMOKṢ -āt SUBHŪT -āv a @ RAṆ -ād VAYAṂ // <g/> 1 <g/> 8 <g/> // </s><s> BUDDH -a @ DĪPAṂKAR -ā @ GRĀH -ād VAK -yen ĀDHIGAM

line.left: / ŚODHAN - @ ĀVARAṆ -ānāṃ ca KṢIPR - @ ĀBHIJÑĀT -vam eva ca // <g/> 4 <g/> 0 <g/> // </s><s> VICITR -aioka SAṂPATT -i @ VIPĀK -aḥ su @ MAH -ānn api / KARM -āṇi etāni DHARM -e PRATIPATT -er MAT -āni x // <g/> 4 <g/> 1 <g/> // </s><s> x x x x x x x x x BODHISATTV -a @ KALPAN -ā / CITT - @ ĀVARAṆ -am ĀKHYĀT -aṃ yac CITT -am a @ PRATIṢṬHIT -aṃ // <g/> 4 <g/> 2 <g/> // </s><s> PAŚC -ād VYĀKARAṆ -ān no ca CARY -ā DĪPAṂKAR -e PAR -ā /

line.left: UTPĀDAY -ituṃ ŚAKN -uvanty UCCHED - @ ABHĪR -utv ĀDĀR -ya @ MĀRG -a @ BAL -ena c OTPĀDAN -ād DṚṢṬADHARM -a @ NIRVĀṆ -asya TAD ADHIMUKT -itaḥ / </s><s> ĀRY -asy <g/> ^ <g/> āpi CEY -aṃ na VAIRĀGY -a @ LABHY -ā / </s><s> kiṃ TARH -i / </s><s> ĀPY ā PRAYOG -ataḥ // <g/> 2 — 43 <g/> // </s><s> PRAYOG -a @ LABHY ^ <g/> aiveyam / </s><s> na c ĀTĪT -ā LABH -yate n ĀPY ANĀGAT -a BHĀV -yate / </s><s> CITT -a @ BAL -ena TAD BHĀVAN -āt / </s><s> kiṃ BHAGAV -ato api PARĀY -ogikī / </s><s> nety ĀH -a / </s><s>
line.right: -i @ LABHY -ā MUN -eḥ KṢAY -a @ JÑĀN -a @ SAMAN -aṃ KĀL -aṃ BUDDH -ā BHAGAV -anta enāṃ LABH -ante n <g/> ^ <g/> āsti KIÑCID BUDDH -ānāṃ PRĀYOGIK -aṃ NĀM -a / </s><s> ICCH -āmā TRA - @ PRATIBADDH -o hi teṣāṃ SARV -a @ GUṆ -a @ SAṂPĀT - @ SAṂMUKH -ī @ BHĀV -aḥ / </s><s> TASMĀD eṣāṃ SARV -a @ VAIRĀGY -a @ LĀBHIK -am / </s><s> KATHAṂ KHALV i DĀN -īm ANUTPĀD -itāyāṃ NIRODHASAMĀPATT -au KṢAY -a @ JÑĀN -a @ KĀL -e BHAGAV -ān UBHAY -oto BHĀG -a @ VIMUKT -aḥ SIDH -yati / </s>

line.left: -ām UTPĀDAY -at <g/> ^ <g/> īti PĀŚ -c ATT -yāḥ / </s><s> atha KASMĀD evaṃ n EṢ -yate / </s><s> evaṃ ca STHAVIR - @ OPAGUPT -asyāp ĪDAṂ NETR -ī @ PAD -aṃ PRĀMĀṆIK -aṃ BHAV -iṣyati / </s><s> " NIRODHASAMĀPATT -im UTPĀDY -a KṢAY -a @ JÑĀN -am UTPĀDAY -at <g/> ^ <g/> īti VAKTAVY -aṃ TATHĀGAT -a <g/> " iti / </s><s> na PRĀK NAH -i PŪRV -aṃ tasyā UTAPĀD -anaṃ YUJY -ata iti KĀŚMĪR -akāḥ / </s><s> kiṃ KĀRAṆ -am / </s><s> CAT -us TRIṂŚ -at KṢAṆ - @ ĀPT -itaḥ / </s><s> CATUSR -iṃ ŚAT -ā KIL -a CITTAKṢAṆ -air BODHISATTV -o

line.left: -a BALĀKṢ -ā MAHĀBALĀKṢ -am / </s><s> DAŚ -a MAHĀBALĀKṢ -āṇya SAM - @ KHY -am / </s><s> AṢṬAK -aṃ MADHY -ād VISTṚT -am / </s><s> ity eteṣāṃ ṢAṢṬ -i @ STHĀN - @ ĀNTAR a @ GAT -āṃ SAṂKHY -ām ANUPRĀPT -āḥ KALP -ā ASAṂKHYEY -ān ity UCYANT -e / </s><s> tato VYĀVṚTY -a punar GAṆ -yante / </s><s> evaṃ TRĪṆ -i ASAṂKHYEY - @ ĀNĪT -y @ UCYANT -e / </s><s> na tu n <g/> ^ <g/> aiva PARISAṂKHYĀT -uṃ ŚAKY -anta iti / </s><s> KINT -u KHAL -u KĀL -a @ PRAKARṢ -eṇ <g/> ^ <g/> aiva KṚT -a @ PRAṆIDHĀN -ā BODHISATTV -ā
line.right: -im ABHISAṂBUDH -yante / </s><s> kim ETAD eva BHAV -iṣyati / </s><s> MAHAT āṃ hi PUṆY -a @ JÑĀN -a @ SAṂBHĀR -eṇa ṢAḌ bhiḥ PĀRAMIT -ābhiḥ BAH -ubhir DUṢKAR -a @ ŚATASAHASR - @ AISTR -ibhiḥ KALP - @ ĀSAṂKHYEY -air ANUTTAR -āṃ SAMYAKSAṂBODH -im ABHISAṂBUDH -yante BODHISATTV -āḥ / </s><s> YADYAP -y @ ANYATH -ā @ APYAST -i MOKṢ - @ ĀVAKĀŚ -aḥ kim ARTH -aṃ ta iyantaṃ YATN -am ĀRABH -ante / </s><s> PARĀRTH -aṃ ta iyantaṃ YATN -am ĀRABH -ante KATHAṂ PAR -ān api MAHAT o DUḤKH - @ AUGH -āt PARITRĀT -uṃ ŚAKN -uyām iti / </s><s> ka eṣāṃ PARĀRTH

line.left: GĀTH -ayā " na DIV -i BHUV -i vā nāsmin LOK -e na VAIŚRAVAṆ - @ ĀLAY -e / </s><s> na MAR UBH -a @ VAN -e DIVY -e STHĀN -e na DIKṢ -u VIDIKṢ -u vā // </s><s> CARAT -u va SUDH -āṃ SPHĪT -āṃ KṚTSN -āṃ sa PARVAT -a @ KĀNAN -ām / </s><s> PURUṢ -a @ VṚṢABH -ast VATTUL -yo ANY -o MAH -ā @ ŚRAMAṆ -aḥ KUT -a <g/> " iti // </s><s> tadā KIL -a VĪRY -a @ PĀRAMIT -ā PARIPŪRṆ -ā NAV -a ca KALP -āḥ PRATYUDĀVART -itāḥ / </s><s> dhī SAM - @ ĀDHY -or ANANTAR -am / </s><s>

line.left: <s> " CATU -rb HIRAṄG -aiḥ SAMANVĀGAT -o BHIṢAKT -al PAS - @ ARTT -e TYATR -a / </s><s> yathā ca VYAVACĀRAṆ - @ ĀVASTHĀY -āṃ SATY -a @ PARĪKṢ -ā TATH - @ ĀBHISAMAY - @ ĀVASTHĀY -āṃ SATY - @ ĀBHISAMAY -aḥ / </s><s> PŪRV -ave DHĀT / </s><s> DṚṢṬ -a @ BHŪM -i @ NIḤSAṂG - @ ĀŚV -a @ DHĀVAN -avat / </s><s> ABHISAMAY -a iti ko ARTH -aḥ / </s><s> ABHISAṂBODH -a iṇo BODHAN - @ ĀRTH -atvāt / </s><s> KARAM -ād an @ ĀSRAV -a eva na s ĀSRAV -aḥ / </s><s> sa hi NIRVĀṆ - @ ĀBHIMUKH -aḥ SAMYA -k @

line.left: VYĀVṚTT -atvāt / </s><s> BODHISATTV -āś ca PARAHIT - @ KRIY - @ ĀPĀR -at ANTR -yādapāyān APY AVAGĀH -anta iti / </s><s> tasy <g/> ^ <g/> aiva tu GOTR -asya <g/> ^ a @ VIVARTY -atvād a @ SAṂBHAV -aḥ / </s><s> TRĪṆ -y @ APĪT -araḥ // <g/> 6 — 23 <g/> // </s><s> VIVARTY -a syād iti VART -ate / </s><s> TRĪṆ -y api NIRVEDHABHĀGĪY -āni ŚRĀVAK -a @ GOTR -ād VAC -y @ ĀVART -ya BUDDH - @ ĀD -i @ BHAV -aḥ syāt PRATYEKABUDDH -a ity ARTH -aḥ / </s><s> PRATYEKABUDDH -ago TRĀṆ -i tu VYĀVART -ayitu MAŚAK yāni / </s><s> ā
line.right: -eḥ SARV -am EKATR -a DHYĀN -ānty e ŚĀST -ṛ KHAḌG -ayoḥ / </s><s> ŚĀST -ā BUDH -aḥ KHAḌGAVIṢĀṆ -a @ KALP -aḥ PRATYEKABUDDH -aḥ / </s><s> tayor EKATR ^ <g/> aiv ĀSAN -e CATURTH -am eva DHYĀN -aṃ NIŚRIT -y @ ANIÑJ -y @ APAṬ -u SAMĀDHIT -vān NIRVEDHABHĀGĪY -āny ĀRABHY -a YĀVAD BODH -ir UTPAD -yate / </s><s> KṢAY - @ ĀNUTPĀD -a @ JÑĀN -e hi BODH -ir iti PAŚC -ād UPAPĀD -ayiṣyāmaḥ / </s><s> a @ ŚUBH -ām ĀRABHY -a YĀVAD VOD -hir ity APAR -e / </s><s> yeṣāṃ tu KHAḌG -ād ANY -o api PRATYEKABUDDH -o asti TAD go TRĀṆ

line.left: -a syād iti VART -ate / </s><s> TRĪṆ -y api NIRVEDHABHĀGĪY -āni ŚRĀVAK -a @ GOTR -ād VAC -y @ ĀVART -ya BUDDH - @ ĀD -i @ BHAV -aḥ syāt PRATYEKABUDDH -a ity ARTH -aḥ / </s><s> PRATYEKABUDDH -ago TRĀṆ -i tu VYĀVART -ayitu MAŚAK yāni / </s><s> ā BODH -eḥ SARV -am EKATR -a DHYĀN -ānty e ŚĀST -ṛ KHAḌG -ayoḥ / </s><s> ŚĀST -ā BUDH -aḥ KHAḌGAVIṢĀṆ -a @ KALP -aḥ PRATYEKABUDDH -aḥ / </s><s> tayor EKATR ^ <g/> aiv ĀSAN -e CATURTH -am eva DHYĀN -aṃ NIŚRIT -y @ ANIÑJ -y @ APAṬ -u SAMĀDHIT -vān NIRVEDHABHĀGĪY -āny ĀRABHY -a YĀVAD
line.right: -ir UTPAD -yate / </s><s> KṢAY - @ ĀNUTPĀD -a @ JÑĀN -e hi BODH -ir iti PAŚC -ād UPAPĀD -ayiṣyāmaḥ / </s><s> a @ ŚUBH -ām ĀRABHY -a YĀVAD VOD -hir ity APAR -e / </s><s> yeṣāṃ tu KHAḌG -ād ANY -o api PRATYEKABUDDH -o asti TAD go TRĀṆ -āṃ VYĀVARTAN -ā @ PRAT -iṣeṣaḥ / </s><s> kiṃ punaḥ PRATHAM -a eva JANM -ani KṚT -a @ PRAYOG -o NIRVEDHABHĀGĪY -āny UTPĀDAY -et / </s><s> n AITAD asti AVAŚY -aṃ hi PRĀKT -ebhyo MOKṢ -a @ BHĀGĪY -aṃ UTPĀDAY -itavyam / </s><s> SARV -a @ SVALP -aṃ hi KṢIPR -aṃ MOKṢ -as TR -ibhir BHAV

line.left: GOTR -ād VAC -y @ ĀVART -ya BUDDH - @ ĀD -i @ BHAV -aḥ syāt PRATYEKABUDDH -a ity ARTH -aḥ / </s><s> PRATYEKABUDDH -ago TRĀṆ -i tu VYĀVART -ayitu MAŚAK yāni / </s><s> ā BODH -eḥ SARV -am EKATR -a DHYĀN -ānty e ŚĀST -ṛ KHAḌG -ayoḥ / </s><s> ŚĀST -ā BUDH -aḥ KHAḌGAVIṢĀṆ -a @ KALP -aḥ PRATYEKABUDDH -aḥ / </s><s> tayor EKATR ^ <g/> aiv ĀSAN -e CATURTH -am eva DHYĀN -aṃ NIŚRIT -y @ ANIÑJ -y @ APAṬ -u SAMĀDHIT -vān NIRVEDHABHĀGĪY -āny ĀRABHY -a YĀVAD BODH -ir UTPAD -yate / </s><s> KṢAY - @ ĀNUTPĀD -a @ JÑĀN -e hi
line.right: -ir iti PAŚC -ād UPAPĀD -ayiṣyāmaḥ / </s><s> a @ ŚUBH -ām ĀRABHY -a YĀVAD VOD -hir ity APAR -e / </s><s> yeṣāṃ tu KHAḌG -ād ANY -o api PRATYEKABUDDH -o asti TAD go TRĀṆ -āṃ VYĀVARTAN -ā @ PRAT -iṣeṣaḥ / </s><s> kiṃ punaḥ PRATHAM -a eva JANM -ani KṚT -a @ PRAYOG -o NIRVEDHABHĀGĪY -āny UTPĀDAY -et / </s><s> n AITAD asti AVAŚY -aṃ hi PRĀKT -ebhyo MOKṢ -a @ BHĀGĪY -aṃ UTPĀDAY -itavyam / </s><s> SARV -a @ SVALP -aṃ hi KṢIPR -aṃ MOKṢ -as TR -ibhir BHAV -aiḥ // <g/> 6 — 24 <g/> // </s><s> EK -asmin JANM -ani MOKṢ -a

line.right: -iḥ KṢAY -a @ JÑĀN -am ANUTPĀD -a @ JÑĀN -aṃ ca / </s><s> PUDGAL -a @ BHED -ena TISR -o BODHAY -a UTPAD -yante / </s><s> ŚRĀVAKABODH -iḥ PRATYEKABODH -ir ANUTTAR -ā SAMYAKSAṂBODH -ir iti / </s><s> a @ ŚEṢ -ā @ VIDY -ā @ PRAHĀṆ -āt / </s><s> tābhyāṃ SVARTH -asya YATHĀBHŪT -a KṚT -ā punaḥ KARTAVY -atā VAV -odhācca / </s><s> TĀD - @ ANULOM -yataḥ / </s><s> SAPT -a @ TRIṂŚAT -tu TAT PAKṢY -āḥ BODH -er ANULOM -atvād BODHIPAKṢY -āḥ SAPT -a @ TRIṂŚ -ad UTPAD -yante / </s><s> NĀM -ato DRAVY -ato DAŚ -a // <g/> 6 — 67 <g/> // </s>

line.left: -āni / </s><s> SAPT -a BODHYAṄG -āni / </s><s> ĀRY - @ ĀṢṬĀṄG -o MĀRG -aḥ iti / </s><s> TATR -a ANUTPĀD -a @ KṢAY -a @ JÑĀN -e BODH -iḥ KṢAY -a @ JÑĀN -am ANUTPĀD -a @ JÑĀN -aṃ ca / </s><s> PUDGAL -a @ BHED -ena TISR -o BODHAY -a UTPAD -yante / </s><s> ŚRĀVAKABODH -iḥ PRATYEKABODH -ir ANUTTAR -ā SAMYAKSAṂBODH -ir iti / </s><s> a @ ŚEṢ -ā @ VIDY -ā @ PRAHĀṆ -āt / </s><s> tābhyāṃ SVARTH -asya YATHĀBHŪT -a KṚT -ā punaḥ KARTAVY -atā VAV -odhācca / </s><s> TĀD - @ ANULOM -yataḥ / </s><s> SAPT -a @ TRIṂŚAT -tu TAT PAKṢY -āḥ
line.right: -er ANULOM -atvād BODHIPAKṢY -āḥ SAPT -a @ TRIṂŚ -ad UTPAD -yante / </s><s> NĀM -ato DRAVY -ato DAŚ -a // <g/> 6 — 67 <g/> // </s><s> DAŚ -a DRAVY -āṇi SARV -e BODHIPAKṢY -āḥ / </s><s> KATAM -āni DAŚ -a / </s><s> ŚRADDH -ā VĪRY -aṃ SMṚT -iḥ PRAJÑ -ā SAMĀDH -iḥ PRĪT -y @ UPEKṢAṆ -e / </s><s> PRAŚRABDH -i @ ŚĪL -a @ SAṂKALP -āḥ ity etāni DAŚ -a DRAVY -āṇi / </s><s> KATHAṂ KṚTV -ā / </s><s> PRAJÑ -ā hi SMṚT -y @ UPASTHIT -iḥ // <g/> 6 — 68 <g/> // </s><s> VĪRY -aṃ SAMYA -k @ PRAH -āṇ ĀKHY -am ṚDDHIPĀD

line.left: ṚDDHIPĀD -āḥ / </s><s> a punaḥ PARIHĀṆ -ita ĀDHIPATY -a @ PRĀPT -atvāt KṢĀNT -iṣv INDRIY -āṇi / </s><s> KLEŚ - @ ĀNAVAMARDANĪY -atvādgra DHARM -eṣu BAL -āni LAUKIK -āny a @ DHARM - @ ĀNAVAMARDANĪY -atvādvā / </s><s> BODHY -ā @ SANN -atvāt BHĀVAN -ā @ MĀRG -e BODHYAṄG -āni / </s><s> GAMAN -a @ PRABHĀV -itvād DARŚAN -a @ MĀRG -e MĀRG - @ ĀṄG -ānī / </s><s> tasyāśugāmitvāt / </s><s> SAṂKHYĀN -u PŪRV -ī @ VIDH -ān ĀRTH -aṃ tu PŪRV -a SAPT - @ OKT -āni PAŚC - @ ĀDAṢṬ -au / </s><s> TATR -a DHARM -a @ PRAVICAY -a @ SAṂBODHYAṄG -aṃ
line.right: -ir v ODHY - @ AṄG -aṃ ca SAMYAGDṚṢṬ -ir MĀRG -o MĀRG - @ ĀṄG -aṃ CET -i VAIBHĀṢIK -āḥ / </s><s> APAR -e punar a @ BHITTV ^ <g/> aiva KRAM -aṃ BODHIPAKṢY -āṇām ĀNUPŪRV -ī VARṆ -ayanti / </s><s> " ĀDIT -a eva TĀVAD VAH -u VIDHAV -iṣapa VYĀSEK -a @ VISĀRIṆ -īnāṃ BUDDH -īnāṃ NIG -ra HĀRY -a SMṚTYUPASTHĀN -āni CETAS -a UPANIBADDH -āni BHAV -anti YĀVADEV -a GARDH - @ ĀŚRIT -ānāṃ SMAR -a @ SAṂKALP -ānāṃ PRATIVINODAN -āyeti SŪTR -e VACAN -āt / </s><s> TAD VAL -ena VĪRY -a @ SAṂVARDHAN -āc CATU -r VIDH -a @

line.left: <s> DVAY -os TAD DVAY -a @ VARJIT -āḥ / </s><s> TṚTĪY -a @ CATURTH -ayor DHYĀN -ayoḥ PRĪT -i @ SAṂKALP -ābhyāṃ VARJIT -āḥ PAÑC -a @ TRIṂŚAT / </s><s> DHYĀN - @ ĀNTAR e ca tābhyām eva dvābhyāṃ VARJIT -āḥ PAÑC -a @ TRIṂŚ -a @ DEV -a / </s><s> ŚĪL - @ ĀṄG -ais tābhyāṃ ca t RIṢV -a @ RUP -iṣu // <g/> 6 — 72 <g/> // </s><s> VARJIT -ā iti VART -ate / </s><s> ĀRUPY -esu SAMYA -g @ VĀK KARM -ānt ĀJĪV -aiḥ PRĪT -i @ SAṂKALP -ābhyāṃ ca VARJIT -ā DVĀTRIṂŚ -at / </s><s> KĀMADHĀT -au BHAVĀGR -e ca
line.right: -i @ MĀRG - @ ĀṄG -a @ VARJIT -āḥ / </s><s> DVĀR - @ VIŚAT -ir BODHIPAKṢY -ās tayoran ĀSRAV -a @ MĀRG -ā @ BHĀV -āt / </s><s> BODHIPAKṢ -eṣu VARTAMĀN -asya kasyām AVASTHĀY -ām AVETYAPRASĀD -a @ LĀBH -o VEDITAVY -aḥ / </s><s> TR -i @ SATYADARŚ -ane ŚĪL -a @ DHARM - @ ĀVETYAPRASĀD -ayoḥ // <g/> 6 — 73 <g/> // </s><s> LĀBH -o MĀRG - @ ĀBHISAMAY -e BUDDHAT -at SAṂGH -ayior api / </s><s> DUḤKH -a @ SAMUDAY -a @ NIRODH -a @ SATY -āny ABHISAM -ayan DHARM -e c ĀVETYAPRASĀD -am ĀRY -a @ KĀNT -āni ca

line.left: <s> atha KṢAY -a @ JÑĀN - @ ĀNUTPĀD -a @ JÑĀN -ayoḥ ko VIŚEṢ -aḥ / </s><s> KṢAY -a @ JÑĀN -aṃ hi SATY -eṣu PARIJÑĀT - @ ĀD -i @ NIŚCAY -aḥ / </s><s> na PARIJÑEY -am ity ādir ANUTPĀD -a @ MAT -ir MAT -ā // <g/> 7 — 7 <g/> // </s><s> KṢAY -a @ JÑĀN -aṃ KATAM -at / </s><s> DUḤKH -aṃ me PARIJÑĀT -am iti JĀN -āti / </s><s> SAMUDAY -aḥ PRAHĪṆ -o NIRODH -aḥ SĀKṢĀT a @ KṚT -o MĀRG -o BHĀVIT -a iti JĀN -āti / </s><s> TAD UPĀDĀY -a yat JÑĀN -aṃ DARŚAN -aṃ VIDY -ā BUDDH -ir
line.right: -iḥ PRAJÑ -ā ĀLOK -o ABHISAMAY -am IDAM UC -yate KṢAY -a @ JÑĀN -am / </s><s> ANUTPĀD -a @ JÑĀN -aṃ KATAM -at / </s><s> DUḤKH -aṃ me PARIJÑĀT -aṃ na pounaḥ PARIJÑEY -am iti JĀN -āti YĀVAT MĀRG -o BHĀVIT -o na punar BHĀVAYITAVY -a iti / </s><s> TAD UPĀDĀY -eti VISTAR -eṇ OKT -aṃ ŚĀSTR -e / </s><s> KATHAM an @ ĀSRAV -eṇa JÑĀN -en <g/> ^^ <g/> aivaṃ JĀN -āti / </s><s> TAT PṚṢṬH -a @ LABDH -ena VYUTTH -ita evaṃ JĀN -āti / </s><s> atas TAD VIŚEṢ -eṇa tayor VIŚEṢ -aḥ / </s><s> ŚĀSTR -e JÑĀ -piota iti KĀŚMĪR -āḥ / </s><s> an

line.left: -a @ HAST -ānā MADH -o HAST -aṃ PĀT -ayati / </s><s> PAÑC - @ ĀTAP - @ ĀVASTHIT -ānā MAGN -im AVAKIR -ati / </s><s> yadā ca tair ĪRYĀPATH -o VIKOPIT -o BHAV -ati tadā sa teṣām AGRAT -aḥ PARYAṄK -aṃ BADHN -āti / </s><s> YĀVAT tair ṚṢ -ibhir ĀCĀRY -āya NIVEDIT -aṃ / </s><s> ten <g/> ^ <g/> āpi c OKT -aṃ / </s><s> PARYAṄK -eṇa TĀVAN NIṢĪD -ata / </s><s> YĀVAT tāni PAÑC -arṣi ŚAT -āni PARYAṄK -eṇ OPAVIṢṬ -āni / </s><s> te an @ ĀCĀRY -akā an @ UPADEŚ -akāḥ SAPTA TRIṂŚAD BODHIPAKṢ -ān DHARM -ān ĀMUKH -ī @ KṚTY -a PRATYEK -āṃ
line.right: -iṃ SĀKṢĀT KṚT -avantaḥ / </s><s> atha teṣāṃ PRATYEKABUDDH -ānām ETAD a @ BHAV -ad / </s><s> yat kiñcad ASMĀBH -iḥ ŚREY -o AVĀPT -aṃ TAT SARV -amimaṃ MARKAṬ -am ĀGAMY -a / </s><s> tair YĀVAT sa MARKAṬ -aḥ PHAL -a @ MŪL -aiḥ PARIPĀLIT -aḥ / </s><s> KĀL -a @ GAT -asya ca ta CCHARĪR -aṃ GANDH -a @ KĀṢṬH -air DHMĀPIT -aṃ / </s><s> TAT kiṃ MAN -yase ĀNAND -a yo asau PAÑC -ānāṃ MARKAṬ -a @ ŚAT -ānāṃ YŪTH -a @ PAT -iḥ sa eṣa UPAGUPT -aḥ / </s><s> TAD ^ <g/> āpi tena VINIPATIT -a @ ŚARĪR -eṇ ĀPY ATRAIV ORUMUṆḌ -a

line.left: -a @ MANAS -aś CĀMĪKAR -ād ri DYUT -iḥ / </s><s> MOH -āndhena hi TATR -a TATR -a sa MAY -ā tais tair NAY -aiḥ KHEDIT -aḥ ten ĀHAṂ ca tathā pi NĀM -a BALIN -ā n <g/> ^ <g/> aivā PRIY -aṃ ŚRĀVIT -aḥ // </s><s> atha KĀMADHĀT -v ADHIPAT -ir MĀR -o n <g/> ^ <g/> āsty ANY -ā GAT -ir ANYATR -a UPAGUPT -akā DEV -eti JÑĀTV -ā SARV -am UTSṚJY -a STHAVIR - @ OPAGUPT -a @ SAMĪP -am UPETY -a PĀD -ayor NIPATY - @ OVĀC -a / </s><s> BHADANT -a kima VIDIT -am ETAD BHADANT -asya yathā
line.right: -i @ MŪL -am UPĀDĀY -a MAY -ā BHAGAV -ato VIPRIY -a @ ŚAT -āni KṚT -āni / </s><s> KUT -aḥ / </s><s> ŚĀL -āyāṃ BRĀHMAṆ -a @ GRĀM -e MĀM - @ ĀSĀDY -a sa GAUTAM -aḥ / BHAKT -a @ CCHED -am api PRĀPY -a nā KĀRṢ -īn MAM -a VIPRIY -aṃ // </s><s> GAUR - @ BHŪTV -ā SARP -avat STH -itvā KṚTV -ā ŚĀKAṬIK - @ ĀKṚT -iṃ / sa MAY - @ ĀYĀS -ito NĀTH -o na c ĀHAṂ tena HIṂSIT -aḥ // </s><s> tvayā punar AHAṂ vīra TYAKTV -ā hi SAHAJ -āṃ DAY -āṃ / sa DEV -

line.left: KĀM -o BHAV -ati PĀD - @ ĀṂGUṢṬH -e ANTARDH -īyante / </s><s> MANUṢY - @ OPAPATT -iṃ VYĀKAR -tu KĀM -o BHAV -ati JĀN -unor ANTARDH -īyante / </s><s> BALACAKRAVART -i @ RĀJY -aṃ VYĀKAR -tu KĀM -o BHAV -ati VĀM -e KAR -a @ TAL -e ANTARDH -īyante / </s><s> CAKRAVART -i @ RĀJY -aṃ VYĀKAR -tu KĀM -o BHAV -ati DAKṢIṆ -e KAR -a @ TAL -e ANTARDH -īyante / </s><s> DEV - @ OPAPATT -iṃ VYĀKAR -tu KĀM -o BHAV -ati NĀBHY -ām ANTARDH -īyante / </s><s> ŚRĀVAKABODH -iṃ VYĀKAR -tu KĀM -o BHAV -ati āsye ANTARDH -īyante / </s><s> PRATYEK -āṃ
line.right: -iṃ VYĀKAR -tu KĀM -o BHAV -ati ŪRṆĀY -ām ANTARDH -īyante / </s><s> ANUTTAR -āṃ SMAY -ak @ SAṂBODH -iṃ VYĀKAR -tu KĀM -o BHAV -ati UṢṆĪṢ -e ANTARDH -īyante / </s><s> atha tā ARC -iṣo BHAGAV -antaṃ triḥ PRADAKṢIṆ -ī @ KṚTY -a BHAGAV -ato VĀM -e KAR -a @ TAL -e ANTARH -itāḥ / </s><s> ath ĀYUṢM -ān ĀNAND -aḥ KṚT - @ ĀÑJAL -i @ PUṬ -o GĀTH -āṃ BHĀṢ -ate / </s><s> NĀH - @ ETV -a @ PRATYAY -aḥ / </s><s> GAT - @ ODDHAV -ā DAIN -yamada PRAHĪṆ -ā BUDDH -ā JAGAT y UTTAM -a @ HET -u BHŪT

line.left: -eṇa TĀPIT -āḥ // </s><s> ASMIN PRADEŚ -e BODHISATTV -ena ṢAḌ VARṢ -āṇi DUṢKAR -aṃ CĪRṆ -aṃ / </s><s> ĀH -a ca / </s><s> ṢAḌ VARṢ -āṇi hi KAṬUK -aṃ TAP -as TAP -tvā MAHĀMUN -iḥ / n ĀYAṂ MĀRG -o hy ABHIJÑĀY -ā iti JÑĀTV -ā SAMAT -ya @ JAT // </s><s> ASMIN PRADEŚ -e BODHISATTV -ena NAND -āyā NAND -a @ BALĀY -āś ca GRĀMIK -a @ DUHIT -roḥ SAKĀŚ -āt ṢOḌAŚ -a @ GUṆIT -aṃ MADH - @ UPĀYAS -aṃ PARIBHUKT -aṃ / </s><s> ĀH -a ca / </s><s> ASMIN PRADEŚ -e NAND -āyā BHUKTV -ā ca MADH - @ UPĀYAS -aṃ /
line.right: -i @ MŪL -aṃ MAHĀVĪR -o JAG -āma VAD -atāṃ VAR -aḥ // </s><s> ASMIN PRADEŚ -e BODHISATTV -aḥ KĀLIK -ena NĀG -a @ RĀJ -ena BODH -i @ MŪL -am ABHIGACCH -an SAṂSTUT -aḥ / </s><s> ĀH -a ca / </s><s> KĀLIK -a @ BHUJAG - @ ENDR -eṇa SAṂSTUT -o VAD -atāṃ VAR -aḥ / PRAYĀT -o anena MĀRG -eṇa BODHIMAṆḌ -e a @ MṚT - @ ĀRTHIK -aḥ // </s><s> atha RĀJ -ā STHAVIR -asya PĀD -ayor NIPATY -a KṚT - @ ĀÑJAL -ir UVĀC -a api PAŚY -ema NĀG - @ ENDR -aṃ yena DṚṢṬ -as TATHĀGAT -aḥ / VRAJ

line.left: -aṃ TAP -as TAP -tvā MAHĀMUN -iḥ / n ĀYAṂ MĀRG -o hy ABHIJÑĀY -ā iti JÑĀTV -ā SAMAT -ya @ JAT // </s><s> ASMIN PRADEŚ -e BODHISATTV -ena NAND -āyā NAND -a @ BALĀY -āś ca GRĀMIK -a @ DUHIT -roḥ SAKĀŚ -āt ṢOḌAŚ -a @ GUṆIT -aṃ MADH - @ UPĀYAS -aṃ PARIBHUKT -aṃ / </s><s> ĀH -a ca / </s><s> ASMIN PRADEŚ -e NAND -āyā BHUKTV -ā ca MADH - @ UPĀYAS -aṃ / BODH -i @ MŪL -aṃ MAHĀVĪR -o JAG -āma VAD -atāṃ VAR -aḥ // </s><s> ASMIN PRADEŚ -e BODHISATTV -aḥ KĀLIK -ena NĀG -a @ RĀJ -ena
line.right: -i @ MŪL -am ABHIGACCH -an SAṂSTUT -aḥ / </s><s> ĀH -a ca / </s><s> KĀLIK -a @ BHUJAG - @ ENDR -eṇa SAṂSTUT -o VAD -atāṃ VAR -aḥ / PRAYĀT -o anena MĀRG -eṇa BODHIMAṆḌ -e a @ MṚT - @ ĀRTHIK -aḥ // </s><s> atha RĀJ -ā STHAVIR -asya PĀD -ayor NIPATY -a KṚT - @ ĀÑJAL -ir UVĀC -a api PAŚY -ema NĀG - @ ENDR -aṃ yena DṚṢṬ -as TATHĀGAT -aḥ / VRAJ -āno anena MĀRG -eṇa MATT -a @ NĀG - @ ENDR -a @ VIKRAM -aḥ // </s><s> atha KĀLIK -o NĀG -a @ RĀJ -aḥ STHAVIR -a

line.left: -asya PĀD -ayor NIPATY -a KṚT - @ ĀÑJAL -ir UVĀC -a api PAŚY -ema NĀG - @ ENDR -aṃ yena DṚṢṬ -as TATHĀGAT -aḥ / VRAJ -āno anena MĀRG -eṇa MATT -a @ NĀG - @ ENDR -a @ VIKRAM -aḥ // </s><s> atha KĀLIK -o NĀG -a @ RĀJ -aḥ STHAVIR -a @ SAMĪP -e STH -itvā KṚT - @ ĀÑJAL -ir UVĀC -a / </s><s> STHAVIR -a kim ĀJÑĀPAY -a @ SĪT -i / </s><s> atha STHAVIR -o RĀJĀN -am UVĀC -a / </s><s> AYAṂ sa MAHĀRĀJ -a KĀLIK -o NĀG -a @ RĀJ -ā yena BHAGAV -ān anena MĀRG -eṇa
line.right: -i @ MŪL -aṃ NIRGACCH -an SAṂSTUT -aḥ / </s><s> atha RĀJ -ā KṚT - @ ĀÑJAL -iḥ KALIK -aṃ NĀGAR -ā @ J -am UVĀC -a / </s><s> DṚṢṬ -as tvayā JVALIT -a @ KĀÑCAN -a @ TULY -a @ VARṆ -aḥ ŚĀST -ā MAM -ā @ PRATISAM -aḥ ŚARAD - @ END -u VAKTR -aḥ / ĀKHY -āhi me DAŚABAL -asya GUṆ - @ AIKAD -e ŚAṂ TAT KĪDṚŚ -ī VAD -a hi ŚRĪ ḥ SUGAT -e TADĀN -īṃ // </s><s> KĀLIK -a UVĀC -a / </s><s> na ŚAKY -aṃ VĀG bhiḥ SAṂPR -akā ŚAYIT -um api tu SAṂKṢEP -aṃ ŚṚṆ -u

line.left: -a hi ŚRĪ ḥ SUGAT -e TADĀN -īṃ // </s><s> KĀLIK -a UVĀC -a / </s><s> na ŚAKY -aṃ VĀG bhiḥ SAṂPR -akā ŚAYIT -um api tu SAṂKṢEP -aṃ ŚṚṆ -u / </s><s> CARAṆ -a @ TAL -a @ PARĀH -ataḥ sa ŚAIL -o h YAVAN -i @ TAL -aḥ PRAC -a @ CĀL -a ṢAḌ VIKĀR -aṃ / RAV -i @ KIR -aṇa VIBH -ād HIK -ā nṛ LOK -e SUGAT -a @ ŚAŚ -i @ DYUT -i @ RAK -ṣayā MANOJÑ -ā // </s><s> YĀVAD RĀJ -ā CAITY -aṃ PRATIṢṬHĀPY -a PRAKRĀNT -aḥ / </s><s> atha STHAVIR - @ OPAGUPT -o RĀJĀN -aṃ
line.right: -i @ MŪL -am UPANĀMAY -itvā DAKṢIṆ -aṃ KARAM - @ ABHIPRAS - @ ĀRY - @ OVĀC -a / </s><s> ASMIN PRADEŚ -e MAHĀRĀJ -a BODHISATTV -ena MAH -ā @ MAITR -ī @ SAHĀY -ena SAKAL -aṃ MĀR -a @ BAL -aṃ JITV - @ ĀNUTTAR -ā SAMYAKSAMBODH -ir ABHISAMBUDDH -ā / </s><s> ĀH -a ca / </s><s> iha MUN -i @ VṚṢABH -eṇa BODH -i @ MŪL -e NAMUC -i @ BAL -aṃ VIKṚT -aṃ NIRAST -am āśu / IDAM a @ MṚT -a @ MUD - @ ĀRAM - @ AGRY -a @ BODH -i hy ADHIGAT -am a @

line.left: -i @ MAN -ā UVĀC -a / </s><s> MĀNUṢY -aṃ SAPHAL -ī @ KṚT -aṃ ṛtu ŚAT -ai RIṢṬ -ena yat PRĀPY -ate RĀJY - @ AIŚVARY -a @ GUṆ -aiś CAL -aiś ca VIBHAV -aiḥ SĀR -aṃ GṚHĪT -aṃ PAR -aṃ / </s><s> LOK -aṃ CAITY -a @ ŚAT -air ALAṄKṚT -am IDAṂ svetā BHRAK -ūṭa PRABH -aiḥ asy ĀDY -ā @ PRATIM -asya ŚĀSAN -a @ KṚT -e kiṃ no KṚT -aṃ DUṢKAR -aṃ // </s><s> iti // </s><s> YĀVAD RĀJ -ā STHAVIR - @ OPAGUPT -asya PRAṆĀM -aṃ KṚTV -ā PRAKRĀNT -aḥ / </s><s> YĀVAD RĀJÑ - @ ĀŚOK -ena JĀT -au

line.left: yat PRĀPY -ate RĀJY - @ AIŚVARY -a @ GUṆ -aiś CAL -aiś ca VIBHAV -aiḥ SĀR -aṃ GṚHĪT -aṃ PAR -aṃ / </s><s> LOK -aṃ CAITY -a @ ŚAT -air ALAṄKṚT -am IDAṂ svetā BHRAK -ūṭa PRABH -aiḥ asy ĀDY -ā @ PRATIM -asya ŚĀSAN -a @ KṚT -e kiṃ no KṚT -aṃ DUṢKAR -aṃ // </s><s> iti // </s><s> YĀVAD RĀJ -ā STHAVIR - @ OPAGUPT -asya PRAṆĀM -aṃ KṚTV -ā PRAKRĀNT -aḥ / </s><s> YĀVAD RĀJÑ - @ ĀŚOK -ena JĀT -au BODH -au dh ARK -a @ CAKR -e PARINIRVĀṆ -e EKAIK -a @ ŚATASAHASR -aṃ DATT -aṃ / </s><s> tasya
line.right: -au VIŚEṢ -ataḥ PRASĀD -o JĀT -a iha BHAGAV -at ĀNUTTAR -ā SAMYAKSAMBODH -ir ABHISAMBUDDH -eti / </s><s> sa yāni VIŚEṢ -a @ YUKT -āni RATN -āni tāni BODH -iṃ PREṢ -ayati / </s><s> atha RĀJÑ -o AŚOK -asya TIṢYARAKṢIT -ā NĀM - @ ĀGR -a @ MAHIṢ -ī / </s><s> tasyā BUDDH -ir UTPANN -ā / </s><s> AYAṂ RĀJ -ā MAY -ā SĀRDH -aṃ RAT -im ANUBHAV -ati VIŚEṢ -a @ YUKT -āni ca RATN -āni BODH -au PREṢ -ayati / </s><s> tayā MĀTAṄG -ī VYĀHAR -itā / </s><s> ŚAK -yasi tvaṃ BODH -iṃ MAM -a SAPATN -īṃ PRAGHĀTAY -ituṃ / </s><s> tay ĀBHIHIT -aṃ / </s>

line.left: ŚAT -air ALAṄKṚT -am IDAṂ svetā BHRAK -ūṭa PRABH -aiḥ asy ĀDY -ā @ PRATIM -asya ŚĀSAN -a @ KṚT -e kiṃ no KṚT -aṃ DUṢKAR -aṃ // </s><s> iti // </s><s> YĀVAD RĀJ -ā STHAVIR - @ OPAGUPT -asya PRAṆĀM -aṃ KṚTV -ā PRAKRĀNT -aḥ / </s><s> YĀVAD RĀJÑ - @ ĀŚOK -ena JĀT -au BODH -au dh ARK -a @ CAKR -e PARINIRVĀṆ -e EKAIK -a @ ŚATASAHASR -aṃ DATT -aṃ / </s><s> tasya BODH -au VIŚEṢ -ataḥ PRASĀD -o JĀT -a iha BHAGAV -at ĀNUTTAR -ā SAMYAKSAMBODH -ir ABHISAMBUDDH -eti / </s><s> sa yāni VIŚEṢ -a @ YUKT -āni RATN -āni tāni

line.left: PATIT -aḥ / </s><s> YĀV -aj JAL -a @ SEK -aṃ DATT -vā UTTHĀPIT -aḥ / </s><s> atha RĀJ -ā KATHAṂ cit SAṂJÑ -ām UPALABHY -a PRARUD -ann UVĀC -a / </s><s> DṚṢṬ -vā nv AHAṂ taṃ DRUM -a @ RĀJ -a @ MŪL -aṃ JĀN -āmi DṚṢṬ -o ADY -a MAY -ā SVAYAMBH -ūḥ / </s><s> NĀTH -ad RŪM -e c <g/> ^ <g/> aiva GAT -e PRAṆĀŚ -aṃ PRĀṆ -āḥ PRAYĀS -yanti MAM ^ <g/> āpi nā ŚAṂ / </s><s> atha TIṢYARAKṢIT -ā RĀJĀN -aṃ ŚOK - @ ĀRT -am a @ VEKṢY - @ OVĀC -a / </s><s> DEV -a <g/> ; </s><s> yadi

line.left: BHAVANT -ī na tathā / </s><s> 1 — 3 </s><s> KATHAṂ TARH -i <g/> ; DARŚIT -a @ VIṢAY -atvāt </s><s> VṚTT -i @ SĀRŪPY -am ITAR -a @ TRA // </s><s> VYUTTHĀN -e yāś CITT -a @ VṚTT -ayas TAD a @ VIŚIṢṬ -a @ VṚTT -iḥ PURUṢ -aḥ / </s><s> tathā ca SŪTR -am EK -am eva DARŚAN -aṃ KHYĀT -ir eva DARŚAN -am iti / </s><s> CITT -am a @ YASK - @ ĀNTAM -aṇi KALP -aṃ SAṂNIDH -i @ MĀTR - @ OPAKĀR -i DṚŚY -atvena SVAṂ BHAV -ati PURUṢ -asya SVĀM -inaḥ / </s><s> tas MĀC CITT -a @ VṚTT -i @
line.right: -e PURUṢ -as YĀN ādiḥ SAṂBANDH -o HET -uḥ / </s><s> 1 — 4 </s><s> tāḥ punar NIRODDHAVY -ā BAH -utve SAT i CITT -asya </s><s> VṚTT -ayaḥ PAÑCATAY -yaḥ KLIṢṬ -ā @ KLIṢṬ -āḥ // </s><s> KLEŚ -a @ HET -ukāḥ KARM - @ ĀŚAY -a @ PRACAY -e KṢETR -ī @ BHŪT āḥ KLIṢṬ -āḥ / </s><s> khy ĀTIVIṢ -ayā GUṆ - @ ĀDHIKĀR -a @ VIRODH -inyo a @ KLIṢṬ -āḥ / </s><s> KLIṢṬ -a @ PRAVĀH -a @ PATIT -ā apy a @ KLIṢṬ -āḥ / </s><s> KLIṢṬ -a @ CCHIDR -eṣv apy a @ KLIṢṬ -ā BHAV -anti / </s><s> a @ KLIṢṬ

line.left: / </s><s> tāḥ KLIṢṬ -āś cā KLIṢṬ -āś ca PAÑCADH -ā VṚTT -ayaḥ / </s><s> 1 — 5 </s><s> PRAMĀṆ -a @ VIPARYAY -a @ VIKALPAN -idrā SMṚT -ayaḥ // </s><s> 1 — 6 </s><s> PRATYAKṢ - @ ĀNUM -ān ĀGAM -āḥ PRAMĀṆ -āni // </s><s> INDRIY -a @ PRAṆĀL -i @ KAY -ā CITT -asya BĀHY -a @ VAST - @ ŪPARĀG -āt TAD VIṢAY -ā SĀMĀNY -a @ VIŚEṢ - @ ĀTM -ano ARTH -asya VIŚEṢ - @ ĀVADHĀRAṆ -a @ PRADHĀN -ā VṚTT -iḥ PRATYAKṢ -aṃ PRAMĀṆ -am / </s><s> PHAL -am a @ VIŚIṢṬ -aḥ PAURUṢEY -aś CITT -a @ VṚTT -i @

line.right: -i @ PRAṆIDH -i @ CITT -asya SAṂSĀR -e api PHAL -aṃ MAHAT / na tva VICCHINN -a @ PUṆY -atvaṃ yathā PRASTHĀN -a @ CETAS -aḥ // </s><s> yataḥ PRABHṚT -y @ APARYANT -a — SATTVADHĀT -u PRAMOKṢAṆ -e / SAMĀDAD -āti tac CITT -am a @ NIVARTY -ena CETAS -ā // </s><s> tataḥ PRABHṚT -i SUPT -asya PRAMATT -as YĀP -yan EKAŚ -aḥ / a @ VICCHINN -āḥ PUṆY -a @ DHĀR -āḥ PRAVART -ante nabhaḥ SAM -āḥ // </s><s> IDAṂ SUBĀH -u PṚCCH -āyāṃ s OPAPATTIK -a @ MUKT -avān / HĪN - @ ĀDHIMUKT -i @ SATTV - @

line.left: @ ODAY -a @ SAṂKHY -ayā sa KALP -ān NARAK -eṣv āvasat <g/> ^ <g/> īti NĀTH -a ĀH -a // </s><s> atha yasya MAN -aḥ PRAS -ā @ DAM -eti PRAS -a @ VETT -asya tato a @ DHIK aṃ PHAL -aṃ / MAHAT ā hi BAL -ena PĀP -a @ KARM -a JIN -ap UTTR -eṣu ŚUBH -aṃ tva YATN -ataḥ // </s><s> teṣāṃ ŚARĪR -āṇi NAMASKAR -omi yat RODIT -aṃ TAD VAR -a @ CITT -a @ RATN -aṃ / YATR - @ ĀPAKĀR -o api SUKH - @ ĀNUBANDH -ī SUKHĀKAR -āṃs tān ŚARAṆ -aṃ PRAYĀM -i // </s><s>
line.right: -i @ CARY - @ ĀVATĀR -e BODHICITT - @ ĀNUŚAṂS -ā NĀM -a PRATHAM -aḥ PARICCHED -aḥ // **************************************************************** tac CITT -a @ RATN -a @ GRAHAṆ -āya SAMYA -k PŪJ -āṃ KAROM -yeṣa TATHĀGAT -ānāṃ / SAD DHARM -a @ RATN -asya ca NIRMAL -asya BUDDH - @ ĀTM -a @ JĀN -āṃ ca GUṆ - @ ODADH -īnāṃ // </s><s> YĀV -anti PUṢP -āṇi PHAL -āni c <g/> ^ <g/> aiva BHAIṢAJY -a @ JĀT -āni ca yāni SANT -i / RATN -āni YĀV -anti ca SANT -i LOK -e JAL -āni ca SVACCH -a @ MANORAM -āṇi

line.left: HAS -antu VILAS -antu ca / DATT -as tebhyo MAY -ā KĀY -aś CINTAY -ā kiṃ MAY -ānayā // </s><s> KĀR -ayantu ca KARM -āṇi yāni teṣāṃ SUKHĀVAH -aṃ / an @ ARTH -aḥ KASYACIN mā BHŪN MĀM - @ ĀLAMBY -a KAD -ā @ CAN -a // </s><s> yeṣāṃ KRUDDH -ā @ PRASANN -ā vā MĀM - @ ĀLAMBY -a MAT -ir BHAV -et / teṣāṃ sa eva HET -uḥ syān NITY -aṃ SARVĀRTHASIDDH -aye // </s><s> ABHYĀKHY -āsyanti māṃ ye ca ye c ĀNY -e apy APAKĀR -iṇaḥ / UTPRĀS -a @ KĀS - @ TATH -ānye api SARV -e syur
line.right: -i @ BHĀG -inaḥ // </s><s> a @ NĀTH -ānām AHAṂ NĀTH -aḥ SĀRTHAVĀH -aś ca YĀY -ināṃ / pā REP - @ SŪN -āṃ ca nau BHŪT aḥ SET -uḥ SAṄKRAM -a eva ca // </s><s> DĪP - @ ĀRTH -inām AHAṂ DĪP -aḥ ŚAYY -ā ŚAYY - @ ĀRTH -inām AHAṂ / DĀS - @ ĀRTH -inām AHAṂ DĀS -o BHAV -eyaṃ SARV -a @ DEH -ināṃ // </s><s> CINT -ā @ MAṆ -ir BHADR -a @ GHAṬ -aḥ SIDDH -a @ VIDY -ā MAHAUṢADH -iḥ / BHAV -eyaṃ KALP -a @ VṚKṢ -aś ca KĀM -a @ DHEN -uś ca

line.left: -a @ MAH - @ ĀRAV -iḥ / SAD DHARM -a @ KṢĪR -a @ MATHAN -ān NAVAN -ītaṃ SAMUTTHIT -aṃ // </s><s> SUKH -a @ BHOG -a @ BUBHUKṢIT -asya vā JAN -a @ SĀRTH -asya BHAV - @ ĀDHV -a @ CĀR -iṇaḥ / SUKH -a @ SATR -a @ MID -aṃ hy UPASTHIT -aṃ SAKAL - @ ĀBHYĀGAT -a @ SATTV -a @ TARPAṆ -aṃ // </s><s> JAG -a @ DADY -a NIMANTRIT -aṃ MAY -ā SUGAT -atvena SUKH -ena c ĀNTAR ā / PURAT -aḥ KHAL -u SARVAT -āyinām ABHINAND -antu sur ĀSUR - @ ĀD -ayaḥ // </s><s>
line.right: -i @ CARY - @ ĀVATĀR -e BODHICITT -a @ PARIGRAH -o NĀM -a TṚTĪY -aḥ PARICCHED -aḥ // **************************************************************** evaṃ GṚHĪT -vā su @ DṚḌH -aṃ BODHICITT -aṃ JIN - @ ĀTM -a @ J -aḥ / ŚIKṢ -ān ATIKRAM -e YATN -aṃ KUR yān NITY -am a @ TANDRIT -aḥ // </s><s> sa HAS -ā yat SAMĀRABDH -aṃ SAMYA -g yada VICĀR -itaṃ / TATR -a KUR yān NAV -ety evaṃ PRATIJÑĀY ^ <g/> āpi YUJ -yate // </s><s> VICĀRIT -aṃ tu yad BUDDH -air MAHĀPRĀJÑ -aiś ca TAT SUT -aiḥ / MAY ^ <g/> āpi ca yathā ŚAKT -i

line.left: ENDRIY -a @ GAṆ -e n ĀPY ANTARĀL -e STHIT -ā nāto ANYATR -a KUH -a @ STHIT -āḥ punar ime MATHN -anti KṚTSN -aṃ JAGAT / MĀY ^ <g/> aiveya MAT -o VIMUÑC -a HṚDAY -a @ TRĀS -aṃ bha JASV - @ ODYAM -aṃ PRAJÑ - @ ĀRTH -aṃ k IMAK -āṇḍa eva NARAK -eṣv ĀTM -ānam ĀBĀDH -ase // </s><s> evaṃ VINIŚCITY -a KAROM -i YATN -aṃ YATHOKT -a @ ŚIKṢ -ā @ PRATIPATT -i @ HET -oḥ / VAIDY - @ OPADEŚ -āc ca LAT -aḥ KUT -o asti BHAIṢAJY -a @ SĀDHY -asya NIRĀMAY -atvam // </s><s>
line.right: -i @ CARY - @ ĀVATĀR -e BODHISATTV -a @ ŚIKṢ -ā CATURTH -aḥ PARICCHED -aḥ // **************************************************************** ŚIKṢ -āṃ RAKṢIT -u KĀM -ena CITT -aṃ RAKṢY -aṃ PRAYATN -ataḥ / na ŚIKṢ -ā RAKṢIT -uṃ ŚAKY -ā CAL -aṃ CITT -a @ MAR -a @ KṢAT -ā // </s><s> a @ DĀNT -ā MATT -a @ MĀTAṄG -ā na KURV -ant <g/> ^ <g/> īha tāṃ VYATH -ām / KAR -oti yāma VĪC -yādau MUKT -aś CITT -a @ MATAṄG -a @ J -aḥ // </s><s> BADDH -aś CECC -ita @ MĀTAṄG -aḥ SMṚT -i @ RAJJ -vā SAMANT -ataḥ /

line.left: AVATIṢṬH -ate // </s><s> PŪRV -aṃ TĀVAD IDAṂ CITT -aṃ SAD OPASTHĀPY -am ĪDṚŚ -am / NIRINDRIY -eṇ eva MAY -ā STHĀTAVY -aṃ KĀṢṬH -a @ VATS -adā // </s><s> NIṢPHAL -ā NETR -a @ VIKṢEP -ā na KARTTAVY -āḥ KAD -ā @ CAN -a / NIDHYĀY -antīva SATAT -aṃ KĀRY -ā DṚṢṬ - @ IRAD -ho GAT -ā // </s><s> DṚṢṬ -i @ VIŚRĀM -a @ HET -ostu DIŚ -aḥ PAŚY -et KAD -ā @ CAN -a / ĀBHĀS -a @ MĀTR -aṃ DṚṢṬ -vā ca SVĀGAT - @ ĀRTH -aṃ VILOKAY -et // </s><s> MĀRG - @ ĀD -au BHAY -a @
line.right: - @ ĀRTH -aṃ MUH -uḥ PAŚY -ec CATU -r DIŚ -am / DIŚ -o VIŚRAMY -a VĪKṢET -a PAR - @ ĀVṚTY eva PṚṢṬHAT -aḥ // </s><s> sared APASAR -edv <g/> ^ <g/> āpi PUR -aḥ PAŚC -ān NIRŪPY -a ca / evaṃ SARV -āsv AVASTH -āsu KĀRY -aṃ BUDDHV -ā SAMĀCAR -et // </s><s> KĀY -en <g/> ^ <g/> aivam AVASTH -eyam ity ĀKṢIPY -a KRIY -āṃ punaḥ / KATHAṂ KĀY -aḥ STHIT -a iti DRAṢṬAVY -aṃ punar ANTAR ā // </s><s> NIRŪPY -aḥ SARV -a @ YATN -ena CITT -a @ MATT -a @ DVIP -as tathā / DHARMACINT -ā

line.left: PRAVART -ayet / ŚEṢ - @ ĀPATT -i @ ŚAM -as tena BODHICITT -a @ JIN - @ ĀŚRAY -āt // </s><s> yā AVASTH -āḥ PRAPAD -yeta SVAY -aṃ PAR -a @ VAŚ -o api vā / tāsv AVASTH -āsu yāḥ ŚIKṢ -āḥ ŚIKṢ -ettā eva YATN -ataḥ // </s><s> na hi TAD VID -yate KIṂCID yanna ŚIKṢY -aṃ JIN - @ ĀTM -ajaiḥ / na TAD asti na yat PUṆY -am evaṃ VIHAR -ataḥ SAT aḥ // </s><s> PĀRAMPARY -eṇa SĀKṢĀD vā SATTV - @ ĀRTH -aṃ n ĀNYAD - @ ĀCAR -et / SATTV -ānām eva c ĀRTHĀY -a SARV -aṃ
line.right: -āya NĀMAY -et // </s><s> sadā KALYĀṆAMITR -aṃ ca JĪVIT - @ ĀRTH -e api na TYAJ -et / BODHISATTV -a @ VRAT - @ ADHAR -aṃ MAHĀYĀN - @ ĀRTH -a @ KOVID -am // </s><s> ŚRĪSAṂBHAV -a @ VIMOKṢ -āc ca ŚIKṢ -edyad GUR -u VARTAN -am / ETAC -c ĀNYACC -a BUDDH - @ OKT -aṃ JÑEY -aṃ SŪTRĀNT -a @ VĀCAN -āt // </s><s> ŚIKṢ -āḥ SŪTR -eṣu DṚŚ -yante TASMĀT SŪTR -āṇi VĀCAY -et / ĀKĀŚAGARBH -e SŪTR -e ca MŪLĀPATT -īr NIRŪPAY -et // </s><s> ŚIKṢĀSAMUCCAY -o AVAŚY -aṃ DRAṢṬAVY -aś ca punaḥ punaḥ / VISTAR -eṇa SADĀCĀR

line.left: -a @ NĀGĀRJUN - @ ĀBADDH -aṃ DVITĪY -aṃ ca PRAYATN -ataḥ // </s><s> yato NIVĀR -yate YATR -a yad eva ca NIYUJ -yate / TALL -o @ KAC -itta RAKṢ - @ ĀRTH -aṃ ŚIKṢ -āṃ DṚṢṬ -vā SAMĀCAR -et // </s><s> ETAD eva SAM -ā @ SEN -a SAṂPRAJANY -asya LAKṢAṆ -am / yat KĀY -a @ CITT - @ ĀVASTHĀY -āḥ PRATYAVEKṢ -ā MUH -ur MUH -uḥ // </s><s> KĀY -en <g/> ^ <g/> aiva PAṬH -iṣyāmi VĀK PĀṬH -ena tu kiṃ BHAV -et / CIKITS -ā @ PĀṬH -a @ MĀTR -eṇa ROG -iṇaḥ kiṃ BHAV -iṣyati // </s><s> iti
line.right: -i @ CARY - @ ĀVATĀR -e SAṂPRAJANY -a @ RAKṢAṆ -aṃ NĀM -a PAÑCAM -aḥ PARICCHED -aḥ // **************************************************************** SARV -am ETAT su @ CARIT -aṃ DĀN -aṃ SUGAT -a @ PŪJAN -am / KṚT -aṃ KALP -a @ SAHASR - @ AIRYAT PRATIGH -aḥ PRATIH -anti TAT // </s><s> na ca DVEṢ -a @ SAM -aṃ PĀP -aṃ na ca KṢĀNT -i @ SAM -aṃ TAP -aḥ / TASMĀT KṢĀNT -iṃ PRAYATN -ena BHĀVAY -e DVIVIDH -air NAY -aiḥ // </s><s> MAN -aḥ ŚAM -aṃ na GṚHṆ -āti na PRĪT -i @ SUKH -am AŚNUT -e / na NIDR -āṃ

line.left: GUṆ -e SV -a @ SAUKHY -am api n ECCH -asi // </s><s> BODHICITT -aṃ SAMUTPĀD -ya SARV -a @ SATTV -a @ SUKH -e CCHAY -ā / SVAY -aṃ LABDH -a @ SUKH -eṣv ADY -a KASMĀT SATTV -eṣu KUP -yasi // </s><s> TRAILOKY -a @ PŪJY -aṃ BUDDHAT -vaṃ SATTV -ānāṃ KINN -a VĀÑCH -asi / SATKĀR -am ITVAR -aṃ DṚṢṬ -vā teṣāṃ kiṃ PARID -ahyase // </s><s> PUṢṆ -ātiyas tvayā POṢY -aṃ TUBH -yam eva DAD -āti saḥ / KUṬUMB -a @ JĪV -inaṃ LAV -dhvā na HṚṢ -yasi PRAKUP -yasi // </s><s> sa kiṃ n ECCHAT -i SATTV -ānāṃ yasteṣāṃ
line.right: -im ICCHAT -i / BODHICITT -aṃ KUT -as tasya yo ANY -a @ SAṂPAD i KUP -yati // </s><s> yadi tena na TAL - @ LABDH -aṃ STHIT -aṃ DĀNAPAT -er GṚH -e / SARVATH ^ <g/> āpi na TAT te asti DATT - @ ĀDATT -ena tena kim // </s><s> kiṃ VĀR -ayatu PUṆY -āni PRASANN -ān SVAG -uṇ ĀNAT -ha / LABH -a @ MĀN -o na GṚHṆ -ātu VAD -a kena na KUP -yasi // </s><s> na KEVAL -aṃ tvam ĀTM -ānaṃ KṚT -a @ PĀP -aṃ na ŚOC -asi / KṚT -a @ PUṆY -aiḥ SAH -a SPARDH -ām

line.left: -e // </s><s> yo hi yena VIN -ā n <g/> ^ <g/> āsti YASM -iṃś ca SAT i VID -yate / sa eva KĀRAṆ -aṃ tasya sa KATHAṂ VIGHN -a UC -yate // </s><s> na hi KĀL - @ OPAPANN -ena DĀNAV -i @ GHN -aḥ KṚT -o ARTH -inā / na ca PRAVRĀJ -ake PRĀPT -e PRAVRAJY -ā @ VIGHN -a UC -yate // </s><s> SULABH -ā YĀCAK -ā LOK -e DURLABH -āstv APAKĀR -iṇaḥ / yato me an @ APARĀDH -asya na KAŚCID APARĀDH -yati // </s><s> a @ ŚRAM - @ OPĀRJIT -as TASMĀD nṛhe NIDH -ir iv OTTHIT -aḥ /
line.right: -i @ CARY -ā @ SAHĀY -atvāt SPṚH - @ AṆĪY -o RIP -ur MAM -a // </s><s> MAY -ā cānena c OPĀTT -aṃ TASMĀD ETAT KṢAM -ā @ PHAL -am / etasmai PRATHAM -aṃ DEY -am ETAT PŪRV -ā KṢAM -ā yataḥ // </s><s> KṢAM -ā @ SIDDHY - @ ĀŚAY -o nāsya tena PŪJY -o na CED -ariḥ / SIDDH -i @ HET -ur UCIT -o api SAD DHARM -aḥ PŪJ -yate KATHAM // </s><s> APAKĀR - @ ĀŚAY -o asya eti ŚATR -uryadi na PŪJ -yate / ANYATH -ā me KATHAṂ KṢĀNT -ir BHIṢ -a @ JĪV -a HIT -

line.left: NARAK -a @ VYATH -ā / yat SATTV -a @ DAURMANASY -ena KṚT -ena hy ANUBHŪ -yate // </s><s> TUṢṬ -aḥ kiṃ NṚP -atir DADY -ād yad BUDDH -atva SAM -aṃ BHAV -et / yat SATTV -a @ SAUMANASY -ena KṚT -ena hy ANUBHŪ -yate // </s><s> āstāṃ BHAVIṢY -ad BUDDHAT -vaṃ SATTV - @ ĀRĀDHAN -a @ SAṂBHAV -am / ih <g/> ^ <g/> aiva SAUBHĀGY -ayaśaḥ sau STH -ityaṃ kiṃ na PAŚ -yasi // </s><s> PRĀSĀDIK -atvam ĀROGY -aṃ PRĀMODY -aṃ CIR -a @ JĪVIT -am / CAKRAVART -i @ SUKH -aṃ SPHĪT -aṃ KṢAM -ī PRĀPN -oti SAṂSAR -an // </s><s>
line.right: -i @ CARY - @ ĀVATĀR -e KṢĀNT -i @ PĀRAMIT -ā ṢAṢṬH -aḥ PARICCHED -aḥ // **************************************************************** evaṃ KṢAM -o BHAJ -ed VĪRY -aṃ VĪRY -e BODH -ir yataḥ STHIT -ā / na hi VĪRY -aṃ VIN -ā PUṆY -aṃ yathā VĀY -uṃ VIN - @ ĀGAT -iḥ // </s><s> kiṃ VĪRY -aṃ KUŚAL - @ OTSĀH -as TAD VIPAKṢ -aḥ ka UC -yate / ĀLASY -aṃ KUTSIT - @ ĀSAKT -ir VIṢĀD - @ ĀTM - @ ĀVAMANYAN -ā // </s><s> a @ VYĀPĀR -a @ SUKH - @ ĀSVĀD -a — NIDR - @ ĀPĀŚRAY -a @ TṚṢṆ -ayā

line.left: SAM -aṃ BHAV -et / yat SATTV -a @ SAUMANASY -ena KṚT -ena hy ANUBHŪ -yate // </s><s> āstāṃ BHAVIṢY -ad BUDDHAT -vaṃ SATTV - @ ĀRĀDHAN -a @ SAṂBHAV -am / ih <g/> ^ <g/> aiva SAUBHĀGY -ayaśaḥ sau STH -ityaṃ kiṃ na PAŚ -yasi // </s><s> PRĀSĀDIK -atvam ĀROGY -aṃ PRĀMODY -aṃ CIR -a @ JĪVIT -am / CAKRAVART -i @ SUKH -aṃ SPHĪT -aṃ KṢAM -ī PRĀPN -oti SAṂSAR -an // </s><s> BODH -i @ CARY - @ ĀVATĀR -e KṢĀNT -i @ PĀRAMIT -ā ṢAṢṬH -aḥ PARICCHED -aḥ // **************************************************************** evaṃ KṢAM -o BHAJ -ed VĪRY -aṃ VĪRY -e
line.right: -ir yataḥ STHIT -ā / na hi VĪRY -aṃ VIN -ā PUṆY -aṃ yathā VĀY -uṃ VIN - @ ĀGAT -iḥ // </s><s> kiṃ VĪRY -aṃ KUŚAL - @ OTSĀH -as TAD VIPAKṢ -aḥ ka UC -yate / ĀLASY -aṃ KUTSIT - @ ĀSAKT -ir VIṢĀD - @ ĀTM - @ ĀVAMANYAN -ā // </s><s> a @ VYĀPĀR -a @ SUKH - @ ĀSVĀD -a — NIDR - @ ĀPĀŚRAY -a @ TṚṢṆ -ayā / SAṂSĀR -a @ DUḤKH - @ ĀNUDVEG -ād ĀLASY -am UPAJĀ -yate // </s><s> KLEŚ -a @ VĀGURIK - @ ĀGHRĀT -aḥ PRAVIṢṬ -o JANM -a @ VĀGUR

line.left: MAH -ā @ NAD -īm / MŪḌH -a KĀL -o na NIDRĀY -ā iyaṃ na URD -ur LABH -ā punaḥ // </s><s> MUKTV -ā DHARM -a @ RAT -iṃ ŚREṢṬH -ām ANANTAR -ati SAṂTAT -im / RAT -ir AUDDHATY -ah ĀSĀD -au DUḤKH -a @ HET -au KATHAṂ tava // </s><s> a @ VIṢĀD -a @ BALAVYŪH -a — TĀTPARY - @ ĀTM -a @ VIDHEY -atā / PAR - @ ĀTM -a @ SAMAT -ā c <g/> ^ <g/> aiva PAR - @ ĀTM -a @ PARIVARTAN -am // </s><s> n <g/> ^ <g/> aiv ĀVASĀD -aḥ KARTAVY -aḥ KUT -o me
line.right: -ir ity ataḥ / YASMĀT TATHĀGAT -aḥ SATY -aṃ SATY -a @ VĀD - @ ĪDAM UKT -avān // </s><s> te apyā SAN DAṂŚ -a @ MAŚAK -ā MAKṢIK -āḥ KṚM -ayas tathā / yair UTSĀH -a @ VAŚ -āt PRĀPT -ā DUR -āpā BODH -ir UTTAM -ā // </s><s> kim UTĀHAṂ NAR -o JĀTY -ā ŚAKT -o JÑĀT -uṃ HIT -ā @ HIT -am / SARVAJÑ -a @ NĪT -yan UTSARG -ād BODH -iṃ kiṃ nāpnuyām AHAM // </s><s> ath <g/> ^ <g/> āpi HAST - @ APĀD - @ ĀD -i DĀTAVY -am iti me BHAY -am / GUR -u LĀGHAV

line.left: HET -au KATHAṂ tava // </s><s> a @ VIṢĀD -a @ BALAVYŪH -a — TĀTPARY - @ ĀTM -a @ VIDHEY -atā / PAR - @ ĀTM -a @ SAMAT -ā c <g/> ^ <g/> aiva PAR - @ ĀTM -a @ PARIVARTAN -am // </s><s> n <g/> ^ <g/> aiv ĀVASĀD -aḥ KARTAVY -aḥ KUT -o me BODH -ir ity ataḥ / YASMĀT TATHĀGAT -aḥ SATY -aṃ SATY -a @ VĀD - @ ĪDAM UKT -avān // </s><s> te apyā SAN DAṂŚ -a @ MAŚAK -ā MAKṢIK -āḥ KṚM -ayas tathā / yair UTSĀH -a @ VAŚ -āt PRĀPT -ā DUR -āpā
line.right: -ir UTTAM -ā // </s><s> kim UTĀHAṂ NAR -o JĀTY -ā ŚAKT -o JÑĀT -uṃ HIT -ā @ HIT -am / SARVAJÑ -a @ NĪT -yan UTSARG -ād BODH -iṃ kiṃ nāpnuyām AHAM // </s><s> ath <g/> ^ <g/> āpi HAST - @ APĀD - @ ĀD -i DĀTAVY -am iti me BHAY -am / GUR -u LĀGHAV -am ūḍ HATV -aṃ TAN me syād a @ VICĀR -ataḥ // </s><s> CHETTAVY -aś c <g/> ^ <g/> āsmi BHETTAVY -o DĀH -yaḥ PĀṬY -o apyan EKAŚ -aḥ / KALP -a @ KOṬĪR -a @ SAṂKHYEY -ā na ca BODH -ir BHAV -iṣyati // </s>

line.left: SAMAT -ā c <g/> ^ <g/> aiva PAR - @ ĀTM -a @ PARIVARTAN -am // </s><s> n <g/> ^ <g/> aiv ĀVASĀD -aḥ KARTAVY -aḥ KUT -o me BODH -ir ity ataḥ / YASMĀT TATHĀGAT -aḥ SATY -aṃ SATY -a @ VĀD - @ ĪDAM UKT -avān // </s><s> te apyā SAN DAṂŚ -a @ MAŚAK -ā MAKṢIK -āḥ KṚM -ayas tathā / yair UTSĀH -a @ VAŚ -āt PRĀPT -ā DUR -āpā BODH -ir UTTAM -ā // </s><s> kim UTĀHAṂ NAR -o JĀTY -ā ŚAKT -o JÑĀT -uṃ HIT -ā @ HIT -am / SARVAJÑ -a @ NĪT -yan UTSARG -ād
line.right: -iṃ kiṃ nāpnuyām AHAM // </s><s> ath <g/> ^ <g/> āpi HAST - @ APĀD - @ ĀD -i DĀTAVY -am iti me BHAY -am / GUR -u LĀGHAV -am ūḍ HATV -aṃ TAN me syād a @ VICĀR -ataḥ // </s><s> CHETTAVY -aś c <g/> ^ <g/> āsmi BHETTAVY -o DĀH -yaḥ PĀṬY -o apyan EKAŚ -aḥ / KALP -a @ KOṬĪR -a @ SAṂKHYEY -ā na ca BODH -ir BHAV -iṣyati // </s><s> IDAṂ tu me PARIMIT -aṃ DUḤKH -aṃ SAṂBODH -i @ SĀDHAN -am / NAṢṬ -a @ ŚALY -a @ VYATH - @ ĀPOH -e TAD UTPĀDAN -a @

line.left: PRĀPT -ā DUR -āpā BODH -ir UTTAM -ā // </s><s> kim UTĀHAṂ NAR -o JĀTY -ā ŚAKT -o JÑĀT -uṃ HIT -ā @ HIT -am / SARVAJÑ -a @ NĪT -yan UTSARG -ād BODH -iṃ kiṃ nāpnuyām AHAM // </s><s> ath <g/> ^ <g/> āpi HAST - @ APĀD - @ ĀD -i DĀTAVY -am iti me BHAY -am / GUR -u LĀGHAV -am ūḍ HATV -aṃ TAN me syād a @ VICĀR -ataḥ // </s><s> CHETTAVY -aś c <g/> ^ <g/> āsmi BHETTAVY -o DĀH -yaḥ PĀṬY -o apyan EKAŚ -aḥ / KALP -a @ KOṬĪR -a @ SAṂKHYEY -ā na ca
line.right: -ir BHAV -iṣyati // </s><s> IDAṂ tu me PARIMIT -aṃ DUḤKH -aṃ SAṂBODH -i @ SĀDHAN -am / NAṢṬ -a @ ŚALY -a @ VYATH - @ ĀPOH -e TAD UTPĀDAN -a @ DUḤKH -avat // </s><s> SARV -e api VAIDY -āḥ KURV -anti KRIY -ā @ DUḤKH -air aro GAT -ām / TASMĀD BAH -ūni DUḤKH -āni HANT -uṃ SOḌHAV - @ YAMAL -pakam // </s><s> KRIY -ām IMĀM -apy UCIT -āṃ VAR -a @ VAIDY -o na DATT -avān / MADHUR -eṇ OPACĀR -eṇa CIKITS -ati MAH - @ ĀTUR -ān // </s><s> ādau ŚĀK -ād IDĀN -e api NIYOJ -ayati NĀYAK

line.left: na BHAVEDIT -i // </s><s> SAṂSARG -aṃ KARM -a vā PRĀPT -am ICCH -edetena HETUN -ā / KATHAṂ NĀM -āsv AVASTH -āsu SMṚT -y @ ABHYĀS -o BHAVEDIT -i // </s><s> LAGH -uṃ KUR -yāt TATH - @ ĀTM -ānam a @ PRAMĀD -a @ KATH -āṃ SMAR -an / KARM - @ ĀGAM -ād yathā PŪRV -aṃ SAJJ -aḥ SARVATR -a VART -ate // </s><s> yath <g/> ^ <g/> aiva TŪLAK -aṃ VĀY -or GAMAN - @ ĀGAMAN -e VAŚ -am / TATH - @ OTSĀH -a @ VAŚ -aṃ YĀY -ād ṚDDH -iś c <g/> ^^ <g/> aivaṃ SAMṚDH -yati // </s><s>
line.right: -i @ CARY - @ ĀVATĀR -e VĪRY -a @ PĀRAMIT -ā NĀM -a SAPTAM -aḥ PARICCHED -aḥ // **************************************************************** VARDHAYIT -v <g/> ^ <g/> aivam UTSĀH -aṃ SAMĀDH -au STHĀPAY -en MAN -aḥ / VIKṢIPT -a @ CITT -as tu NAR -aḥ KLEŚ -a @ DAṂṢṬR - @ ĀNTAR e STHIT -aḥ // </s><s> KĀY -a @ CITT -a @ VIVEK -ena VIKṢEP -asya na SAṂBHAV -aḥ / tas MĀLL -okaṃ PARITYAJY -a VITARK -ān PARIVARJAY -et // </s><s> SNEH -ān na TYAJ -yate LOK -o LĀBH - @ ĀD -iṣu ca TṚṢṆ -ayā / TASMĀD ETAT PARITYĀG -e VIDV -ān

line.left: @ LAV -a @ GRAH -aḥ // </s><s> tasy ĀSVĀD -ala VASY - @ ĀRTH -e yaḥ PAŚ -or apya DURLABH -aḥ / HAT -ā DAIV -a @ HAT -e NEY -aṃ KṢAṆ -a @ SAṂPAT su @ DURLABH -ā // </s><s> AVAŚY -aṃ GANT -ur ALP -asya NARAK - @ ĀD -i @ PRAPĀT -inaḥ / KĀY -asy ĀRTH -e KṚT -o yo AYAṂ SARV -a @ KĀL -aṃ PARIŚRAM -aḥ // </s><s> tataḥ KOṬ -i @ ŚAT -en <g/> ^ <g/> āpi ŚRAM -a @ BHĀG -ena BUDDHAT -ā / CARY -ā @ DUḤKH -ān MAH -ad DUḤKH -aṃ sā ca
line.right: -ir na KĀMIN -ām // </s><s> na ŚASTR -aṃ na VIṢAṂ n ĀGN -ir na PRAPĀT -o na VAIRIṆ -aḥ / KĀM -ānām upamāṃ yānti NARAK -ādi VYATH -ā @ SMṚT -eḥ // </s><s> evam UDVIJ -ya KĀM -ebhyo VIVEK -e JANAY -ed RAT -im / KALAHĀY -āsa ŚŪNY -āsu ŚĀNT -āsu VAN -a @ BHŪM -iṣu // </s><s> DHANY -aiḥ ŚAŚĀṄK -a @ KAR -a @ CANDAN -a @ ŚĪTAL -eṣu RAMY -eṣu HARMY -a @ VIPUL -eṣu ŚIL -ā @ TAL -eṣu / NIḤŚABD -a @ SAUMY -a @ VAN -a @ MĀRUT -a @ VĪJYAMĀN -aiḥ CAṂKRAM -yate PARAHIT -āya

line.left: ĀYAM i CCHANT -i te api kas MĀN -na me PRIY -āḥ // </s><s> tasmān MAY - @ ĀNAPEKṢ -eṇa KĀY -as TYAKT -o JAG -ad DHIT -e / ato AYAṂ BAH -u DOṢ -o api DHĀR -yate KARM -a @ BHĀṆḌ -avat // </s><s> te NĀL -aṃ LOK -a @ CARIT -aiḥ PAṆḌIT - @ ĀNAN -u YĀMY - @ AHAM / a @ PRAMĀD -a @ KATH -āṃ SMṚT -vā STYĀNAMIDDH -aṃ NIVĀR -ayan // </s><s> TASMĀD ĀVARAṆ -aṃ HANT -uṃ SAMĀDHĀN -aṃ KAROM -y @ AHAM / VIMĀRG -āc CITT -am ĀKṚṢY -a sv ĀLAMBAN -a @ NIRANTAR -am // </s><s>
line.right: -i @ CARY - @ ĀVATĀR -e DHYĀN -a @ PĀRAMIT -ā AṢṬAM -aḥ PARICCHED -aḥ // **************************************************************** imaṃ PAR -i @ KAR -aṃ SARV -aṃ PRAJÑ - @ ĀRTH -aṃ hi MUN -ir JAG -au / TASMĀD UTPĀDAY -et PRAJÑ -āṃ DUḤKHAN -i @ VṚTT -i @ KĀṄKṢ -ayā // </s><s> SAṂVṚT -iḥ PARAMĀRTH -aś ca SATY -a @ DVAY -am IDAṂ MAT -aṃ / BUDDH -er a @ GOCAR -as TATTV -aṃ BUDDH -iḥ SAṂVṚT -i @ RUC -yate // </s><s> TATR -a LOK -o DVIDH -ā DṚṢṬ -o YOG -ī PRĀKṚT -akas tathā / TATR -a PRĀKṚT -ako LOK

line.left: -au CITT -ā @ BHĀV -ān na PĀPAK -aṃ / CITT -a @ MĀY -ā @ SAMET -e tu PĀP -a @ PUṆY -a @ SAMUDBHAV -aḥ // </s><s> MANTR - @ ĀD -īnām a @ SĀMARTHY -ān na MĀY -ā @ CITT -a @ SAṂBHAV -aḥ / s <g/> ^ <g/> āpi NĀN -ā @ VIDH -ā MĀY -ā NĀN -ā @ PRATYAY -a @ SAṂBHAV -ā // </s><s> NAIK -asya SARV -a @ SĀMARTHY -aṃ PRATYAY -asyāsti KUT - @ RACIT / NIRVṚT -aḥ PARAMĀRTH -ena SAṂVṚTY -ā yadi SAṂSAR -et // </s><s> BUDDH -o api SAṂSAR -ed evaṃ tataḥ kiṃ
line.right: -i @ CARY -ayā / PRATYAY -ānām ANUCCHED -e MĀY - @ ĀPY UCCHID -yate na hi // </s><s> PRATYAY -ānāṃ tu VICCHED -āt SAṂVṚTY ^ <g/> āpi na SAṂBHAV -aḥ / yadā na BHRĀNT -ir APYAST -i MĀY -ā ken OPALABH -yate // </s><s> yadā MĀY ^ <g/> aiva te n <g/> ^ <g/> āsti tadā kim UPALABH -yate / CITT -asy <g/> ^ <g/> aiva sa ĀKĀR -o YADYAP -y @ ANY -o asti TATTV -ataḥ // </s><s> CITT -am eva yadā MĀY -ā tadā kiṃ kena DṚŚ -yate / UKT -aṃ ca LOKANĀTH -ena CITT -aṃ CITT -aṃ na PAŚ

line.left: NĀST -īti PRAKALP -yate / tadā NIRĀŚRAY -o a @ BHĀV -aḥ KATHAṂ TIṢṬH -en MAT -eḥ PUR -aḥ // </s><s> yadā na BHĀV -o nā BHĀV -o MAT -eḥ SAṂTIṢṬHAT -e PUR -aḥ / TADĀN -ya @ GAT -ya @ BHĀV -ena NIRĀLAMB -ā PRAŚĀM -yate // </s><s> CINT -ā @ MAṆ -iḥ KALP -a @ TAR -ur yath ECCH -ā @ PARIPŪRAṆ -aḥ / VINEY -a @ PRAṆIDHĀN -ābhyāṃ JIN -a @ BIMB -aṃ TATH -ekṣyate // </s><s> yathā GĀRUḌIK -aḥ STAMBH -aṃ SĀDHAY -itvā VINAŚ -yati / sa tasmiṃś CIR -a @ NAṢṬ -e api VIṢĀD -īn UPAŚĀMAY -et // </s><s>
line.right: -i @ CARY - @ ĀNURŪP -yeṇa JIN -a @ STAMBH -o api SĀDHIT -aḥ / KAR -oti SARV -a @ KĀRY -āṇi BODHISATTV -e api NIRVṚT -e // </s><s> a @ CITT -ake KṚT -ā PŪJ -ā KATHAṂ PHAL -avatī BHAV -et / TULY ^ <g/> aiva PAṬH -yate YASMĀT TIṢṬHAT -o NIRVṚT -asya ca // </s><s> ĀGAM -āc ca PHAL -aṃ TATR -a SAṂVṚTY -ā TATTV -ato api vā / SATY -a @ BUDDH -e KṚT -ā PŪJ -ā SAPHAL -eti KATHAṂ yathā // </s><s> SATY -a @ DARŚANAT -o MUKT -iḥ ŚŪNYAT - @ ĀDARŚAN -ena kim / na VIN

line.left: - @ ĀNURŪP -yeṇa JIN -a @ STAMBH -o api SĀDHIT -aḥ / KAR -oti SARV -a @ KĀRY -āṇi BODHISATTV -e api NIRVṚT -e // </s><s> a @ CITT -ake KṚT -ā PŪJ -ā KATHAṂ PHAL -avatī BHAV -et / TULY ^ <g/> aiva PAṬH -yate YASMĀT TIṢṬHAT -o NIRVṚT -asya ca // </s><s> ĀGAM -āc ca PHAL -aṃ TATR -a SAṂVṚTY -ā TATTV -ato api vā / SATY -a @ BUDDH -e KṚT -ā PŪJ -ā SAPHAL -eti KATHAṂ yathā // </s><s> SATY -a @ DARŚANAT -o MUKT -iḥ ŚŪNYAT - @ ĀDARŚAN -ena kim / na VIN -ānena MĀRG -eṇa
line.right: -ir ity ĀGAM -o yataḥ // </s><s> NAN -va SIDDH -aṃ MAHĀYĀN -aṃ KATHAṂ SIDDH -ast VAD - @ ĀGAM -aḥ / YASM -ād UBHAY -a @ SIDDH -o asau na SIDDH -o asau tav ĀDIT -aḥ // </s><s> yat PRATYAY -ā ca TATR -ā @ STH -ā MAHĀYĀN -e api tāṃ KUR -u / ANY - @ OBHAY - @ EṢṬ -a @ SATY -atve ve DĀD -er api SATY -atā // </s><s> sa VIVĀD -aṃ MAHĀYĀN -am iti CED - @ ĀGAM -aṃ TYAJ -a / TĪRTHIK -aiḥ sa VIVĀD -atvāt svaiḥ PAR -aiś cā GAM - @ ĀNTAR am // </s>

line.left: MANYANT -a evam apy ATID -uḥ STHIT -āḥ // </s><s> a @ JAR -ā @ MAR -a @ LĪL -ānām evaṃ VIH -a @ RAT -āṃ SAT ām / ĀYĀS -yanty ĀPAD -o GHOR -āḥ KṚTV -ā MARAṆ -am AGRAT -aḥ // </s><s> evaṃ DUḤKH - @ ĀGN -i @ TAPT -ānāṃ ŚĀNT -iṃ KUR -yām AHAṂ KAD -ā / PUṆY -a @ MEGH -a @ SAMUDBHŪT -aiḥ SUKH - @ OPAKARAṆ -aiḥ SVAK -aiḥ // </s><s> KAD - @ OPALAMBH -a @ DṚṢṬ -ibhyo DEŚAY -iṣyāmi ŚŪNYAT -ām / SAṂVṚTY - @ ĀNUPALAMBH -ena PUṆY -a @ SAṂBHĀR -am ĀDAR -āt // </s><s>
line.right: -i @ CARY - @ ĀVATĀR -e PRAJÑĀPĀRAMIT -ā NĀM -a NAVAM -aḥ PARICCHED -aḥ // **************************************************************** BODH -i @ CARY - @ ĀVATĀR -aṃ me yad VICINTAY -ataḥ ŚUBH -am / tena SARV -aṃ JAN -āḥ SANT -u BODH -i @ CARY -ā VIBHŪṢAṆ -āḥ // </s><s> SARV -āsu DIKṢ -u YĀV -antaḥ KĀY -a @ CITT -a @ VYATH - @ ĀTUR -āḥ / te PRĀPN -uvantu MAT - @ PUṆY -aiḥ SUKH -a @ PRĀMODY -a @ SĀGAR -ān // </s><s> ĀSAṂSĀR -aṃ SUKH -a @ JYĀN -ir m ĀBHŪT -teṣāṃ KAD -ā @ CAN -a / BODHISATTV -a

line.left: -ānām evaṃ VIH -a @ RAT -āṃ SAT ām / ĀYĀS -yanty ĀPAD -o GHOR -āḥ KṚTV -ā MARAṆ -am AGRAT -aḥ // </s><s> evaṃ DUḤKH - @ ĀGN -i @ TAPT -ānāṃ ŚĀNT -iṃ KUR -yām AHAṂ KAD -ā / PUṆY -a @ MEGH -a @ SAMUDBHŪT -aiḥ SUKH - @ OPAKARAṆ -aiḥ SVAK -aiḥ // </s><s> KAD - @ OPALAMBH -a @ DṚṢṬ -ibhyo DEŚAY -iṣyāmi ŚŪNYAT -ām / SAṂVṚTY - @ ĀNUPALAMBH -ena PUṆY -a @ SAṂBHĀR -am ĀDAR -āt // </s><s> BODH -i @ CARY - @ ĀVATĀR -e PRAJÑĀPĀRAMIT -ā NĀM -a NAVAM -aḥ PARICCHED -aḥ // ****************************************************************
line.right: -i @ CARY - @ ĀVATĀR -aṃ me yad VICINTAY -ataḥ ŚUBH -am / tena SARV -aṃ JAN -āḥ SANT -u BODH -i @ CARY -ā VIBHŪṢAṆ -āḥ // </s><s> SARV -āsu DIKṢ -u YĀV -antaḥ KĀY -a @ CITT -a @ VYATH - @ ĀTUR -āḥ / te PRĀPN -uvantu MAT - @ PUṆY -aiḥ SUKH -a @ PRĀMODY -a @ SĀGAR -ān // </s><s> ĀSAṂSĀR -aṃ SUKH -a @ JYĀN -ir m ĀBHŪT -teṣāṃ KAD -ā @ CAN -a / BODHISATTV -a @ SUKH -aṃ PRĀPT -uṃ BHAV -aty a @ VIRAT -aṃ JAGAT // </s><s> YĀV -anto NĀRAK -āḥ KECID

line.left: // </s><s> evaṃ DUḤKH - @ ĀGN -i @ TAPT -ānāṃ ŚĀNT -iṃ KUR -yām AHAṂ KAD -ā / PUṆY -a @ MEGH -a @ SAMUDBHŪT -aiḥ SUKH - @ OPAKARAṆ -aiḥ SVAK -aiḥ // </s><s> KAD - @ OPALAMBH -a @ DṚṢṬ -ibhyo DEŚAY -iṣyāmi ŚŪNYAT -ām / SAṂVṚTY - @ ĀNUPALAMBH -ena PUṆY -a @ SAṂBHĀR -am ĀDAR -āt // </s><s> BODH -i @ CARY - @ ĀVATĀR -e PRAJÑĀPĀRAMIT -ā NĀM -a NAVAM -aḥ PARICCHED -aḥ // **************************************************************** BODH -i @ CARY - @ ĀVATĀR -aṃ me yad VICINTAY -ataḥ ŚUBH -am / tena SARV -aṃ JAN -āḥ SANT -u
line.right: -i @ CARY -ā VIBHŪṢAṆ -āḥ // </s><s> SARV -āsu DIKṢ -u YĀV -antaḥ KĀY -a @ CITT -a @ VYATH - @ ĀTUR -āḥ / te PRĀPN -uvantu MAT - @ PUṆY -aiḥ SUKH -a @ PRĀMODY -a @ SĀGAR -ān // </s><s> ĀSAṂSĀR -aṃ SUKH -a @ JYĀN -ir m ĀBHŪT -teṣāṃ KAD -ā @ CAN -a / BODHISATTV -a @ SUKH -aṃ PRĀPT -uṃ BHAV -aty a @ VIRAT -aṃ JAGAT // </s><s> YĀV -anto NĀRAK -āḥ KECID VID -yante LOKADHĀT -uṣu / SUKHĀVAT -ī SUKH - @ ĀMOD -air MODAN -tāṃ teṣu DEH -inaḥ // </s><s> ŚĪT - @ ĀRT

line.left: -a @ VṚTT -ayaḥ // </s><s> ALP - @ AUJAS -aś ca ye SATTV -ās te BHAVANT -u MAH - @ AUJAS -aḥ / BHAVANT -u RŪP -a @ SAṂPANN -ā ye VIRŪP -ās TAP -as VIN -aḥ // </s><s> yāḥ kāś CAN -a STRIY -o LOK -e PURUṢ -atvaṃ VRAJ -antu tāḥ / PRĀPN -uvantu ca tāṃ NĪC -ā HAT -a @ MĀN -ā BHAVANT -u ca // </s><s> anena MAM -a PUṆY -ena SARV -a @ SATTV -ā a @ ŚEṢ -ataḥ / VIRAMY -a SARV -a @ PĀP -ebhyaḥ KURV -antu KUŚAL -aṃ sadā // </s><s> BODHICITT -ā @ VIRAHIT -ā
line.right: -i @ CARY -ā @ PARĀYAṆ -āḥ / BUDDH -aiḥ PARIGṚHĪT -āś ca MĀR -a @ KARM -a @ VIVARJIT -āḥ // </s><s> a @ PRAMEY - @ ĀYUṢ aś c <g/> ^ <g/> aiva SARV -a @ SATTV -ā BHAVANT -u te / NITY -aṃ JĪVANT -u SUKHIT -ā MṚTY -u ŚABD -o api NAŚ -yatu // </s><s> RAMY -āḥ KALP -a @ DRUM - @ ODYĀN -aiḥ DIŚ -aḥ SARV -ā BHAVANT -u ca / BUDDH -a @ BUDDH - @ ĀTM -aj ĀKĪRṆ -ā DHARM -a @ DHV -ani MANOHAR -aiḥ // </s><s> ŚARKAR - @ ĀD -i @ VYAPET

line.left: MAM -a STHIT -ir BHŪY -āj JAG -ad DUḤKH -āni NIGHN -ataḥ // </s><s> yat KIṂCI -j JAGAT o DUḤKH -aṃ TAT SARV -aṃ MAY -i PACYAT -ām / BODHISATTV -a @ ŚUBH -aiḥ SARV -air JAGAT SUKHIT -a @ MAST -u ca // </s><s> JAG -ad DUḤKH - @ AIK -a @ BHAIṢAJY -aṃ SARV -a @ SAṂPAT SUKHĀKAR -am / LĀBH -a @ SATKĀR -a @ SAHIT -aṃ CIR -aṃ TIṢṬHAT -u ŚĀSAN -am // </s><s> MAÑJUGHOṢ -aṃ NAMAS -yāmi yat PRASĀD -ān MAT -iḥ ŚUBH -e / KALYĀṆAMITR -aṃ VAND -e AHAṂ yat PRASĀD -āc ca VARDH -ata iti // </s><s>

line.left: PRAYOG -a @ KUŚAL -aḥ RĀG -a @ DVEṢ -a @ MOH -a @ VYĀDHIK LEŚ - @ OPAKLEŚ -a @ VYĀDHIP -īḍītānāṃ bu BAL 180 SATTV -ānāṃ MĀN -a @ MAD -a @ MATT -atā VṚT -ānāṃ KĀM -a @ ŚOK -a @ BHAY -a @ KRODH - @ ĀVṚT -ānāṃ NARAK -a @ TIRYAGYON -i @ YAMALOK -a @ BHŪM -i @ PARIMOKṢAṆ - @ ĀRTH -aṃ NĀN - @ OPĀYAKAUŚALY -air NĀN -ā @ PRAKĀR -a @ YOG -aiḥ NĀN -ā @ SAMĀDH -i @ ṚDDHIVIKRĪḌIT -aiḥ SATTV -ān PARIMOC -ayati / </s><s> YĀVAD ANUTTARĀY -āṃ SAMYAK -am
line.right: -au PRATIṢṬHĀPY ĀNUPADHIŚEṢ -e NIRVĀṆ -a @ DHĀT -au PARINIRVĀP -ayati / </s><s> a @ KUŚAL -air DHAM -aiḥ PARIMOKṢ -yate / </s><s> ĀRY - @ ĀṢṬĀṄG -e MĀRG -e PRATIṢṬHĀP -ayati / </s><s> tadyathāpi KULAPUTR -āḥ CANDR -a @ MAṆḌAL -am UPĀY -ā @ KAUŚALY -a SAMANVĀGAT -aṃ yathā DHĀT -u KUŚALAMŪL -a @ VAINEY -ān SATTV -ānām ARTHĀY -a ĀTM -ānam ANTARH -itaṃ DARŚ -ayati / </s><s> ARDHACANDR - @ ĀKṚT -i @ MAṆḌAL -am UPADARŚ -ayati / </s><s> KṚṢṆAPAKṢ -a @ ŚUKLAPAKṢ -āṇy UPADARŚ -ayati / </s><s> PAR -i @ PŪRṆACANDR -a @ MAṆḌAL -am UPADARŚ -ayati / </s><s> SARV -a @ TAMO ANDHAKĀR

line.left: -i c AITAD AVOCAT / </s><s> YUV -ā @ BHY -āṃ KULAPUTR -au KĪDṚŚ -aṃ PRAṆIDHĀN -aṃ KṚT -aṃ <g/> \ DHARM -ma CINTY - @ ĀH -a // </s><s> ETAT MAM -a MĀRṢ -ā PRAṆIDHĀN -aṃ yathā HAṂ YUṢMĀK -aṃ SARV -eṣāṃ VAJRAPĀṆ -iḥ syād ANANTAR -an CĀR -ī a @ PARIBĀHY -aḥ SARV -a @ TATHĀGAT -a @ GUHY -ānām antar BĀHY -aṃ SARV -a @ BUDDH -a @ DHARM -āñ CHṚṆ -uyāṃ ADHIMUCY -a @ YAṂ PRAT -īyāṃ // </s><s> DHARMAMAT -ir ĀH -a // </s><s> ETAT MAM -a SĀLOHIT -āḥ PRAṆIDHĀN -aṃ yathā HAṂ YUṢMĀK -aṃ <g/> \ SARV -eṣāṃ
line.right: -i @ PRĀPT -ānāṃa DHARMACAKR -a @ PRAVARTTAN -e ADHYEṢAṆ -āṃ KUR -yāṃ MAM -a v ĀDHYEṢAṆ -ayā YŪY -am SARVADHARM -a @ CAKR -aṃ PRAVARTT -ayeta TĀV api ŚĀNTAMAT -e tena BHAGAV -atā VYĀKṚT -au yathā PRAṆIDHĀN -ena syāt KHAL -u punas te ŚĀNTAMAT -e ANY -aḥ sa tena KĀL -ena tena SAMAY -ena RĀJ - @ ĀBHŪT / </s><s> DHṚT -ar AṢṬR -o NĀM -a na KHAL -u punar TEVAN DRAṢṬAVY -aṃ TAT KASMĀD d HET -oḥ DĪP -aṅ KAR -aḥ sa BHAGAV -ān tena KĀL -ena DHṚT -ar AṢṬR -o NĀM -a rajābhūc CAKRAVARTT -ī ya BHŪT PUTR

line.left: ĀKĀŚ -a @ DHĀT -unā // </s><s> nabha SPHARAT -i YĀVAD dhi KĀY -a SPHARAT -i TAT SAM -aṃ YĀVAT SPHARAT -i KĀY -o hi TĀVAT SPHARAT -i vai PRABH -ā // </s><s> PRABH -ā SPHARAT -i YĀVAC ca VĀK TĀVAT SPHARAT -i PRABH -oḥ YĀVAT SPHARAT -i VĀK TĀV -ac CITT -aṃ SPHARAT -i vai GUR -oḥ // </s><s> YĀVAT SPHARAT -i CITT -aṃ hi MAITR -ī TĀVAT SPHARAT -y api / YĀVAT SPHARAT -i vai MAITR -ī JÑĀN -aṃ TĀVAT SPHARAT -y api // </s><s> YĀVAC ca SPHARAT -i JÑĀN -aṃ TĀVAT KĀY -aḥ SPHARAT -yapi TĀVAT SPHARAT -i PUṆY -ena yo
line.right: -au JANAY -et MAT -iḥ // </s><s> BODHICITT -ād dhi yat PUṆY -aṃ sa CED RŪP -i hi TAD BHAV -et / ĀKĀŚ -a @ DHĀT -uṃ sa PŪRY -ya BHŪY -a UTTAR -i TAD BHAV -et // </s><s> YĀV -āṃ hi SARV -a @ SATV -ānāṃ PUṆY -a @ SKANDH -a @ PARIGRAH -aḥ / TĀV -āṃ hi BODHISATV -asya BODHICITT -āt PRAVARTT -ate // </s><s> YĀV -āṃ hi BODHISATV -asya PUṆY -a @ SKANDH -aḥ PRAKĪRTTIT -aḥ / ato BAH -utaraṃ PUṆY -aṃ SAD DHARM -aṃ PARIGṚH -nataḥ // </s><s> SARV -a @ BUDDH -āḥ PRAYATN -ena b HĀV -eran KALP -a

line.left: // </s><s> SARV -a @ BUDDH -āḥ PRAYATN -ena b HĀV -eran KALP -a @ KOṬ -iṣu / PARYANT -aṃ n ĀDHIGACCH -eyuḥ PUṆY -aṃ SAD DHARM -m ĀDHĀRAṆ -āt // </s><s> BODHICITT -āc ca yat PUṆY -aṃ SAD DHARM -masya ca SAṂGRAH -āt / ŚŪNYAT -ām ADHIMUKT -asya kalāṃ na ARGH -ati ṢOḌAŚ -īṃ // </s><s> ŚŪNYAT -ām ADHIMUCY -eha BODHICITT -aṃ na RIÑCAT -i / DADH -āti c <g/> ^ <g/> aiva SAD DHARM -aṃ PUṆY -ānām eṣa SAṂGRAH -aḥ // </s><s> imāṃ DHARM - @ MAM -atiṃ PRĀPT -o BODHISATV -o MAHĀYAŚ -āḥ BAUDDH -aṃ GUṆ -am AVĀPN -oti sa CARAN
line.right: -i @ CĀRIK -āṃ // </s><s> BHĀṢYAMĀṆ -āsu GĀTH -āsu KṢETR -a @ KOṬ -yaḥ PRAK -an PPIT -āḥ / DEV -a @ KOṬ -ī @ SAHASR -aiś ca BHŪR - @ YYAK -oṭyaḥ PRAVĀDIT -āḥ // </s><s> SAT VAKOṬ -ī @ SAHASR -aiś ca BODH -āy OTPĀDIT -aṃ MAN -aḥ / </s><s> ŚRUTV -ā ca BUDDH -a @ MĀH - @ ĀTMY -aṃ BRŪ -vato VEGADHĀR -iṇaḥ // </s><s> a @ CINTY -aṃ STHĀN -am ETAD dhi a @ PRAMEY -am ANUTTAR -aṃ / BUDDH -ānāṃ SARVADARŚ -īnāṃ GUHY -a @ STHĀN -aṃ SVAYAṂBH -ū VĀM iti // </s><s> IDAM api ŚĀNTAMAT -e TATHĀGAT

line.left: -ām ADHIMUKT -asya kalāṃ na ARGH -ati ṢOḌAŚ -īṃ // </s><s> ŚŪNYAT -ām ADHIMUCY -eha BODHICITT -aṃ na RIÑCAT -i / DADH -āti c <g/> ^ <g/> aiva SAD DHARM -aṃ PUṆY -ānām eṣa SAṂGRAH -aḥ // </s><s> imāṃ DHARM - @ MAM -atiṃ PRĀPT -o BODHISATV -o MAHĀYAŚ -āḥ BAUDDH -aṃ GUṆ -am AVĀPN -oti sa CARAN BODH -i @ CĀRIK -āṃ // </s><s> BHĀṢYAMĀṆ -āsu GĀTH -āsu KṢETR -a @ KOṬ -yaḥ PRAK -an PPIT -āḥ / DEV -a @ KOṬ -ī @ SAHASR -aiś ca BHŪR - @ YYAK -oṭyaḥ PRAVĀDIT -āḥ // </s><s> SAT VAKOṬ -ī @ SAHASR -aiś ca
line.right: -āy OTPĀDIT -aṃ MAN -aḥ / </s><s> ŚRUTV -ā ca BUDDH -a @ MĀH - @ ĀTMY -aṃ BRŪ -vato VEGADHĀR -iṇaḥ // </s><s> a @ CINTY -aṃ STHĀN -am ETAD dhi a @ PRAMEY -am ANUTTAR -aṃ / BUDDH -ānāṃ SARVADARŚ -īnāṃ GUHY -a @ STHĀN -aṃ SVAYAṂBH -ū VĀM iti // </s><s> IDAM api ŚĀNTAMAT -e TATHĀGAT -asya KĀY -a @ GUHY -aṃ TATR -a ŚĀNTAMAT -e EK APAR -ṣat SAM - @ NIPATIT -āḥ SATV -āḥ KECIT TATHĀGAT -aṃ PAŚ -yanti KECIN na PAŚ -yanti ye PAŚ -yanti te harṣa JĀT -ās tam UDĪKṢ -yante ye na PAŚ -yanti te

line.left: @ VAŚ -ena teṣu teṣ ŪPAPATT -y @ ĀYATAN -eṣ ŪPAPANN -āḥ / </s><s> a @ LABDH - @ ĀNNAPĀN -a @ BHOJAN -āḥ KṢUDH -ā DAURBAL -ya @ PARIGAT -ās teṣāṃ TATHĀGAT - @ OTSṚṢṬ -aṃ BHOJAN -am UPANĀM -ayanti / </s><s> te ca SATV -ās TAD BHOJAN -aṃ PARIBHUJ -ya KṢUT - @ PIPĀS -ā @ PRAT -i @ PRASRABDH -āḥ SUKHIT -āḥ PRĪṆIT -a @ GĀTR -āḥ / </s><s> ADHYĀŚAY -ena ANUTTARĀY -āṃ SAṂMYAK - @ SAṂBODH -au CITT -āny UTPĀD -ayanti ye pi VINIPĀT -a @ GAT -āḥ PRET - @ ĀYĀM -a @ LAUKIK -ā na ŚAKN -uvanti
line.right: -āya CITT -am UTPĀDAY -ituṃ sa eva teṣāṃ HET -ur BHAV -ati YĀVAT PARINIRVĀṆ -āya TAD anen <g/> ^ <g/> āpi te ŚĀNTAMAT -e PARY - @ YĀY -eṇ <g/> ^^ <g/> aivaṃ VEDITAVY -aṃ / </s><s> yathā na TATHĀGAT -a ĀHĀR -am ĀH -a @ RAT -i DHARM - @ ĀHĀR -as TATHĀGAT -aḥ NĀRĀYAṆ -a @ SAṂH -atano hi ŚĀNTAMAT -e TATHĀGAT -a @ KĀY -aḥ DṚḌH -aḥ SĀR -o BHEDY -aḥ VAJR -a @ MAY -aḥ na KHAL -u punaḥ ŚĀNTAMAT -e TATHĀGAT -a @ KĀY -e ām ĀŚAY -aḥ PAKṢ - @ ĀŚAY -o vā SAṂVID -yate

line.left: -aṃ ŚRUTV - @ ĀDHIMOKṢ -yante DHĀRAY -iṣyanti not TRAS -iṣ-yanti na SANTRAS -iṣ-yanti na SANTRĀS -am ĀYAT -s-yante / </s><s> ARTH -a @ GAT -iṃ c ĀNUBH -ots-yante / </s><s> TATHATV -āya ca PRATIPAT -s-yante / </s><s> TAD evaṃ teṣāṃ VYĀKARAṆ -am ANUTTARĀY -āṃ SAMYAKSAṂBODH -au / </s><s> asmiṃ KHAL -u punar NIRDEŚ -e NIRDIŚY -am āne VAJRAPĀṆ -inā GUHYAKĀDHIPAT -inā ASAṂKHYEY -ā LOKADHĀT -avaḥ ṣad VIKĀR -aṃ PRĀK ṛmpata MAHAT ĀVABHĀS -ena SPHUṬ -ā a @ BHŪ -van / </s><s> MAH -ac ca PUṢP -a @ VARṢ -am ABHIPRĀVARṢ -at / </s><s> TŪRY -a @ SAṄGĪT -iś ca PARĀVADH -iṣur ASAṂKHYEY -ānāṃ SATV -ānāṃ
line.right: -āya CITT -āny UTPADY -anta / </s><s> ASAṂKHYEY -ānāṃ ca BODHISATV -ānām ĀNULOMIK -eṣu DHARM -eṣu KṢĀNT -ir UDAPAD -yate / </s><s> ASAṂKHYEY -ānāṃ ca BODHISATV -ānām ANUTPATTIK -a @ DHARM -a @ KṢĀNT -i @ PRATILAṂBH -o BHŪT / </s><s> ASAṂKHYEY -ānāṃ ca BODHISATV -ānām EKAJĀTIPRATIBADDH -atāyai KUŚAL -am ulāni PARIPĀCIT -āny a @ BHŪ -van // </s><s> atha KHAL -u tataḥ PARṢ -an MAṆḌALAMĀḌ -asya MADHY -āt BHAGAV -ataṣ PURAST -ād AṢṬ -a @ ṢAṢṬ -i @ YOJAN -a @ ŚATASAHASR -āṃ MAH -ā @ PṚTHIV -īṃ BH -itvā AKṢAMĀTR - @ ĀVĀR -i @ DHĀR -ā ABHYUDGACCH -antāḥ SADṚŚ -yante sma

line.left: -aṃ yad api ŚĀRIPUTR -a TATHĀGAT -o NIRMIT -ān NIRMIMĪT -e teṣām api PṚṢṬHAT -o VAJRAPĀṆ -ir GUHYAKĀDHIPAT -is SANT -i @ ṢṬH -ante / </s><s> etasy <g/> ^ <g/> aiv ĀDHIṢṬHĀN -ena evam a @ CINTY -a @ JÑĀN - @ ĀBHIJÑ - @ ĀDHIṢṬHĀN -a @ BAL -ena ŚĀRIPUTR -a SAMANVĀGAT -o VAJRAPĀṆ -ir GUHYAKĀDHIPAT -ir iti // </s><s> // </s><s> CITT -a @ GUHY -a @ PARIVARTT -a @ PAÑCAM -aḥ // </s><s> // </s><s> atha KHAL -u ŚĀNTAMAT -ir BODHISATV -o VAJRAPĀṆ -im GUHYAKĀDHIPAT -im ETAD AVOCAT / </s><s> PRATIBH -ātu TER GUHYAKĀDHIPAT -e BODHISATV -asya DUṢKAR -a @ CARY -ā @
line.right: -i — MAṆ -ḍ OPASAṂKRAMAṆ -a @ MĀR -a @ DHARṢAṆ -a @ DHARMACAKR -a @ PRAVARTTAN -a @ VYŪH -a @ NIRDEŚ -am ĀRABHY -a yāni TATR - @ ĀDBHUT -a @ KĀRAṆ -āny a @ BHŪ -van / </s><s> YATR -a tvaṃ PRATYAKṢ -aḥ // </s><s> evam UKT -e VAJRAPĀṆ -ir GUHYAKĀDHIPAT -iḥ ŚĀNTAMAT -iṃ BODHISATV -am ETAD AVOCAT / </s><s> a @ PRAMĀṆ -a @ GUṆ -a @ VYŪH -ā BODHISATV -asya DUṢKAR -a @ CARY -ā @ BHŪN na SUKAR -ā KALPASTHITIK -en <g/> ^ <g/> āpy ĀYUṢ PRAMĀṆ -ena VIST -a @ STAR -a @ VIBHĀG -ato NIRD

line.left: @ KANIṢṬH -a @ NIṢṬ -aiḥ VYŪH -ais tathā BHAVAN -a @ TAL -aiḥ SVAK -a @ SVAK -aiḥ / </s><s> UPAR -y @ UPAR -y @ ANTARIKṢ -e BHŪY -u eva // </s><s> VIBHŪṢAṆ -ā DEV -a @ GAṆ -aiḥ PRADARŚIT -āḥ KOṬ -ī @ ŚAT -āny APS - @ ĀRAS -āṃ hi ṢAṢṬH -iḥ / VAJR - @ ĀSAN -aṃ yāstv iha MAṆḌAYANT -i / </s><s> GANDH -odaiś cā DHAN -iṣicya SARVAT -o // </s><s> VICITR -a @ PUṢP -aiḥ PRAKIR -anti c <g/> ^^ <g/> ainaṃ RATN -aiḥ ŚUBH -aiḥ SAṂSKṚT -a @ MEDIN -ī @ TAL -aṃ / VIBHŪṢIT -o
line.right: -i @ TARU -ḥ PRADARŚIT -aḥ VĀC -ā na SAK -yo NIKHIL -aḥ PRAVAKT -uṃ // </s><s> VYŪH -o PRAMĀṆ -ā @ TRA tathā KṚT -as tathā tasya ca KULAPUTR -a BODH -im āl ĀYAM ā LĀY -a @ MĀNAS -ya SAHASR - @ ĀDHIPAT -iḥ MAHĀBRAHM -ā SARV -āṃ BRAHMAKĀYIK -āṃ DEVAPUTR -ān ĀMANTR -ayate sma / </s><s> eṣa MĀRṢ -āḥ BAH -u KALP -a @ KOṬ -ī @ NIYUT -a @ ŚATASAHASR -a @ VRAT -a @ TAP -aḥ su @ CARIT -a @ CARAṆ -am AGR -a <g/> SATV -o MAHĀPURUṢ -o yena BODHIMAṆḌ -as ten <g/> ^ <g/>

line.left: // </s><s> VIBHŪṢAṆ -ā DEV -a @ GAṆ -aiḥ PRADARŚIT -āḥ KOṬ -ī @ ŚAT -āny APS - @ ĀRAS -āṃ hi ṢAṢṬH -iḥ / VAJR - @ ĀSAN -aṃ yāstv iha MAṆḌAYANT -i / </s><s> GANDH -odaiś cā DHAN -iṣicya SARVAT -o // </s><s> VICITR -a @ PUṢP -aiḥ PRAKIR -anti c <g/> ^^ <g/> ainaṃ RATN -aiḥ ŚUBH -aiḥ SAṂSKṚT -a @ MEDIN -ī @ TAL -aṃ / VIBHŪṢIT -o BODH -i @ TARU -ḥ PRADARŚIT -aḥ VĀC -ā na SAK -yo NIKHIL -aḥ PRAVAKT -uṃ // </s><s> VYŪH -o PRAMĀṆ -ā @ TRA tathā KṚT -as tathā tasya ca KULAPUTR -a
line.right: -im āl ĀYAM ā LĀY -a @ MĀNAS -ya SAHASR - @ ĀDHIPAT -iḥ MAHĀBRAHM -ā SARV -āṃ BRAHMAKĀYIK -āṃ DEVAPUTR -ān ĀMANTR -ayate sma / </s><s> eṣa MĀRṢ -āḥ BAH -u KALP -a @ KOṬ -ī @ NIYUT -a @ ŚATASAHASR -a @ VRAT -a @ TAP -aḥ su @ CARIT -a @ CARAṆ -am AGR -a <g/> SATV -o MAHĀPURUṢ -o yena BODHIMAṆḌ -as ten <g/> ^ <g/> ā LĪ -yate / </s><s> TATR - @ ĀYUṢM -ābhiḥ SARV -a @ TRISĀHASR -a @ MAH -ā @ SĀHASR -o LOKADHĀT -uḥ MAHĀVYŪH -air ALAṂKARTT -avyaḥ // </s><s> atha KHAL -u MAHĀBRAHM

line.left: NIRMIT -āḥ PARANIRMIT -ā yetha tathā KANIṢṬH -āḥ SARV -e BHIYUKT -ā BAL -a @ VEGADHĀR -iṇaḥ PRAMAṆ -ḍayāmo vara BODHIMAṆḌ -a YOT -tamāḥ SANT ^ <g/> īha KĀMADHĀT -au VYŪH -ā hi NĀG -ā @ MAR -u KINNAR -āṇāṃ / te DARŚIT -ās TAT KṢAṆ -am eva SARV -e YATR - @ ĀNTAR e GACCH -ati BODHISATV -aḥ // </s><s> CATU -r DIŚ -aṃ hy APSAR -aḥ KOṬ -yas ĀGAT -āḥ yā BODHIVṚKṢ -aṃ PRATIMAṆḌ -ayanti / PUṢP -aiś ca GANDH -aiś ca VILEPAN -aiś ca GANDH - @ ODAK -aiḥ SARVAT -aś c ĀBHIṢIṂC -at // </s><s> sv ALAṂKṚT -o
line.right: -i @ TARU -ḥ sa ŚOBH -ate TR -i @ DAŚ -eṣu DEV -eṣv iva PĀRIYĀTR -aḥ // </s><s> VYŪH -āś ca te KĪRTTAY -ituṃ na ŚAKT -āḥ ye NIRMIT -āḥ SUR -a @ NAYUT -aiḥ SUŚOBHAN -ā iti // </s><s> atha KHAL -u KULAPUTR -a BODHISATV -asya BODHIMAṆḌ -am UPASAṂKR -ā @ MAT -aḥ / </s><s> adhaḥ PĀD -ata LAY -oḥ SAH -as RĀR -ā @ BHY -āṃ CAKR -ā @ BHY -āṃ TĀDṚŚ -ī PRABH -ā NIŚCAR -ati sma // </s><s> YAY -ā PRABHAY -ā SARV -a @ NARAK -a @ TIRYAGYON -iyām a @ LAUKIK -āṇāṃ SATV -ānāṃ DUḤKH -ā VEDAN

line.left: PRABH -āṃ VĀKY -am IDAṂ va BHĀṢ -e / BUDDH -o hi NIḤSAṂŚAY -am ADY -a b HĀV -īyasya PRABH -e YAṂ hi SUVARṆṆAVARṆṆ -ā // </s><s> sa NĀG -a @ KANY -ā @ GAṆ -a @ SAṂPURASKṚT -o JĀGR - @ ĀH -uḥ CCHATR -a @ DHVAJ -a @ CĪVAR -āṇi / UPĀGAM - @ ADY -ena sa BODHISATV -aḥ SAṂPŪJY -a TUṢṬ -a ca sa GAURAV -astaṃ // </s><s> SARV -ā @ BHŪN MAṆ -i @ RATNAPUṢP -a @ BHARIT -ā SAṂS -ob HAT -e LAṂKṚT -ā SARV -e VṚKṢ -av a @ NĀD -ric AUṢADH -i @ GAṆ -ā
line.right: -iṃ DRUM -aṃ SANNAT -ā / SARV -ā @ NADY -a imā STHIT -ā a @ VICAL -āno cāti v ĀYUR yathā ADY -a tvaṃ BHAVIT -o tṛ LOK -a @ MAHIT -o BUDDH -aḥ PRADHṚṢY - @ ĀNTAK -aṃ // </s><s> ŚAKR -a @ BRAHM -a EṆĀṂK -a @ SŪRY -a @ KIRAṆ -ābhābhis tvayā JIHM -itāḥ SPṚṢṬ -ās tvat PRABHAY - @ ĀDY -ā @ TUL -a @ MAT -e ŚĀNT -ā APĀY -ās TRAY -aḥ / sābhā MADBH -a <g/> VAN -e dya c <g/> ^ <g/> āpy ANUGAT -ā BUDDH - @ ODBHAV - @ ODGĀR -iṇīm

line.left: n ĀRTH -a @ VIPUL -ā LABDH -ā MAH - @ ĀVEG -avat kra KUTS -anto hi MAY - @ ĀRCIT -o MUN -ivaraḥ KANAKĀHVAY -aś c ĀPAR -aḥ / yaccā VANDIT -u KĀŚYAP -o JIN -avaraḥ ŚĀKY -a @ RṢABH -aś CĀD -ya MEN ^ <g/> aiv ĀHAṂ MUN -i @ DARŚAN -ād VIRAHIT -eḥ SARVAJÑAT -āṃ PRĀRTHAY -aṃ // </s><s> BRAHM - @ ĀṂBH -o NĀD -a @ SUGHOṢ -a @ SIṂH -a @ NINAD -a @ PRAVIMUṂC -adhā ca MUN -e YĀY -ād bhūḥ sa tathā CAL - @ ODGIR -ivaraḥ SARV -vaṃ JAGAN -no BHAV -et /
line.right: -au yasya hi MĀNAS -aṃ VINIYAT -aṃ c ĀDHYĀŚAY -ena <g/> ^ UDGAT -aṃ sa UDY -e VĀS -u BHAV -en NAV -ai DAŚABAL -aḥ STHĀN -an na TAD VID -yate // </s><s> atha KHAL -u ŚĀNTAMAT -e KĀLIK -asya NĀG -a @ RĀJAS -y @ ĀGR -a @ MAHIṢ -ī / </s><s> SUVARṆṆAPRABHĀS -ā NĀM -a sā SAṂBAHUL -ābhirn NĀGAK -an YĀBH -iḥ PARIVṚT -ā PURASKṚT -ā NĀN -ā @ CCHATR -a @ PARIGṚHĪT -āḥ NĀN -ā @ DŪṢY -a @ PARIGṚHĪT -ābhiḥ NĀN - @ ĀMUKT - @ ĀHĀR -a @ PARIGṚHĪT -ābhiḥ NĀN -ā @ MAṆ -i @ RATN

line.left: -āṃ a @ DVĪP -āṃ VID -itvā / </s><s> s VAL -enaṃ SV -a @ TRĀṆ -aṃ TR -i @ LOK -e UTPANN -aḥ // </s><s> PRASANN -āḥ PRAHṚṢṬ -āḥ yathā DEV -a @ SAṂGH -āḥ PRAVARṢ -ī na BHĀT -o MAH -āpuṣ PAVAR -ṣaṃ MAH -āc AILAK -ṣepaṃ KAR -ontī MAHARṢ -ī JIN -o BHEṢ -ya @ SED -yā JAN -ehī PRAHARṢ -aṃ // </s><s> upehi DRUM - @ ENDR -a @ NIṢĪD -ā ACCHAṂBH -ī DHUN -ā MĀR -a @ SAINY -aṃ c CHIN -ā KLEŚ -a @ JĀL -aṃ VIBUDHY -a PRASĀNT -āṃ va RĀM - @ ĀGR -a @

line.left: -āya TUṢṬ -āya DĪPT -āya RAMY -ā @ YĀN - @ AVADY -āya DOṢ -air VIMUKT -āya ŚĀST -e // </s><s> NAM -as te a @ NĀTH -e JAN -esmiṃ MAH -ā @ DUḤKH -a @ MAGN -e tvam eko hi NĀTH -aḥ SUKH -asya PRADĀT -ā JAGAT KLEŚ -a @ ROG -a @ PRAHĀṆ -āya RĀJ -a @ MAH -ā @ VAIDYARĀJ -aḥ YAŚAS - @ VIN - @ NAM -as te PRAS -ānnā PRAHṚṢṬ -āḥ yathā DEV -a @ SAṂGH -ā PRAVṚ -ṣṭaṃ ca DIVY -aṃ yathā PUṢP -a @ VARṢ -an TAT HĀRY - @ ĀGR -a @

line.left: -iṃ DHRUV -aṃ LAPS -yase tvaṃ // </s><s> VINIRJITY -a mai TYĀS MAR -āriṃ upehi DRŪ -m ENDR -aṃ NIṢĪD - @ ĀSAN -e smiṃ VINIRJITY -a MĀR -aṃ TAMO - @ BHIND -i SARV -aṃ VIBUDHY -asva ŚĀNT -āṃ va RĀM AGR -a @ BODH -iṃ yathā PŪRVAK -ais tair MUNĪNDR -air VIBUDDH -ā // </s><s> yathā te VIŚUDDH -aṃ BHAV -et KALP -a @ KOṬ -yaḥ KṚT -a @ DUṢKAR -aṃ taj JAGAN - @ MOCAN - @ ĀRTH -aṃ pra PŪRṆṆ - @ ĀDY -a sā te VARĀS -ā MAHARṢ -a NIṢĪD -a DRŪ -m ENDR -e VIBUDHY -asva
line.right: -iṃ // </s><s> atha KHAL -u KULAPUTR -a BODHISATV -as TṚṆ -a @ KALĀP -aṃ GṚHĪT -vā yena BODHIMAṆḌ -as ten OPĀGAM -ad UPETY -a BODHIVṚKṢ -a @ MŪL -e SVAY -am eva TṚṆ -a @ SAṂSTAR -aṃ SAṂSTĪRY -a BODHIVṚKṢ -aṃ NAMASKṚT -ya SAPT -a @ KṚTV -aḥ PRADAKṢIṆ -am a @ KĀRṢ -it / </s><s> saṃm ANANTAR -a @ SAṂSKṚT -e KHAL -u punaḥ KULAPUTR -a BODHISATV -ena TṚṆ -a @ SAṂSTAR -e atha tair api CATU -ra ŚĪTY -ā DEVAPUTR -a @ SAH -asaiḥ CATU -ra ŚĪT -iḥ SIṂH - @ ĀSAN -a @ SAHASR -āni BODHISATV -am UDRIŚY

line.left: @ SAHASR -āṇi BODHIVṚKṢ -am a @ DRĀKṢ -uḥ dvā CATVĀRIṂŚ -a @ YOJAN -a @ SAHASR -āṇi SIṂH - @ ĀSAN -a KECID DEV -a @ MANUṢY -āḥ BODHISATV -aṃ MĀR -aṃ DHARṢAY -antaṃ pa <g/> ś-yanti sma // </s><s> KECID EK -am eva MĀR -aṃ PAŚ -yanti / </s><s> KECID VIPUL -aṃ MĀR -a @ SAINY -aṃ / </s><s> KECIT MĀR -a @ BHAṂG -na BODHISATV -aṃ VIKRĪḌIT -aṃ PAŚ -yanti sma / </s><s> KECID GAGAN -a @ TAL -a @ GAT -aṃ BODHISATV -aṃ PAŚ -yanti sma / </s><s> SIṂH - @ ĀSAN -a @ NIṢAṆṆ -aṃ BODHIVṚKṢ -a @ MŪL -e
line.right: -im ABHISAṂBUDHY -a @ YAM -ānaṃ iti hi KULAPUTR -āḥ a @ PRAMĀṆ -a @ VIṢAY -ā BODHISATV -ā BHAV -anti / </s><s> teṣāṃ BODHIMAṆḌ -avar ĀGR -a @ GAT -ānām a @ PRAMĀṆ -a eva GUṆ -a @ KĀRAṆ -a @ VIŚEṢ -āḥ SAṂDṚŚ -yante sma / </s><s> BODHIMAṆḌ -avar ĀGR -a @ GAT -asya KHAL -u punaḥ KULAPUTR -a BODHISATV -asya DAŚ -abhyo DI -g @ BHY -aḥ a @ PRAMEY - @ ĀSAṂKHYEY -e BHY -o LOKADHĀT -u BHY -aḥ a @ PRAMEY - @ ĀSAṂKHYEY -āḥ PŪRV -a @ SABHĀG -a @ CARIT -ā BODHISATV -āḥ ĀGATY -ā

line.left: sma / </s><s> PŪRV -asu @ CARIT -am ETAD BODHISATV -asya yena te DAŚ -a @ DI -g @ LOKADHĀT -u SANNIPATIT -ā BODHISATV -ā BODHIMAṆḌ -avar ĀGR -a @ GAT -aṃ BODHISATV -am āsv ĀS -ayanti sma / </s><s> PŪJ -ayanti ca / </s><s> TATR ^ <g/> āpi BODHISATV -asya nā BHŪD ANUNAY -o MĀR -ase NĀY -ā cā PRATIGH -aḥ ANUNAY -a @ PRATIGH -a @ VIGAT -ena KULAPUTR -a BODHISATV -e NAIK -a @ CITTAKṢAṆ -a @ SAMĀYUKT -ayā PRAJÑ -ayā yat KIÑCIT JÑĀTAVY -aṃ DRAṢṬAVY -aṃ PRĀPTAVY -aṃ / </s><s> ABHISAṂBODH -a @ VYAṂ ca TAT SARV -am ABHISAṂBUDDH -aṃ
line.right: -i @ PRĀPT -asya KHAL -u punaḥ KULAPUTR -a TATHĀGAT -asya DAŚ -abhyo DI -g @ BHY -aḥ / </s><s> a @ PRAM -eṇ ĀSAṂKHYEY -āṃ BUDDH -ā BHAGAV -anto DAKṢIṆ -āt PĀṆ -īṃ PRASĀRY -ā KLĀNTAK - @ ĀYAT -āṃ ca PARIPṚCCH -anti sma / </s><s> ABHY -ā <g/> nt ĀNUBODH -añ ca PARIPṚCCH -anti sma / </s><s> SUKH - @ ĀNUBODH -añ ca SVAYAMBH -utv ĀBHISAṂBODH -aṃ ca an @ ĀVARAṆ - @ ĀBHISAṂBODH -aṃ ca / </s><s> SAMAJÑ -ān ĀBHISAṂBODH -aṃ ca PARIPṚCCH -anti sma / </s><s> a @ SAṂBHINN -a @ GOCAR -atāṃ ca MAHĀKARUṆ - @ ĀSANN - @ ĀHAṂ

line.left: / </s><s> SUKH - @ ĀNUBODH -añ ca SVAYAMBH -utv ĀBHISAṂBODH -aṃ ca an @ ĀVARAṆ - @ ĀBHISAṂBODH -aṃ ca / </s><s> SAMAJÑ -ān ĀBHISAṂBODH -aṃ ca PARIPṚCCH -anti sma / </s><s> a @ SAṂBHINN -a @ GOCAR -atāṃ ca MAHĀKARUṆ - @ ĀSANN - @ ĀHAṂ ca TRIRATN -a @ VAṂŚ - @ ĀNUPACCHED -atāṃ ca SARVADHARM -a @ VAŚAVARTT -itāṃ ca PARIPṚCCH -anti sma / </s><s> TATR -a ye PARIPAKV - @ ENDRIY -āḥ SATV -āḥ / </s><s> ā SAṂS -te tāṃ KRIY -āṃ SAṂJĀN -ate sma / </s><s> ye a @ PARIPAKV - @ ENDRIY -ās te na SAṂJĀN -ate sma / </s><s>
line.right: -i @ PRĀPT -aḥ KHAL -u punaḥ KULAPUTR -a TATHĀGAT -aḥ SAPT -ar atra -m a @ NIMIṢ -o DHARMAR -ati SUKH -aṃ PRATISAṂVED -ayate sma / </s><s> BODHIVṚKṢ -añ cā NIMIṢ -aḥ PREKṢ -ate sma / </s><s> DEVAPUTR -a @ ŚATASAHASR -āṇi c <g/> ^^ <g/> ainaṃ PŪJ -ayanti sma STUV -anti SMĀBH -inamanti sma / </s><s> APSAR -aḥ ŚATASAHASR -āṇi c <g/> ^^ <g/> ainaṃ STUV -aṃ ty ABHIPRAṆ -am anti sma / </s><s> ANUTTARĀY -āñ ca SAṂMYAK - @ SAṂBODHY -au CITT -āny UTPĀD -ayanti sma / </s><s> TATHĀGAT - @ ERYĀPATH -aṃ DṚṢṬ -vā BODH -i @ PRĀPT -asya KHAL -u

line.left: te na SAṂJĀN -ate sma / </s><s> BODH -i @ PRĀPT -aḥ KHAL -u punaḥ KULAPUTR -a TATHĀGAT -aḥ SAPT -ar atra -m a @ NIMIṢ -o DHARMAR -ati SUKH -aṃ PRATISAṂVED -ayate sma / </s><s> BODHIVṚKṢ -añ cā NIMIṢ -aḥ PREKṢ -ate sma / </s><s> DEVAPUTR -a @ ŚATASAHASR -āṇi c <g/> ^^ <g/> ainaṃ PŪJ -ayanti sma STUV -anti SMĀBH -inamanti sma / </s><s> APSAR -aḥ ŚATASAHASR -āṇi c <g/> ^^ <g/> ainaṃ STUV -aṃ ty ABHIPRAṆ -am anti sma / </s><s> ANUTTARĀY -āñ ca SAṂMYAK - @ SAṂBODHY -au CITT -āny UTPĀD -ayanti sma / </s><s> TATHĀGAT - @ ERYĀPATH -aṃ DṚṢṬ -vā
line.right: -i @ PRĀPT -asya KHAL -u punaḥ KULAPUTR -a TATHĀGAT -asya CATVĀR -o MAHĀRĀJ -āḥ PRĀT - @ RĀṆ -i GṚHĪT -vā TATHĀGAT -am UPASAṂKR -āntāḥ a @ BHŪ -van yathā CET -aḥ CĀTURDVĪPIK -āta UPASAṂKR -ā @ MAT -i sma TATH ^ <g/> aiva KOṬ -ī @ ŚAT -āc CĀTURDVĪPIK -e BHY -o LOKADHĀT -u BHY -aś CATVĀR -i KOṬ -ī @ ŚAT -āni MAHĀRĀJ -ānāṃ PĀTR -āṇi GṚHĪT -vā TATHĀGAT -am UPASAṂKR -ām anti sma / </s><s> TATR -a KULAPUTR -a CATVĀR -i KOṬ -ī @ ŚAT -āni PĀTR -āṇāṃ TATHĀGAT -ena PRATIGṚH -ītāny a @ BHŪ -van PRATIGṚH

line.left: KOṬ -ī @ ŚAT -āni MAHĀRĀJ -ānāṃ PĀTR -āṇi GṚHĪT -vā TATHĀGAT -am UPASAṂKR -ām anti sma / </s><s> TATR -a KULAPUTR -a CATVĀR -i KOṬ -ī @ ŚAT -āni PĀTR -āṇāṃ TATHĀGAT -ena PRATIGṚH -ītāny a @ BHŪ -van PRATIGṚH -ya c AIK -a @ PĀTR -am ADHITIṢṬHAT -i sma / </s><s> EKAIK -aś ca MAHĀRĀJ -ā evaṃ SAṂJĀNĪT -e sma / </s><s> MAM -a PĀTR -aṃ TATHĀGAT -ena PRATIGṚH -ītaṃ MAM -a PĀTR -e TATHĀGAT -aḥ PARIBHOJY -ata iti te ten <g/> ^ <g/> aiva PRĪT -i @ PRAMOD -yen ĀVAIVARTTIK -ā a @ BHŪ -van / </s><s> ANUTTARĀY -āḥ SAMYAKSAṂBODH -eḥ
line.right: -i @ PRĀPT -asya KHAL -u punaḥ KULAPUTR -a TATHĀGAT -asya TR -iṣu SAṂVAR -ṇṇ ĪYAK -ā VAṆIJ -aḥ TAD ANY -āni ca ṢAṢṬ -ir DEVAPUTR -a @ SAHASR -āṇi TATHĀGAT -āya PRATHAM -a @ PIṆḌ -a @ PĀTR -aṃ GṚHĪT -v OPASAṂKRAM -ya DAD -ati sma / </s><s> yaiḥ PŪRVAK -aṃ PRAṆIDHĀN -aṃ KṚT -am ABHŪT / </s><s> VAYAṂ PRATHAM -aṃ TATHĀGAT -aṃ PIṆḌ -a @ PĀTR -eṇa PRATIPĀDAY -eya iti / </s><s> te TATHĀGAT -aṃ PRATHAM -aṃ PIṆḌ -a @ PĀTR -ena PRATIPĀDY -a ten <g/> ^ <g/> aiva PRĪT -i @ PRĀMODY -en ĀVAIVARTTIK -ā a @ BHŪ -van /
