line.right: -i @ PRĀPT -ena ca TATHĀGAT -ena <g/> ^ a @ PRAVARTTIT -e DHARMACAKR -e yaḥ SATV - @ ĀRTH -aḥ KṚT -aḥ SAṂB -a @ HUT -aro na tv eva PRATHAM -a @ CITTOTPĀD -am UPĀDĀY -a YĀVAD BODHIMAṆḌ -ād iti / </s><s> TAD anen <g/> ^ <g/> āpi te KULAPUTR -a PARYĀY -eṇ <g/> ^ <g/> aiva VEDITAVY -āṃ yathā yathā BODHISATV -a ĀSANN -o BHAV -ati BODH -āya tathā tathā PRAMĀṆ -ānāṃ SATV -ānām ARTH -aṃ KAR -oti / </s><s> BODH -i @ PRĀPT -asya KHAL -u punaḥ KULAPUTR -a TATHĀGAT -asya ŚIKH -ī NĀM -a BRAHM -ā AṢṬ

line.left: a @ BHŪ -van / iti hi KULAPUTR -a yo BODHISATV -ena BODHIMAṆḌ -av a @ RĀG -raf <g/> . </s><s> b GAT -ena <g/> ^ a @ PRĀPT -āyāṃ SARVAJÑAT -āyāṃ BODH -i @ PRĀPT -ena ca TATHĀGAT -ena <g/> ^ a @ PRAVARTTIT -e DHARMACAKR -e yaḥ SATV - @ ĀRTH -aḥ KṚT -aḥ SAṂB -a @ HUT -aro na tv eva PRATHAM -a @ CITTOTPĀD -am UPĀDĀY -a YĀVAD BODHIMAṆḌ -ād iti / </s><s> TAD anen <g/> ^ <g/> āpi te KULAPUTR -a PARYĀY -eṇ <g/> ^ <g/> aiva VEDITAVY -āṃ yathā yathā BODHISATV -a ĀSANN -o BHAV -ati
line.right: -āya tathā tathā PRAMĀṆ -ānāṃ SATV -ānām ARTH -aṃ KAR -oti / </s><s> BODH -i @ PRĀPT -asya KHAL -u punaḥ KULAPUTR -a TATHĀGAT -asya ŚIKH -ī NĀM -a BRAHM -ā AṢṬ -a @ ṢAṢṬ -yā BRAHMAKĀYIK -a @ DEVAPUTR -a @ ŚATASAHASR -aiḥ PARIVṚT -aḥ PURASKṚT -o BRAHMALOK -ād ANTARH -ito BHAGAV -ataḥ PURAST -āt PRATY -a @ ṢṬH -āt / </s><s> sa BHAGAV -ataḥ PĀD -au ŚIRAS -ā VANDIT -vā SAPT -a @ KṚTV -aḥ PRADAKṢIṆ -ī @ KṚTY -a BHAGAV -antam ADHYEṢAT -e sma / </s><s> DHARMACAKR -a @ PRAVARTTAN -āya DEŚ -ayatu BHAGAV -āṃ DHARM -aṃ DEŚ -ayatu SUGAT

line.left: -av a @ RĀG -raf <g/> . </s><s> b GAT -ena <g/> ^ a @ PRĀPT -āyāṃ SARVAJÑAT -āyāṃ BODH -i @ PRĀPT -ena ca TATHĀGAT -ena <g/> ^ a @ PRAVARTTIT -e DHARMACAKR -e yaḥ SATV - @ ĀRTH -aḥ KṚT -aḥ SAṂB -a @ HUT -aro na tv eva PRATHAM -a @ CITTOTPĀD -am UPĀDĀY -a YĀVAD BODHIMAṆḌ -ād iti / </s><s> TAD anen <g/> ^ <g/> āpi te KULAPUTR -a PARYĀY -eṇ <g/> ^ <g/> aiva VEDITAVY -āṃ yathā yathā BODHISATV -a ĀSANN -o BHAV -ati BODH -āya tathā tathā PRAMĀṆ -ānāṃ SATV -ānām ARTH -aṃ KAR -oti / </s><s>
line.right: -i @ PRĀPT -asya KHAL -u punaḥ KULAPUTR -a TATHĀGAT -asya ŚIKH -ī NĀM -a BRAHM -ā AṢṬ -a @ ṢAṢṬ -yā BRAHMAKĀYIK -a @ DEVAPUTR -a @ ŚATASAHASR -aiḥ PARIVṚT -aḥ PURASKṚT -o BRAHMALOK -ād ANTARH -ito BHAGAV -ataḥ PURAST -āt PRATY -a @ ṢṬH -āt / </s><s> sa BHAGAV -ataḥ PĀD -au ŚIRAS -ā VANDIT -vā SAPT -a @ KṚTV -aḥ PRADAKṢIṆ -ī @ KṚTY -a BHAGAV -antam ADHYEṢAT -e sma / </s><s> DHARMACAKR -a @ PRAVARTTAN -āya DEŚ -ayatu BHAGAV -āṃ DHARM -aṃ DEŚ -ayatu SUGAT -o DHARM -aṃ SANT -i SATV -ā DHARM -asya BHĀJAN -ī @ BHŪT

line.left: / </s><s> sa BHAGAV -ataḥ PĀD -au ŚIRAS -ā VANDIT -vā SAPT -a @ KṚTV -aḥ PRADAKṢIṆ -ī @ KṚTY -a BHAGAV -antam ADHYEṢAT -e sma / </s><s> DHARMACAKR -a @ PRAVARTTAN -āya DEŚ -ayatu BHAGAV -āṃ DHARM -aṃ DEŚ -ayatu SUGAT -o DHARM -aṃ SANT -i SATV -ā DHARM -asya BHĀJAN -ī @ BHŪT ās te TATHĀGAT -asya DHARM -aṃ DEŚIT -am ĀJÑ -ās yanti // </s><s> YATHĀP -i TAT PŪRV -a @ PRAṆIDHĀN -ena yena TAD RĀJÑ -o DHṚT -a @ RĀṢṬ -asya PUTR -atvam ABHYUPAGAM -ya PRAṆIDHĀN -aṃ KṚT -am a @ BHŪD AHAṂ SARV -āṃ BHADRAKALPIK -āṃs TATHĀGAT -ān
line.right: -i @ PRĀPT -ān ADHYEṢ -e YAṂ DHARMACAKR -a @ PRAVARTTAN -āya syāt KHAL -u punas te KULAPUTR -a ŚIKH -in <g/> ^ <g/> aiva BRAHM -aṇā TATHĀGAT -o DHYEṢ -ito DHARMACAKR -a @ PRAVARTTAN -āya n ĀNY -air iti na KHALV evaṃ DRAṢṬAVY -aṃ TAT KASMĀD yathā ca ŚIKH -inā BRAHM -aṇā ADHĪṢṬ - @ HAS tathā DAŚ -ābhir BRAHM -a @ KOṬ -ībhis TATHĀGAT -o DHYEṢ -ito BHŪD DAŚ -abhiḥ ŚAKR -a @ KOṬ -ībhir DAŚ -ābhir eva BODHISATV -a @ KOṬ -ībhiḥ BHAGAV -ān ADHYEṢ -ito BHŪD DHARMACAKR -a @ PRAVARTTAN -āya yadā ca BHAGAV -at ĀDHIVĀSIT

line.left: SUGAT -a @ BHĀSKAR -ā SMIT -aṃ kim ARTHIK -aṃ // </s><s> JAGAT ām ĀSAY -āṃ vetsi ROC -ase ca SADEVAK -e PARVAT -a PREKṢ -ate VAKT -uṃ SMIT -aṃ kiṃ DARŚIT -aṃ tvayā // </s><s> evam UKT -e BHAGAV -āṃ CCHĀNTAMAT -iṃ BODHISATV -aṃ MAH -ā @ SATV -aṃ ETAD AVOCAT / </s><s> AYAṂ KULAPUTR -a VAJRAPĀṆ -ir GUHYAKĀDHIPAT -iḥ SARV -eṣāṃ BHADRAKALP -akānāṃ TATHĀGAT -ānāṃ VAJR -a @ DHĀRIT -ayā PŪJ -āṃ KAR -iṣyati / </s><s> SAD DHARM -añ ca PARIGRAH -īṣyatīmaṃ ca TATHĀGAT -a @ GUHY -aṃ DHARMAPARYĀY -aṃ VAISTĀRIK -aṃ KAR -iṣyati / </s><s> a @ PRAMĀṆ -āṃś ca SATV -āṃ
line.right: -au PARIPĀCAY -iṣyati / </s><s> so sya BHADRAKALP -asya NIRGAT -asya YĀVAD ROC -asya TATHĀGAT -asya SAD DHARM -e NTARH -ite a @ KṢOBHY -asya TATHĀGAT -asya BUDDHAKṢETR -a UTPAT -syate ABHIRAT -yāṃ LOKADHĀT -au TATR - @ OPAPANN -o YAN ten ĀKṢ -o @ BHY -ena TATHĀGAT -ena mūd RĀṢṬ -a @ ŚAT -aṃ BODHISATV -ānām ĀKHYĀT -aṃ tadā DHĀRAYIṢY -ety ARTH -a @ GAT -iṃ c ĀNUPRAV -e KṢAT -i / </s><s> TATHATV -āya ca PRATIPAT -syate tataḥ pareṇā PRAMEY - @ ĀSAṂKHYEY -āṃs TATHĀGAT -ān ĀRĀGAY -iṣyati / </s><s> SAT KAR -iṣyati GUR -u KAR -iṣyati / </s><s> MĀNAY -iṣyati PŪJAY

line.left: -a @ ṢṬH -uḥ / </s><s> PRĀṂJAL -ayo BHŪTV -ā BHAGAV -antam eva NAMASY -antaḥ TATR -a CATU -rṇṇāṃ MAHĀRĀJ -ānāṃ yāny antaḥ PUL -āni BALAKĀY -aḥ PĀRIṢADY -āś ca te pi sa SARV -e SAṂNIPAT -ya BHAGAV -ataḥ PĀD -au ŚIR -obhir VANDIT -vā PRĀṂJAL -ayo NAMAS -yanti sma / </s><s> tasyo BHAGAV -āṃs teṣā SANNIPATIT -e BHY -aḥ CATU -ro MAHĀRĀJ -ān ĀRABHY -a TĀDṚŚ -īṃ DHĀRMY -ā @ KATH -āṃ SAṂPRAYOJ -ayati sma / </s><s> yat tato NĀG -aya KṢAR - @ ĀKṢ -a @ SAGANDHARV -a @ KUṂBHĀṆḌ -a @ PARṢAD aḥ DVĀDAŚ -ānāṃ PRĀṆ -i @ SAHASR -āṇāṃ
line.right: -āya CITT -āny UTPADY -anta te BHY -aś ca MAHĀRĀJ -ānām antaḥ PUR -e BHY -o DAŚ -a @ KANY -ā @ SAHASR -āṇi ANUTTARĀY -āṃ SAMYAKSAṂBODH -au CITT -āny UTPĀD -yanti sma // </s><s> atha KHAL -u VAJRAPĀṆ -ir GUHYAKĀDHIPAT -iḥ ŚĀNT -aḥ PUR -aḥ SASV -a @ JAN -a @ PARIVĀR -aḥ sa PĀRIṢ -e BHY -o nanta GUṆ -a @ VYŪH -ena PARIVĀR -eṇa SARV -a @ PUṢP -a @ GANDH -a @ MĀLY -a @ VILEPAN -a @ DHŪP -a @ CŪRṆṆ -a @ CĪVAR -a @ CCHATR -a — DHVAJ -a @ PATĀK -ā @ TŪRY

line.left: MAHĀRĀJ -āṃ SARV -āvatīṃ ca PARṢAD am MANTR -ayate sma / </s><s> ĀGACCH -antu BHAGAV -antaḥ SARV -e SAHIT -ā SAMAGR -ā BHŪTV -ā yathā PRAṆIHIT -ena BHOJAN -ena BHAGAV -antaṃ PRATIPĀDAY -iṣyāmaḥ / </s><s> atha KHAL -u VAJRAPĀṆ -ir GUHYAKĀDHIPAT -iḥ ŚĀNT -aḥ PUR -aḥ SASV - @ EJAN -aḥ sa PĀRIṢADY -aḥ SAPUTR -aḥ SABAL -aḥ SAPARIVĀR -aḥ s VAHAST -ena SATKṚTY -ān AVAVIDDH -aṃ / </s><s> PRABHŪT -ena PRAṆĪT -e NĀN - @ EK -a @ SAT ara SABHOJAN -ena BODHISATV - @ ĀDHYĀS -aya PARIŚUDDH -ena TATHĀGAT -a @ PŪJ - @ ĀRH -eṇa BHAKT -ena TATHĀGAT -aṃ sa
line.right: -i @ SATV -a @ SAṂGH -aṃ BHIKṢ -u SAṂGH -aṃ SAṂTARP -ayati sma / </s><s> SAṂPRAV -ā @ RAT -i sma / </s><s> SAṂTARP -ya SAṂPRAY -e PIN -ī @ TAP -ā @ TRA -ṃ vauta PĀṆ -iṃ BHAGAV -antaṃ VID -itvā BHAGAV -ataḥ PURAST -āt paṣī DAD DHARMAŚRAVAṆ -āya / </s><s> ye vā BHAGAV -atyāṃ RĀJ -a @ DHĀNY -āṃ YAKṢ -a @ RĀKṢAS -āḥ PRATIVAS -anti sma / </s><s> SANNIPATY -a BHAGAV -ato MUKH -am ULLOKAY -antaḥ PRĀṂJAL -ī @ BHŪT āḥ NAMASY -antaḥ STHIT -ā a @ BHŪ -van // </s><s> atha KHAL -u VAJRAPĀṆ -i @ GUHYAKĀDHIPAT -ir BHAGAV -antam

line.left: TAP -ā @ TRA -ṃ vauta PĀṆ -iṃ BHAGAV -antaṃ VID -itvā BHAGAV -ataḥ PURAST -āt paṣī DAD DHARMAŚRAVAṆ -āya / </s><s> ye vā BHAGAV -atyāṃ RĀJ -a @ DHĀNY -āṃ YAKṢ -a @ RĀKṢAS -āḥ PRATIVAS -anti sma / </s><s> SANNIPATY -a BHAGAV -ato MUKH -am ULLOKAY -antaḥ PRĀṂJAL -ī @ BHŪT āḥ NAMASY -antaḥ STHIT -ā a @ BHŪ -van // </s><s> atha KHAL -u VAJRAPĀṆ -i @ GUHYAKĀDHIPAT -ir BHAGAV -antam ADHYEṢAT -e sma / </s><s> DHARMADEŚAN -āyai / </s><s> DEŚ -ayatu BHAGAV -āṃs tathā RŪP -aṃ DHARM -a @ NAY -a PRAVEṢ -aṃ yath ĀNUTPĀD -ita @ BODHICITT -āḥ SATV -āya
line.right: -āya CITT -ān YUT -pdayeyuḥ / </s><s> AVAIVARTTIKAT -āyāṃ SANT -i @ ṢṬH -eran / </s><s> asyāś ca YAKṢ -a @ RĀKṢ -a @ SAPIŚĀC -a @ GANDHARV -a @ GUHY -aka @ MAHORAG -a @ PARṢAD o DĪRGHARĀTR -am ARTHĀY -a HITĀY -a SUKHĀY -a YOGAKṢEM -āya BHAV -ed VIŚEṢ -eṇa ca VIŚEṢ -at ĀYĀM ABHYUDGACCH -eyuḥ / </s><s> na ca hāma BHĀGĪY -ā BHAV -eyuḥ / </s><s> evam UKT -e BHAGAV -āṃ VAJRAPĀṆ -iṃ GUHYAKĀDHIPAT -iṃ tāṃ ca SARV -āvatīṃ PARṢAD am ĀMANTR -ayate sma / </s><s> tena hi MĀRṢ -āḥ SṚṆ -ṇata s ĀDHUT -a SUṢV -uta MANAS -i KUL -uta DHARM

line.left: / </s><s> ĀH -a MĀRG -o MAHĀRĀJ -a PHAL - @ ĀBHISAMAY -a @ NIṢYAND -aḥ / </s><s> ĀH -a / </s><s> ADHIMUKT -ir BHAGAV -aṃ kiṃ NIṢYAND -aḥ / </s><s> ĀH -a / </s><s> ADHIMUKT -ir MAHĀRĀJ -a VIMUKT -i @ PARIPŪR -i @ NIṢYAND -aḥ / </s><s> ĀH -a / </s><s> BUDDH - @ OTPĀD -o BHAGAV -āṃ kiṃ NIṢYAND -aḥ / </s><s> ĀH -a / </s><s> BUDDH - @ OTPĀD -o MAHĀRĀJ -a SARV -a @ BODHIPĀKṢIK -a @ DHARM -a @ PRATILAṂBH -a @ NIṢYAND -aḥ / </s><s> ĀH -a / </s><s> KATHAṂ BHAGAV -aṃ BUDDH - @ OTPĀD -aḥ / </s><s> ĀH -a / </s><s> yathā MAHĀRĀJ -ā

line.left: -o BHAV -ati LĀBH -a @ SATKĀR -aiḥ / </s><s> a @ MATSAR -ī BHAV -ati DHARM -a @ DEŚ -ānāsu / </s><s> NIRAṂGAṆ -o BHAV -ati ŚĪL -a @ PARIŚUDDH -yā NIRUPAKRAM -o BHAV -ati KṢĀNT -i @ PARIŚUDDH -yā su @ PARINIṢṬHIT -a @ KARM -ānto BHAV -ati VĪRY -a @ PARIŚUDDH -yā / </s><s> ĀJĀNEY -o BHAV -ati DHYĀN -a @ PARIŚUDDH -yā / </s><s> sv AVADARPIT -a @ BUDDH -ir BHAV -ati PRAJÑ -ā @ PARIŚUDDH -yā BRAHMOTTAR -o BHAV -ati a @ PRAMĀṆ -eṣu / </s><s> LOKOTTAR -o BHAV -ati DHYĀN -a @ SAMĀPATT -iṣu / </s><s> ANUTTAR -o BHAV -ati

line.left: -ānaṃ te DHARM -ā ABHIMUKH -ī BHAV -anti // </s><s> TADYATH -ā NĀM -a BHAGAV -an i YAṂ MAH -ā @ PṚTHIV -ī APAS -k @ ANDH -asyo PARIPRATIṢṬHIT -āḥ TATR -a yaḥ PURUṢ -a UDAPĀN -aṃ vā KŪP -aṃ vā PARIKṢ -aneti / </s><s> sa UDRAK -ena SAMAṂG -ī BHAV -ati / </s><s> yaḥ punar na KHAN -ati / </s><s> na sa lab HAT -e / </s><s> evam eva BHAGAV -aṃ SARVATR - @ ĀNUGAT -aṃ jñanaṃ TATR -a yo BHIYUJ -yate sa JÑĀN -am ADHIGACCH -ati yo n ĀBHIYUJ -yate SUT -a JÑĀN -aṃ n ĀDHIGACCH -ati // </s><s> TASMĀT TARH -i BHAGAV -aṃ

line.left: OTPATT -ir ity ĀRYASATY -eṣu SAṂKṢEP -ato ABHISAMAY -a @ KRAM -aḥ / </s><s> ITTH -am ĀRY -a @ SATY -a @ DARŚANAT -o MUKT -i @ RUC -yate / </s><s> TASMĀD ata eva MUKT -i @ RAS -tu <g/> ; ŚŪNYAT - @ ĀDARŚAN -ena kim <g/> ; ŚŪNYAT -āyāḥ SARVADHARM -a @ NIḤSVABHĀV -atāyā DARŚAN -ena ADHIGAM -ena / </s><s> s ĀKṢ -āt KARAṆ -eneti YĀVAT / </s><s> kim ? na KIṂCIT PRAYOJAN -am / </s><s> TAD a @ PAR -asya MUKT -e RUP - @ ĀYAS -ya VIDYAMĀN -atvāt / </s><s> atr ĀH -a na VINET -yādi — na VIN -ānena MĀRG -eṇa

line.left: an @ ĀROPIT -am eva TATTV -am ANUPALAMBH -a @ YOG -ena ADHIGAMYAMĀN -am a @ JÑĀN - @ ĀSRAVAKṢAY -āya SĀMARTHY -avad UPALABH -yate / </s><s> tac ca PRAJÑ -ayā VIVEC -yamānaṃ SARVADHARM - @ ĀNUPALAMBH -a @ LAKṢAṆ -am AVASIT -am iti SARVADHARM -a @ ŚŪNYAT ^ <g/> aiva SARV - @ ĀVARAṆ -a @ VIBHRAM -a @ PRAHĀṆ -āya PAṬĪY -a @ SĪTY -av a @ GAMYAT -e / </s><s> iti YUKT -ito NIRŪPIT -aṃ PRĀK ; nir UPAY -iṣyate ca PAŚCĀT / </s><s> iha punar ĀGAM -ata eva enam ARTH -am AVAGRĀH -ayitum — na VIN -ānena MĀRG -eṇa

line.left: -a @ SAṂJÑ -ā v <g/> ^ <g/> āpi me TASMIN SAMAY -e a @ BHAVIṢY -ad ABHIJĀN -āmy AHAṂ SUBHŪT -e ATĪT -e ADHV -ani PAṂC -a JĀT -i @ ŚAT -āni yo AHAṂ KṢĀNTIVĀD -ī ṚṢ -ir abhūv AṂS TATR ^ <g/> āpi me n ĀTM -a @ SAṂJÑ -ā @ BHŪN na SATV -a @ SAṂJÑ -ā na JĪV -a @ SAṂJÑ -ā na PUDGAL -a @ SAṂJÑ -ā / </s><s> TASMĀT TARH -i SUBHŪT -e BODHISATV -ena MAH -ā @ SATV -ena SARVASAṂJÑ -ā VARJAY -itvā ḥrimāṇena / </s><s> SARV -e te SATV -ā MAM -āṃ SEN -a
line.right: -iṃ DHĀRAY -iṣyanti / </s><s> TAT kasya HET -oḥ na hi ŚAKY -aṃ SUBHŪT -e AYAṂ DHARMAPARYĀY -o HĪN - @ ĀDHIMUKTIK -aiḥ SATV -aiḥ ŚROT -uṃ <g/> / </s><s> n ĀTM -a @ DṚṢṬIK -air na SATV -a @ JĪV -a @ PUDGAL -a @ DṚṢṬIK -aiḥ ŚAKY -aṃ ŚROT -uṃ UDGRAH -ītuṃ vā / </s><s> YĀVAT PARYAVĀPT -uṃ vā n EDAṂ STHĀN -aṃ VID -yate / </s><s> api tu KHAL -u punaḥ SUBHŪT -e YATR -a PṚTHIV -ī @ PRADEŚ -e IDAṂ SŪTR -aṃ PRAKĀŚ -ayiṣyati / </s><s> PŪJANĪY -aḥ sa PṚTHIV -ī @ PRADEŚ -o BHAV -iṣyati / </s><s> SAD eva MĀNUṢ -

line.left: sa PṚTHIV -ī @ PRADEŚ -o BHAV -iṣyati / </s><s> SAD eva MĀNUṢ - @ ĀSURAS -ya LOK -asya VANDANĪY -aḥ PRADAKṢIṆ -ī @ KARAṆĪY -aś CAITY -a @ BHŪT a sa PṚTHIV -ī @ PRADEŚ -o BHAV -iṣyati / </s><s> ye te SUBHŪT -e KULAPUTR -ā vā KULADUHIT -aro vā / </s><s> imān evaṃ RŪP -ān SŪTRĀNT -ān UDGRAH -īṣyanti YĀVAT PARYAVĀPS -yanti / </s><s> te PARIBHŪT -ā BHAV -iṣyanti su @ PARIBHŪT -āḥ yāni ca teṣāṃ SATV -ānāṃ PŪRVAJANMIK -āny a @ ŚUBHĀN -i KARM -āṇy APĀY -a @ SAṂVARTANĪY -āni tāni DṚṢṬ -a eva DHARM -e PARIBHŪT -atayā KṢAPAY -iṣyanti budda
line.right: -iṃ c ĀNUPR - @ ĀPS -yanti / </s><s> ABHIJĀN -āmy AHAṂ SUBHŪT -e ATĪT -e ADHV -any ASAṂKHYEY -aiḥ KALP -air ASAṂKHYEY -atarair DĪPAṂKAR -asya TATHĀGAT -asy ĀRHAT -aḥ SAMYAKSAṂBUDDH -asya PAR -eṇa CATU -ra ŚĪT -ir BUDDH -a @ KOṬ -ī @ NIYUT -a @ ŚATASAHASR -āṇy a @ BHŪ -van yāni MAY -ā ĀRĀG -itāni ĀRĀG -ya ca na VIRĀG -itāni / yac ca MAY -ā SUBHŪT -e te BUDDH -ā BHAGAV -anta ĀRĀG -ya na VIRĀG -itā yac ca CARIM -e KĀL -e PAŚCIM -āyāṃ PAṂCĀŚAT -yāṃ vartam ĀNĀY -ām imāṃ SŪTRĀNT -ān UDGRAH -īṣyanti / </s><s> YĀVAT

line.left: -a @ KUŚAL -aṃ PARAMĀRTH -a @ DARŚ -in DHARMEŚVAR -aṃ ŚIRAS -i VAND -ami DHARMARĀJ -am // 3 // </s><s> na ca NĀM -a asti na ca n <g/> ^ <g/> āsti GIR -aṃ PRABHĀṢ -i HET -uṃ PRATĪTY -a imi SAṂBHAV -i SARVADHARM -āḥ / n AIVĀTR -a ĀTM -ana ca KĀRAK -u VEDAK -o vā na ca KARM -u NAŚ -yati ŚUBH -am a @ ŚUBH -aṃ ca KIṂCIT // 4 // </s><s> MĀR -as tvayāstu VIJIT -as SABAL -o MUNĪNDR -aḥ PRĀPT -ā ŚIV -ā a @ MṚT -aś ĀNT -a @ VAR - @ ĀGR -a @
line.right: -iḥ / YASMIN n a @ VEDIT -a na CITT -a @ MAN -aḥ PRACĀR -ā SARV -aku TĪRTHIK -a @ GAṆ -āś ca na yānti GĀH -aṃ // 5 // </s><s> CAKR -aṃ ca te TRIPARIVART -i BAH -u PRAKĀR -aṃ PRĀVARTIT -aṃ PRAŚAMAN -aṃ PRAKṚT -ī @ VIŚUDDH -am / PRATYAKṢ -a @ DEVAM -anuj ĀDBHUT -a @ DHARMARĀJ -ā RATN -āni TRĪṆ -i UPADARŚIT -a TATR -a KĀL -e // 6 // </s><s> ye TUBH -ya DHARMAR -a @ TAN ena VINĪT -a SAMYA -k teṣām a @ KALPAN -a punaḥ SATAT -e PRAŚĀNT -ā / VAIDYOTTAM -aṃ MARAṆ

line.left: TĀDṚŚ -aṃ m ĀP -ayeta <g/> ; </s><s> na c ĀKĀŚ -aṃ ŚAK -yate m ĀPAYIT -uṃ n <g/> ^ <g/> āpy ALAṂKART -um / </s><s> evam eva RATNĀKAR -a ĀKĀŚ -a @ SAMĀN SARVADHARM -āñ JÑĀTV -ā / </s><s> YĀDṚŚ -am ICCH -ed BODHISATV -aḥ SATV -a @ PARIPĀK -āya BUDDHAKṢETR -aṃ m ĀPAYIT -uṃ TĀDṚŚ -aṃ BUDDHAKṢETR -aṃ m ĀP -ayati <g/> ; </s><s> na ca BUDDHAKṢETR - @ ĀKĀŚ -atā ŚAKY -aṃ m ĀPAYIT -uṃ n <g/> ^ <g/> āpy ALAṂKART -um / </s><s> api ca RATNĀKAR -a <g/> ; </s><s> ĀŚAY -a @ KṢETR -aṃ BODHISATV -asya BUDDHAKṢETR -am <g/> ; </s><s> tasya

line.left: - @ OTPĀD -ena TATHAT -ā @ NIRODH -ena vā / </s><s> na ca TATHAT - @ OTPAD -yate na NIRUDH -yate <g/> ; </s><s> na NIROTS -yate / </s><s> yā ca SARV -a @ SATV -ānāṃ TATHAT -ā <g/> ; </s><s> yā ca SARVADHARM -āṇāṃ TATHAT -ā <g/> ; </s><s> s <g/> ^ <g/> aiva MAITREY -asy <g/> ^ <g/> āpi TATHAT -ā / </s><s> evaṃ yadi tvaṃ VYĀKṚT -aḥ SARV -a @ SATV -ā api VYĀKṚT -ā BHAV -anti / </s><s> TAT KASMĀD d HET -oḥ / </s><s> na hi TATHAT -ā DVAY -a @ PRABHĀV -itā NĀN -ātva PRABHĀV -itā / </s><s> TAD yadā MAITREY -o
line.right: -im ABHISAṂBHOTS -yate <g/> ; </s><s> SARV -a @ SATV -ā api TASMIN SAMAY -e TĀDṚŚ -īm eva BODH -im ABHISAṂBHOTS -yante / </s><s> TAT KASMĀD d HET -oḥ / </s><s> SARV -a @ SATV - @ ĀNUBODH -o hi BODH -iḥ / </s><s> yadā ca MAITREY -aḥ PARINIRV -āsyati <g/> ; </s><s> SARV -a @ SATV -ā api tadā PARINIRV -āsyanti / </s><s> TAT KASMĀD d HET -oḥ / </s><s> na hy a @ PARINIRVṚT -ānāṃ SARV -a @ SATV -ānāṃ TATHĀGAT -āḥ PARINIRV -ānti / </s><s> PARINIRVṚT -āni te SATV -āni PAŚ -yanti NIRVĀṆ -a @ PRAKṚT -ikāni / </s><s> TASMĀD iha MAITREY -a mā etān DEVAPUTR

line.left: -a @ RAS -o VIMALAKĪRT -iṃ NAMASKṚT -y <g/> ^^ <g/> aivam āhuḥ <g/> : </s><s> KATHAṂ VAYAṂ GṚHAPAT -e MĀR -a @ BHAVAN -e AVATIṢṬH -ema / </s><s> ĀH -a <g/> : </s><s> asti BHAGIN -yaḥ a @ KṢAY -a @ PRADĪP -aṃ NĀM -a DHARMAMUKH -am / </s><s> TATR -a PRATIPADY ADHV -am / </s><s> TAT punaḥ KATAM -at / </s><s> TADYATH -ā BHAGIN -yaḥ e KASMĀT TAIL -a @ PRADĪP -ād DĪP -a @ ŚATASAHASR -āṇy ĀD -īpyante / </s><s> na ca tasya DĪP -asya PARIHĀṆ -ir BHAV -ati / </s><s> evam eva BHAGIN -yaḥ eko BODHISATV -o BAH -ūni SATV -a @ ŚATASAHASR -āṇi
line.right: -au PRATIṢṬHĀP -ayati / </s><s> na ca tasya BODHISATV -asya CITT -a @ SMṚT -ir hīyate <g/> ; </s><s> na PARIH -īyate <g/> ; </s><s> uta ca VARDH -ate / </s><s> evaṃ SARV -ān KUŚAL -ān DHARM -ān yathā yathā PAR -eṣām ĀROC -ayati DEŚ -ayati <g/> ; </s><s> tathā tathā VIVARDH -ate SARV -aiḥ KUŚAL -air DHARM -aiḥ / </s><s> IDAṂ TAD a @ KṢAY -a @ PRADĪP -aṃ NĀM -a DHARMAMUKH -am / </s><s> TATR -a y UṢM -ābhir MĀR -a @ BHAVAN -e STHIT -ābhir a @ PARIMĀṆ -ānāṃ DEVAPUTR -āṇām APS -a @ RAS -āṃ ca BODHICITT -aṃ ROCAY -itavyam / </s><s> evaṃ YŪY

line.left: <s> tasy ĀDHYĀLAMBANAT -ayā kā PARIJÑ -ā <g/> ; </s><s> yad IDAM ĀLAMBAN - @ ĀNUPALAMBH -aḥ / </s><s> yaṃ hi n OPALABH -yate taṃ NĀL -am BAT -e / </s><s> kiṃ ca n OPALABH -ate <g/> ; </s><s> UBH -e DṚṢṬ -ī n OPALABH -ate <g/> ; </s><s> yad IDAM ĀTM -a @ DṚṢṬ -iṃ PARADṚṢṬ -iṃ ca / </s><s> TAD UC -yate ANUPALAMBH -a iti / </s><s> evaṃ hi MAÑJUŚR -īḥ GLĀN -ena BODHISATV -ena SVACITT -aṃ NIDH -y @ APAY -i @ TAVY -aṃ JAR - @ ĀVYĀDH -i @ MARAṆ - @ OPAPATT -i @ PRAHĀṆ -āya / </s><s> evaṃ ca MAÑJUŚR -īḥ BODHISATV -ānāṃ
line.right: -ir yadi na BHAV -et <g/> ; </s><s> NIRARTH -ako NAN -u VYĀYĀM -o BHAV -et / </s><s> yathā PRATYARTHIK -a @ NIRGHĀT -āc CHUR -ā ity UCYANT -e <g/> ; </s><s> evam eva JAR - @ ĀVYĀDH -i @ MARAṆ -a @ DUḤKH - @ OPAŚAMAN -ād BODHISATV -ā ity UCYANT -e / </s><s> tena BODHISATV -ena VYĀDHIT -en <g/> ^^ <g/> aivaṃ PRATYAVEKṢ -itavyam / </s><s> yathā MAM -a VYĀDH -ir ABHŪT -o a @ SAN -n evaṃ SARV -a @ SATV -ānām api VYĀDH -ir ABHŪT -o a @ SAN -n iti / </s><s> tasy <g/> ^^ <g/> aivaṃ PRATYAVEKṢ -amāṇasya n ĀNUŚAṂS

line.left: @ SAṂGṚHĪT -ā PRAJÑ -ā MOKṢ -aḥ <g/> ; </s><s> yad IDAṂ LAKṢ -an ĀNUVYAÑJAN -a @ BUDDHAKṢETR - @ ĀLAṂKĀR -a @ SATV -a @ PARIPĀCAN -a @ NIDHYAPT -i @ CITT -aṃ ca ŚŪNYAT - @ ĀNIMITT -ā @ PRAṆIHIT -a @ PARIJAY -aś ca / </s><s> iyam UPĀY -a @ SAṂGṚHĪT -ā PRAJÑ -ā MOKṢ -aḥ / </s><s> TATR -a KATAM -aḥ PRAJÑ -ayā SAṂGṚHĪT -a UPĀY -o BANDH -aḥ <g/> ; </s><s> yad IDAṂ SARV -a @ DṚṢṬIK -leśa PARYUTTHĀN - @ ĀNUŚAYĀN -u NAY -a @ PRATIGH -a @ PRATIṢṬHIT -asya SARV -a @ KUŚALAMŪL - @ ĀRAMBH -o
line.right: -au cā PARIṆĀMAN -ā / </s><s> AYAṂ PRAJÑ -ayā SAṂGṚHĪT -a UPĀY -o BANDH -aḥ / </s><s> TATR -a KATAM -aḥ PRAJÑ -ā @ SAṂGṚHĪT -a UPĀY -o MOKṢ -aḥ <g/> ; </s><s> yad IDAṂ SARV -a @ DṚṢṬIK -leśa PARYUTTHĀN - @ ĀNUŚAYĀN -u NAY -a @ PRATIGH -a @ PRAHĪṆ -asya SARV -a @ KUŚALAMŪL - @ ĀRAMBH -o BODH -au PARIṆĀM -itas tasya cā PARĀMARŚ -aḥ / </s><s> AYAṂ BODHISATV -asya PRAJÑ -ā @ SAṂGṚHĪT -a UPĀY -o MOKṢ -aḥ / </s><s> TATR -a MAÑJUŚR -īḥ GLĀN -ena BODHISATV -en <g/> ^^ <g/> aivam ime DHARM -ā NIDH -y @ APAY -i

line.left: -a KATAM -aḥ PRAJÑ -ayā SAṂGṚHĪT -a UPĀY -o BANDH -aḥ <g/> ; </s><s> yad IDAṂ SARV -a @ DṚṢṬIK -leśa PARYUTTHĀN - @ ĀNUŚAYĀN -u NAY -a @ PRATIGH -a @ PRATIṢṬHIT -asya SARV -a @ KUŚALAMŪL - @ ĀRAMBH -o BODH -au cā PARIṆĀMAN -ā / </s><s> AYAṂ PRAJÑ -ayā SAṂGṚHĪT -a UPĀY -o BANDH -aḥ / </s><s> TATR -a KATAM -aḥ PRAJÑ -ā @ SAṂGṚHĪT -a UPĀY -o MOKṢ -aḥ <g/> ; </s><s> yad IDAṂ SARV -a @ DṚṢṬIK -leśa PARYUTTHĀN - @ ĀNUŚAYĀN -u NAY -a @ PRATIGH -a @ PRAHĪṆ -asya SARV -a @ KUŚALAMŪL - @ ĀRAMBH -o
line.right: -au PARIṆĀM -itas tasya cā PARĀMARŚ -aḥ / </s><s> AYAṂ BODHISATV -asya PRAJÑ -ā @ SAṂGṚHĪT -a UPĀY -o MOKṢ -aḥ / </s><s> TATR -a MAÑJUŚR -īḥ GLĀN -ena BODHISATV -en <g/> ^^ <g/> aivam ime DHARM -ā NIDH -y @ APAY -i @ TAVY -āḥ / </s><s> yatl KĀY -asya CITT -asya ca VYĀDH -eś cā NITY -a @ DUḤKH -a @ ŚŪNY -ānātma PRATYAVEKṢAṆ -ā <g/> ; </s><s> iyam asya PRAJÑ -ā / </s><s> yat punaḥ KĀYAVY - @ ĀDHIPARIHAR -aṇatayā na KHID -yate <g/> ; </s><s> na PRATIBADHN -āti SAṂSĀR -am <g/> ; </s><s> SATV - @ ĀRTH -a @ YOG -am ANUYUKT -aḥ

line.left: ; </s><s> DṚḌH -a @ MAITR -ī VAJR -a @ DṚḌH -ā @ BHEDY - @ ĀŚAY -atayā <g/> ; </s><s> ŚUDDH -a @ MAITR -ī PRAKṚT -iś UDDHAT -ayā <g/> ; </s><s> SAM -a @ MAITR -y ĀKĀŚ -a @ SAMAT -ayā <g/> ; </s><s> ARHAN MAITR -y ari NIRGHĀTAN -atayā <g/> ; </s><s> BODHISATV -a @ MAITR -ī SATV -a @ PARIPĀK -ā @ SRAṂSAN -atayā <g/> ; </s><s> TATHĀGAT -a @ MAITR -ī TATHAT - @ ĀNUBODHAN -atayā <g/> ; </s><s> BUDDH -a @ MAITR -ī SUPT -a @ SATV -a @ PRABODHAN -atayā <g/> ; </s><s> SVAYAMBH -u MAITR -ī SVAY -am ABHISAṂBODHAN -atayā

line.left: na KṚT -ir na VIKṚT -is TAD BUDDH -a @ VACAN -am / </s><s> ĀH -a <g/> : </s><s> itas tvaṃ DEVAT -e CYUT -ā KUTR -o @ PAP -atsyase / </s><s> ĀH -a <g/> : </s><s> YATR ^ <g/> aiva TATHĀGAT -a @ NIRMIT -a @ UPAP -atsyate <g/> ; </s><s> tatr <g/> ^ <g/> aiv <g/> ^ ĀHAM UPAP -atsye / </s><s> ĀH -a <g/> : </s><s> TATHĀGAT -a @ NIRMIT -asya na CYUT -ir n OPAPATT -iḥ / </s><s> ĀH -a <g/> : </s><s> evam eva SARVADHARM -āṇāṃ na CYUT -ir n OPAPATT -iḥ / </s><s> ĀH -a <g/> : </s><s> KIY -ac CIREṆ -a punar DEVAT -e

line.left: ĀVAIVARTIK -a @ SAMAVASARAṆ -ā PRAṆIDHĀN -a @ VAŚ -ena yath ECCHAT -i tathā TIṢṬHAT -i SATV -a @ PARIPĀK -āya // // </s><s> DEVAT -ā @ PARIVART -aḥ ṢAṢṬH -aḥ // </s><s> atha KHAL -u MAÑJUŚR -īḥ KUMĀRABHŪT -o VIMALAKĪRT -iṃ LICCHAV -im evam ĀH -a <g/> : </s><s> KATHAṂ KULAPUTR -a BODHISATV -o GATIṂGAT -o BHAV -ati BUDDH -a @ DHARM -eṣu / </s><s> ĀH -a <g/> : </s><s> yadā MAÑJUŚR -īḥ BODHISATV -oa GAT -i @ GAMAN -aṃ GACCH -ati <g/> ; </s><s> tadā BODHISATV -o GATIṂGAT -o BHAV -ati BUDDH -a @ DHARM -eṣu / </s><s> ĀH -a <g/> : </s><s> KATAM -ac ca

line.left: VĀH -anaṃ vā / </s><s> evam UKT -e VIMALAKĪRT -ir LICCHAV -iḥ SARVARŪPASAṂDARŚAN -aṃ BODHISATV -aṃ GĀTH -ābhir ADHYABHĀṢAT : </s><s> PRAJÑĀPĀRAMIT -ā MĀT -ā BODHISATV -āna MĀRIṢ -a / </s><s> PIT -ā c OPĀYAKAUŚALY -aṃ yato j-āyanti NĀYAK -āḥ // 1 BHĀRY -ā DHARM -a @ RAT -is teṣāṃ MAITR -i KARUṆ -ā ca DUHIT -arau / </s><s> SATY -a @ DHARM -āv UBH -au PUTR -au GṚH -aṃ ŚŪNY - @ ĀRTH -a @ CINTAN -ā // 2 SARV -a @ KLEŚ -ās tathā ŚIṢY -ā yat HEṢṬ -a @ VAŚAVART -inaḥ / </s><s> BODHYAṄG -āś c <g/> ^ <g/> aiva MITR -āṇi

line.left: AYAṂ DHARMAPARYĀY -aḥ PRACAR -iṣyati DEŚAY -iṣyati SAṂPRAKĀŚ -ayiṣyati <g/> ; </s><s> TATR - @ ĀHAṂ SAPARIVĀR -o DHARM -a @ ŚRAVAṆ -āyo PAS -aṃkr ĀM -iṣyāmi / </s><s> a @ PRASANN -ānāṃ ca KULAPUTR -āṇāṃ PRASĀD -am UTPĀDAY -iṣyāmi <g/> ; </s><s> PRASANN -ānāṃ ca DHĀRMIK -iṃ RAKṢĀVARAṆAGUPT -iṃ KAR -iṣyāmi / </s><s> evam UKT -e BHAGAV -āñ ŚAKR -aṃ DEV -ānām INDR -am ETAD AVOCAT : </s><s> SĀDH -u SĀDH -u DEV -ānam INDR -a <g/> ; </s><s> su @ BHĀṢIT -aṃ te ANUMOD -ate TATHĀGAT -aḥ / </s><s> yā DEV -ānām INDR -a ATĪT -ān ĀGAT -a @ PRATYUTPANN -ānāṃ BUDDH -ānāṃ BHAG -avatāṃ
line.right: -ir iha DHARMAPARYĀY -a UDDIṢṬ -ā / </s><s> TASMĀD iha DEV - @ ENDR -a ATĪT -ān ĀGAT -a @ PRATYUTPANN -ās tena KULAPUTR -eṇa va KULADUHIT -rā vā BUDDH -ā BHAGAV -antaḥ PŪJIT -ā BHAV -iṣyanti <g/> ; </s><s> ya imaṃ DHARMAPARYĀY -am UDGRAH -īṣyaty antaśaḥ PUSTAK -a @ LIKHIT -am api KAR -iṣyati VĀCAY -iṣyati LIKH -iṣyati PARYAVĀPS -yati / </s><s> yaś ca punar DEV - @ ENDR -a KULAPUTR -o vā KULADUHIT -ā VEM -aṃ TRISĀHASR -a @ MAH -ā @ SĀHASR -aṃ LOKADHĀT -uṃ TATHĀGAT -a @ PŪRṆ -aṃ TADYATHĀP -i NĀM -e KṢUV -anaṃ vā NAḌ -a @

line.left: -ān SŪTRĀNT -ān ROCAY -iṣyanti PRAVART -ayiṣyanti / </s><s> VEDITAVY -am ETAD BHAGAV -an MAITREY -asya BODHISATV -asy ĀDHIṢṬHĀN -am iti / </s><s> atha BHAGAV -ān MAITREY -asya BODHISATV -asya SĀDHUKĀR -am a @ DĀT : </s><s> SĀDH -u SĀDH -u MAITREY -a <g/> ; </s><s> su @ BHĀṢIT -ā ta iyaṃ VĀK / </s><s> ANUMOD -ate TATHĀGAT -o ANUJĀN -āti ca SUBH - @ ĀSIT -am / </s><s> atha te BODHISATV -ā EK -a @ SVAREṆ -a VĀC -am a @ BHĀṢ -anta <g/> : </s><s> VAYAM api BHAGAV -an TATHĀGAT -asya PARINIRVṚT -asy ĀNYONY -ebhyo BUDDHAKṢETR -ebhya ĀGATY -emāṃ TATHĀGAT -a @ BUDDH -a @
line.right: -iṃ VAISTĀRIK -īṃ KARIṢY -āmaḥ / </s><s> teṣāṃ ca KULAPUTR -āṇām ĀROCAY -iṣyāmaḥ / </s><s> atha CATVĀR -o MAHĀRĀJ -āno BHAGAV -antam ETAD AVOC -an <g/> : </s><s> YATR -a YATR -a BHAGAV -an GRĀM -a @ NAGAR -a @ NIGAM -a @ RĀṢṬR -a @ RĀJ -a @ DHĀN - @ ĪṢV ima evaṃ RŪP -ā DHARMAPARYĀY -āḥ PRACAR -iṣyanti DEŚAY -iṣyanti PRAKĀŚ -ayiṣyanti <g/> ; </s><s> TATR -a TATR -a VAYAṂ BHAGAV -an CATVĀR -o MAHĀRĀJ -āḥ SABAL -āḥ sa VĀHAN -āḥ SAPARIVĀR -ā DHARM -a @ ŚRAVAṆ -āyo PAS -aṃ KRAM -iṣyāmaḥ / </s><s> tasya ca DHARMABHĀṆAK -asya SAMANT -ato YOJAN -a

line.left: -u punaḥ SAMAY -ena GRĀM -a @ NAGAR -a @ NIGAM -a @ JANAPAD -eṣu PIṆḌAPĀTIK -o BHIKṢ -uḥ PIṆḌAPĀT -āy ĀVATAR -ati / </s><s> yadā tvad GṚH -am ĀGAT -o ABHŪT tadā tvaṃ DĀRIK -e PIṆḌAPĀT -aṃ GṚHĪT -vā GṚH -ān NIṢKRĀNT -ā punar eva PRAVIṢṬ -ābhūḥ / </s><s> na c ĀHAṂ MUṆḌIT -a @ ŚIRAS -o a @ DHANY -asya PIṆḌAPĀT -aṃ DĀS -yāmi / </s><s> tena KARM - @ OPACAY -ena tvayā DĀRIK -e DVĀDAŚ -a KALP -a @ SAHASR -āṇi punaḥ punar DARIDR -a @ GṚH -e DUḤKH -āny ANUBHŪT -āni / </s><s> EK -ena tvayā DĀRIK -e KUŚALAMŪL -ena

line.left: ĀNUPALAMBH -aḥ / </s><s> PAŚYAT -āṃ GUR -utvaṃ tāṃ DĪRGH -aṃ NIMITT -aṃ VĪRY -am ĀTM -anaḥ / MĀN -ināṃ BODHISATV -ānāṃ DŪR -e BODH -ir NIRŪP -yate // <g/> 9 — 80 <g/> // </s><s> ye ca GUR -utvaṃ BAH -utvaṃ PAŚ -yanti ADBHUT -a @ DHARM -a @ YUKT -aṃ / </s><s> DĪRGH -aṃ ca KĀL -aṃ PAŚ -yanti TAT SAMUDĀGAM -āya / </s><s> NIMITT -aṃ na PAŚ -yanti CITT - @ ĀLAMBAN -aṃ / </s><s> ĀTM -anaś ca VĪRY -aṃ VAYAM ĀRABDH -a @ VĪRY -ā BUDDHAT -vaṃ PRĀP -syāma iti / </s><s> teṣām evaṃ MĀN -ināṃ BODHISATV -ānām AUPALAMBHIK -atvāt DŪR -e
line.right: -ir NIRŪP -yate / </s><s> PAŚYAT -ām KALPAN -ā @ MĀTR -aṃ SARV -am ETAD yath ODIT -aṃ / a @ KALP -a @ BODHISATV -ānāṃ PRĀPT -ā BODH -ir NIRŪP -yate // <g/> 9 — 81 <g/> // </s><s> KALPAN -ā @ MĀTR -aṃ tv ETAT SARV -am iti PAŚYAT -āṃ tasy <g/> ^ <g/> āpi KALPAN -ā @ MĀTR -asya <g/> ^ a @ VIKALPAN -ād a @ KALP -a @ BODHISATV -ānām ANUTPATTIK -a @ DHARM -a @ KṢĀNT -i @ LĀBH - @ ĀVASTHĀY -ām ARTH -ataḥ PRĀPT ^ <g/> aiva BODH -ir ity UC -yate / </s><s> BUDDH

line.left: -a @ SAMĀDHIGAT -ānāṃ KŪRM -a @ PRAKHY -ā SVĀRTH -avatāṃ BHṚTY - @ OPAM -ā / </s><s> RĀJ -a @ PRAKHY -ā PARĀRTH -avatāṃ / </s><s> ETAM ev ĀRTH -aṃ PAR -eṇ OPAPĀDY -a MAHĀYĀN - @ ĀDHIMUKT -au SAMĀDĀP -ayati / </s><s> ADHIMUKT -i @ LAY -a @ PRATIṢEDH -e ŚLOK -āḥ / </s><s> MANUṢ -aṣya BHŪT āḥ SAṂBODH -iṃ PRĀPN -uvanti PRATIKṢAṆ -am / a @ PRAMEY -ā yataḥ SATV -ā LAY -aṃ nāto ADHIVĀSAY -et // <g/> 1 <g/> 0 — 11 <g/> // </s><s> TRI -bhiḥ KĀRAṆ -air LAY -o na YUKT -aḥ / </s><s> yato MANUṢ -a @ BHŪT ā

line.left: <s> ADHIPRAJÑ -ā @ SAṂPĀDAN - @ ĀBHIDHARM -eṇā VIPARĪT - @ ĀRTH -a @ PRAVICAY -āt / </s><s> punar DHARM - @ ĀRTH -a @ DEŚAN -ā SŪTR -eṇa / </s><s> DHARM - @ ĀRTH -a @ NIṢPATT -ir VINAY -ena KLEŚ -a @ VINAY -a @ SAṂYUKT -a @ SASY -a tayoḥ PRATIVEDH -āt / </s><s> DHARM - @ ĀRTH -a @ SĀṂKATHY -a @ VINIŚCAY -a @ KAUŚALY -am ABHIDHARM -eṇeti / </s><s> ebhir nabhiḥ KĀRAṆ -aiḥ PIṬAK -atr AYAM IṢṬ -aṃ / </s><s> tac ca SAṂSĀR -ād VIMOCAN - @ ĀRTH -aṃ / </s><s> KATHAṂ punas TAD VIMOC -ayati / </s><s> VĀSAN -a @
line.right: -a @ ŚAMAN -a @ PRATIVEDH -ais TAD VIMOC -ayati / </s><s> ŚRUT -ena CITT -a @ VĀSAN -ataḥ / </s><s> CINTAY -ā BODHAN -ataḥ / </s><s> BHĀVAN -ayā ŚAMATH -ena ŚAMAN -ataḥ / </s><s> VIPAŚYAN -ayā PRATIVEDH -ataḥ / </s><s> SŪTR - @ ĀBHIDHARM -a @ VINAY -āś CATU -r VIDH - @ ĀRTH -ā MAT -āḥ SAM -ā @ SEN -a / teṣāṃ JÑĀN -ād dhīmān SARVĀKĀRAJÑAT -ām eti // <g/> 11 — 2 <g/> // </s><s> te ca SŪTR -a @ VINAY - @ ĀBHIDHARM -āḥ PRATYEK -aṃ CATU -r VIDH - @ ĀRTH -āḥ SAMĀSAT -as teṣāṃ JÑĀN -ād BODHISATV -aḥ SARVAJÑAT

line.left: -asya TULY -atvād EKAYĀN -atā ŚRĀVAK - @ ĀD -īnām ĀTM -ā @ BHĀVAT -ā @ SĀMĀNY -ād yātā YĀN -am iti KṚTV -ā VIMUKT -i @ TULY -atvād EKAYĀN -atā yāti YĀN -am iti KṚTV -ā / </s><s> GOTRABH -e DĀD EKAYĀN -atā / </s><s> a @ NIYAT -a @ ŚRĀVAK -a @ GOTR -āṇāṃ MAHĀYĀN -ena NIRYĀṆ -ād yānti tena YĀN -am iti KṚTV -ā dvy ĀŚAY - @ ĀPT -er EKAYĀN -atā BUDDH -ānāṃ ca SARV -a @ SATV -eṣv ĀTM - @ ĀŚAY -a @ PRĀPT -eḥ ŚRĀVAK -āṇāṃ ca TAD GOTR -a @ NIYAT -ānāṃ PŪRV -aṃ
line.right: -i @ SAṂBHĀR -a @ CARIT -ād an @ ĀTM -ani BADDH - @ ĀŚAY -a @ PRĀPT -er ABHINN -a @ SAṂTĀN - @ ĀDHIMOKṢ -a @ LĀBH -ato BUDDH - @ ĀNUBHĀV -ena TATHĀGAT - @ ĀNUGRAH -a @ VIŚEṢ -a @ PRADEŚ -a @ LĀBH -āya ity EK -atv ĀŚAY -a @ LĀBH -e NAIK -atvāt BUDDHAT -ac CHRĀVAK -āṇām EKAYĀN -atā / </s><s> NIRMĀṆ -ād EKAYĀN -atā YATHOKT -am an @ EKAŚ -ata KṚTV -o AHAṂ ŚRĀVAKAYĀN -ena PARINIRVṚT -a iti VINEY -ānām ARTH -e tathā NIRMĀṆ -a @ SAṂDARŚAN -āt / </s><s> PARYANT -ād apy EKAYĀN -atā

line.left: @ ĀBHIRAT -atvāc ca tau DHANDH -a @ GATIK -au MAT -au / punaḥ punaḥ SVACITT -asya SAMUDĀCĀR -ayo GAT -aḥ // <g/> 11 — 58 <g/> // </s><s> tau ca NIRVĀṆ - @ ĀBHIRAT -atvād UBH -āv api DHANDH -a @ GATIK -au MAT -au ci RAT -areṇ ĀBHISAṂBODH -ataḥ / </s><s> SV -asya ŚRĀVAK -a @ CITT -asya NIRV -it SAHAGAT -asy ĀBHĪKṢṆ -aṃ SAMUDĀCĀR -āt / </s><s> so a @ KṚT - @ ĀRTH -o hy a @ BUDDH -e ca JĀT -o DHYĀN - @ ĀRTH -am UDYAT -aḥ / NIRMĀṆ - @ ĀRTH -ī TAD ĀŚRITY -a PARĀṂ
line.right: -im AVĀPN -ute // <g/> 11 — 59 <g/> // </s><s> yaḥ punar a @ SĀV a @ VĪT -a @ RĀG -o DṚṢṬ -a @ SATY -aḥ so a @ KṚT - @ ĀRTH -aḥ ŚAIKṢ -o BHAV -an BUDDH -ara HIT -e KĀL -e JĀT -o DHYĀN - @ ĀRTH -am UDYAT -o BHAV -ati NIRMĀṆ - @ ĀRTH -ī / </s><s> tac ca NIRMĀṆ -am ĀŚRITY -a KRAM -eṇa PARĀṂ BODH -iṃ PRĀPN -oti / </s><s> tam AVASTHĀTRAY -a @ STH -aṃ SAṂDHĀY - @ OKT -aṃ BHAGAV -atā ŚRĪMĀL -ā @ SŪTR -e / </s><s> ŚRĀVAK -o BHŪTV -ā PRATYEKABUDDH

line.left: @ ĀRTH -o hy a @ BUDDH -e ca JĀT -o DHYĀN - @ ĀRTH -am UDYAT -aḥ / NIRMĀṆ - @ ĀRTH -ī TAD ĀŚRITY -a PARĀṂ BODH -im AVĀPN -ute // <g/> 11 — 59 <g/> // </s><s> yaḥ punar a @ SĀV a @ VĪT -a @ RĀG -o DṚṢṬ -a @ SATY -aḥ so a @ KṚT - @ ĀRTH -aḥ ŚAIKṢ -o BHAV -an BUDDH -ara HIT -e KĀL -e JĀT -o DHYĀN - @ ĀRTH -am UDYAT -o BHAV -ati NIRMĀṆ - @ ĀRTH -ī / </s><s> tac ca NIRMĀṆ -am ĀŚRITY -a KRAM -eṇa PARĀṂ
line.right: -iṃ PRĀPN -oti / </s><s> tam AVASTHĀTRAY -a @ STH -aṃ SAṂDHĀY - @ OKT -aṃ BHAGAV -atā ŚRĪMĀL -ā @ SŪTR -e / </s><s> ŚRĀVAK -o BHŪTV -ā PRATYEKABUDDH -o BHAV -ati PUN -aś ca BUDDH -a iti / </s><s> AGN -i @ DṚṢṬĀNT -e ca yadā ca PŪRV -aṃ DṚṢṬ -a @ SATY - @ ĀVASTH -ā sadā BUDDH -ara HIT -e KĀL -e SVAY -aṃ DHYĀN -am UTPĀDY -a JANM -a @ KĀY -aṃ TYAKTV -ā NIRMĀṆAKĀY -aṃ GṚHṆ -āti yadā ca PARĀṂ BODH -iṃ PRĀPN -ot <g/> ^ <g/> īti / </s><s> VIDYĀSTHĀN -a @ PARYEṢṬ -au ŚLOK -aḥ / </s>

line.left: -ati NIRMĀṆ - @ ĀRTH -ī / </s><s> tac ca NIRMĀṆ -am ĀŚRITY -a KRAM -eṇa PARĀṂ BODH -iṃ PRĀPN -oti / </s><s> tam AVASTHĀTRAY -a @ STH -aṃ SAṂDHĀY - @ OKT -aṃ BHAGAV -atā ŚRĪMĀL -ā @ SŪTR -e / </s><s> ŚRĀVAK -o BHŪTV -ā PRATYEKABUDDH -o BHAV -ati PUN -aś ca BUDDH -a iti / </s><s> AGN -i @ DṚṢṬĀNT -e ca yadā ca PŪRV -aṃ DṚṢṬ -a @ SATY - @ ĀVASTH -ā sadā BUDDH -ara HIT -e KĀL -e SVAY -aṃ DHYĀN -am UTPĀDY -a JANM -a @ KĀY -aṃ TYAKTV -ā NIRMĀṆAKĀY -aṃ GṚHṆ -āti yadā ca PARĀṂ
line.right: -iṃ PRĀPN -ot <g/> ^ <g/> īti / </s><s> VIDYĀSTHĀN -a @ PARYEṢṬ -au ŚLOK -aḥ / </s><s> VIDYĀSTHĀN -e PAÑC -a @ VIDH -e YOG -am a @ KṚTV -ā SARVAJÑAT -vaṃ na iti KATHAṂ cit PARAMĀR -yaḥ / ity ANY -eṣāṃ ni GRAHAṆ - @ ĀNUGRAHAṆ -āya SV - @ ĀJÑ - @ ĀRTH -aṃ vā TATR -a KAR -oty eva sa YOG -am // <g/> 11 — 60 <g/> // </s><s> PAÑC -a @ VIDH -aṃ VIDYĀSTHĀN -aṃ / </s><s> ADHYĀTMAVIDY -ā HET -u VIDY -ā ŚABD -a @ VIDY -ā CIKITS -ā @ VIDY -ā ŚILP -a @ KARMASTHĀN -a

line.left: -ā @ VIDY -āṃ ŚILP -a @ KARMASTHĀN -a @ VIDY -āṃ cānyeṣām ANUGRAH - @ ĀRTH -aṃ TAD ARTHIK -ānāṃ / </s><s> ADHYĀTMAVIDY -āṃ SVAY -am ĀJÑ - @ ĀRTH -aṃ / </s><s> DHĀT -u PUṢṬ -i @ PARYEṢṬ -au TRAYODAŚ -a ŚLOK -āḥ / </s><s> PĀRAMIT -ā @ PARIPŪRAṆ - @ ĀRTH -aṃ ye PĀRAMIT -ā @ PRATISAṂYUKT -ā evaṃ MANASIKĀR -ā DHĀT -u PUṢṬ -aye BHAV -anti ta etābhir GĀTH -ābhir DEŚIT -āḥ / </s><s> HET - @ ŪPALABDH -i @ TUṢṬ -iś ca NIŚRAY -a @ TAD ANUSMṚT -iḥ / SĀDHĀRAṆ -a @ PHAL - @ ECCH -ā ca yathā

line.left: <s> ABHISAṂDH -i @ VIBHĀG -e ŚLOK -a @ DVAY -aṃ / </s><s> AVATĀRAṆ -a @ SAṂDH -iś ca SAṂDH -ir LAKṢAṆ -ato APAR -aḥ / PRATIPAKṢ - @ ĀBHISAṂDH -iś ca SAṂDH -iḥ PARIṆAT -āv api // <g/> 1 <g/> 2 — 16 <g/> // </s><s> ŚRĀVAK -eṣu SVABHĀV -eṣu DOṢ -āṇāṃ VINAY -e tathā / ABHIDHĀN -asya GĀMBHĪRY -e SAṂDH -ir eṣa CATU -r VIDH -aḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 2 — 17 <g/> // </s><s> a @ SĀR -e SĀR -a @ MAT -ayo VIPARYĀS -e ca su @ STHIT -āḥ / </s><s> KLEŚ -ena ca su @ SAṂKLIṢṬ -ā LABH -ante

line.left: PARIKALPIT - @ ĀD -isv a @ BHĀV -eṣu DRAṢṬAVY -o NIḤSVABHĀV - @ ĀNUTPANN - @ ĀD -i @ SARV -a @ DHARMADEŚAN -āt / </s><s> PRATIPAKṢ - @ ĀBHISAṂDH -ir DOṢ -āṇāṃ VINAY -e DRAṢṬAVY -o yath ĀṢṬ - @ ĀVARAṆ -a @ PRATIPAKṢ - @ ĀGRAYĀN -a @ SAṂBHĀṢ - @ ĀNUŚAṂS -e GĀTH -ā @ DVAY -aṃ VAKṢ -yati / </s><s> PARIṆĀMAN - @ ĀBHISAṂDH -ir ABHIDHĀN -a @ GĀMBHĪRY -e DRAṢṬAVY -o yat HĀH -a / </s><s> a @ SĀR -e sā RAT -ayo VIPARYĀS -eca SUKHIT -āḥ / </s><s> KLEŚ -ena ca su @ SAṂKLIṢṬ -ā LABH -ante
line.right: -im UTTAM -āṃ // </s><s> iti </s><s> AYAM atr ĀBHISAṂDH -iḥ / </s><s> a @ SĀR -e SĀR -a @ MAT -aya ity a @ VIKṢEP -e yeṣāṃ SĀR -a @ BUDDH -iḥ PRADHĀN -a @ BUDDH -ir VIKṢEP -o hi VISĀR -aś CETAS -aḥ / </s><s> VIPARYĀS -e ca su @ STHIT -ā iti NITY -a @ SUKH -a @ ŚUCY - @ ĀTMAGRĀH -a @ VIPARYAY -eṇā NITY - @ ĀDIK -e VIPARYĀS -e su @ STHIT -ā a @ PARIHĀṆ -itaḥ / </s><s> KLEŚ -ena ca sa SAṂKLIṢṬ -ā iti DĪRGH -a @ DUṢKAR -a @ VYĀYĀM a @ ŚRAM -eṇ ĀTYARTH

line.left: @ DVAY -a @ DHĀRAṆ -e PRAYUJ -yeta / sa hi DAŚ -a @ VIDHAMAN -u ŚAṂS -aṃ LABH -ate SATV - @ OTTAM -o dhīmān // <g/> 1 <g/> 2 — 21 <g/> // </s><s> KṚTSN -āṃ ca DHĀT -u PUṢṬ -iṃ PRĀMODY -aṃ c OTTAM -aṃ MARAṆ -a @ KĀL -e / JANM -a ca yath ĀBHIKĀM -aṃ JĀT -i @ SMAR -atāṃ ca SARVATR -a // <g/> 1 <g/> 2 — 22 <g/> // </s><s> BUDDH -aiś ca SAMAVADHĀN -aṃ tebhyaḥ ŚRAVAṆ -aṃ TATH - @ ĀGRAYĀN asya / ADHIMUKT -iṃ SAH -a BUDDH YĀDV -aya MUKH -atām āśu
line.right: -iṃ ca // <g/> 1 <g/> 2 — 23 <g/> // </s><s> BUDDH -e DHARM -e av AJÑ -eti PAÑC -a GĀTH -āḥ / </s><s> TATR -ā @ NIYAT -a @ BHED -o BODHISATV -ānām a @ NIYAT -ānāṃ MAHĀYĀN -ad BHED -aḥ / </s><s> AGRAYĀN a @ SAṂBHĀṢ -ā yā MAHĀYĀN -a @ DEŚAN -ā / </s><s> BUDDH -e ava JÑĀ - @ VARAṆAS -ya PRATIPAKṢ -a @ SAṂBHĀṢ -ā / </s><s> AHAM eva sa tena KĀL -ena VIPAŚ -vī SAMYAKSAṂBUDDH -o abhūvam iti / </s><s> DHARM -e ava JÑĀ - @ VARAṆAS -ya PRATIPAKṢ -a @ SAṂBHĀṢ -ā / </s><s> iyato GAṂG -ā @ NAD

line.left: -o n <g/> ^ <g/> āsti DHARMAT -ā @ VYATIREK -eṇa DHARM -ā @ BHĀV -āt / </s><s> TASMĀD RĀG - @ ĀD -i @ DHARMAT ^ <g/> āpi RĀG - @ ĀDY -ā @ KHY -āṃ LABH -ate sa ca NIḤSARAṆ -aṃ RĀG - @ ĀD -īnām ity evaṃ TATR - @ ĀBHISAṂDH -ir VEDITAVY -aḥ / </s><s> DHARMADHĀT -u VINIRMUKT -o YASM -ād DHARM -o na VID -yate / TASMĀT SAṂKLEŚ -a @ NIRDEŚ -e sa saṃvid dhī MAT -āṃ MAT -aḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 3 — 12 <g/> // </s><s> yad UKT -aṃ / </s><s> a @ VIDY -ā ca
line.right: -iś c AIK -am iti / </s><s> TATR ^ <g/> āpi sa KLEŚ -a @ NIRDEŚ -e sa ev ĀBHISAṂDH -iḥ / </s><s> a @ VIDY -ā BODH -i @ DHARMAT -ā syāt TAD UPACĀR -āt / </s><s> yatas tān eva RĀG - @ ĀD -īn YONIŚ -aḥ PRATIPAD -yate / tato VIMUC -yate tebhyas ten AIṢ -āṃ NIḤSṚT -is tataḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 3 — 13 <g/> // </s><s> tān eva RĀG - @ ĀD -īn YONIŚ -aḥ PRATIPADY -a @ MĀNAS tebhyo VIMUC -yate TASMĀT PARIJÑĀT -ās ta eva teṣāṃ NIḤSARAṆ -aṃ BHAV -at <g/> ^ <g/> īty AYAM atr ĀBHISAṂDH

line.right: -i @ DHARMAT -ā syāt TAD UPACĀR -āt / </s><s> yatas tān eva RĀG - @ ĀD -īn YONIŚ -aḥ PRATIPAD -yate / tato VIMUC -yate tebhyas ten AIṢ -āṃ NIḤSṚT -is tataḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 3 — 13 <g/> // </s><s> tān eva RĀG - @ ĀD -īn YONIŚ -aḥ PRATIPADY -a @ MĀNAS tebhyo VIMUC -yate TASMĀT PARIJÑĀT -ās ta eva teṣāṃ NIḤSARAṆ -aṃ BHAV -at <g/> ^ <g/> īty AYAM atr ĀBHISAṂDH -iḥ / </s><s> ŚRĀVAK -a @ PRATYEKABUDDH -a @ MANASIKĀR -a @ PARIVARJAN -e ŚLOK -a @ DVAY -aṃ / </s><s> na KHAL -u JINASUT -ānāṃ BĀDH -akaṃ

line.left: @ PRATYEKABUDDH -a @ MANASIKĀR -a @ PARIVARJAN -e ŚLOK -a @ DVAY -aṃ / </s><s> na KHAL -u JINASUT -ānāṃ BĀDH -akaṃ DUḤKH -am UGR -aṃ NARAK -a @ BHAVANAVĀS -aiḥ SATV -a @ HET -oḥ KATHAṂ cit / ŚAM -a @ BHAV -a @ GUṆ -a @ DOṢ -a @ PRERIT -ā HĪNAYĀN -e VIVIDH -a @ ŚUBH -a @ VIKALP -ā BĀDH -akā dhī MAT -āṃ tu // <g/> 1 <g/> 3 — 14 <g/> // </s><s> na KHAL -u NARAK -a @ VĀS -o dhī MAT -āṃ SARV -a @ KĀL -aṃ VIMAL -a @ VIPUL -a @

line.left: SAṂDARŚAN - @ ĀD -ibhiḥ SATV -ānāṃ HITĀY -a PRATIPAD -yate / </s><s> KATHAṂ tathā DURLABH -a @ DARŚAN -e MUN -au BHAV -en MAH - @ ĀRTH -aṃ na hi NITY -a @ DARŚAN -aṃ / BHṚŚ -aṃ SAMĀPYĀYIT -a @ CETAS -aḥ sadā PRASĀD -a @ VEG -air a @ SAM -a @ ŚRAV - @ ODBHAV -aiḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 4 — 47 <g/> // </s><s> a @ PRACODYAMĀN -aḥ SATAT -aṃ ca SAṂMUKH -aṃ TATHĀGAT -air DHARM -a @ SUMUKH -e VYAVASTHIT -aḥ / ni GṚH -ya KEŚ -eṣv iva DOṢ -aga HVAR -āt ni KṚṢY -a
line.right: -au sa BAL -ān NIVEŚ -yate // <g/> 1 <g/> 4 — 48 <g/> // </s><s> sa SARVALOK -aṃ SUVIŚUDDH -a @ DARŚAN -air a @ KALP -a @ BODH -air ABHIBHŪY -a SARVATH -ā / MAH - @ ĀNDHAKĀR -aṃ VIDH -a @ MAY -ya BHĀS -ate JAG -an MAH - @ ĀDIT -ya iv ĀTYUDĀR -ataḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 4 — 49 <g/> // </s><s> ebhis TRI -bhiḥ ŚLOK -air AVAVĀD -a @ MĀH - @ ĀTMY -aṃ DARŚ -ayati / </s><s> yo hi DHARMAMUKH -a @ ŚROT -asy AVAVĀD -aṃ LABH -ate tasya NITY -aṃ BUDDH -a @ DARŚAN

line.right: -iṃ BUDDH -āḥ / </s><s> ŚEṢ -aṃ GAT - @ ĀRTH -aṃ / </s><s> TRĀS - @ ĀBHINANDAN -a @ NIMITT -atve ŚLOK -aḥ / </s><s> DUḤKH -ā @ BHĀV -e DUḤKH -aṃ yat KṚPAY -ā BHAV -ati BODHISATV -ānāṃ / SAṂTRĀS -ayati TAD ādau SPṚṢṬ -aṃ tv ABHINAND -ayati GĀḌH -aṃ // <g/> 1 <g/> 7 — 46 <g/> // </s><s> DUḤKH -ā @ BHĀV -e iti DUḤKH -ā @ BHĀV -o NIMITT -aṃ / </s><s> SATV -eṣu KARUṆ -ayā BODHISATV -ānāṃ yad DUḤKH -am UTPAD -yate TAD ĀD -au SAṂTRĀS -ayati ADHIMUKTICARY -ā @ BHŪM -au / </s><s> ĀTM -a @ PAR -a @

line.left: MADY - @ ĀD -i @ VIVARJAN -ataḥ / </s><s> HIT - @ ĀVAH -aṃ DĀN -ena SAṂGṚH -ya KUŚAL -e NIYOJAN -āt / </s><s> s ĀNURAKṢ -aṃ PARIJAN -asya <g/> ^ a @ VIGHĀT -aṃ KṚTV -ā an @ YASM -ai DĀN -āt / </s><s> nir MṚGY -am a @ YĀCAMĀN -e apy ARTHIT -vaṃ VIGHĀT -aṃ v ĀVAGAMY -a SVAY -am eva DĀN -āt DAKṢIṆĪY -ā @ PARIMĀRGAṆ -āc ca / </s><s> NIRLEP -aṃ PRATIKĀR -a @ VIPĀKAN -iḥ SPṚH -atvāt / </s><s> APAR -aḥ PRAKĀR -aḥ / </s><s> SAKAL -aṃ VIPUL -aṃ ŚREṢṬH -aṃ SATAT -aṃ MUDIT -aṃ NIRĀMIṢ -aṃ ŚUDDH -aṃ /

line.left: NIRĀMIṢ -aṃ ŚUDDH -aṃ / BODH -inataṃ KUŚAL -anataṃ JIN - @ ĀTM -a @ JĀN -āṃ KṚṢ - @ ĀDĀN -am // <g/> 1 <g/> 7 — 60 <g/> // </s><s> TATR -a SAKAL -am ĀDHYĀTMIK -a @ BĀH - @ YAVAS -t UDĀN -āt / </s><s> VIPUL -aṃ PRABHŪT -a @ VAST -u DĀN -āt / </s><s> ŚREṢṬH -aṃ PRAṆĪT -a @ VAST -u DĀN -āt / </s><s> SATAT -am ABHĪKṢṆ -a @ DĀN -āt / </s><s> MUDIT -a @ PRATISAṂKHYĀY -a PRAHṚṢṬ -a @ DĀN -āt / </s><s> NIRĀMIṢ -aṃ yathā NIRLEP -aṃ / </s><s> ŚUDDH -aṃ yathā ŚUDDH - @ APAD -aṃ / </s><s>
line.right: -inataṃ MAHĀBODH -i @ PARIṆĀMAN -āt / </s><s> KUŚAL -anataṃ yathā HIT - @ ĀVAH -aṃ / </s><s> UPABHOG -a @ VIŚEṢ -e ŚLOK -aḥ / </s><s> na TATH - @ OPABHOG -a @ TUṢṬ -iṃ LABH -ate BHOG -ī yathā PARITYĀG -āt / TUṢṬ -im UPAI -ti KṚPĀL -uḥ SUKH -a @ TRAY - @ ĀPYĀYIT -a @ MANAS -kaḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 7 — 61 <g/> // </s><s> TATR -a SUKH -atr AYAṂ DĀN -a @ PRĪT -iḥ PARĀNUGRAH -a @ PRĪT -iḥ BODH -i @ SAṂBHĀR -a @ SAṂBHAR -aṇa PRĪT -iś ca / </s><s> ŚEṢ -aṃ GAT - @ ĀRTH

line.left: -āt / </s><s> NIRĀMIṢ -aṃ yathā NIRLEP -aṃ / </s><s> ŚUDDH -aṃ yathā ŚUDDH - @ APAD -aṃ / </s><s> BODH -inataṃ MAHĀBODH -i @ PARIṆĀMAN -āt / </s><s> KUŚAL -anataṃ yathā HIT - @ ĀVAH -aṃ / </s><s> UPABHOG -a @ VIŚEṢ -e ŚLOK -aḥ / </s><s> na TATH - @ OPABHOG -a @ TUṢṬ -iṃ LABH -ate BHOG -ī yathā PARITYĀG -āt / TUṢṬ -im UPAI -ti KṚPĀL -uḥ SUKH -a @ TRAY - @ ĀPYĀYIT -a @ MANAS -kaḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 7 — 61 <g/> // </s><s> TATR -a SUKH -atr AYAṂ DĀN -a @ PRĪT -iḥ PARĀNUGRAH -a @ PRĪT -iḥ
line.right: -i @ SAṂBHĀR -a @ SAṂBHAR -aṇa PRĪT -iś ca / </s><s> ŚEṢ -aṃ GAT - @ ĀRTH -aṃ / </s><s> PĀRAMIT - @ ĀBHINIRHĀR -a @ KARUṆĀY -āṃ ŚLOK -aḥ / </s><s> KṚPAṆ -a @ KṚP -ā RAUDR -a @ KṚP -ā SAṂKṢUBDH -a @ KṚP -ā KṚP -ā PRAMATT -eṣu / VIṢAY -a @ PARATANTR -a @ KARUṆ -ā MITHY - @ ĀBHINIVIṢṬ -a @ KARUṆ -ā ca // <g/> 1 <g/> 7 — 62 <g/> // </s><s> TATR -a KṚPAṆ -ā MATSAR -iṇaḥ / </s><s> RAUDR -ā DUḤŚ -īlāḥ PAR -o @ PAT -āni ḥ / </s><s> SAṂKṢUBDH -āḥ KRODHAN -āḥ / </s><s> PRAMATT

line.left: -ām eti // <g/> 1 <g/> 8 — 7 <g/> // </s><s> ity etena LAJJ -aṃ CAITASIK -aṃ DUḤKH -aṃ DAURMANASY -aṃ PRATISAṂVEDAY -ata ity SAṂDARŚIT -aṃ / </s><s> ete SARV -e DOṢ -ā HR -ī @ MATS -u BHAV -anti no JINASUT -eṣu / </s><s> ity ata UPĀDĀY -a LAJJ -ā @ GUṆ -o VEDITAVY -aḥ / </s><s> yad ete ca DOṢ -ā na BHAV -anti / DEV -eṣu ca manujeṣu ca NITY -aṃ SAṂJĀ -yate ca BUDH -aḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 8 — 8 <g/> // </s><s> ity ETAD asya VIPĀK -a @ PHAL -aṃ BHAV -ati / </s><s> SAṂBHĀR -āṃś ca sa
line.right: -eḥ KṢIPR -aṃ PŪR -ayati LAJJ -ayā dhīmān / </s><s> ity ETAD ADHIPAT -i @ PHAL -aṃ / SATV -ānāṃ PĀCAN -ayā na KHID -yate c <g/> ^ <g/> aiva JINAPUTR -aḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 8 — 9 <g/> // </s><s> ity ETAT PURUṢ -akāra PHAL -aṃ / </s><s> sa VIPAKṢ -a @ PRATIPAKṢ -ai RAHIT -o a @ RAHIT -aś ca JĀ -yate SATAT -aṃ / </s><s> ity ete VISAṂYOG -a @ NIṢPAND -a @ PHAL -aṃ / </s><s> yad uta VIPAKṢ ARAH -i @ TATV -aṃ PRATIPAKṢ - @ ĀRAH -i @ TATV -aṃ ca / ity ETAM ĀNUŚAṂS -aṃ HR -īmān

line.left: BODHISATV -āḥ PRAṆIDHĀN -a @ VAIŚEṢIK -atayā VIKRĪḌ -anti / </s><s> yeṣāṃ na SUKAR -aṃ SAṂKHY -ā KART -uṃ KĀY -asya vā PRABHĀY -ā vā SVARAS -asya v <g/> ^ <g/> eti VISTAR -eṇa yathā DAŚ -a @ BHŪM -ike SŪTR -e / </s><s> VAŚIT -ā yathā tatr <g/> ^ <g/> aiva DAŚ -a VAŚIT -ā NIRDIṢṬ -āḥ / </s><s> DHARM -a @ PRĀPT -ir BAL -a @ VAIŚĀRADY - @ ĀVEṆIK -a @ BUDDH -a @ DHARM -āṇāṃ PRĀPT -iḥ / </s><s> ity eṣā DARŚAN - @ ĀD -īnām ABHINIRHĀR -aḥ ṢAḌ VIDH -aḥ / </s><s> INDRIY -a @ VIBHĀG -e ŚLOK -aḥ / </s><s>
line.right: -iś CARY -ā ŚRUT -a CĀTR -a ŚAMATH -o atha VIPAŚYAN -ā / ŚRADDH - @ ĀD -īnāṃ PAD -aṃ JÑEY -am ARTHASIDDH -y @ ADHIKĀR -ataḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 8 — 55 <g/> // </s><s> ŚRADDH - @ ENDRIY -asya BODH -iḥ PAD -am ĀLAMBAN -am ity ARTH -aḥ / </s><s> VĪRY - @ ENDRIY -asya BODHISATV -a @ CARY -ā / </s><s> SMṚT - @ ĪNDRIY -asya MAHĀYĀN -a @ SAṂGṚHĪT -aṃ ŚRUT -aṃ / </s><s> SAMĀDH - @ ĪNDRIY -asya ŚAMATH -aḥ / </s><s> PRAJÑ - @ ENDRIY -asya VIPAŚYAN -ā PAD -aṃ / </s><s> TAD ARTH - @ ĀDHIKĀR -eṇ <g/>

line.left: <s> VAŚIT -ā yathā tatr <g/> ^ <g/> aiva DAŚ -a VAŚIT -ā NIRDIṢṬ -āḥ / </s><s> DHARM -a @ PRĀPT -ir BAL -a @ VAIŚĀRADY - @ ĀVEṆIK -a @ BUDDH -a @ DHARM -āṇāṃ PRĀPT -iḥ / </s><s> ity eṣā DARŚAN - @ ĀD -īnām ABHINIRHĀR -aḥ ṢAḌ VIDH -aḥ / </s><s> INDRIY -a @ VIBHĀG -e ŚLOK -aḥ / </s><s> BODH -iś CARY -ā ŚRUT -a CĀTR -a ŚAMATH -o atha VIPAŚYAN -ā / ŚRADDH - @ ĀD -īnāṃ PAD -aṃ JÑEY -am ARTHASIDDH -y @ ADHIKĀR -ataḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 8 — 55 <g/> // </s><s> ŚRADDH - @ ENDRIY -asya

line.left: @ RATN -a @ SĀDHARMY -aṃ BODHY -anṅ GĀN -āṃ DARŚ -ayati / </s><s> SMṚT -iś CAR -ati SARVATR -a JÑEY -ā @ JIT -a @ VINIRJAY -e / </s><s> a @ JIT -a @ JÑEY -a @ VINIRJAY -āya / </s><s> yathā CAKRAVART -inaś CAKR -a @ RATN -am a @ JIT -a @ DEŚ -a @ VIN -ir JAY -āya / SARV -a @ KALP -a @ NIMITT -ānāṃ BHAṄG -āya VICAY -o asya ca // <g/> 1 <g/> 8 — 58 <g/> // </s><s> yathā HAST -i @ RATN -aṃ PRATYARTHIK -a @ BHAṄG -āya / </s><s> āśu cā ŚEṢ -a @
line.right: -āya VĪRY -asya PRAVART -ate / </s><s> KṢIPR - @ ĀBHIJÑAT - @ OTPĀDAN -āt / </s><s> yath ĀŚV -a @ RATN -am āśu SAMUDR -a @ PARYANT -a @ MAH -ā @ PṚTHIV -ī @ GAMAN -āya / DHARMĀLOK -a @ VIVṚDDH -yā ca PRĪT -yā ĀPŪR -yate DHRUV -am // <g/> 1 <g/> 8 — 59 <g/> // </s><s> ĀRABDH -a @ VĪRY -asya BODH -is AVASY -a DHARMĀLOK -ā VIVARDH -ante / </s><s> tataḥ PRĪT -iḥ SARV -aṃ KĀRY -aṃ sadā PRĪṆ -ayati / </s><s> yathā MAṆ -i @ RATN -am ĀLOK -a @ VIŚEṢ -eṇa CAKRAVART -inaṃ PRĪṆ -ayati / </s><s> SARV

line.right: -is AVASY -a DHARMĀLOK -ā VIVARDH -ante / </s><s> tataḥ PRĪT -iḥ SARV -aṃ KĀRY -aṃ sadā PRĪṆ -ayati / </s><s> yathā MAṆ -i @ RATN -am ĀLOK -a @ VIŚEṢ -eṇa CAKRAVART -inaṃ PRĪṆ -ayati / </s><s> SARV - @ ĀVARAṆ -a @ NIRMOKṢ -āt PRAŚRABDH -yā SUKH -am eti ca / </s><s> SARV -a @ DAUṢṬHULY -a @ SAMUTPĀDAN -āt / </s><s> yathā STR -ī @ RATN -ena CAKRAVART -ī SUKH -am ANUBHAV -ati / CINTIT - @ ĀRTH -a @ SAMṚDDH -iś ca SAMĀDH -er UPAJĀ -yate // <g/> 1 <g/> 8 — 60 <g/> // </s><s> yathā CAKRAVART -ino GṚHAPAT -i @

line.left: — 62 <g/> // </s><s> iti SAPT -a @ RATN - @ OPAM -atvaṃ BODHYAṄG -ānāṃ NIGAM -ayati / </s><s> NIŚRAY - @ ĀṄG -aṃ SVABHĀV - @ ĀṄG -aṃ NIRYĀṆ - @ ĀṄG -aṃ TṚTĪYAK -aṃ / CATURTH -am ANUŚAṂS - @ ĀṄG -am a @ KLEŚ - @ ĀṄG -aṃ TRAY - @ ĀTMAK -am // <g/> 1 <g/> 8 — 63 <g/> // </s><s> etena yad BODHYAṄG -aṃ yath ĀṄG -aṃ TAD ABHID -yatitaṃ / </s><s> SMṚT -ir NIŚRAY - @ ĀṄG -aṃ SARV -eṣāṃ TAN NIŚRAY -eṇa PRAVṚTT -eḥ / </s><s> DHARM -a @ PRAVICAY -aḥ SVABHĀV - @ ĀṄG -aṃ
line.right: -es TAT SVABHĀV -atvāt / </s><s> VĪRY -aṃ NIRYĀṆ - @ ĀṄG -aṃ ten <g/> ^ <g/> ā PRĀPY -a @ NIṢṬH - @ ĀYĀM ad HIṢ -t HĀN -āt / </s><s> PRĪT -ir ANUŚAṂS - @ ĀṄG -am CITT -a @ SUKH -atvāt / </s><s> PRAŚRABDH -i @ SAMĀDHYUPEKṢ -ā a @ KLEŚ - @ ĀṄG -aṃ / </s><s> yena yan NIŚRITY -a yo a @ SAṂKLEŚ -a iti / </s><s> TRIVIDH -am a @ SAṂKLEŚ - @ ĀṄG -aṃ VEDITAVY -aṃ / </s><s> MĀRG - @ ĀṄG -a @ VIBHĀG -e dvau ŚLOK -au / </s><s> yathā BODH - @ ĀNUVṚTT -iś ca TAD ŪRDHV

line.left: PRAVICAY -aḥ SVABHĀV - @ ĀṄG -aṃ BODH -es TAT SVABHĀV -atvāt / </s><s> VĪRY -aṃ NIRYĀṆ - @ ĀṄG -aṃ ten <g/> ^ <g/> ā PRĀPY -a @ NIṢṬH - @ ĀYĀM ad HIṢ -t HĀN -āt / </s><s> PRĪT -ir ANUŚAṂS - @ ĀṄG -am CITT -a @ SUKH -atvāt / </s><s> PRAŚRABDH -i @ SAMĀDHYUPEKṢ -ā a @ KLEŚ - @ ĀṄG -aṃ / </s><s> yena yan NIŚRITY -a yo a @ SAṂKLEŚ -a iti / </s><s> TRIVIDH -am a @ SAṂKLEŚ - @ ĀṄG -aṃ VEDITAVY -aṃ / </s><s> MĀRG - @ ĀṄG -a @ VIBHĀG -e dvau ŚLOK -au / </s><s> yathā
line.right: - @ ĀNUVṚTT -iś ca TAD ŪRDHV -am UPAJĀ -yate / yathā BODH -a @ VYAVASTHĀN -aṃ PRAVEŚ -aś ca VYAVASTHIT -au // <g/> 1 <g/> 8 — 64 <g/> // </s><s> KARM -a @ TRAY -a @ VIŚUDDH -iś ca PRATIPAKṢ -asya BHĀVAN -ā / JÑEY - @ ĀVṚTT -eś ca MĀRG -asya VAIŚEṢIK -a @ GUṆ -asya ca // <g/> 1 <g/> 8 — 65 <g/> // </s><s> BODHYAṄG -a @ KĀL -ād ŪRDHV -aṃ YATHĀBHŪT ĀVABODH - @ ĀNUVṚTT -iḥ SAMYAGDṚṢṬ -iḥ / </s><s> tasy <g/> ^ <g/> aiv ĀVABODH -asya AVASTHĀN -aṃ PARICCHED -aḥ SAMYA -k @ SAṂKALP -aḥ

line.left: <s> VĪRY -aṃ NIRYĀṆ - @ ĀṄG -aṃ ten <g/> ^ <g/> ā PRĀPY -a @ NIṢṬH - @ ĀYĀM ad HIṢ -t HĀN -āt / </s><s> PRĪT -ir ANUŚAṂS - @ ĀṄG -am CITT -a @ SUKH -atvāt / </s><s> PRAŚRABDH -i @ SAMĀDHYUPEKṢ -ā a @ KLEŚ - @ ĀṄG -aṃ / </s><s> yena yan NIŚRITY -a yo a @ SAṂKLEŚ -a iti / </s><s> TRIVIDH -am a @ SAṂKLEŚ - @ ĀṄG -aṃ VEDITAVY -aṃ / </s><s> MĀRG - @ ĀṄG -a @ VIBHĀG -e dvau ŚLOK -au / </s><s> yathā BODH - @ ĀNUVṚTT -iś ca TAD ŪRDHV -am UPAJĀ -yate / yathā
line.right: -a @ VYAVASTHĀN -aṃ PRAVEŚ -aś ca VYAVASTHIT -au // <g/> 1 <g/> 8 — 64 <g/> // </s><s> KARM -a @ TRAY -a @ VIŚUDDH -iś ca PRATIPAKṢ -asya BHĀVAN -ā / JÑEY - @ ĀVṚTT -eś ca MĀRG -asya VAIŚEṢIK -a @ GUṆ -asya ca // <g/> 1 <g/> 8 — 65 <g/> // </s><s> BODHYAṄG -a @ KĀL -ād ŪRDHV -aṃ YATHĀBHŪT ĀVABODH - @ ĀNUVṚTT -iḥ SAMYAGDṚṢṬ -iḥ / </s><s> tasy <g/> ^ <g/> aiv ĀVABODH -asya AVASTHĀN -aṃ PARICCHED -aḥ SAMYA -k @ SAṂKALP -aḥ / </s><s> TAD VYAVASTHĀN -e ca SŪTR - @ ĀDIK -e BHAGAV -atā KṚT

line.left: VIBHĀG -e TRAY -aḥ ŚLOK -āḥ / </s><s> CETAN -ā CHAND -a @ SAHIT -ā JÑĀN -ena PRERIT -ā ca TAT / PRAṆIDHĀN -aṃ hi DHĪR -āṇām a @ SAM -aṃ SARV -a @ BHŪM -iṣu // <g/> 1 <g/> 8 — 74 <g/> // </s><s> HET -u BHŪT aṃ ca VIJÑEY -aṃ CITT -āt SADY -aḥ PHAL -aṃ ca TAT / ĀYAT -yām ARTHASIDDH -y @ ARTH -aṃ CITT -a @ MĀTR -āt SAMṚDDH -itaḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 8 — 75 <g/> // </s><s> CITR -aṃ MAH -ad VIŚUDDH -aṃ ca UTTAR - @ OTTAR -a @ BHŪM -iṣu / ā
line.right: -er BODHISATV -ānāṃ SV -a @ PARĀRTH -a @ PRASĀDHAK -aṃ // <g/> 1 <g/> 8 — 76 <g/> // </s><s> a @ TRA PRAṆIDHĀN -aṃ SVABHĀV -ato NIDĀN -ato BHŪM -itaḥ PRABHEDAT -aḥ KARMAT -aś ca PARIDĪPIT -aṃ / </s><s> CETAN -ā CHAND -a @ SAṂPRAYUKT -ā SVABHĀV -aḥ / </s><s> JÑĀN -aṃ NIDĀN -aṃ / </s><s> SARV -a @ BHŪM -iṣv iti BHŪM -iḥ / </s><s> tac ca PRAṆIDHĀN -aṃ HET -u BHŪT aṃ / </s><s> CITT -ād eva SADY -aḥ PHAL -atvāt / </s><s> ĀYAT -yāṃ v ĀBHIPRET - @ ĀRTHASIDDH -y @ ARTH -aṃ CITT -āt punaḥ SADY -aḥ PHAL -aṃ CITT -a

line.left: ĀBHIPRET - @ ĀRTHASIDDH -y @ ARTH -aṃ CITT -āt punaḥ SADY -aḥ PHAL -aṃ CITT -a @ MĀTR -āt YATHĀRTH -a @ SAMṚDDH -itā VED -u TAVY -ā / </s><s> yena PRAṆIH -ānena BALIK -ā bohi SATV -ā VIKRĪḌ -anti / </s><s> yasya na SUKAR -ā SAṂKHY -ā KART -uṃ KĀY -asya v <g/> ^ <g/> eti VISTAR -aḥ / </s><s> CITR -am ADHIMUKTICARY -ā @ BHŪM -āv evaṃ ca syām iti / </s><s> MAH -ad BHŪM -i @ PRAVIṢṬ -asya DAŚ -a MAH -ā @ PRAṆIDHĀN -āni / </s><s> VIŚUDDH -aṃ UTTAR - @ OTTAR -āsu BHŪM -iṣu VIŚUDDH -i @ VIŚEṢ -ādā
line.right: -er ity eṣa PRABHEDAT -aḥ / </s><s> SV -a @ PARĀRTH -a @ PRASĀDHAN -aṃ KARM -a / </s><s> SAMĀDH -i @ TRAY -a @ VIBHĀG -e TRAY -aḥ ŚLOK -āḥ / </s><s> NAIRĀTMY -aṃ DVIVIDH -aṃ JÑEY -o hy ĀTMAGRĀH -asya c ĀŚRAY -aḥ / tasya c OPAŚAM -o NITY -aṃ SAMĀDH -i @ TRAY -a @ GOCAR -aḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 8 — 77 <g/> // </s><s> TRAY -āṇāṃ SAMĀDH -īnāṃ TRIVIDH -o GOCAR -o JÑEY -aḥ / </s><s> PUDGAL -a @ NAIRĀTMY -aṃ ŚŪNYAT -ā @ SAMĀDH -eḥ / </s><s> TAD UBHAY - @ ĀTMAGRĀH -asy ĀŚRAY -aḥ PAÑC - @ OPADĀN

line.left: -aḥ </s><s> ĀŚCARY -a VIBHĀG -e TRAY -aḥ ŚLOK -āḥ / </s><s> s VAD -e HAS -ya PARITYĀG -aḥ SAṂPATT -eś c <g/> ^ <g/> aiva SAṂVṚTT -au / DURBAL -eṣu KṢAM -ā KĀY -e JĪVIT -e NIRAPEKṢ -iṇaḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 9 — 1 <g/> // </s><s> VĪRYĀRAMBH -o hy an @ ĀSVĀD -o DHYĀN -eṣu SUKH -a eva ca / niṣ KALPAN -ā ca PRAJÑĀY -ām ĀŚCARY -aṃ dhī MAT -āṃ GAT -aṃ // <g/> 1 <g/> 9 — 2 <g/> // </s><s> TATHĀGAT -a @ KUL -e JANM -a LĀBH -o VYĀKARAṆ -asya ca / ABHIṢEK -asya ca PRĀPT -ir
line.right: -eś c ĀŚCARY -am iṣyate // <g/> 1 <g/> 9 — 3 <g/> // </s><s> a @ TRA dvābhāṃ ŚLOK -ābhyāṃ PRATIPATT -y @ ĀŚCARY -am UKT -aṃ ṢAḌ PĀRAMIT -ā ĀRABHY -a / </s><s> DĀN -ena hi s VAD -eha PARITYĀG -a ĀŚCARY -aṃ ŚĪL -a @ SAṂVAR -a @ NIMITT -am UDĀR -a @ SAṂPATT -i @ TYĀG -aḥ / </s><s> ŚEṢ -aṃ GAT - @ ĀRTH -aṃ / </s><s> TṚTĪY -ena ŚLOK -ena PHAL - @ ĀŚCARY -am UKT -aṃ CATVĀR -i BODHISATV -a @ PHAL -āny ĀRABHY -a PRATH -a @ MĀY -ām AṢṬ -abhyāṃ DAŚ -abhyāṃ TRĪṆ -i ŚAIKṢ

line.left: - @ ĀRTH -aṃ VĪRYĀRAMBH -o MAH -ān api // <g/> 1 <g/> 9 — 6 <g/> // </s><s> DHYĀN -aṃ ca KUŚAL -aṃ NITY -aṃ PRAJÑ -ā c <g/> ^ <g/> aivā VIKALP -ikā / VIJÑEY -ā BODHISATV -ānāṃ tāsv eva SAM -a @ CITT -atā // <g/> 1 <g/> 9 — 7 <g/> // </s><s> EK -aḥ ŚLOK -aḥ SATV -eṣu SAM -a @ CITT -atāyāṃ / </s><s> dvau PĀRAMIT -āsu / </s><s> na hi SATV -ānām ĀTM - @ ĀD -iṣu SNEH -aḥ SAMAT -ayā ANUGAT -o na c ĀTYANT -aṃ / </s><s> tathā hi ĀTM -anam api KADĀCIN MĀR -ayanti / </s><s>
line.right: -i @ SAT ānāṃ tu SARV -a @ SATV -eṣu SAMAT -ayā ATYANT -aṃ ca PĀRAMIT -āsu punar DĀN -e SAM -acit TATV -am ARTH -iṣv a @ PAKṢ -a @ PĀT -āt / </s><s> ŚĪL -e aṇum ĀTR -asy <g/> ^ <g/> āpi NITY -am a @ KHAṆḌAN -ā / </s><s> KṢĀNT -iḥ SARVATR -eti sa TVEṢ -c a @ BHEDAN -ā / </s><s> VĪRY -e SATV - @ ĀRTH -aṃ VĪRYĀRAMBH -āt SV -a @ PARĀRTH -aṃ SAM -aṃ PRAYOG -āt SARV -a @ KUŚAL - @ ĀRTH -aṃ ca / </s><s> ŚEṢ -aṃ GAT - @ ĀRTH -aṃ / </s><s> UPAKĀR -itva

line.left: <g/> // </s><s> TATH -eti yathā teṣāṃ BODHISATV -ā UPAKĀR -iṇaḥ / </s><s> TATR -a BHOG -eṣv an @ ĀSAKT -yā DĀN -e VART -ante / </s><s> ŚĪL -asya — </s><s> a @ KHAṆḌAN -ena ŚĪL -e / </s><s> KṚTAJÑ -at ĀNUYOG -āt KṢĀNT -au / </s><s> UPAKĀR -i @ BODHISATV -asya KṚTAJÑ -atayā te hi KṢĀNTIPRIY -ā iti / </s><s> PRATIPATT -i @ YOG -ato VĪRY -a @ JÑĀ -su yena ca PRATIPAD -yante YATR -a CET -i KṚTV -ā / </s><s> ĀŚĀST -i @ VIBHĀG -e ŚLOK -aḥ / </s><s> VṚDDH -iṃ HĀN -iṃ ca KĀṄKṢ -anti SATV -ānāṃ ca PRAPĀCAN -aṃ / VIŚEṢAGAMAN -aṃ BHŪM -au
line.right: -iṃ c ĀNUTTAR -āṃ sadā // <g/> 1 <g/> 9 — 26 <g/> // </s><s> PAÑC -a STHĀN -āni BODHISATV -āḥ sa DAIV ĀŚAṂS -ante / </s><s> PĀRAMIT -ā @ ṚDDH -iṃ TAD VIPAKṢ -a @ HĀN -iṃ / </s><s> SATV -a @ PRAPĀCAN -aṃ / </s><s> BHŪM -i @ VIŚEṢAGAMAN -aṃ / </s><s> ANUTTAR -āṃ ca SAMYAKSAṂBODH -iṃ / </s><s> a @ BANDHY -a @ PRAYOG -a @ VIBHĀG -e ŚLOK -aḥ / </s><s> TRĀS -a @ HĀN -au SAMUTPĀD -e SAṂŚAY -a @ CCHEDAN -e api ca / PRATIPATT -y @ AVAVĀD -e ca SAD ĀBANDHY -ā JIN - @ ĀTM -a @ J -āḥ

line.left: <s> ŚEṢ -aṃ GAT - @ ĀRTH -aṃ / </s><s> VINAY -a @ VIBHĀG -e ŚLOK -aḥ / </s><s> te DĀN - @ ĀDY -u PAṂS -a @ HĀR -aiḥ SATV -ānāṃ VIN -ayanti hi / ṢAṬ - @ PRAKĀR -aṃ VIPAKṢ -aṃ hi dhīmantaḥ SARV -a @ BHŪM -iṣu // <g/> 1 <g/> 9 — 34 <g/> // </s><s> ṢAḌ PRAKĀR -o VIPAKṢ -aḥ / </s><s> ṢAṆṆ -āṃ PĀRAMIT -ānāṃ MĀTSARY -a @ DAUḤŚĪLY -a @ KRODH -a @ KAUSĪDY -a @ VIKṢEP -a @ DAUṢPRAJÑ yāni YATHĀKRAM -āḥ / </s><s> dhīmadvy ĀKARAṆ -aṃ DVEDH -ā KĀL -a @ PUDGAL -a @ BHED -ataḥ /
line.right: -au VYĀKARAṆ -e c <g/> ^ <g/> aiva MAH -āc c ĀNYAD u DĀH -ṛtaṃ // <g/> 1 <g/> 9 — 35 <g/> // </s><s> n OTPATT -i @ KṢĀNT -i @ LĀBH -ena MĀN - @ ĀBHOG -a @ VIHĀN -itaḥ / EKĪBH - @ ĀVAGAM -atvāc ca SARV -a @ BUDDH -a @ JIN - @ ĀTM -ajaiḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 9 — 36 <g/> // </s><s> KṢETR -eṇa NĀM -nā KĀL -ena KALPAN -ām nā ca TAT punaḥ / PARIVĀR - @ ĀNUV -ṛtyā ca SAD DHARM -asya TAD iṣyate // <g/> 1 <g/> 9 — 37 <g/>

line.left: @ JIN - @ ĀTM -ajaiḥ // <g/> 1 <g/> 9 — 36 <g/> // </s><s> KṢETR -eṇa NĀM -nā KĀL -ena KALPAN -ām nā ca TAT punaḥ / PARIVĀR - @ ĀNUV -ṛtyā ca SAD DHARM -asya TAD iṣyate // <g/> 1 <g/> 9 — 37 <g/> // </s><s> TATR -a PUDGAL -a @ BHED -ena dvy ĀKARAṆ -aṃ GOTR -a @ STH - @ OTPĀDIT -a @ CITT -a @ SAṂMUKH -a @ SAMAKṢ -a @ PUDGAL -a @ VYĀKARAṆ -āt / </s><s> KĀL -a @ BHED -ena PARIMIT -ā @ PARIMIT -a @ KĀL -a @ VYĀKARAṆ -āt / </s><s> punar
line.right: -au VYĀKARAṆ -aṃ BHAV -ati / </s><s> VYĀKARAṆ -aṃ vā evaṃ NĀM -ā TATHĀGAT -a evam AMUṢM -in KĀL -e VYĀKARIṢY -at <g/> ^ <g/> īti / </s><s> ANYAT punar MAH -ā @ VYĀKARAṆ -aṃ yad yad AṢṬAM -yāṃ BHŪM -au ANUTPATTIK -a @ DHARM -a @ KṢĀNT -i @ LĀBH -ataḥ / </s><s> AHAṂ BUDDH -o BHAV -iṣyāmi iti MĀN -a @ PRAHĀṆ -ataḥ / </s><s> SARV -a @ NIMITT -a @ BHOG -a @ PRAHĀṆ -ataḥ / </s><s> SARV -a @ BUDDH -a @ BODHISATV -aiś ca SĀRDH -am EKĪBH -āv OPAGAMAN -ataḥ / </s><s> TAD ĀTM -a @ SAṂTĀN -a @ BHED -

line.left: KLEŚ -a @ PRAHĀṆ -aṃ PHAL -am ity evam ādi / </s><s> YĀN -a @ TRAY -a @ VYAVASTHĀN -aṃ PAÑC -abhir ĀKĀR -air VEDITAVY -aṃ / </s><s> ĀŚAY -ato DEŚAN -ātaḥ PRAYOG -ataḥ SAṂBHĀR -ataḥ SAMUDĀGAM -ataś ca / </s><s> TATR -a HĪN -aṃ ĀŚAY -a @ DEŚAN -ā @ PRAYOG -a @ SAṂBHĀR -a @ SAMUDĀGAM -āḥ ŚRĀVAKAYĀN -aṃ MADHY -āḥ PRATYEKABUDDH -a @ YĀN -aṃ UTTAM -ā MAHĀYĀN -aṃ / </s><s> yath ĀŚAY -aṃ hi yath ĀBHIPRĀY -aṃ DHARMADEŚAN - @ ĀBHIBHAV -ati / </s><s> yathā DEŚAN -aṃ tathā PRAYOG -aṃ / </s><s> yathā PRAYOG -aṃ SAṂBHĀR -aḥ / </s><s> yathā SAṂBHĀR -aṃ ca
line.right: -i @ SAMUDĀGAM -a iti / </s><s> PARYEṢAṆ -ā @ VIBHĀG -e ŚLOK -aḥ / </s><s> ĀGANTUK -atva PARYEṢ -ā ANYONY -aṃ NĀM -a VAST -unoḥ / PRAJÑAPT -er DVIVIDH -as YĀTR -a TANMĀTR -atvasya v AIṢAṆ -ā // <g/> 1 <g/> 9 — 47 <g/> // </s><s> CATU -r VIDH -ā PARYEṢAṆ -ā DHARM -āṇāṃ / </s><s> NĀM -a @ PAR -yṣaṇā VAST -u PARYEṢAṆ -ā / </s><s> SVABHĀV -a @ PRAJÑAPT -i @ PARYEṢAṆ -ā / </s><s> VIŚEṢ -a @ PRAJÑAPT -i @ PARYEṢAṆ -ā ca / </s><s> TATR -a NĀM -no VAST -uny ĀGANTUK -atva PARYEṢAṆ -ā NĀM -a @ PARYEṢAṆ -ā VEDITAVY -ā

line.left: <g/> // </s><s> TATR -a PRATIṢṬH - @ ĀNIMITT -aṃ BHĀJAN -a @ LOK -aḥ / </s><s> BHOG -a @ NIMITT -aṃ PAÑC -a RŪP - @ ĀD -ayo VIṢAY -āḥ / </s><s> BĪJ -a @ NIMITT -aṃ yat teṣāṃ BĪJ -am ĀLAYAVIJÑĀN -aṃ / </s><s> YATR -a tir VIDH -e NIMITT -e s ĀŚRAY -āś CITT -a @ CAITT -ā BADH -yante / </s><s> yac ca teṣāṃ BĪJ -am ĀLAYAVIJÑĀN -aṃ / </s><s> ĀŚRAY -āḥ PUN -aś CAKṢ -ur ĀD -ayo VEDITAVY -āḥ / </s><s> PURAT -aḥ STHĀPIT -aṃ yac ca NIMITT -aṃ yat STHIT -aṃ SVAY -aṃ / SARV -aṃ VIBHĀV -ayan dhīmān LABH -ate
line.right: -im UTTAM -ām // <g/> 1 <g/> 9 — 50 <g/> // </s><s> TATR -a PURAT -aḥ STHĀPIT -aṃ NIMITT -aṃ yac CHRUT -a @ CINT -ā @ BHĀVAN -ā @ PRAYOG -en ĀLAMBAN -ī @ KṚT -aṃ PARIKALPIT -aṃ / </s><s> STHIT -aṃ SVAY -am eva yat PRAKṚT -iyā LAMBAN -ī @ BHŪT am a @ YATN -a @ PARIKALPIT -aṃ / </s><s> tasya VIBHĀVAN - @ ĀDHIGAM -o n ĀLAMBAN -ī @ BHĀV -aḥ / </s><s> a @ KALPAN -ā TAD UPĀY -o NIMITT -a @ PRATIPAKṢ -aḥ / </s><s> tac c OBHAY -aṃ KRAM -ād BHAV -ati / </s><s> PŪRV -aṃ hi STHĀPIT

line.left: -a @ MAH -atvena BAL -a @ VAIŚĀRADY - @ ĀVEṆIK -a @ BUDDH -a @ DHARM -a @ SAMUDĀGAM -āt / </s><s> BUDDH -a @ KARM -a @ MAH -tvena ca punaḥ punar ABHISAṂBODH -i @ MAHĀPARINIRVĀṆ -a @ SAṂDARŚANAT -aḥ / </s><s> GOTR -aṃ DHARM - @ ĀDHIMUKT -iś ca CITT -asya <g/> ^ UTPĀDAN -ā tathā / DĀN - @ ĀD -i @ PRATIPATT -iś ca NYĀY -ām ĀVAKRĀNT -ir eva ca // <g/> 1 <g/> 9 — 61 <g/> // </s><s> SATV -ānāṃ PARIPĀK -aś ca KṢETR -asya ca VIŚODHAN -ā / a @ PRATIṢṬHIT -a @ NIRVĀṆ -aṃ
line.right: -iḥ ŚREṢṬH -ā ca DARŚAN -āt DARŚAN -ā // <g/> 1 <g/> 9 — 62 <g/> // </s><s> etena DAŚ -a @ VIDH -ena VAST -unā KṚTSN -aṃ MAHĀYĀN -aṃ SAṂGṚHĪT -aṃ / </s><s> SATV -ānāṃ PARIPĀCAN -aṃ BHŪM -i @ PART -iṣṭ HIT -asya YĀVAT SAPTAM -yāṃ BHŪM -au VEDITAVY -aṃ / </s><s> KṢETR -a @ PARIŚODHAN -am a @ PRATIṢṬHIT -a @ NIRVĀṆ -aṃ c ĀVINIVARTANĪY -āyāṃ BHŪM -au TRIVIDH -āyāṃ / </s><s> ŚREṢṬH -ā BODH -ir BUDDHABHŪM -au / </s><s> tatr <g/> ^ <g/> aiva c ĀBHISAṂBODH -i @ MAHĀPARINIRVĀṆ -a @ SAṂDARŚAN -ā / </s><s> ŚEṢ -aṃ GAT - @ ĀRTH -aṃ

line.left: <g/> 1 <g/> 9 — 61 <g/> // </s><s> SATV -ānāṃ PARIPĀK -aś ca KṢETR -asya ca VIŚODHAN -ā / a @ PRATIṢṬHIT -a @ NIRVĀṆ -aṃ BODH -iḥ ŚREṢṬH -ā ca DARŚAN -āt DARŚAN -ā // <g/> 1 <g/> 9 — 62 <g/> // </s><s> etena DAŚ -a @ VIDH -ena VAST -unā KṚTSN -aṃ MAHĀYĀN -aṃ SAṂGṚHĪT -aṃ / </s><s> SATV -ānāṃ PARIPĀCAN -aṃ BHŪM -i @ PART -iṣṭ HIT -asya YĀVAT SAPTAM -yāṃ BHŪM -au VEDITAVY -aṃ / </s><s> KṢETR -a @ PARIŚODHAN -am a @ PRATIṢṬHIT -a @ NIRVĀṆ -aṃ c ĀVINIVARTANĪY -āyāṃ BHŪM -au TRIVIDH -āyāṃ / </s><s> ŚREṢṬH -ā

line.right: - @ PAKṢ -a @ BHĀVAN -ātaḥ / </s><s> AṢṬAM -yām UPEKṢ -akaḥ KṢETR -a @ VIŚODH -akaś c <g/> ^ <g/> ān ĀBHOG -a @ NIRNIMITT -a @ VIHĀR -itvād MIŚR -a — </s><s> UPAM -iśra PRAYOG -ataś c ĀVINIVARTANĪY -a @ BHŪM -i @ PRAVIṢṬ -air BODHISATV -aiḥ / </s><s> NAVAM -yāṃ SATV -a @ PARIPĀK -a @ KUŚAL -aḥ PŪRV -avat / </s><s> DAŚAM -yāṃ BODHISATV -a @ BHŪM -au BODHISATV -o MAHARDDHIK -aś ca VYAVASTHĀP -yate MAH - @ ĀBHIJÑ -ā @ LĀBH -āt / </s><s> SAṂPŪRṆ -a @ KĀY -aś cā PRAMĀṆ -a @ SAMĀDH -i @ DHĀRAṆ -ī @

line.left: / </s><s> SARV -aṃ TATHĀGAT -asya KĀY -a @ KARM -a JÑĀN -a @ PŪRVAṂGAM -aṃ JÑĀN - @ ĀNUPARIVART -i / </s><s> SARV -aṃ VĀK KARM -a SARV -aṃ MAN -as KARM -eti KARM -a @ SAṂGṚH -āitās TRAY -aḥ / </s><s> SARVĀKĀRAJÑAT -ā @ VIBHĀG -e ŚLOK -aḥ / </s><s> TRI -bhiḥ KĀY -air MAHĀBODH -iṃ SARV - @ ĀKĀR -ām UPĀGAT -a / SARVATR -a SARV -a @ SATV -ānāṃ KĀṄKṢ -ā @ CHID -a NAM -o astu te // <g/> 2 <g/> 0 — 21 — 58 // </s><s> anena TRI -bhiś ca KĀY -aiḥ SARV - @ ĀKĀR -a @

line.left: ^ <g/> āsti v <g/> ^ <g/> eti / </s><s> PARAMĀRTH -o hy ĀRY -āṇāṃ TŪṢṆĪṂBHĀV -aḥ / </s><s> tataḥ KUT -as TATR -a PRAPAÑC -a @ SAṂBHAV -o yad UPAPATT -ir ANUPAPATT -ir vā syāt ? </s><s> yadi hy ĀRY -ā UPAPATT -iṃ na VARṆ -ayanti <g/> ; kena KHALV IDĀN -īṃ PARAMĀRTH -aṃ LOK -aṃ BODHAY -iṣyanti ? na KHALV ĀRY -ā LOK -a @ SAṂVYAVAHĀR -eṇ OPAPATT -iṃ VARṆ -ayanti <g/> ; kiṃ tu LOK -ata eva yā PRASIDDH - @ OPAPATT -iḥ <g/> ; tāṃ PARĀVABODH - @ ĀRTH -am ABHYUPETY -a tay <g/> ^ <g/> aiva LOK -aṃ

line.left: VID -yati so api yo api VIJĀN -ati so api a @ SANT -o // </s><s> TATR -a PRAṆ - @ AṢṬ -u JAG -aṃ imu SARV -aṃ VITATH -a @ VIKALP -a @ NIV -e ŚAV -aśena / ŚĀNT -a VIJĀN -ati yo NAR -u DHARM -āṃs tehi TATHĀGAT -u DṚṢṬ -a SVAYAṂBH -ūḥ // </s><s> ŚĀNT -a PRAJĀN -ati DHARM -a PRAṆĪT -ān PRĪT -i sa VIND -ati TOṢ -ati SATTV -ān / so BHAV -atī JIN -u JITV -ena KLEŚ -ān ĀTM -a — — — — — — — — — — — — / </s><s> tena VIJĀN -ita
line.right: -i JIN -ānāṃ BUDDH -iya BODH -ayate sa JAG -aṃ pi / </s><s> ity ādi // 6 // </s><s> yacc OKT -am — a @ SVABHĀV -o BHĀV -o n <g/> ^ <g/> ai v <g/> ^ <g/> āsti ; ŚŪNYAT -ā ca BHĀV -ān ĀMIṢ -yate <g/> ; TASMĀD asti ŚŪNY -atā AŚR -ayo BHĀV -a @ SVABHĀV -a iti <g/> ; ETAD api na YUJ -yate ity ĀH -a — </s><s> yady a @ ŚŪNY -aṃ BHAV -et KIṂCIT syā CCHŪNY -am iti KIṂCAN -a / na KIṂCID ASTY -a @ ŚŪNY -aṃ ca KUT -aḥ ŚŪNY -aṃ BHAV -iṣyati //

line.right: -ayate sa JAG -aṃ pi / </s><s> ity ādi // 6 // </s><s> yacc OKT -am — a @ SVABHĀV -o BHĀV -o n <g/> ^ <g/> ai v <g/> ^ <g/> āsti ; ŚŪNYAT -ā ca BHĀV -ān ĀMIṢ -yate <g/> ; TASMĀD asti ŚŪNY -atā AŚR -ayo BHĀV -a @ SVABHĀV -a iti <g/> ; ETAD api na YUJ -yate ity ĀH -a — </s><s> yady a @ ŚŪNY -aṃ BHAV -et KIṂCIT syā CCHŪNY -am iti KIṂCAN -a / na KIṂCID ASTY -a @ ŚŪNY -aṃ ca KUT -aḥ ŚŪNY -aṃ BHAV -iṣyati // 7 // </s><s> yadi ŚŪNYAT -ā NĀM

line.left: DARŚAN - @ ĀD -iṣ VIT -i / </s><s> VIJÑEY -am / </s><s> ata ev OKT -am ĀRY -a @ RATN - @ ĀVAL -yām — </s><s> sa SĀṂKHY - @ AUL -lūkya NIRGRANTH -a @ PUDGAL -a @ SKANDH -a @ VĀD -inam / PṚCCH -a LOK -aṃ yadi VAD - @ ATYAST -in <g/> ^ <g/> āsti VYATIKRAM -am // </s><s> DHARM -a @ YAUT -a @ KAMIT -y @ ASMĀD asti n <g/> ^ <g/> āsti VYATIKRAM -am / VIDDH -i GAMBHĪR -am ITYUKT -a BUDDH -ānāṃ ŚĀSAN - @ ĀMṚT -am // iti // </s><s> tathā VIDHAV -ine YAJAN -a @
line.right: - @ ĀNURODH -āt tu PARAMĀRTH -a @ DARŚAN -asya UPĀY -a @ BHŪT atvāt NEYĀRTH -atvena BHAGAV -atā MAHĀKARUṆ -ā @ PARATANTR -atayā VIJÑĀN - @ ĀD -i @ VĀD -o DEŚIT -aḥ SĀṂMITĪY -a @ PUDGAL -a @ VĀD -avat <g/> ; na NĪTĀRTH -aḥ iti VIJÑEY -am / </s><s> YATHOKT -am ĀRY -a @ SAMĀDHIRĀJ -a @ BHAṬṬĀR -ake — </s><s> NĪTĀRTH -a @ SŪTRĀNT -a @ VIŚEṢ -a JĀN -ati yath OPADIṢṬ -ā SUGAT -ena ŚŪNYAT -ā / YASMIN punaḥ PUDGAL -a SATTV -a PŪRUṢ -o NEYĀRTH -ato JĀN -ati SARVADHARM -ān // </s><s> ETAC -ca ĀRY - @

line.left: ŚAMATH -a UTPAD -yate / </s><s> tasya SARVADHARM -eṣu CITT -aṃ PRATILĪ -yate PRATIVAH -ati PRATYUDĀVART -ate <g/> ; tebhyaś c ĀRTĪ -yate JEHRĪ -yate <g/> ; an @ ABHINANDAN -ā @ CITT -am UTPAD -yate / </s><s> tasy <g/> ^^ <g/> aivaṃ BHAV -ati — MUKT -o asmi SARV -a @ DUḤKH -ebhyaḥ / </s><s> na MAM -a BHŪY -a UTTAR -iṃ KIṂCIT KARAṆĪY -am / </s><s> ARH -annasmi / </s><s> ity ĀTM -ānaṃ SAṂJĀNĀT -i / </s><s> SAMARAṆ -a @ KĀL -a @ SAMAY -e UTPATT -im ĀTM -anaḥ SAMANUPAŚ -yati / </s><s> tasya KĀṄKṢ -ā ca VICIKITS -ā ca BHAV -ati BUDDH -a @
line.right: -au / </s><s> sa VICIKITS - @ ĀPATIT -aḥ KĀL -a @ GAT -o MAH -ā @ NIRAY -eṣu PRAPAT -ati / </s><s> TAT kasya HET -oḥ ? </s><s> YATHĀP - @ ĪDAM ANUTPANN -ān SARVADHARM -ān VIKALPAY -itvā TATHĀGAT -e VICIKITS -āṃ VIMAT -iṃ c OTPĀD -ayati // </s><s> atha KHAL -u MAÑJUŚR -īḥ KUMĀRABHŪT -o BHAGAV -antam ETAD AVOCAT — KATHAṂ punar BHAGAV -aṃś CATVĀR -i ĀRYASATY -āni DRAṢṬAVY -āni ? </s><s> BHAGAV -ān ĀH -a — yena MAÑJUŚR -īr ANUTPANN -āḥ SARV -a @ SAṂSKĀR -ā DṚṢṬ -āḥ <g/> ; tena DUḤKH -aṃ PARIJÑĀT -am / </s><s> yena a @ SAMUTTHIT -āḥ SARVADHARM

line.left: -e — </s><s> PAÑC -a ca BHIKṢ -u ŚAT -āni DHYĀN -a @ LĀBH -īni UTTHĀY - @ ĀSAN -ebhyaḥ PRAKRĀNT -āni imāṃ GAMBHĪR -āṃ DHARMADEŚAN -ām ANAVABUDHYAMĀN -āni an @ AVATAR -anti ANAVAGĀH -a @ MĀN -āni an @ ADHIMUCY -a @ MĀN -āni / </s><s> BHAGAV -ān ĀH -a — tathā hy ete KĀŚYAP -a BHIKṢ -avaḥ ĀBHIMĀNIK -āḥ imāman ĀSRAV -āṃ ŚĪL -a @ VIŚUDDH -iṃ n ĀVATAR -anti n ĀVAGĀH -ante n ĀDHIMUC -yante UTTRAS -yanti SAṂTRAS -yanti saṃtrā SAMĀPAD -yante / </s><s> GAMBHĪR -aḥ KĀŚYAP -a GĀTH - @ ĀBHINIRHĀR -o GAMBHĪR -ā ca BUDDH -ānāṃ BHAG -avatāṃ

line.left: ŚŪNYAT -ām // </s><s> tathā — </s><s> yo api ca CINTAY -i ŚŪNY -aka DHARM -ān so api KUMĀRG -a @ PAP -an NAK -u BĀL -aḥ / AKṢAR -a KĪRTIT -a ŚŪNY -aka DHARM -āḥ te ca an @ AKṢAR -a AKṢAR -a UKT -āḥ // </s><s> ŚĀNT -a PAŚ - @ ĀNT -a ya CINTAY -i DHARM -ān so api ca CITT -u na JĀT -u na BHŪT aḥ / CITT -a @ VITARK -iṇa SARV -i PAP -añ cāḥ tasya ACINTIY -a BUDHY -atha DHARM -ān // iti / </s><s> tathā — </s><s> SKANDH -a sa BHĀVAT -u ŚŪNY -a VIVIKT -a
line.right: -i sa BHĀVAT -u ŚŪNY -a VIVIKT -a / yo api caretsa pi ŚŪNY -a @ SABH -āvo JÑĀNAVAT -o na tu BĀL -a @ JAN -asya // </s><s> iti // 3 // </s><s> TAD evam — </s><s> MAM -ety AHAM iti KṢĪṆ -e BAHIRDH - @ ĀDHYĀTM -am eva ca / NIRUDHY -ata UPĀDĀN -aṃ TAT KṢAY -āj JANM -anaḥ KṢAY -aḥ // 4 // </s><s> SATKĀYADṚṢṬ -i @ MŪLAK -āḥ SATKĀYADṚṢṬ -i @ SAMUDAY -āḥ SATKĀYADṚṢṬ -i @ HET -ukāḥ SARV -a @ KLEŚ -āḥ SŪTR -e UKT -āḥ / </s><s> sā ca SATKĀYADṚṢṬ -ir ĀTMĀTMĪY - @ ĀNUPALAMBH -āt PRAH -īyate <g/>

line.left: nir AHAṂ KĀR -o yaś ca so api na VID -yate // iti // </s><s> TAD AYAM ĀCĀRY -o yath AIVAṂVIDH -e VIṢAY -e n ĀCĀR -y @ APĀD -a @ MAT - @ ĀNUVART -ī tathā PRATIPĀDIT -aṃ MADHY -a @ MAK - @ ĀVATĀR -e — </s><s> DŪRAṂGAM -āyāṃ tu dhiyā DHIK aḥ </s><s> ITYATR -eti na punas TAD DŪṢAṆ -e YATN -a ā STH -īyate / </s><s> ata ev OKT -aṃ BHAGAV -atā ĀRY - @ ĀṢṬ -a @ SĀHASRIK -āyāṃ BHAGAV -atyām — </s><s> ŚRĀVAKABODH -im ABHISAṂBODDH -u KRĀM -ena SUBHŪT -e asyām eva PRAJÑĀPĀRAMIT -āyāṃ ŚIKṢITAVY -am / </s><s> PRATYEK -a
line.right: -im ABHISAṂBODDH -u KĀM -ena SUBHŪT -e asyām eva PRAJÑĀPĀRAMIT -āyāṃ ŚIKṢITAVY -am / </s><s> ANUTTAR -āṃ SAMYAKSAṂBODH -im ABHISAṂBODDH -u KĀM -ena SUBHŪT -e BODHISATTV -ena MAHĀSATTV -ena asyām eva PRAJÑĀPĀRAMIT -āyāṃ ŚIKṢITAVY -am ity ādi // </s><s> ĀH -a ca — </s><s> yo ICCHAT -ī SUGAT -a @ ŚRĀVAK -u haṃ BHAV -eyaṃ PRATYEKABUDDH -u BHAV -i @ J -ā TATH -a DHARMARĀJ -o / imu KṢĀNT -i n ĀGATY -a na ŚAK -yati PĀP -uṇotuṃ yatha ĀRAP -āra GAMANĪY -aṃ a @ TĪR -a @ DARŚ -ī // </s><s> iti // 5 // </s><s> atr ĀH -a — yady evam ĀDHY -

line.left: VĀRAṆ -aṃ PAŚC - @ ĀDY -o JĀN -īte sa BUDDH -imān // iti // </s><s> tathā ĀCĀR -y @ APĀD -air UKT -am — </s><s> yath <g/> ^ <g/> aiva VAIYĀKARAṆ -o MĀTṚK -ām api PĀṬHAY -et / BUDDH -o AVADAT tathā DHARM -a VINEY -ānāṃ yathā KṢAM -am // </s><s> keṣāṃcida VAD -ad DHARM -aṃ PĀP -ebhyo VINIVṚTT -aye / keṣ ĀṂCIT - @ PUṆY -a @ SIDDH -ay ARTH -aṃ keṣāṃcid DVAY -a @ NIŚCIT -am // </s><s> DVAY -ā @ NIŚRIT -am EK -eṣāṃ GAMBHĪR -aṃ BHĪR -u BHĪṢAṆ -am / ŚŪNYAT -ā @ KARUṆ -ā @ GARBH -aṃ keṣāṃcid
line.right: -i @ SĀDHAN -am // iti // </s><s> ATHAV -ā — AYAM ANY -o ARTH -aḥ — ĀTM -ety api PRAJÑAPIT -aṃ SĀṂKHY - @ ĀD -ibhiḥ PRATIKṢAṆ -a @ VINAŚVAR -āṇāṃ SAṂSKĀR -āṇāṃ KARM -a @ PHAL -a @ SAṂBANDH -ā @ BHĀV -am UTPREKṢY -a / </s><s> an @ ĀTM -ety api PRAJÑAPIT -aṃ LOKĀYAT -ikaiḥ UPAPATT -yā ĀTM -ānaṃ SAṂSAR -t ĀRAM - @ APAŚY -adbhiḥ — </s><s> ETĀV -ān eva PURUṢ -o YĀV -ān INDRIY -a @ GOCAR -aḥ / </s><s> BHADR -e VṚK - @ APAD -aṃ hy ETAD yad VADANT -i BAHUŚRUT -āḥ // </s><s> ity ā DIN -ā

line.left: -aṃ VIPARYAST -a @ JAN - @ ĀNUYĀT -aṃ tam eva MAH -ā @ GHOR -a @ SAṂSĀR - @ ĀṬAV -ī @ KĀNTĀR -a @ CĀRAK - @ ĀNUGAM -ārgam AVAGĀH -ante / </s><s> na hi TATHĀGAT -āḥ KADĀCID apy ĀTM -anaḥ SKANDH -ānāṃ vā AST -itvaṃ PRAJÑAP -ayanti / </s><s> YATHOKT -aṃ BHAGAV -atyām — </s><s> BUDDH -o apy ĀYUṢM -an SUBHŪT -e MĀYOPAM -aḥ SVAPN - @ OPAM -aḥ / </s><s> BUDDH -a @ DHARM -ā apy ĀYUṢM -an SUBHŪT -e MĀYOPAM -āḥ SVAPN - @ OPAM -āḥ // iti // </s><s> tathā — </s><s> DHARM -a SVABHĀV -atu ŚŪNY -a VIVIKT -o
line.right: -i SVABHĀV -atu ŚŪNY -a VIVIKT -ā / yo hi caretsa pi ŚŪNY -a @ SVABHĀV -o JÑĀNAVAT -o na tu BĀL -a @ JAN -asya // iti / </s><s> na ca VAYAṂ SARVATH ^ <g/> aiva NIṢPRAPAÑC -ānāṃ TATHĀGAT -ānāṃ n <g/> ^ <g/> āstitvaṃ BRŪM -aḥ <g/> ; yad ASMĀK -aṃ TAD APAVĀD -a @ KṚT -o DOṢ -aḥ syāt // 10 // </s><s> api ca / </s><s> NIḤSVABHĀV -aṃ hi TATHĀGAT -aṃ VYĀCAKṢĀṆ -ena a @ VIPARĪT - @ ĀRTH - @ ĀBHIDHITS -unā YOG -ināṃ SAT ā SARVATH -ā — </s><s> ŚŪNY -am iti na VAKTAVY -am a @ ŚŪNY

line.left: -a ity UC -yate // iti VISTAR -aḥ / </s><s> tathā — </s><s> ĀDARŚ -a @ PṚṢṬH -e TATH -a TAIL -a @ PĀTR -e NIRĪKṢ -ate NĀR -i @ MUKH -aṃ sv ALAṂKṚT -am / so TATR -a RĀG -aṃ JANAY -itva BĀL -o PRADHĀVIT -o KĀM -i GAVEṢ -am āṇo // </s><s> MUKH -asya SAṂKRĀNT -i yadā na VID -yate BIMB -e MUKH -aṃ n <g/> ^ <g/> aiva KADĀC -i LABH -yate / MŪḌH -o yathā so JAN -ayeta RĀG -aṃ TATH - @ OPAM -ān JĀN -atha SARVADHARM -ān // ity ādi / </s><s> tathā — </s><s> RŪP -eṇa DARŚIT -ā
line.right: -ī BODHAY -e RŪP -a DARŚIT -am / VIṢ -a @ BHĀG -ena ŚABD -ena UTTAR -o DHARM -u DEŚIT -aḥ // </s><s> ŚABD -ena UTTAR -aṃ RŪP -aṃ GAMBHĪR -aṃ ca SVABHĀV -ataḥ / SAM -aṃ RŪP -aṃ ca BODH -iś ca NĀN -ātvaṃ na sa LABH -yate // </s><s> yathā NIRVĀṆ -u GAMBHĪR -aṃ ŚABD -ena SAṂPRAKĀŚIT -am / LABH -yate na ca NIRVĀṆ -aṃ sa ca ŚABD -o na LABH -yate / </s><s> ŚABD -aś c <g/> ^ <g/> āpi NIRVĀṆ -aṃ ca UBHAY -aṃ TAN na LABH -yate / evaṃ ŚŪNY -eṣu DHARM -eṣu NIRVĀṆ -aṃ SAṂPRAKĀŚIT -am // </s>

line.left: -itva BĀL -o PRADHĀVIT -o KĀM -i GAVEṢ -am āṇo // </s><s> MUKH -asya SAṂKRĀNT -i yadā na VID -yate BIMB -e MUKH -aṃ n <g/> ^ <g/> aiva KADĀC -i LABH -yate / MŪḌH -o yathā so JAN -ayeta RĀG -aṃ TATH - @ OPAM -ān JĀN -atha SARVADHARM -ān // ity ādi / </s><s> tathā — </s><s> RŪP -eṇa DARŚIT -ā BODH -ī BODHAY -e RŪP -a DARŚIT -am / VIṢ -a @ BHĀG -ena ŚABD -ena UTTAR -o DHARM -u DEŚIT -aḥ // </s><s> ŚABD -ena UTTAR -aṃ RŪP -aṃ GAMBHĪR -aṃ ca SVABHĀV -ataḥ / SAM -aṃ RŪP -aṃ ca
line.right: -iś ca NĀN -ātvaṃ na sa LABH -yate // </s><s> yathā NIRVĀṆ -u GAMBHĪR -aṃ ŚABD -ena SAṂPRAKĀŚIT -am / LABH -yate na ca NIRVĀṆ -aṃ sa ca ŚABD -o na LABH -yate / </s><s> ŚABD -aś c <g/> ^ <g/> āpi NIRVĀṆ -aṃ ca UBHAY -aṃ TAN na LABH -yate / evaṃ ŚŪNY -eṣu DHARM -eṣu NIRVĀṆ -aṃ SAṂPRAKĀŚIT -am // </s><s> NIRVĀṆ -aṃ NIVṚTT -ir eva NIRVĀṆ -aṃ ca na LABH -yate / a @ PRAVṚTT -ir hi DHARM -āṇāṃ yathā PAŚCĀT tathā PUR -ā // </s><s> SARVADHARM -āḥ SVABHĀV -ena NIRVĀṆ -a @ SAM -a @ SĀDṚŚ -āḥ / JÑĀT -ā

line.left: SANT -i PRATIPANN -akāḥ / SAṂGH -o n <g/> ^ <g/> āsti na CET - @ SANT -i te AṢṬ -au PURUṢ -a @ PUDGAL -āḥ // 29 // </s><s> a @ BHĀV -āc c ĀRYASATY -ānāṃ SAD DHARM -o api na VID -yate / DHARM -e cā SAT i SAṂGH -e ca KATHAṂ BUDDH -o BHAV -iṣyati // 30 // </s><s> a @ NAY -ośca ŚLOKAY -oḥ PŪRV -av a @ DEV - @ ĀRTH -o VEDITAVY -aḥ // 29 — 30 // </s><s> api ca — sa SVABHĀV - @ ĀBHYUPAGAM -e SAT i — </s><s> a @ PRATĪTY ^ <g/> āpi
line.right: -iṃ ca tava BUDDH -aḥ PRASAJ -yate / a @ PRATĪTY ^ <g/> āpi BUDDH -aṃ ca tava BODH -iḥ PRASAJ -yate // 31 // </s><s> yadi hi SVABHĀV -ato BUDDH -o NĀM -a KAŚCID BHĀV -aḥ syāt <g/> ; sa BODH -iṃ SARVAJÑ -a @ JÑĀN -am a @ PRATĪTY ^ <g/> āpi ANAPEKṢ -y <g/> ^ <g/> āpi syāt / </s><s> a @ KṚTRIM -aḥ SVABHĀV -o hi NIRAPEKṢ -aḥ PARATR -a ca / </s><s> iti VACAN -āt / </s><s> tathā VIN ^ <g/> āpi BUDDH -ena BODH -iḥ syāt <g/> ; ANAPEKṢ -y <g/> ^ <g/> āpi BUDDH -aṃ NIRĀŚRAY -ā

line.left: AṢṬ -au PURUṢ -a @ PUDGAL -āḥ // 29 // </s><s> a @ BHĀV -āc c ĀRYASATY -ānāṃ SAD DHARM -o api na VID -yate / DHARM -e cā SAT i SAṂGH -e ca KATHAṂ BUDDH -o BHAV -iṣyati // 30 // </s><s> a @ NAY -ośca ŚLOKAY -oḥ PŪRV -av a @ DEV - @ ĀRTH -o VEDITAVY -aḥ // 29 — 30 // </s><s> api ca — sa SVABHĀV - @ ĀBHYUPAGAM -e SAT i — </s><s> a @ PRATĪTY ^ <g/> āpi BODH -iṃ ca tava BUDDH -aḥ PRASAJ -yate / a @ PRATĪTY ^ <g/> āpi BUDDH -aṃ ca tava

line.left: VID -yate / DHARM -e cā SAT i SAṂGH -e ca KATHAṂ BUDDH -o BHAV -iṣyati // 30 // </s><s> a @ NAY -ośca ŚLOKAY -oḥ PŪRV -av a @ DEV - @ ĀRTH -o VEDITAVY -aḥ // 29 — 30 // </s><s> api ca — sa SVABHĀV - @ ĀBHYUPAGAM -e SAT i — </s><s> a @ PRATĪTY ^ <g/> āpi BODH -iṃ ca tava BUDDH -aḥ PRASAJ -yate / a @ PRATĪTY ^ <g/> āpi BUDDH -aṃ ca tava BODH -iḥ PRASAJ -yate // 31 // </s><s> yadi hi SVABHĀV -ato BUDDH -o NĀM -a KAŚCID BHĀV -aḥ syāt <g/> ; sa
line.right: -iṃ SARVAJÑ -a @ JÑĀN -am a @ PRATĪTY ^ <g/> āpi ANAPEKṢ -y <g/> ^ <g/> āpi syāt / </s><s> a @ KṚTRIM -aḥ SVABHĀV -o hi NIRAPEKṢ -aḥ PARATR -a ca / </s><s> iti VACAN -āt / </s><s> tathā VIN ^ <g/> āpi BUDDH -ena BODH -iḥ syāt <g/> ; ANAPEKṢ -y <g/> ^ <g/> āpi BUDDH -aṃ NIRĀŚRAY -ā BODH -iḥ syāt // 31 // </s><s> kiṃ c ĀNYAT — </s><s> yaś cā BUDDH -aḥ SVABHĀV -ena sa BODH -āya GHAṬAN -n api / na BODHISATTV -a @ CARY -āyāṃ BODH -iṃ te ADHIGAM -iṣyati // 32 // </s><s> iha hi BUDDH -atvāt

line.left: SVABHĀV - @ ĀBHYUPAGAM -e SAT i — </s><s> a @ PRATĪTY ^ <g/> āpi BODH -iṃ ca tava BUDDH -aḥ PRASAJ -yate / a @ PRATĪTY ^ <g/> āpi BUDDH -aṃ ca tava BODH -iḥ PRASAJ -yate // 31 // </s><s> yadi hi SVABHĀV -ato BUDDH -o NĀM -a KAŚCID BHĀV -aḥ syāt <g/> ; sa BODH -iṃ SARVAJÑ -a @ JÑĀN -am a @ PRATĪTY ^ <g/> āpi ANAPEKṢ -y <g/> ^ <g/> āpi syāt / </s><s> a @ KṚTRIM -aḥ SVABHĀV -o hi NIRAPEKṢ -aḥ PARATR -a ca / </s><s> iti VACAN -āt / </s><s> tathā VIN ^ <g/> āpi BUDDH -ena
line.right: -iḥ syāt <g/> ; ANAPEKṢ -y <g/> ^ <g/> āpi BUDDH -aṃ NIRĀŚRAY -ā BODH -iḥ syāt // 31 // </s><s> kiṃ c ĀNYAT — </s><s> yaś cā BUDDH -aḥ SVABHĀV -ena sa BODH -āya GHAṬAN -n api / na BODHISATTV -a @ CARY -āyāṃ BODH -iṃ te ADHIGAM -iṣyati // 32 // </s><s> iha hi BUDDH -atvāt PŪRV -am a @ BUDDH -a @ SVABHĀV -asya SAT aḥ PUDGAL -asya SATY -ām api BODHISATTV -a @ CARY -āyāṃ BODH -y @ ARTH -aṃ GHAṬ -amānasy ĀPI n <g/> ^ <g/> aiva BODH -iḥ syāt <g/> ; a @ BUDDH -a @ SVABHĀV

line.right: -iḥ syāt // 31 // </s><s> kiṃ c ĀNYAT — </s><s> yaś cā BUDDH -aḥ SVABHĀV -ena sa BODH -āya GHAṬAN -n api / na BODHISATTV -a @ CARY -āyāṃ BODH -iṃ te ADHIGAM -iṣyati // 32 // </s><s> iha hi BUDDH -atvāt PŪRV -am a @ BUDDH -a @ SVABHĀV -asya SAT aḥ PUDGAL -asya SATY -ām api BODHISATTV -a @ CARY -āyāṃ BODH -y @ ARTH -aṃ GHAṬ -amānasy ĀPI n <g/> ^ <g/> aiva BODH -iḥ syāt <g/> ; a @ BUDDH -a @ SVABHĀV -asya VYĀVART -ayitu MAŚAK -yatvāt // 32 // </s><s> kiṃ c ĀNYAT — </s><s> na ca DHARM

line.right: -āya GHAṬAN -n api / na BODHISATTV -a @ CARY -āyāṃ BODH -iṃ te ADHIGAM -iṣyati // 32 // </s><s> iha hi BUDDH -atvāt PŪRV -am a @ BUDDH -a @ SVABHĀV -asya SAT aḥ PUDGAL -asya SATY -ām api BODHISATTV -a @ CARY -āyāṃ BODH -y @ ARTH -aṃ GHAṬ -amānasy ĀPI n <g/> ^ <g/> aiva BODH -iḥ syāt <g/> ; a @ BUDDH -a @ SVABHĀV -asya VYĀVART -ayitu MAŚAK -yatvāt // 32 // </s><s> kiṃ c ĀNYAT — </s><s> na ca DHARM -am a @ DHARM -aṃ vā KAŚCI -j JĀT -u KAR -iṣyati / kima ŚŪNY -asya KARTAVY

line.left: @ KṚTRIM -aḥ SVABHĀV -o hi NIRAPEKṢ -aḥ PARATR -a ca / </s><s> iti VACAN -āt / </s><s> tathā VIN ^ <g/> āpi BUDDH -ena BODH -iḥ syāt <g/> ; ANAPEKṢ -y <g/> ^ <g/> āpi BUDDH -aṃ NIRĀŚRAY -ā BODH -iḥ syāt // 31 // </s><s> kiṃ c ĀNYAT — </s><s> yaś cā BUDDH -aḥ SVABHĀV -ena sa BODH -āya GHAṬAN -n api / na BODHISATTV -a @ CARY -āyāṃ BODH -iṃ te ADHIGAM -iṣyati // 32 // </s><s> iha hi BUDDH -atvāt PŪRV -am a @ BUDDH -a @ SVABHĀV -asya SAT aḥ PUDGAL -asya SATY -ām api BODHISATTV -a @ CARY -āyāṃ
line.right: -y @ ARTH -aṃ GHAṬ -amānasy ĀPI n <g/> ^ <g/> aiva BODH -iḥ syāt <g/> ; a @ BUDDH -a @ SVABHĀV -asya VYĀVART -ayitu MAŚAK -yatvāt // 32 // </s><s> kiṃ c ĀNYAT — </s><s> na ca DHARM -am a @ DHARM -aṃ vā KAŚCI -j JĀT -u KAR -iṣyati / kima ŚŪNY -asya KARTAVY -aṃ SVABHĀV -aḥ KRI -yate na hi // 33 // </s><s> SAT i hi SVABHĀV -a @ VĀD - @ ĀBHYUPAGAM -e DHARM -ā @ DHARMAY -oḥ KARAṆ -aṃ n OPAPAD -yate / </s><s> kiṃ hi a @ ŚŪNY -asya KARTAVY -am ? na hi SVABHĀV -asya

line.left: VACAN -āt / </s><s> tathā VIN ^ <g/> āpi BUDDH -ena BODH -iḥ syāt <g/> ; ANAPEKṢ -y <g/> ^ <g/> āpi BUDDH -aṃ NIRĀŚRAY -ā BODH -iḥ syāt // 31 // </s><s> kiṃ c ĀNYAT — </s><s> yaś cā BUDDH -aḥ SVABHĀV -ena sa BODH -āya GHAṬAN -n api / na BODHISATTV -a @ CARY -āyāṃ BODH -iṃ te ADHIGAM -iṣyati // 32 // </s><s> iha hi BUDDH -atvāt PŪRV -am a @ BUDDH -a @ SVABHĀV -asya SAT aḥ PUDGAL -asya SATY -ām api BODHISATTV -a @ CARY -āyāṃ BODH -y @ ARTH -aṃ GHAṬ -amānasy ĀPI n <g/> ^ <g/> aiva
line.right: -iḥ syāt <g/> ; a @ BUDDH -a @ SVABHĀV -asya VYĀVART -ayitu MAŚAK -yatvāt // 32 // </s><s> kiṃ c ĀNYAT — </s><s> na ca DHARM -am a @ DHARM -aṃ vā KAŚCI -j JĀT -u KAR -iṣyati / kima ŚŪNY -asya KARTAVY -aṃ SVABHĀV -aḥ KRI -yate na hi // 33 // </s><s> SAT i hi SVABHĀV -a @ VĀD - @ ĀBHYUPAGAM -e DHARM -ā @ DHARMAY -oḥ KARAṆ -aṃ n OPAPAD -yate / </s><s> kiṃ hi a @ ŚŪNY -asya KARTAVY -am ? na hi SVABHĀV -asya <g/> ^ a @ ŚŪNY -asya KĀRAṆ -am UPAPAD -yate VIDYAMĀN -atvāt //

line.left: -yate / </s><s> tasya SARVADHARM -eṣu CITT -aṃ na PRALĪ -yate PRATIVAH -ati PRATYUDĀVART -ate / </s><s> tebhyaś c ĀRTĪ -yate JEHRĪ -yate <g/> ; an @ ABHINANDAN -ā @ CITT -aṃ SAMUTPAD -yate / </s><s> tasy <g/> ^^ <g/> aivaṃ BHAV -ati — MUKT -o asmi SARV -a @ DUḤKH -ebhyaḥ <g/> ; na MAM -a BHŪY -aḥ UTTAR -iṃ KIṂCIT KARAṆĪY -am <g/> ; ARH -annasmi ity ĀTM -ānaṃ SAṂJĀNĀT -i / </s><s> sa MARAṆ -a @ KĀL -a @ SAMAY -e UTPATT -im ĀTM -ano DEV -eṣu PAŚ -yati / </s><s> tasya KĀṄKṢ -ā VICIKITS -ā ca BHAV -ati BUDDH -a @
line.right: -au / </s><s> sa VICIKITS -ām ĀPATIT -aḥ KĀL -a @ GAT -o MAH -ā @ NIRAY -eṣu PRAPAT -ati / </s><s> TAT kasya HET -oḥ ? </s><s> YATHĀP - @ ĪDAM ANUTPANN -ān SARVADHARM -ān VIKALPAY -itvā TATHĀGAT -e VICIKITS -āṃ VIMAT -im UTPĀD -ayati // </s><s> atha KHAL -u MAÑJUŚR -īḥ KUMĀRABHŪT -o BHAGAV -antam ETAD AVOCAT — KATHAṂ punar BHAGAV -an CATVĀR -i ĀRYASATY -āni DRAṢṬAVY -āni ? </s><s> BHAGAV -ān ĀH -a — yena MAÑJUŚR -īr ANUTPANN -āḥ SARVADHARM -ā DṚṢṬ -āḥ <g/> ; tena DUḤKH -aṃ PARIJÑĀT -am / </s><s> yena a @ SAMUTTHIT -āḥ SARVADHARM -ā DṚṢṬ -āḥ <g/> ;

line.left: @ MUDR -ā @ PRATIMUDR - @ ĀD -i @ NYĀY -ena vā MĀRAṆĀNTIK -eṣu SKANDH -eṣu NIRUDHY -a @ MĀN -eṣu EK ASMIN n eva KṢAṆ -e TUL -ā @ DAṆḌAN -āmonn ĀMANY -āyen <g/> ^ <g/> aiva AUPAPATT -y @ ĀṂŚIK -āḥ SKANDH -ā yathā KARM - @ ĀKṢEP -ata UPAJĀ -yante / </s><s> evaṃ ca BIMB -a @ PRATIBIMB -a @ MUDR -ā @ PRATIMUDR -ā @ NYĀY -ena PRATĪTYASAMUTPĀD -aḥ SIDH -yati / </s><s> TUL -ā @ DAṆḌAN -āmonn ĀMANY -āyena tu yad VIJÑĀN -aṃ SAṂNIVIŚ -ate ITYUKT -am <g/> ; TAD BĀL -a @ LOK -a @
line.right: - @ ĀNURODH -ena <g/> ; SAMĀN -a @ KĀL -a eva BHAV -a @ PRATISAṂDH -ir iti / </s><s> tathā SAMĀN -ena SAMĀN -a @ KĀL -aṃ LOK -asya DUḤKH -aṃ ca SUKH - @ ODAY -aṃ ca / HART -uṃ ca KART -uṃ ca SAD āstu ŚAKT -istamaḥ PRAKĀŚ -aṃ ca yath <g/> ^ <g/> aiva BHĀN -oḥ // iti / </s><s> na tu punaḥ PRATĪTYASAMUTPĀD -a @ SVARŪP -a @ VICAKṢAṆ -ānām evaṃ VAKT -uṃ YUJ -yate SĀH -a @ CARY - @ ĀDIT -vam EK -a @ KṢAṆ -e TUL -ā @ DAṆḌAN -ām ONNĀM -a @ DṚṢṬ

line.left: -am // </s><s> n AIKATV -e SAH -a @ BHĀV -o asti na ten <g/> ^ <g/> aiva hi TAT SAH -a / PṚTHAKTV -e SAH -a @ BHĀV -o atha KUT -a eva BHAV -iṣyati // </s><s> evaṃ RAKT -ena RĀG -asya SIDDH -ir na SAH -a nā SAH -a / RĀG -avat SARVADHARM -āṇāṃ SIDDH -ir na SAH -a nā SAH -a // </s><s> iti PRATIṢEDH -āt KUT -aḥ SAMĀN -a @ KĀL -atā BHĀV -ānāṃ MARAṆ -a @ BHAV - @ OPAPATT -i @ BHAV -ayor iti ? ataḥ SAH -a @ BHĀV -o VINEY -a @ JAN -a @

line.left: - @ ĀNUBODH -aḥ <g/> ; TATR -a na KASYACID DHARM -asya ūnatvaṃ vā PŪRṆ -atvaṃ vā / </s><s> SARVADHARM -ā iti DHARMADHĀT -or ETAD ADHIVACAN -am / </s><s> na ca DHARMADHĀT -or ūnatvaṃ vā PŪRṆ -atvaṃ vā / </s><s> TAT kasya HET -oḥ ? </s><s> ANANT -o hi DHARMADHĀT -uḥ / </s><s> na hi SAT tva DHĀT -ośca DHAR -mad HĀT -ośca NĀN -ātvam UPALABH -yate <g/> ; n <g/> ^ <g/> āpi SAT tva DHĀT -or vā DHAR -mad HĀT -or vā ūnatvaṃ vā PŪRṆ -atvaṃ v OPALABH -yate vā SAṂVID -yate vā / </s><s> ya evam ANUBODH -aḥ <g/> ; iyam UC -yate
line.right: -ir iti / </s><s> ten OC -yate — na BUDDH -a @ DHARM -āṇāmūnatvaṃ vā PŪRṆ -atvaṃ vā PRAJÑĀY -ata iti / </s><s> a NŪN -atva PŪRṆ -at VAMIT -i SUVIKRĀNTAVIKRĀM -in YATHĀVAD a @ VIKALP -asya YATHĀBHŪT -a @ DARŚAN -asy AITAD ADHIVACAN -am / </s><s> na TATR -a ŚAKY -aṃ KENACID UTKṢEP -tuṃ vā PRAKṢEP -tuṃ vā / </s><s> ya evam ANUBODH -aḥ <g/> ; iyam UC -yate BODH -ir iti / </s><s> BODH -ir iti SUVIKRĀNTAVIKRĀM -in BUDDH -a @ LAKṢAṆ -am ETAT / </s><s> KATHAṂ BUDDH -a @ LAKṢAṆ -am ? </s><s> SARVADHARM -a @ LAKṢAṆ -āny a @ LAKṢAṆ -am <g/> ;

line.right: -iḥ <g/> ; KUT -o BODHISATTV -a @ DHARM -āḥ ? ya evaṃ DHARM -aṃ PRAJĀN -anti <g/> ; na te BHŪY -o ABHŪT ĀRAMBAṆ -e CAR -anti / </s><s> na te BHŪY -aḥ KAṂCID DHARM -aṃ MANYANT -e / </s><s> ten OC -yate — a @ CARY -ā BODHISATTV -a @ CAR -eti / </s><s> na BODHISATTV -āḥ KALP -e na VIKALP -e CAR -anti / </s><s> YATR -a ca na KALP -o na VIKALP -aḥ <g/> ; na TATR -a KĀC -ic CARY -ā / </s><s> YATR -a cā VIKALP -aḥ <g/> ; na TATR -a KASYACIC -c ARY -ā / </s><s> BUDDH -a
