line.left: ŚĀKY -a @ RṢABH -anā MAGH -eyāḥ SARV -eṣu co RĀHUL -a NĀM -a PUTR -āḥ / ĀNANDAN -āmā PARICĀR -a @ KĀŚ -ca KAPILĀHVAY -āḥ PRAVRAJIT -āś ca SARV -e // <g/> 2 — 13 <g/> // </s><s> AGR -e YUG -aṃ KOLIT -a @ ŚĀRIPUTR -ā SAMAN -āma SARV -e ca a @ BHŪṢ -i TĀY -inaḥ / SAMAN -ā @ MIK -ā co tada LOKADHĀT -uḥ SARV -e api c OTPANN -a KAṢĀY -a @ KĀL -e // <g/> 2 — 14 <g/> // </s><s> SARV -e MAY -ā SAT KṚT -a te NARENDR -ā imāṃ CAR -antena mi
line.right: -i @ CĀRIK -ām / YĀV -anti co KĀC -i JIN -āna PŪJ -ā SARV -ā KṚT -ā etu SAMĀDH -imeṣatā // <g/> 2 — 15 <g/> // </s><s> PRATIPATT -iya eṣa SAMĀDH -i LABH -yate BAH -u PRAKĀR -ā PRATIPATT -ir UKT -ā / GUṆ -eṣu SARV -eṣu PRATIṢṬHIT -asya na DURLABHAS -tasya SAMĀDH -ir eṣaḥ // <g/> 2 — 16 <g/> // </s><s> RAS -eṣv a @ GṚDHRAS -ya a @ LOLUP -asya KUL -eṣv a @ SAKT -asya an @ ĪRṢUK -asya / MAT -rī VIHĀR -asya a @ MATSAR -asya na DURLABHAS -tasya SAMĀDH -ir eṣaḥ // <g/>

line.left: <g/> āpy atha LOKADHĀT -um / ye PAŚCIM -e KĀL -i MAH -ā @ BHAYĀNAK -e SAMĀDH -i ŚRUTV -ā imu DHĀR -ayeyuḥ // <g/> 2 — 28 <g/> // </s><s> PRAKĀŚ -ayitvā imu ĀNUŚAṂS -ā ADHYEṢAT -e ŚĀST -u SVAY -aṃ SVAYAṂBH -ūḥ / PARINIRVṚT -asya MAM -a PAŚC -i @ KĀL -e SAMĀDH -i DHĀR -etha imaṃ VIŚUDDH -am // <g/> 2 — 29 <g/> // </s><s> ye KEC -i BUDDH -ā DAŚ -asu DIŚ -āsu ATĪT -a @ KĀL -e api ca PRATYUTPANN -āḥ / SARV -e JIN -ā a @ TRA SAMĀDH -i @ ŚIKṢIT -ā BUDH -yanti
line.right: -iṃ VIRAJ -ām a @ SAṂSKṚT -ām // <g/> 2 — 30 <g/> // </s><s> iti ŚRĪ SAMĀDHIRĀJ -e ŚĀLENDRARĀJ -a @ PŪRVAYOG -a @ PARIVART -o NĀM -a DVITĪY -aḥ // 3 BHŪT a @ GUṆ -a @ VARṆ -a @ PRAKĀŚAN -a @ PARIVART -aḥ / TATR -a BHAGAV -ān punar api CANDRAPRABH -aṃ KUMĀRABHŪT -am ĀMANTR -ayate sma — </s><s> TASMĀT TARH -iṃ KUMĀR -a yo BODHISATTV -o MAHĀSATTV -a ĀKĀṄKṢ -ati TATHĀGAT -asy ĀRHAT -aḥ SAMYAKSAṂBUDDH -asya BHŪT aṃ BUDDH -a @ GUṆ -a @ VARṆ -aṃ SAṂPRAK - @ ĀŚAYIT -uṃ no c ĀRTH -ato vā VYAÑJAN

line.left: NIDHĀN -u PAṆḌIT -ena / MAR -u manuja SPṚH -aṃ JAN -enti TATR -a sa ca DHAN -u deti NIRUTTAR -aṃ PRAJĀN -ām // <g/> 3 — 33 <g/> // </s><s> tasma imi ŚRUṆ -itva ĀNUŚAṂS -āṃ PARAM -a @ PRAṆĪT -ayaḥ KĪRTIT -ā JIN -ena / SARV -a JAH -iya JÑĀTR -a @ LĀBH -a @ SAUKHY -amimu VAR -am UDDIŚAT -hā SAMĀDH -i ŚĀNT -am // <g/> 3 — 34 <g/> // </s><s> ye KEC -i BUDDH -ā DIŚAT -ā su @ NIRVṚT -ā ANĀGAT -ā ye api ca PRATYUTPANN -āḥ / SARV -e ca ŚIKṢ -itva iha SAMĀDH -au
line.right: -iṃ VIBUDDH -ā a @ TUL -ām ACINTIY -ām // <g/> 3 — 35 <g/> // </s><s> CANDRAPRABH -aḥ KUMĀR -u HṚṢṬ -a @ CITT -aḥ PURAT -u JIN -asya STH -i @ HIT -va VĀC -a BHĀṢ -ī / ahu PURUṢ -a @ VARASY -a NIRVṚT -asya su @ KISAR -i KĀL -i IDAṂ DHAR -iṣye SŪTR -am // <g/> 3 — 36 <g/> // </s><s> KĀY -a ahu TYAJ -itva JĪVIT -aṃ ca TATH api ca SAUKHY -a ya DAS -ti LOK -e / TATR -a ahu MAH -ā @ BHAY -e api KĀL -e imu VAR -u ŚĀNT -a

line.left: SVĀGAT -am / </s><s> TATH -a SAṂGṚHĪT -vā PRIY -a @ VADYAT -āya KĀRUṆYAT -āṃ TATR -a UPASTHAPET -i // <g/> 9 — 61 <g/> // </s><s> yo BHO -ti BĀL -āna HIT - @ ĀNUKAMP -ī tasy <g/> ^ <g/> aiva BĀL -ā VYASAN -ena TUṢṬ -āḥ / etena DOṢ -eṇa JAH -itva BĀL -ān MṚG -ovadeko VIHAR -ed ARAṆY -e // <g/> 9 — 62 <g/> // </s><s> ima ĪDṚŚ -ān DOṢ -a VID -itva PAṆḌIT -o na JĀT -u BĀL -ehi KAR -oti SAṂGAT -im / VIH -īna PRAJÑĀN -upa SEV -ato me SVARG -āt tu HĀN -iḥ KUT -a
line.right: -i LAPSY -e // <g/> 9 — 63 <g/> // </s><s> MAITR -ī @ VIHĀR -ī ca BHAV -anti PAṆḌIT -āḥ KARUṆ -ā @ VIHĀR -ī MUDIT -ā @ VIHĀR -ī / UPEKṢ -akāḥ SARV -a @ BHAV -eṣu NITY -aṃ SAMĀDH -i BHĀV - @ ETV -a SPṚŚ -anti BODH -im // <g/> 9 — 64 <g/> // </s><s> te BODH -i BUDDH -itva ŚIV -ā @ MAŚ -okāṃ VID -itva SATTV -ān JAN -a @ VYĀDH -i @ PĪḌIT -ān / KĀRUṆYAT -āṃ TATR -a UPASTHAPET -vā KATH -āṃ KATH -enti PARAMĀRTH -a @ YUKT -ām // <g/> 9 —

line.left: JAH -itva BĀL -ān MṚG -ovadeko VIHAR -ed ARAṆY -e // <g/> 9 — 62 <g/> // </s><s> ima ĪDṚŚ -ān DOṢ -a VID -itva PAṆḌIT -o na JĀT -u BĀL -ehi KAR -oti SAṂGAT -im / VIH -īna PRAJÑĀN -upa SEV -ato me SVARG -āt tu HĀN -iḥ KUT -a BODH -i LAPSY -e // <g/> 9 — 63 <g/> // </s><s> MAITR -ī @ VIHĀR -ī ca BHAV -anti PAṆḌIT -āḥ KARUṆ -ā @ VIHĀR -ī MUDIT -ā @ VIHĀR -ī / UPEKṢ -akāḥ SARV -a @ BHAV -eṣu NITY -aṃ SAMĀDH -i BHĀV - @ ETV -a SPṚŚ -anti
line.right: -im // <g/> 9 — 64 <g/> // </s><s> te BODH -i BUDDH -itva ŚIV -ā @ MAŚ -okāṃ VID -itva SATTV -ān JAN -a @ VYĀDH -i @ PĪḌIT -ān / KĀRUṆYAT -āṃ TATR -a UPASTHAPET -vā KATH -āṃ KATH -enti PARAMĀRTH -a @ YUKT -ām // <g/> 9 — 65 <g/> // </s><s> ye tāṃ VIJĀN -anti JIN -āna DHARMAT -āman ĀBHILAPY -aṃ SUGAT -āna SATY -am / te DHARM -a ŚRUTV -ā ima EVARŪP -āṃ LAPS -yanti KṢĀNT -i ARIY -āṃ NIRĀMIṢ -ām // <g/> 9 — 66 <g/> // </s><s> iti ŚRĪ SAMĀDHIRĀJ -e GAMBHĪR -a @ DHARM -a

line.left: // <g/> 9 — 62 <g/> // </s><s> ima ĪDṚŚ -ān DOṢ -a VID -itva PAṆḌIT -o na JĀT -u BĀL -ehi KAR -oti SAṂGAT -im / VIH -īna PRAJÑĀN -upa SEV -ato me SVARG -āt tu HĀN -iḥ KUT -a BODH -i LAPSY -e // <g/> 9 — 63 <g/> // </s><s> MAITR -ī @ VIHĀR -ī ca BHAV -anti PAṆḌIT -āḥ KARUṆ -ā @ VIHĀR -ī MUDIT -ā @ VIHĀR -ī / UPEKṢ -akāḥ SARV -a @ BHAV -eṣu NITY -aṃ SAMĀDH -i BHĀV - @ ETV -a SPṚŚ -anti BODH -im // <g/> 9 — 64 <g/> // </s><s> te
line.right: -i BUDDH -itva ŚIV -ā @ MAŚ -okāṃ VID -itva SATTV -ān JAN -a @ VYĀDH -i @ PĪḌIT -ān / KĀRUṆYAT -āṃ TATR -a UPASTHAPET -vā KATH -āṃ KATH -enti PARAMĀRTH -a @ YUKT -ām // <g/> 9 — 65 <g/> // </s><s> ye tāṃ VIJĀN -anti JIN -āna DHARMAT -āman ĀBHILAPY -aṃ SUGAT -āna SATY -am / te DHARM -a ŚRUTV -ā ima EVARŪP -āṃ LAPS -yanti KṢĀNT -i ARIY -āṃ NIRĀMIṢ -ām // <g/> 9 — 66 <g/> // </s><s> iti ŚRĪ SAMĀDHIRĀJ -e GAMBHĪR -a @ DHARM -a @ KṢĀNT -i @ PARIVART -o NĀM -a NAVAM -aḥ

line.left: BHAUM -ān DEV - @ ĀNUPĀDĀY -a YĀVAD BRAHMALOK -aṃ PARAṂPAR -ayā ŚABD -a @ MUD -ī @ RAY -ām āsuḥ GHOṢ -am ANUŚRĀVAY -ām āsuḥ — </s><s> ABHĀVASAMUDGAT -o BAT - @ ĀYAṂ TATHĀGAT -o BHAV -iṣyati <g/> ; </s><s> yo JĀT -a @ MĀTR -a evo PARY - @ ANTARĪKṢ -e SAPT -a @ TĀL -a @ MĀTR -am ABHYUDGAM -ya SAPT -a PAD -ān-i PRAKRAM -itvā a @ BHĀV -a @ ŚABD -am UDĪR -ayati / </s><s> iti hy ABHĀVASAMUDGAT -o ABHĀVASAMUDGAT -a iti tasya TATHĀGAT -asya nā MADH -eya MUD -a @ PĀD -i / </s><s> tasya ca BHAGAV -ato
line.right: -i @ PRĀPT -asya SARV -a @ VṚKṢ -a @ PAT -rebhyaḥ SARVAT -ṛṇa GULM - @ AUṢADH -i @ VANASPAT -ibhyaḥ SARV -a @ ŚAIL -a @ ŚIKHAR -ebhyaś c ĀBHĀVASAMUDGAT -a @ ŚABD -o NIŚCAR -ati / </s><s> YĀVAT i ca TATR -a LOKADHĀT -au ŚABD -a @ PRAJÑAPT -iḥ SARVAT -o ABHĀVASAMUDGAT -a @ VIJÑAPT -i @ ŚABD -o NIŚCAR -ati / </s><s> tena ca KUMĀR -a KĀL -ena tena SAMAY -ena tasya BHAGAV -ato ABHĀVASAMUDGAT -asya TATHĀGAT -asy ĀRHAT -aḥ SAMYAKSAṂBUDDH -asya PRAVACAN -e MAHĀKARUṆĀCINT -ī NĀM -a RĀJ -a @ KUMĀR -o abhū DABH -i @ RŪP

line.left: tena c <g/> ^^ <g/> aivaṃ KUŚAL -ena KARM -aṇā ĀRĀGAY -ī VIṂŚAT -i BUDDH -a @ KOṬ -yaḥ / teṣāṃ ca SARV -eṣu JIN -āna ANTIK - @ ĀDIM -aṃ VAR -aṃ ŚĀNT -a SAMĀDH -i BHĀVAY -ī // <g/> 8 — 10 <g/> // </s><s> sa PAŚC -i @ KĀL -e abhu BUDDH -a LOK -e SUCINTITĀRTH -o SAD a @ NĀMADHEY -aḥ / KṚTV -ā ca ARTH -aṃ BAH -u PRĀṆ -a @ KOṬ -ināṃ sa PAŚC -ak @ ĀLAS -mi ŚIKH -īva NIRVṚT -aḥ // <g/> 8 — 11 <g/> // </s><s> tasm ĀDDH -i ya ICCHAT -i
line.right: -i BUDDH -ituṃ SATTV -āṃś ca UTT -a @ RĀY -ituṃ BHAV - @ ĀRṆAV -āt / DHĀR -eta SŪTR -amimu BUDDH -a @ VARṆIT -aṃ na DURLABH -ā BHEṢ -yati so AGR -a @ BODH -iḥ // <g/> 8 — 12 <g/> // </s><s> iti ŚRĪ SAMĀDHIRĀJ -e ABHĀVASAMUDGAT -a @ PARIVART -o NĀM - @ ĀṢṬAM -aḥ // </s><s> 8 // 19 a @ CINTY -a @ BUDDH -a @ DHARM -a @ NIRDEŚ -a @ PARIVART -aḥ / TASMĀT TARH -i KUMĀR -a BODHISATTV -ena MAHĀSATTV -e NEM -aṃ SAMĀDH -im ĀKĀṄKṢ -atā a @ CINTY -a @ BUDDH

line.left: -i BHĀVAY -ī // <g/> 8 — 10 <g/> // </s><s> sa PAŚC -i @ KĀL -e abhu BUDDH -a LOK -e SUCINTITĀRTH -o SAD a @ NĀMADHEY -aḥ / KṚTV -ā ca ARTH -aṃ BAH -u PRĀṆ -a @ KOṬ -ināṃ sa PAŚC -ak @ ĀLAS -mi ŚIKH -īva NIRVṚT -aḥ // <g/> 8 — 11 <g/> // </s><s> tasm ĀDDH -i ya ICCHAT -i BODH -i BUDDH -ituṃ SATTV -āṃś ca UTT -a @ RĀY -ituṃ BHAV - @ ĀRṆAV -āt / DHĀR -eta SŪTR -amimu BUDDH -a @ VARṆIT -aṃ na DURLABH -ā BHEṢ -yati so AGR -a @
line.right: -iḥ // <g/> 8 — 12 <g/> // </s><s> iti ŚRĪ SAMĀDHIRĀJ -e ABHĀVASAMUDGAT -a @ PARIVART -o NĀM - @ ĀṢṬAM -aḥ // </s><s> 8 // 19 a @ CINTY -a @ BUDDH -a @ DHARM -a @ NIRDEŚ -a @ PARIVART -aḥ / TASMĀT TARH -i KUMĀR -a BODHISATTV -ena MAHĀSATTV -e NEM -aṃ SAMĀDH -im ĀKĀṄKṢ -atā a @ CINTY -a @ BUDDH -a @ DHARM -a @ NIRDEŚ -a @ KUŚAL -ena BHAVITAVY -am / </s><s> a @ CINTY -a @ BUDDH -a @ DHARM -a @ PARIPṚCCH -aka @ JĀTIK -ena BHAVITAVY -am / </s><s> a @ CINTY -a

line.left: ĀBHIJÑ -ā @ PARIKARM -a @ NIRDEŚ -ena / </s><s> AYAM UC -yate KUMĀR -a TATHĀGAT -a @ KĀY -a iti // atha KHAL -u BHAGAV -āṃs tasyāṃ VELĀY -ām imā GĀTH -ā a @ BHĀṢ -ata — </s><s> ya ICCH -e LOKANĀTH -asya KĀY -aṃ JĀNIT -um ĪDṚŚ -am / imaṃ SAMĀDH -iṃ BHĀVIT -vā KĀY -aṃ BUDDH -asya JÑĀ -syati // <g/> 22 — 1 <g/> // </s><s> PUṆY -a @ NIRJĀT -u BUDDH -asya KĀY -aḥ ŚUDDH -aḥ PRABHĀSVAR -aḥ / SAMET -i so ANTARĪKṢ -eṇa NĀN -ātvaṃ nāsya LABH -yate // <g/> 22 — 2 <g/> // </s><s> YĀDṚŚ -ā
line.right: -ir BUDDH -asya LAKṢAṆ -āni ca TĀDṚŚ -āḥ / YĀDṚŚ -ā LAKṢAṆ -ās tasya KĀY -as tasya hi TĀDṚŚ -aḥ // <g/> 22 — 3 <g/> // </s><s> SAṂBODH -i @ LAKṢAṆ -aḥ KĀY -o BUDDHAKṢETR -aṃ hi TĀDṚŚ -am / BAL -ā VIMOKṢ -ā DHYĀN -āni SARV -e te apy EK -a @ LAKṢAṆ -āḥ // <g/> 22 — 4 <g/> // </s><s> evaṃ SAṂBHAV -u BUDDH -ānāṃ LOKANĀTH -āna ĪDṚŚ -aḥ / na JĀT -u kena CICCHAK -yaṃ PAŚY -ituṃ MĀṂS -a @ CAKṢUṢ -ā // <g/> 22 — 5 <g/> // </s><s> BAH -ū evaṃ PRAVAK -ṣyanti DṚṢṬ -o me

line.left: / KĀY -o NIRABHILĀPY -o me DURVIJÑEY -o NIDARŚIT -aḥ // <g/> 22 — 21 <g/> // </s><s> DHARMAKĀY -o MAHĀVĪR -o DHARM -eṇa KĀY -a NIRJIT -o / na JĀT -u RŪPAKĀY -eṇa ŚAKY -aṃ PRAJÑĀPIT -uṃ JIN -o // <g/> 22 — 22 <g/> // </s><s> KATH -ā @ NIRDEŚ -u yasyaitaṃ ŚRUTV -ā PRĪT -ir BHAV -iṣyati / na tasya MĀR -aḥ PĀPĪY -ān AVATĀR -aṃ LABH -iṣyati // <g/> 22 — 23 <g/> // </s><s> ŚRUTV -ā ca DHARM -aṃ GAMBHĪR -aṃ yasya TRĀS -o na BHEṢ -yati / na cāsau JĪVIT - @ ĀRTHĀY -a BUDDH -a @
line.right: -iṃ PRATIKṢIP -et // <g/> 22 — 24 <g/> // </s><s> BHŪTAKOṬ -ī @ SAHASR -āṇāṃ BHŪT a @ NIRDEŚ -a JÑĀ -syati / ĀLOK -a @ BHŪT o LOK -ānāṃ yena yena GAM -iṣyati // <g/> 22 — 25 <g/> // </s><s> TATR -a KUMĀR -a TATHĀGAT -asya KĀY -o NIMITT -a @ KARM -aṇ <g/> ^ <g/> āpi na SUKAR -aṃ JÑĀT -um / </s><s> NĪL -o vā NĪL -a @ VARṆ -o vā NĪL -a @ NIDARŚAN -o vā NĪL -a @ NIRBH -āso vā / </s><s> PĪT -o vā PĪT -a @ VARṆ -o vā PĪT -a @ NIDARŚAN -o

line.left: PRAKĀŚ -enti PRAŚĀNT -a @ NIRVṚT -iṃ DUḤKH -asya anto ayu BHIKṢ -ave ti <g/> // <g/> 1 — 9 <g/> // </s><s> UDĀR -a @ STHĀM - @ ĀDHIGAT -āś ca ye NAR -āḥ PUṆY -air UPET -ās TATH -a BUDDH -a @ DARŚAN -aiḥ / PRATYEKAYĀN -aṃ ca VADANT -i teṣāṃ SAṂVARṆAY -anto ima DHARM -a @ NETR -īm <g/> // <g/> 1 — 10 <g/> // </s><s> ye c <g/> ^ <g/> āpi ANY -e SUGAT -asya PUTR -ā ANUTTAR -aṃ JÑĀN -a GAVEṢ -amāṇāḥ / VIVIDH -āṃ KRIY -āṃ KURV -iṣu SARV -a @ KĀL -aṃ teṣāṃ pi
line.right: -āya VADANT -i VARṆ -am <g/> // <g/> 1 — 11 <g/> // </s><s> ŚṚṆOM -i PAŚ -yāmi ca MAÑJUGHOṢ -a iha STHIT -o ĪDṚŚ -akāni TATR -a / ANY -ā VIŚEṢ -āṇa SAHASR -a @ KOṬ -yaḥ PRADEŚ -a @ MĀTR -aṃ tatu VARṆAYIṢY -e <g/> // <g/> 1 — 12 <g/> // </s><s> PAŚ -yāmi KṢETR -eṣu BAH -ūṣu c <g/> ^ <g/> āpi ye BODHISATTV -ā yatha GAṄG -a @ VĀLIK -āḥ / KOṬ -ī @ SAHASR -āṇi an @ ALP -akāni VIVIDH -ena VĪRY -eṇa JAN -enti BODH -im <g/> // <g/> 1 — 13 <g/> // </s><s> DAD

line.left: -āṃ KURV -iṣu SARV -a @ KĀL -aṃ teṣāṃ pi BODH -āya VADANT -i VARṆ -am <g/> // <g/> 1 — 11 <g/> // </s><s> ŚṚṆOM -i PAŚ -yāmi ca MAÑJUGHOṢ -a iha STHIT -o ĪDṚŚ -akāni TATR -a / ANY -ā VIŚEṢ -āṇa SAHASR -a @ KOṬ -yaḥ PRADEŚ -a @ MĀTR -aṃ tatu VARṆAYIṢY -e <g/> // <g/> 1 — 12 <g/> // </s><s> PAŚ -yāmi KṢETR -eṣu BAH -ūṣu c <g/> ^ <g/> āpi ye BODHISATTV -ā yatha GAṄG -a @ VĀLIK -āḥ / KOṬ -ī @ SAHASR -āṇi an @ ALP -akāni VIVIDH -ena VĪRY -eṇa JAN -enti
line.right: -im <g/> // <g/> 1 — 13 <g/> // </s><s> DAD -anti DĀN -āni TATH ^ <g/> aiva KECID DHAN -aṃ HIRAṆY -aṃ RAJAT -aṃ SUVARṆ -am / MUKT -ā @ MAṆ -iṃ ŚAṄKHAŚIL -ā @ PRAVĀL -aṃ DĀS -āṃś ca DĀS -ī RATH -a @ AŚV -a @ EḌAK -ān <g/> // <g/> 1 — 14 <g/> // </s><s> ŚIB -i @ KĀS tathā RATN -a @ VIBHŪṢIT -āś ca DAD -anti DĀN -āni PRAHṚṢṬ -a @ MĀNAS -āḥ / PARIṆĀMAY -anto iha AGR -a @ BODH -au VAYAṂ hi YĀN -asya BHAV -ema LĀBH -inaḥ <g/> // <g/> 1 —

line.left: -ī @ SAHASR -āṇi an @ ALP -akāni VIVIDH -ena VĪRY -eṇa JAN -enti BODH -im <g/> // <g/> 1 — 13 <g/> // </s><s> DAD -anti DĀN -āni TATH ^ <g/> aiva KECID DHAN -aṃ HIRAṆY -aṃ RAJAT -aṃ SUVARṆ -am / MUKT -ā @ MAṆ -iṃ ŚAṄKHAŚIL -ā @ PRAVĀL -aṃ DĀS -āṃś ca DĀS -ī RATH -a @ AŚV -a @ EḌAK -ān <g/> // <g/> 1 — 14 <g/> // </s><s> ŚIB -i @ KĀS tathā RATN -a @ VIBHŪṢIT -āś ca DAD -anti DĀN -āni PRAHṚṢṬ -a @ MĀNAS -āḥ / PARIṆĀMAY -anto iha AGR -a @
line.right: -au VAYAṂ hi YĀN -asya BHAV -ema LĀBH -inaḥ <g/> // <g/> 1 — 15 <g/> // </s><s> TRAIDHĀTUK -e ŚREṢṬH -a @ VIŚIṢṬ -a @ YĀN -aṃ yad BUDDHAYĀN -aṃ SUGAT -ehi VARṆIT -am / AHAṂ pi tasyo BHAV -i KṢIPR -a LĀBH -ī DAD -anti DĀN -āni imī DṚŚĀN -i <g/> // <g/> 1 — 16 <g/> // </s><s> CATU -r HAY -air YUKT -a @ RATH -āṃś ca KECIT sa VEDIK -ān PUṢPADHVAJ -air ALAṂKṚT -ān / sa VAIJAYANT -ān RATANĀMAY -āni DAD -anti DĀN -āni TATH ^ <g/> aiva KECIT // <g/> 1 — 17 <g/> // </s><s> DAD

line.left: pi tasyo BHAV -i KṢIPR -a LĀBH -ī DAD -anti DĀN -āni imī DṚŚĀN -i <g/> // <g/> 1 — 16 <g/> // </s><s> CATU -r HAY -air YUKT -a @ RATH -āṃś ca KECIT sa VEDIK -ān PUṢPADHVAJ -air ALAṂKṚT -ān / sa VAIJAYANT -ān RATANĀMAY -āni DAD -anti DĀN -āni TATH ^ <g/> aiva KECIT // <g/> 1 — 17 <g/> // </s><s> DAD -anti PUTR -āṃś ca TATH ^ <g/> aiva PUTR -īḥ PRIY -āṇi MĀṂS -āni DAD -anti KECIT / HAST -āṃś ca PĀD -āṃś ca DAD -anti YĀCIT -āḥ PARYEṢ -amāṇā IMAM - @ AGR -a @
line.right: -im <g/> // <g/> 1 — 18 <g/> // </s><s> ŚIR -āṃsi KECIN NAYAN -āni KECID DAD -anti KECIT PRAVAR - @ ĀTMABHĀV -ān / datvā ca DĀN -āni PRASANN -a @ CITT -āḥ PRĀRTH -enti JÑĀN -aṃ hi TATHĀGAT -ānām <g/> // <g/> 1 — 19 <g/> // </s><s> PAŚ -yāmy AHAṂ MAÑJ -u ŚIR -ī kahiṃ CIT SPHĪT -āni RĀJY -āni VIVARJAY -itvā / antaḥ PUR -ān DVĪP -a TATH ^ <g/> aiva SARV -ān a @ MĀT - @ YAJÑ -ātīṃśca VIHĀY -a SARV -ān <g/> // <g/> 1 — 20 <g/> // </s><s> UPASAṂKRAM -ī LOK -a @ VINĀYAK
